story:
Viridis3D has been hard at work for the last 2 years developing a new large format of Robotic Additive Manufacturing (our RAM series 3D Printers.)  We've succeeded in creating demo units with build areas from 14x30x12 inches (for the small unit) up to 28x80x24 for the midsized unit.  Check out the Viridis3D Homepage to see how it works.  We can adapt the hardware to a wide range of powders, ink, and print resolutions, since all the components of the system are essentially independent sub-assemblies.  The solution is modular, scalable, and we're really excited about it. 


So far we have developed some materials to provide solutions to the investment casting, sand casting, ceramics, and composites.  These products were created with the help of some great students, and a good deal of hard work here in house.  We've been privately funded by the founders, but we're ready to take the next step, and get these products out into the market so people can start using them. 

Startups can't exactly compete with publically traded companies when it comes to cash, so we're inviting all of you to collaborate with us.  Right now, it's trade show season.  It's time to spawn the next generation of ideas.  Make new life in the rights of spring, so to speak.  In honor of this, we at Viridis3D are here to crowd fund the launch our new generation of industrial 3D printers.

As perks, we're offering up much of our new product line, at discounted rates, for a very limited time.  We've got pre-production units to build, tradeshows to attend, and a team to build to support our vision. Get a 3D printed part by some famous digital artists!  Try our new powders & inks (some of which were crowd sourced to begin with!)  If you're even more motivated, buy a development kit, and develop your own materials.  If you find a winner, we'll work with you to commercialize it on our new manufacturing class 3D printers.

If you're not ready to develop your own materials, and don't have a powder based printer of your own yet, you can still help out the cause.  We've added some swag to the campaign.  Get a cool shirt, or a cooler 3D printed sculpture. Get some printed part samples to talk over with your friends.

Help us extend the reach of additive manufacturing further into real industrial processes. You'll be enabling a collaborative, distributed digital manufacturing network around the world - which will be well suited to serve independent designers, the freelance engineers, and the other little guys.  Who knows what they might invent.

Who are we? Viridis3D is co-founded by James Bredt, Will Shambley, and Andrew Jeffrey - guys who help get 3D printing off the ground at with some of the original 3D printing companies like Z Corp.  We got the ball rolling to create the first 3D printed ceramics service bureau, Figulo.  We've done this before.  Now we have a new, very small team, and we are creating some revolutionary industrial opportunities.

Why are we doing this campaign? Past success aside, getting a new, industrial 3d printing platform ready to go  to market has been a lot of work, and we're looking for a little push across the finish line.  The goal of this campaign is to MOVE our first RAM260 out to some tradeshows, and get more of our team out to support the demos.   As a pre-sales startup, we can't afford to miss this tradeshow season, with so many new hardware and materials solutions to talk about. Your assistance, and interest in the product lines we are launching, will make it possible to rock these shows with all the content and examples that they deserve.

How much are we looking for? We'd like to get at least $20K.  We've got heavy equipment to haul (safely!) from Boston to Ohio, and we need to get 2-4 people out there for some extended stays to run demos, man the shows, and help recruit others to work with us to expand the industrial applications of 3DP.  Anything and everything that we raise beyond that will go straight into development. We have the groundwork laid for a bigger, faster version of this printer, as well as a higher definition unit for fast, high res production parts, and several new materials options. 

We understand that everyone can't contribute to every campaign, so if you like 3D printing, but can't use our current offerings, please pass the link along, and let a few more people know what we're doing.

story:
TIDY-KEY, 

          A GADGET WICH IS UNRIVALED IN ITS CLASS

          A GADGET MADE OF FULL CARBONFIBRE

          A GADGET WITH A TRENDY, TIMELESS AND NEW DESIGN

          A GADGET WICH MAKES OUR EVERYDAY LIFE EASY

TIDY-KEY is the perfect tool to organize your keys and protect your pockets against holes and damage. Besides that, TIDY-KEY stops that annoying jingling of your keys. 

TIDY-KEY is the intelligent solution to sort your keys in a smarter and space-saving way –easy to set-up and maintain! (No assembly tool needed)


By using different lengths of screws (16 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40mm) TIDY-KEY can be expanded to contain any number of keys (up to 26 keys). Missing keys can easily be replaced with our carbon spacer rings.

Use our TIDY-KEY adapter to add big keys (e. g. car keys) to the TIDY-KEY


Always carry your most important data with you by using our perfectly fitting key-shaped USB-stick.

Never ever search for a bottleopener again or misuse a lighter. Upgrade your TIDY-KEY with our carbonfibre bottleopener.

TIDY-KEY is made of full high-class carbonfibre for maximum stability and an elegant carbon fibre look. The shape is designed to contain both round and angularly keys.

TIDY-KEY is designed to hold 99% of all commercial keys. That means suitable keys are all keys with a hole and a length of up to 75mm.

TIDY-KEY is a registered trademark with protected design and form. 

Now we need your help to expand our production, enlarge our engine and to take our project to the next level. As another Addition we are currently developing a lost-and-found Service by manufacturing small inividual and registered ID-Pendants that can be added to the TIDY-KEY.

Futhermore we intend to produce and integrate several matching add-ons like a screwdriver and keyknife as you can see on the first picture. If we are able to do depends on the funding: 



POSSIBLE RISKS:

We have worked hard during the last months organizing our business, developing the design and setting up the production. As of today we have solved the initial problems concerning the substance and the right tooling equipment for cutting out and engraving our brandname on the TIDY-KEY.

However, there are always some issues when a business is growing and you can never be safe that evertything works as intended. We currently plan to start shipping in Mai to have a little margin in case of unscheduled Problems.


We are now ready to change up! - What ails you?

story:
Welcome to Gildshire Collection of Magazines, the new age online magazine stand!

“We live in an aspirational world. Magazines play a very important role in those kind of cues of how to dress, how to entertain, how to travel and have that good life that everyone on the planet seems to want to have” - David Carey, the President of Hearst Magazines, March 2016.


WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

Gildshire is the product of our work and passion to deliver. The company was funded with our savings and from family contributions, hard work and part-time jobs.

Our Magazines are 100% people funded. We have 50 days to raise $85,000 and with your help we can do it! We need your support to carry on, fulfill a dream and give back to thousands of loyal readers a product to enjoy.

Culture, tradition and positive thinking matter, in our magazines there is no place for negativity or sensationalism.  

WHAT IS GILDSHIRE

The idea of Gildshire Collection of Magazine (Gildshire.com) has come from the love of glossy paper magazines and the realization that we cannot stop the progress of technology and media will continue to move online.

Sometimes it is not easy to let go of the beautiful glossy paper magazines that for decades have enhanced our lives.

Those magazines have shaped our lives, telling us what to wear, what to eat, what to think about ourselves and the world around us. How many of you are still standing in front of a shelf of magazines, browsing, wishing you had a chair to sit and forget about everything, hoping the salesperson will not come and ask “how can I help?”.

Printed media is reinventing itself online and as we live a disruptive time, we need to innovate and adapt to the way consumers interact with mobile technology.

We offer our readers a beautiful collection of 18 Magazines to submerge into a relaxed experience and savor “the magazine moment”, as we did for decades with glossy paper magazines.

WHAT WE WILL DO WITH THE FUNDS

Our goal is that Gildshire Magazines will identify with the readers’ interests to develop a personal relationship, and take our Collection on the plane or by the beach, like they did with glossy paper magazines. We are asking for your support not only to pledge funds, but become part of our community and spread the word through your social media.

Every dollar we receive will go towards funding further content and expand program offerings, as well as enhancing the design.

For each magazine we will bring updated news stories and featured articles, editorials, analysis and videos.

Our Collection of 18 Magazines will be full of information, “what’s in” and “what’s out”, enabling our readers to stay up-to-date on trends, dress better and maintain a healthy lifestyle.

We will bring new ideas and help with tips for gardening, organizing the house or offering information for traveling, exercising and staying in shape.


On our main Global Page we have a button that connects our readers with a charity organization. With the help of our readers and their proposals, all 18 Magazines will have a charity button, and as we grow we are committed to give back and help our community.

HOW YOU CAN HELP

Our business is located in San Diego, California and with our rewards will give something back to our supporters to remind them about this experience.

We are happy to offer small presents from San Diego, from a T-shirt or a Calendar, to tickets to Sea World or the famous San Diego Zoo. We are also inviting businesses to make this journey and grow together, advertise and be featured in the Gildshire Collection.

We very much appreciate your support to bring Gildshire.com to more readers around the world!

THE TEAM

                                          

                 


Gabriela Golumbovici, Founder and CEO

Gabriela has lived on four continents, traveled, worked and studied, meeting different people, learning about their cultures and being grateful for these experiences.

After a Bachelors in Finance and Economics, Masters in Innovation, Creativity and Enterprise, and a Masters of Business Administration, Gabriela started a University teaching career. She decided to follow her passion for media and magazines, left a Marketing Lecturer and University Business Department Leader position, to embrace a challenge and do what she loves.

John Laprise, Advisor and Editor

John is an expert Internet Public Policy Strategist, has a PhD and is a former Northwestern University Professor. He has worked for start-ups all the way up to Fortune 500 clients, sovereign foreign governments and the United Nations. He wrote a history of the White House computer and information technology policy and adoption. Through his wide experience, John offers great support and advice to our company.

Matt Cullerton, Advisor

Matt is an experienced engineer with a Bachelor in Business Administration and Computer Science, and is the CTO of a very successful startup. Due to his experience, he offers Gildshiregreat technical support when needed.

Michael Chuang, Product Development Advisor

Michael has worked as Lead Engineer and had a substantial contribution in developing the site. He has a Bachelor Degree in Computer Science. Michael is passionate about coding and developing new ideas, and is also a talented artist.

Allen Gong, Full Stack Developer

Allen is a very talented and dedicated coder and has a Bachelor Degree in Computer Science, currently working on his Master's. He has developed the site, and his structured and organized way of working has brought tremendous quality to the team.

Philip Khristian Perez, Web Designer

Philip is passionate about digital art and design. He has a Bachelor Degree in Computer Science, traveled the world and is a great asset to our team.

Elvira Barucija, Editor

Elvira has a Master Degree in Psychology. She is passionate about writing, is always on trend, and thoroughly researches her topics to offer readers high quality content. She also enjoys working with children and practicing yoga.

Mia Russell, Editor

Mia is a freelance journalist, with over 20 years of experience in the industry. She has worked across a variety of fields, ranging from researcher, writer, and chief copy editor on various magazines and online publications, to freelance travel writer for Exclusive Adventures, Go2Africa and Kuoni Safaris South Africa.

Kim Hastings, Reporter

Kim is a writer of wide scope. In his submissions he strives to shine a new light, offer a new perspective and make our readers smile. Should he accomplish all of those goals in any one piece, he has succeeded. He is a family man, a dedicated husband, father and grandfather.

Cecile Sassus, Editor-at-Large

Cecile has a Masters Degree in European Affairs. She is a French native and has lived in Malaysia, Singapore, UK, South Korea and Netherlands. Cecile is passionate about traveling, reading and writing, and is a talented freelance writer.

Deborah Cecile Catin, Editor

Deborah is an Ottawa-based online freelance writer. Through her educational background in Political Science and Public Policy, she has a broad knowledge base that allows her to cover a variety of different subjects. Fashion, food, travel, current affairs and health are some of the subjects she is most passionate about.

Jamie McConnell, Editor - Golf Magazine

Jamie has a Foundation Degree in Professional Golf Studies from the University of Birmingham. He lives in Dubai where he is an accomplished teaching professional and coach for both professionals and amateurs. His passion for golf makes him seasoned and talented writer about the sport he loves.

Emmaline Soken-Huberty, Contributor

Emmaline Soken-Huberty is a freelance writer and editor living in Salem, OR with her husband and pet hedgehog.

Rebecca Smith, Contributor

Rebecca has a Bachelors degree in English, as well as an Associates in Paralegal Studies. She enjoys researching and writing.

Note regarding perks:

  • Estimated Delivery: December 2016
  • Ships to: Anywhere in the world
  • Businesses that are against our policy will not be advertised: drugs, sex, weaponry, gambling, promoting racism, discrimination and hate speech
  • Choice of dates is subject to availability

story:
- - - English Version below - - -


PiggyBank – ein Programm, das Jeden wie einen Millionär behandelt!


Problem:

Deutschland steht vor drei gesellschaftsrelevanten Problemen:

-  66% der Deutschen sind besorgt wenn es um ihre Altersvorsoge geht (Accenture GmbH, 2012)

-  Frauen bekommen nur 55% der Rente von Männern (OECD, 2012)

-  Die unteren 50% der Deutschen halten 1% des Vermögens in Deutschland (Bundesministerium für Arbeit und Soziales, 2013)

Trotz des technologischen Fortschritts gibt es weiterhin eine große Lücke zwischen Sparprogrammen, die heute angeboten werden (bspw Riester-Rente) und Sparprogrammen, die vor allem junge Personen benötigen.

Wer weniger als 100€ im Monat sparen möchte, wird weder von einer Bank noch von einem Vermögensverwalter unterstützt. Da ich selbst vor diesem Problem stande, möchte ich dieser Personengruppe jetzt helfen. Als ich die Bundeswehr verließ, musste ich mich um meine eigene Altersvorsorge kümmern und war vom Angebot an Aktien, Anleihen, ETFs, Fonds und mehr überwältigt und überfordert. Ich dachte:

„Da muss es einen besseren Weg geben!”


Lösung:

Wir bitten dich eine Packung Zigaretten weniger zu rauchen bzw ein Bier oder Kaffee weniger zu trinken und mindestens 5€ pro Monat für deine eigene Zukunft zu sparen!

Mit unserem Programm kannst du dieses Geld anlegen und wir investieren es für dich. Als Entscheidungsgrundlage für die Investitionen dienen deine Wünsche und Vorstellungen.

PiggyBank löst das  Problem deiner Altersvorsorge und hilft dir kleine Summen zu investieren!


Geschäftsmodell:

Unser Programm basiert auf Beitragsgebühren:

- 1€ Mitgliedsbeitrag für Konten kleiner als 2.500€

- 0,5% p.a. Gebühren für größere Konten.

Zusätzlich planen wir Einnahmen über Werbung & Affiliate Marketing.

PiggyBank ist dein persönlicher Finanzberater für 12€ pro Jahr!


Markt:

PiggyBank konzentriert sich auf Privatpersonen. Hauptsächlich Personen unter 30, da diese Generation an Smartphone und Technik gewöhnt sind. Das Modell von traditionellen Banken verschwindet für junge Personen immer mehr.

Aufgrund rechtlicher Beschränkungen kann unser Programm vorerst nur in Deutschland angeboten werden. Wenn der Markt PiggyBank akzeptiert haben wir die Möglichkeit innerhalb der Europäischen Union unseren Markt zu vergrößern.


Vorschau auf das End-Produkt:


Vorteil gegenüber traditionellen Programmen:

Wenn wir unsere Gespräche mit Banken/Vermögensverwaltern abschließen, können wir dir ein kostengünstiges Sparprogramm anbieten. Anhand weniger Basis-Entscheidungen, die du am Anfang treffen musst, kümmern wir uns mit dir um dein Geld und mithilfe des Zinzes-Zins-Effekts wird dein Geld über die Jahre wachsen.


Aufgrund hoher Regulierungen von Regierung & BaFin (Bundesanstalt für Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht) sowie der Technologie-Seite ist PiggyBank vor der Konkurrenz geschützt. Weitere Eintrittsbarrieren sind unser Know-How über den Kapitalmarkt und seine vielfältigen Produkte.


Unsere Bitte:

Wir werden eine Webseite und eine App für Android & iPhone bauen, damit du leichter auf unser Programm zugreifen kannst. Als Dank für deine Unterstützung werden wir dir in den “Perks“ in den ersten Monaten unseren Mitgliedsbeitrag erlassen, damit du unser Programm kostenlos testen kannst.

Falls du uns nicht finanziell unterstützen möchtest, kannst du uns gern eine E-Mail mit dem Betreff "Online" an "PiggyBankUG@gmail.com" senden, dann werden wir dich informieren sobald PiggyBank für dich bereitsteht. (Deine Mail-Adresse wird rein zu diesem Zweck verwendet und nicht an Dritte weitergegeben).


- - - English Version - - -

Introducing PiggyBank - a program that lets anyone save money like a Millionaire!


Problem:

Germany faces three big challenges:

-  66% of Germans are worried about their financial security (Accenture GmbH, 2012)

-  Women receive only 55% the rent of German men (OECD, 2012)

-  The bottom 50% of Germany own 1% of net Assets (Bundesministerium für Arbeit und Soziales, 2013)

We feel there is a huge gap between saving solutions offered today and what (especially young) people really need to ensure their financial security in retirement. There are Stocks, Bonds, ETFs, Funds & more hardly anyone knows anything about. And no one is assisting you if you have less than 100€ per month to put aside.

I was facing this problem myself when I came out of the German Army and had to take care about my own savings for retirement. So I thought

“There has to be a better way!”


Solution:

Smoke one less pack of cigarettes, drink one less beer or coffee and save at least 5€ per month for your own future!

We will invent a user-friendly program which lets you save small amounts of money without having the trouble to take care about it. PiggyBank invests money on your behalf based on your decisions and wishes.

PiggyBank solves the problem of saving by helping people invest small amounts of money!


Business Modell:

We plan to make money with our subscription fee:

-  1€ fixed Fee per month for accounts smaller than 2.500€

-  0,5% p.a. Fee for larger accounts.

As a side business we want to earn money with Ad revenue & Affiliate Marketing.

PiggyBank lets you have your own Financial Advisor for 12€ per year!


Market:

PiggyBank focuses on the B2C market (Business to Consumer) involving mainly people below 30 years of age, who are used to (and demand) technological simplicity with smartphones.

Due to legal restrictions our customers must be German citizens. If the market accepts our idea we have the possibility to scale our business within the European Union.


Sneak Peek at the Product:


Competitive Advantage:

When we partner with Banks/Asset Management companies we can offer anyone a low-cost saving solution for anyone that is able so safe at least 5€ per month.

We offer you some basic investment decision (as seen in the Product section) and the rest is our job: together we use the compounding effect to grow your money over time.


PiggyBank is protected by high barriers to entry from the fields of law, finance & technology.


Our Plea:

We also want to build a website and mobile app so you can access your account more easily. To thank you for your support our perks make you safe the subscription fee for the first months so you can test PiggyBank for free.

In case you can’t afford to help us financially we would deeply appreciate if you send an email with the subject "Online" to "PiggyBankUG@gmail.com" and we will notify you once PiggyBank is online and ready to secure your financial future. Your mail address will not be used for anything else or forwarded to third parties.

von einem Vermögensverwalter unterstützt. Da ich selbst vor diesem Problem
stande, möchte ich dieser Personengruppe jetzt helfen. Als ich die Bundeswehr

Angebot an Aktien, Anleihen, ETFs, Fonds und mehr überwältigt und überfordert. Ich dachte:

geben!”

Wir bitten dich eine Packung Zigaretten weniger zu rauchen bzw ein Bier

für dich. Als Entscheidungsgrundlage für die Investitionen dienen deine Wünsche
und Vorstellungen.
PiggyBank löst das  Problem deiner Altersvorsorge und hilft dir
kleine Summen zu investieren!

persönlicher Finanzberater für 12€ pro Jahr!

PiggyBank konzentriert sich auf Privatpersonen. Hauptsächlich Personen
unter 30, da diese Generation an Smartphone und Technik gewöhnt sind. Das
Modell von traditionellen Banken verschwindet für junge Personen immer mehr.

Deutschland angeboten werden. Wenn der Markt PiggyBank akzeptiert haben wir die
Möglichkeit innerhalb der Europäischen Union unseren Markt zu vergrößern.

können wir dir ein kostengünstiges Sparprogramm anbieten. Anhand weniger

story: We did not receive the full funding - so we have closed our campaign. We will attempt to still deliver for those who still supported. Thank you for your time.
story_txt: We did not receive the full funding - so we have closed our campaign. We will attempt to still deliver for those who still supported. Thank you for your time.

story:
Our Story

Rachel and I are Acupuncture physicians. We started looking for a device that we could give to patients as a way for them alert us when they needed help. We found that the devices that already exist had limitations that we weren’t willing to deal with: poor range, noisy, expensive, complicated etc. As huge believers in simplicity we knew that there could be a better way. The wheels began to turn and soon the concept for the Room8 button was born.

The Button

Our concept was simple - a device that when activated sends an alert to mobile devices via WiFi without the need for extra hardware, software or subscriptions. We took this concept to Jaycon Systems and in a matter of weeks they delivered our working prototype!

The App

The Room8 can work with mobile devices and computers without an app but we decided that the app would enhance the user experience. The app acts as the user interface where the button can be configured, customized and even controlled. Other useful features such as: a treatment timer to keep track of multiple patient treatments at a time and a location feature for locating misplaced buttons will be incorporated into the app as well.

What We Need  

At this point the Room8 is a working prototype, is patent pending and trademarked. We have a manufacturer and an app developer and our goal is to get funded so we can get a first round of  buttons out. Our backers will be the first to get their hands on the buttons and the app. We will begin taking orders for subsequent button batches after our first batch runs out. There is much more that needs to happen before and after we get there but here is what we need to get started:

If we do not meet our funding goal our objective is to find the means to deliver the perks/rewards promised to our backers regardless!

Timeline

The Team

 

The Room8's evolution from rudimentary concept to computer rendering to working prototype

 

Press:

"The Room8 is also a stand-alone solution. No larger, complex or expensive system is required. This means that even sole practitioners or caretakers can afford it." inc.com

"While smart accessories are often a convenient addition to your home, innovative tech products are also saving lives. One addition to the latter category is Room8..." Home Tech Scoop

Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | YouTube | PressKit

 

Thank You To:

A special thanks goes out to the fantastic players in our video: Tomas Brown, Shawn Butler, Kim Clifford, Kenzie Estes, Doreen Hackett, Rob Houts, Bethany Keenan, Joe Keenan, Mindy Kim, Jorge Mejia Sr., Maggie Mejia, Phoebe Mejia and Ali Owens. You guys rock!

Risks & Challenges:

story:
Restart NOW, Save Our Jobs

A data-driven approach to saving lives, livelihoods and our economic future

It's currently lights-off for much of our country and the world, a first in human history. The Coronavirus is real, but the steps taken to prevent the spread and loss of life are truly damaging, with over 22 MILLION people having already lost their livelihoods as a result of the shelter-in-place directives by local and state governments, even where the virus has barely registered.

In the last 3 years alone the fastest growing small businesses were minority, veteran and women-owned. Now, they're all losing their dreams. Suicide hotlines are spiking to levels we've never witnessed. Without scientific basis, parks and recreation places are being closed. Stress levels in the unemployed are and will cause many of them lifelong health issues.

The sun is shining in America, spring is here, and we need to Save Livelihoods.

We need to know where to restart today.

We need to act now.

Join Restart NOW!

 

Data-driven Approach

We're using big data analytics to show how the rich diversity of our country's social and economic communities can allow us to safely restart the economy on a county by county level, as well as specific industry-focused risk factors. In America, one size does not fit all.

Our group has already built models for Texas and Idaho, which identify areas safe to open up today.

           

Our goal is to educate every American citizen with knowledge of the harm, and the need to restart across the entire USA. You then go and talk with your local and state representatives. After we Restart, help us be good world partners, and broaden these tools to show other countries across the globe why and how to Restart theirs. Poverty must be fought to Save Livelihoods.

Your support helps us get America back to work, and sends a message to the White House and the US Capitol that we Americans agree - it's time to Restart NOW!

 

Who Are We?

We're a data analysis risk company. Among other things, we support and provide tools to help protect people who travel for work, volunteer for NGOs, and non-profits. To date, our customers have visited and used our protective tools in over 95 countries around the globe.

Now we've turned our focus inward, to our homeland. We have significant economic modeling experience from working on Department of Defense and other workforce initiatives. We value every business owner in our communities, and don't want to see anyone else losing their jobs or dreams as a result of this virus. We're devoting every penny and every minute to powering on our communities, our industries, and lighting the way forward for the world.

Let's get Americans back in the sunshine, where we belong, Proud and Free!

 

Contribute Today

We welcome several levels of contribution:

  • Community Supporter
  • Community Builder
  • Community Architect
  • Community Ambassador
  • State Maven
  • Global Maven

 

What You Get

You're helping us help everyone!

This is a public education and empowerment project. Your contribution helps us build this data-driven plan for restarting counties, states, and soon countries around the world.

Everyone gets access to the live site with the economic Restart data, economic and business resources and other Coronavirus information for each new county, state and country that we complete with your support.

Everyone gets resources to help job seekers and those who need other kinds of support.

Starting with Community Builder support level, special support awards will be created using local American businesses to source the awards.

 

The Impact

What we can accomplish with your support:

  • We will build out a data driven plan for each and every state and country to help get our communities and our country back to work, that looks at the actual economic damage from our social and legislative response. Instead of a board of experts, we focus on contacting and working with real business owners and operators so that the Restart happens in the best way for their businesses to thrive again.

  • We can provide you with the facts and statistics to Tell the Truth about the real damages that are growing and compounding every day business owners are not allowed to operate their businesses. People have a right to know the levels of financial loss, depression, suicide, crime and other factors that are increasing in their communities.

  • Build awareness of the vast need to especially support the millions of small businesses, especially restaurants, gyms, small locally owned community retailers, and women and minority owned businesses (which had until now been the fastest growing business ownership groups in the country). We cannot slide back into economic depression, or else the cure will have been far more harmful than the disease.

  • Get the true and up-to-date data and risk analyses in front of those in our local, state, and federal governments that have influence over the reopening of our communities.

 

Stretch Goals

 

 

Stretch goals include modeling out the increases in violent crime, domestic abuse, stress-related health issues and the future burdens on our healthcare systems (these will be showing up for years to come as a result of job loss or bankruptcy), and the interconnected nature of deemed 'essential' and 'non-essential' businesses.

Anecdotal evidence is already indicating, for example, that suicide hotline calls have increased 300% above historical levels, and domestic abuse calls to police and hotlines are also spiking far above normal due to the forced stay at home policies and 'cabin fever' situations.

 

Risks & Challenges

Will it work?

Obviously, we cannot guarantee our data will persuade governments to reopen their economies as quickly as we believe they must. It is possible some governments will refuse for an extended period of time, citing various reasons. Our data will absolutely make it a moral hazard for them to pursue that path and with your help, the pressure will build for Restart NOW.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, but would love to help:

  • Please share what we're doing on your Facebook, LinkedIn, business community, and anywhere else you can think to promote Restart NOW!. Share our videos, promotional materials, and campaign link so that those who feel they can support with contributions will be able to do so. The faster we get this covering the whole country, the faster we will Get America Back To Work Again!
  • Let us know if there is a small business you can forward to us that we can help promote so that they avoid going out of business.

story:
"Rose N Gold" - Cigar Stand

This Rose N Gold EDC keychain cigar stand made from solid brass, when you hold in your hand you will feel solid, heavy duty and ineffable satisfaction. With roses in our signature lightning logo makes a very luxury accessory.


 

Super fine polishing brass

Design

We design two different logos on each side, not only looking good with our CNC rose logos, with the round edge design we also want to make something that you will feel good when hold in hand, therefore; we've created this just want to make sure that you are holding on something feel heavy, bold, and solid all the time. Also, the middle inside hole will be good fit for your cigars. The hole fit perfectly for any size of cigars, and it's great for everydaycarry.

Fit any size of cigar
 

Height: 2.16 inch / 55 mm | Width: 1.37 inch / 35 mm |
Thickness: 0.7 inch / 18 mm | Inside hole diameter: 0.9 inch / 23 mm

Size compare with airpod

Size compare with airpod pro

Size compare with iPhone MAX​

We create from Sketch

 

Dimensions:


Height: 2.16 inch / 55 mm
Width: 1.37 inch / 35 mm
Thickness: 0.7 inch / 18 mm
Inside hole diameter: 0.9 inch / 23 mm

 

Attitude & Lifestyle 

As a result, four words wrap up this project:
Solid, bold, luxury, and low profile...  ^,^
Hope you guys will like it and hope can make it happen.

Cigar rest stand


 

Brass Always

Brass has been used for thousands of years for sterilization as the composition of brass is 70% copper and 30% zinc.

On copper/brass surfaces, bacteria and viruses die. When a microbe lands on a copper surface, the copper releases ions, which are electrically charged particles. Those copper ions blast through the outer membranes and destroy the whole cell, including the DNA or RNA inside. Because their DNA and RNA are destroyed, it also means a bacteria or virus can’t mutate and become resistant to the copper, or pass on genes (like for antibiotic resistance) to other microbes." Michael Schmidt, a professor of microbiology and immunology at the Medical University of South Carolina.

Risks and challenges

If we can hit the goal than we can bring the cost down and make it happen.
story_txt:
"Rose N Gold" - Cigar StandThis Rose N Gold EDC keychain cigar stand made from solid brass, when you hold in your hand you will feel solid, heavy duty and ineffable satisfaction. With roses in our signature lightning logo makes a very luxury accessory.
 Super fine polishing brassDesignWe design two different logos on each side, not only looking good with our CNC rose logos, with the round edge design we also want to make something that you will feel good when hold in hand, therefore; we've created this just want to make sure that you are holding on something feel heavy, bold, and solid all the time. Also, the middle inside hole will be good fit for your cigars. The hole fit perfectly for any size of cigars, and it's great for everydaycarry.
Fit any size of cigar Height: 2.16 inch / 55 mm | Width: 1.37 inch / 35 mm |Thickness: 0.7 inch / 18 mm | Inside hole diameter: 0.9 inch / 23 mmSize compare with airpodSize compare with airpod proSize compare with iPhone MAX​We create from Sketch Dimensions:Height: 2.16 inch / 55 mmWidth: 1.37 inch / 35 mmThickness: 0.7 inch / 18 mmInside hole diameter: 0.9 inch / 23 mm Attitude & Lifestyle As a result, four words wrap up this project:Solid, bold, luxury, and low profile...  ^,^Hope you guys will like it and hope can make it happen.Cigar rest stand Brass AlwaysBrass has been used for thousands of years for sterilization as the composition of brass is 70% copper and 30% zinc.On copper/brass surfaces, bacteria and viruses die. When a microbe lands on a copper surface, the copper releases ions, which are electrically charged particles. Those copper ions blast through the outer membranes and destroy the whole cell, including the DNA or RNA inside. Because their DNA and RNA are destroyed, it also means a bacteria or virus can’t mutate and become resistant to the copper, or pass on genes (like for antibiotic resistance) to other microbes." Michael Schmidt, a professor of microbiology and immunology at the Medical University of South Carolina.Risks and challengesIf we can hit the goal than we can bring the cost down and make it happen.

story:
In 2017, our first project, the Cubiio that started it all, was the most funded fabrication tool ever on Kickstarter. Now we’re back with the 2nd generation - more powerful, much faster, yet still sporting a refined look with a compact footprint. At 2.5" slim, with a diagonal of 25" and a weight of 13 lbs, the Cubiio 2 features a workspace bigger than a standard Letter or A4 size paper, offering you plenty of room to flex your creative muscle.  

 

Metal Engraving

Thanks to the latest advances in semiconductor laser technology, our laser cartridge works on stainless steel directly, without pre-coating spray. Cubiio 2 can engrave on titanium, dark glass, shale, brick, concrete, most varieties of colored anodized aluminum, and other materials. It even works on curved surfaces, like wine bottles.  

What Can Be Cut?

Cubiio 2 can cut through paper, wood, leather, fabric, felt, cardboard, non-transparent acrylic, and many other materials. If the work material is too thick for a single pass to cut through, Cubiio 2 will continue to focus downward into the material for subsequent passes. The maximum cutting thickness is 5 mm.     

Excellent Resolution

Cubiio 2 outputs at a resolution of 500 DPI or 0.05 mm. That’s even thinner than your hair! In contrast to PWM control, our “realtime analog control” of laser power produces a wide range of gray tones. With Cubiio 2, your laser portrait is not only black and white.  

 

Preview

Put an object in the machine and take a top view picture with the Cubiio App. Don’t worry about getting it perfect because the App will compensate for the angle deviation. Scale, rotate, position your art work, and go. What you see is what you get! 

Easy to Use

Cubiio 2 is easy to use thanks to features like autofocus, preview, Wi-Fi remote control, OTA firmware update, cross-format compatibility, alignment-free optics, and embedded fume filter. Our App is user-friendly and intuitive. It is developed by programmers led by Mr. Michael Pan, an Apple Certified Trainer.  

Cubiio Club

Hundreds of amazing projects are ready to use in the cloud database (Cubiio Club). Browse, download one, and laser it immediately. Even a beginner can achieve amazing results. Cubiio Team has hired professional designers to enrich the database regularly. Users are also welcome to upload and share their projects with the community.   

Community Sharing

Our Cubiio fanpage has over 23k followers. More than 5k Cubiio owners have joined the “Quser group”, where they share useful tips and thousands of beautiful pictures. If you have questions, seasoned enthusiasts from all over the world would love to help you. Just take a look at the amazing artwork they posted.  

Autofocus

Thanks to LiDAR, some high-end smartphones are now equipped with 3D cameras. LiDAR calculates distances by emitting infrared light to a target and measuring the time it takes for the reflection to bounce back. Cubiio 2 employs LiDAR technology to focus the laser beam on the target’s surface automatically and precisely.   

 

Laser Cartridge

Like every kind of light source, the laser has a limited lifetime and is a consumable product. Replacing the laser cartridge for Cubiio 2 is as simple as replacing the ink cartridge in a printer. We offer two types of laser cartridges, LC35 and LC50, with different wattages as shown below. Both types are interchangeable.    

Safety

Cubiio 2 is a Class 1 laser product - naked-eye safe under all conditions of normal use. The complete enclosure prevents the laser from leaking. Lifting the lid stops the laser immediately. Cubiio 2 is equipped with an attenuator, digital lock, thermometer, accelerometer, beeper, emission indicator, and emergency stop switch. Your safety is our top priority.    

Reward 

Team 

Still here, still us, just 3 years older and with more experience. The Cubiio team closely cooperates with FPIC, a specialized company whose niche products are industrial laser cutters. These super machines can even cut sapphire. All Cubiio products are Made in Taiwan, where schools and businesses remain unaffected by COVID-19. 

Timeline  

Tech Spec  

 

===

Reward

These super machines can even cut sapphire. All Cubiio products are Made in Taiwan, where schools and businesses remain unaffected by COVID-19.

story:
WHAT IS ISHIPPO?

The iShippo Web/App is easy and fun to use.  

Enjoy shopping anywhere, anytime. 

With a huge selection of authentic, original products in categories such as fashion, beauty, skincare, Accessories, Apparel, Art, Baby, Bakes, Bath, Beauty & Personal Care, Electronics Accessories, Furniture, Grocery & Gourmet Foods, Handicrafts, Health, Home Decor, Jewellery, Kitchen & Dining, Lighting, Luggage, Musical Instruments, Party Supplies, Patio, Lawn & Garden, Pet Supplies, Shoes, Sporting Goods, Stationery, Storage & Organization, Toys & Games and so on to choose from, you get timely alerts on great deals and updates on anything and everything you need, everyday.


At iShippo, we have begun a fascinating journey, a humble attempt to bring India a little closer to the world. Dedicated to creating a unique interpretation of age-old crafts, we partner with artisanal communities, textile designers, independent artists (and the occasional maverick) to showcase a new, contemporary design language that comes from India and belongs everywhere on the globe. We believe in sharing stories and celebrating how each handmade object can come to represent something much bigger than itself. Travelling to the colourful corners of this fascinating country, we curate unique and exclusive collections that represent India’s finest craft-based designs, so that you can savour the delightful treasures at leisure, with us. Immerse yourself in the beauty of India.
#MakeInIndia #StartUpIndia #MadeWithLove

The Online handcrafted Megastore
• Happy Shopping: 100% Buyer Protection. Payment Protection Guarantee. 
• Chat - A fun new way to shop while chatting with a real seller/artisan
• Choice of Payments: iKash, Paytm, Wallets, Credit/Debit Card, EMI, NetBanking, Cashback
• Search Filters: It’s simple and quick. With filters and sorting you can now search for your favourite item in your choice of rating, price or even popularity and new arrivals.
• Select Products: Find what you want with the sort and multi-filter functions. Read reviews that other users have written about different products
• Explore Your Way: Quickly switch between List, Grid and Full Screen views.
• Never Miss an Offer: Get access to personalized and exclusive app-only deals
• Personalized Alerts: Get notifications on personalized offers, price drops, order status, exclusive launches
• Product Suggestions: Relevant recommendations based on your shopping history
• Wishlist: Add products to your iShippo Wishlist with just one tap
• Offline browsing: View recently browsed products and their details even when network is not available
• Share: Recommend products through Facebook, twitter or email. Refer the App to friends & family and you both win rewards. 
• Earn Karma points: Buy handmade and support a community of artisans, craftsmen and designers 


What we offer
• Great Choices At Unbeatable Prices:
• Convenient: Shop anytime, anywhere. Shop on the go
• Most Popular: discover popular sellers based on orders, reviews and ratings.
• Authentic: Shop a vast selection of new, genuine, high-quality products at unbeatable prices.
• Access: Instant App notifications on offers, discounts, daily promotions and exclusive deals.
• Shopping: Pick from an amazing array of products and get amazing deals and discounts.
• Year-Round Discounts: We’re always looking to get the best deals for you, so you will always find incredible deals and discounts. Come on over and see.
• iKash Wallet : Now pay using iShippo's iKash Wallet.
• Cash Back Offers: We bring you regular cash back offers for your delight. Save with our offers!
• 24x7 Customer Care: We love to connect with you. Whether it’s a query or a concern, feedback or suggestions. We’re listening at support@ishippo.com 
• User-Friendly: Enjoy our clean immersive design. Navigate swiftly and easily across categories. 
• Same Day Delivery for products that can be delivered within the city.




THE TEAM






Please let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions!

You can leave your questions on the comments page or send an email to info@iShippo.com

Don't forget to like and follow us on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/askishippo to be up to date with the latest information!

Or send us a tweet: http://www.twitter.com/askishippo 

Also like and follow us on LinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/company/ishippo

For inquiries regarding Partnerships please email partner@iShippo.com

Press, please email press@iShippo.com for more information

#MakeInIndia   #MadeWithLove

story:
Vendedy makes it easy to access local products while you travel the world! 

1/5 of global goods are located in street markets, bazaars and souqs- yet there is no digital platform to access them. With beta success in Haiti, Vendedy launched the first mobile network connecting travelers to street vendors in real time. 

Now a traveler can use the network to browse through live photo feeds of products and either connect with the vendor to purchase via sms or request a product delivery to their hotel. Also, you get discount points for hotel and airlines when you generate activity on the network either via purchases or shares! 

The launch of the mobile photo feed of street vendors is this summer-August 15th. Sign up for the first access here: http://vendedy.com/landing


Why We Do It? Vendedy is dubbed the “Etsy on the go for travelers”. The founder is the daughter of 3 generations of Haitian female street vendors. Her mother continued the tradition in the streets and flea markets of New York City until she opened a boutique in 1998.  Haiti’s earthquake of 2010 disrupted supply access to artisan designs and led to an abrupt shut down of the business. The concept of Vendedy was born post this loss as the founder walked through the Haitian Capital only to find vendors on top of rubble and trash street vending for survival. It was at that moment that she pursued a 5 year agenda to digitize the industry and make it a global conduit of prosperity. Our Impact: With research across 30 countries, and on the ground beta launches in the favelas of Brazil and the streets of Haiti our Vendors were grossing up to 14X times their annual income in a matter of weeks.

                                    What We Need 

We need $50,000 to roll out Vendedy in one country in the Caribbean - the more we raise, the more countries we can reach past the Caribbean market to Latin America, Africa etc! The funds cover the costs of training the local vendor community, marketing to place the Vendedy app in wifi hotspots and cloud infrastructure for the messaging system. 

                                 The Vendedy Team


                                      What You Get 

Each contribution gets you access to products with cultural significance and access to team trips to our global markets!

                      Other Ways You Can Help

  • Connect us with Travel Hotels & Airlines (We are growing our partnership base)
  • Share, tweet, facebook it, make some internet noise and fill it with Vendedy!
 Press 
We are mentioned in over 40 outlets around the world!

With beta success in Haiti, the startup onboarded the partnership support of IBM, Microsoft BizSpark, Mass Challenge Accelerator and Manatt Ventures. Vendedy has attained several recognitions including the 2014 Poverty Alleviation commitment of the Clinton Global Initiative, CNBC Singularity Top 5 Exponential Breakthroughs, Citi Mobile Fin Tech Top 20, MasterCard Pitch Winner, Digital Entertainment World Winner, 2014 Verizon Powerful Answers quarter finalist, and USA Finalist for $1 Million Social Impact Prize.

story:
Let me introduce myself. I am Pekoko, a portable printer and you can take me anywhere.  I am suitable for printing texts, pictures, symbols, bar codes, QR-codes, etc. One of my main characteristics is that I have my own app, compatible with Android and IOS. And guess what? I function via Bluetooth. 

 

I might be small but I am capable of greater! :)

 

On the contrary to traditional printers I do not only print on paper, but also on:

 

 My App gives you the possibility to generate your own QR-Codes and Bar-Codes. 

 

  • Size:  90 x 68 x 78 mm
  • Weight: 200 g
  • Material: Aluminium Alloy, ABS / PC
  • Connection: Bluetooth / WiFi 
  • Battery Life: 10 Hours
  • Printing Height: 14 mm
  • Printing Distance: 2 - 5 mm
  • Printing Accuracy: Up to 1200 dpi 
  • Ink: 62XL Tri-Color 
  • Working environment: Temperature 0 - 45 °C (best 20 - 30 °C)

 

 

 

 

Our production facilities are already set up and production is carried out as orders are placed. We are able to produce hundreds of pieces per day, so production and delivery will be made on time.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Every package contains: 

  • Pekoko Printer
  • USB Charger
  • Tri-Color cartridge
  • Pekoko cartridge adapter

 

 

 

We will be working with one of the best European logistic companies, LOGSTA. It is run by young professionals for young professionals. They support crowdfunding campaigns like ours and even offer better conditions.
