story:
ABOUT PLUGGED

 

Identities shape our perceptions of others. They influence the friends we make, the schools we attend, the activities we undertake—and who has access to what.

 

I learned that very quickly after moving to the United States at the tender age of 5, in 1999, with my mother.

 

Coming from French-speaking Cameroon (there is an English-speaking part, as well), I was often teased for my accent and poor English-speaking skills. In the first grade, I recall telling my mom that I wanted to abandon my African-sounding name, Méola (inspired by Mexican-American U.S. Men’s National Team goalkeeper, Tony Méola) for my other middle name, Jeffrey. I wanted to fit in. To do so, I needed an American name.

 

But the question of identity is about much more than the struggles of an immigrant boy to fit in. This sort of camouflaging happens every day in our Black communities. Not just switching our names to appear more American, but masking and downplaying our backgrounds to get ahead. We work hard to attend the best schools, and code-switch to get jobs, but neither ensures socio-economic success.

 

For those fortunate to get the job, more roadblocks await them. In 2015, A Boston University study found that Black employees received more criticism from their bosses than their white colleagues. Such an enhanced focus on Black employees, the study found, made small mistakes seem bigger and less forgivable, leading to poor performance reviews, lower wages, loss of jobs and sometimes recurring unemployment.

 

Surviving at a job is one hurdle, getting that job or opportunity is another

 

The majority of U.S. companies acknowledge that hiring diverse applicants is important. While that’s a great starting point, many companies struggle to meet their diversity and inclusion goals. According to a study by Mercer, an employee healthcare and investment consulting firm, 64 percent of workers in entry-level positions in the corporate workforce are white. In senior-level positions that number balloons to 85 percent.

 

Last summer, Charles Scharf, the CEO of the largest U.S. bank employer, Wells Fargo, acknowledged that his company struggled to reach its diversity and inclusion goals. “While it might sound like an excuse, the unfortunate reality is that there is a very limited pool of Black talent to recruit from,” he said in a meeting.

 

Many Black employees who attended the meeting scoffed at the idea that there was a shortage of talent. They knew, like many Black employees in predominantly white workspaces, that the issue wasn’t the lack of quality candidates. It was the lack of a pipeline to find, cultivate and develop Black talent.

 

Like these Black Wells Fargo employees, I’ve been part of newsrooms and media companies that desperately searched for great Black and POC talent, only to hire more white staffers. It happens every day, across all industries, in the United States.

 

As a young Black journalist, observing these trends frustrated me, because I knew the talent was out there. Every time I’d find myself doomscrolling on Twitter, Instagram, or, now, Tik Tok, I’d see the most amazing Black creatives and entrepreneurs just waiting to be discovered. I’d also see folks constantly posting, “Where can I find a Black-owned business to help me do X, or I’m looking for a Black Creative to help me do XYZ?”

 

What if there was a platform that could help meet that demand?

 

 

There’s lots of dope Black talent in the world. How are they discovered and getting opportunities? 

 

Since the spring of 2019, I’ve been thinking about the Black talent pipeline and how to help organizations reach their diversity and inclusion goals. That summer I connected with two friends, David Peterson and Abdul-Hafeez Nakumbe, from the Kente Summit conference, a conference for Black men attending colleges in Minnesota.

 

The three of us met for a routine check-in, but we quickly locked into a four-hour conversation about how to empower our Black communities. We talked about economic mobility, storytelling and journalism, and how to get more resources and opportunities for our Twin Cities’ community.

 

The thing we kept coming back to was how small Minneapolis and St. Paul were, and still, if you didn’t know the right person, it was hard to learn about great opportunities and events happening in our diverse Black communities.

 

I went home that night and thought about what we could do to address these problems. The next morning, I texted both of them that we needed to meet up again. We met at Spyhouse Coffee, near Uptown, and started strategizing on how to tackle racial inequality in our home state.

 

We talked for hours and finally came to an ‘aha’ moment: “What if we built a platform that helped folks connect to their Black community?”

 

From there we discussed how we could build a multi-purpose app that helps businesses hire diverse talent, and also assists Black creatives and entrepreneurs in branding themselves, marketing and selling their art, products, and services. We also developed ideas about how the app could be used to highlight upcoming, in-person and virtual events, from professional workshops to poetry slams, comedy shows, concerts and more.

 

We even strategized on how the app could be used not just in the Twin Cities or the United States, but anywhere worldwide where there was a large Black or pan-African population. Long-term, we thought about how we could grow to tell unique stories of our diverse Black communities.

 

We decided on the name Plugged, because our aim was to plug communities into Black creativity and innovation in their local ecosystems.

 

 

WITH YOUR SUPPORT

 

In our incubation phase, we’ve heard from over a hundred Black creatives and entrepreneurs screaming for a platform like Plugged. These various Black creatives, innovators, and entrepreneurs are part of our growing Plugged community and they are seeking more opportunities and resources.

 

At Plugged, we have a team lined up and ready to carry us to our next phase, but, we need YOU. Together, we are determined to turn these tragedies that launched the Black Lives Matter movement into a powerful community that uplifts the next generation.

 

To accomplish our goals, we need YOU! With your pledge, we will build this platform and make the vision of Plugged App a reality!

 

Black founders are disproportionately at risk of not having access to traditional funding methods, such as banking loans, venture capital, and angel investors.

 

For this reason, our Plugged team is currently running our Indiegogo campaign to fund development of the app. Your contribution will help us invest in data storage, security and other intangibles, ahead of our launch this summer.

 

A contribution to The Plugged isn’t limited to dismantling racial discrimination—it’s about the entire U.S. economy. Since 2000, according to Citigroup, the U.S. has lost $16 trillion dollars due to systemic racism. If we jumpstart Black-owned businesses and the Black workforce, Citigroup says the U.S. economy could also see a $5 trillion boost over the next five years.

 

Your pledge to our Indiegogo campaign would create transformative economic and social change in Black communities in the Twin Cities, across the United States and worldwide!

 

Be a plug and make a contribution to The Plugged App, today!
story_txt: ABOUT PLUGGED Identities shape our perceptions of others. They influence the friends we make, the schools we attend, the activities we undertake—and who has access to what. I learned that very quickly after moving to the United States at the tender age of 5, in 1999, with my mother. Coming from French-speaking Cameroon (there is an English-speaking part, as well), I was often teased for my accent and poor English-speaking skills. In the first grade, I recall telling my mom that I wanted to abandon my African-sounding name, Méola (inspired by Mexican-American U.S. Men’s National Team goalkeeper, Tony Méola) for my other middle name, Jeffrey. I wanted to fit in. To do so, I needed an American name. But the question of identity is about much more than the struggles of an immigrant boy to fit in. This sort of camouflaging happens every day in our Black communities. Not just switching our names to appear more American, but masking and downplaying our backgrounds to get ahead. We work hard to attend the best schools, and code-switch to get jobs, but neither ensures socio-economic success. For those fortunate to get the job, more roadblocks await them. In 2015, A Boston University study found that Black employees received more criticism from their bosses than their white colleagues. Such an enhanced focus on Black employees, the study found, made small mistakes seem bigger and less forgivable, leading to poor performance reviews, lower wages, loss of jobs and sometimes recurring unemployment. Surviving at a job is one hurdle, getting that job or opportunity is another The majority of U.S. companies acknowledge that hiring diverse applicants is important. While that’s a great starting point, many companies struggle to meet their diversity and inclusion goals. According to a study by Mercer, an employee healthcare and investment consulting firm, 64 percent of workers in entry-level positions in the corporate workforce are white. In senior-level positions that number balloons to 85 percent. Last summer, Charles Scharf, the CEO of the largest U.S. bank employer, Wells Fargo, acknowledged that his company struggled to reach its diversity and inclusion goals. “While it might sound like an excuse, the unfortunate reality is that there is a very limited pool of Black talent to recruit from,” he said in a meeting. Many Black employees who attended the meeting scoffed at the idea that there was a shortage of talent. They knew, like many Black employees in predominantly white workspaces, that the issue wasn’t the lack of quality candidates. It was the lack of a pipeline to find, cultivate and develop Black talent. Like these Black Wells Fargo employees, I’ve been part of newsrooms and media companies that desperately searched for great Black and POC talent, only to hire more white staffers. It happens every day, across all industries, in the United States. As a young Black journalist, observing these trends frustrated me, because I knew the talent was out there. Every time I’d find myself doomscrolling on Twitter, Instagram, or, now, Tik Tok, I’d see the most amazing Black creatives and entrepreneurs just waiting to be discovered. I’d also see folks constantly posting, “Where can I find a Black-owned business to help me do X, or I’m looking for a Black Creative to help me do XYZ?” What if there was a platform that could help meet that demand?  There’s lots of dope Black talent in the world. How are they discovered and getting opportunities?   Since the spring of 2019, I’ve been thinking about the Black talent pipeline and how to help organizations reach their diversity and inclusion goals. That summer I connected with two friends, David Peterson and Abdul-Hafeez Nakumbe, from the Kente Summit conference, a conference for Black men attending colleges in Minnesota. The three of us met for a routine check-in, but we quickly locked into a four-hour conversation about how to empower our Black communities. We talked about economic mobility, storytelling and journalism, and how to get more resources and opportunities for our Twin Cities’ community. The thing we kept coming back to was how small Minneapolis and St. Paul were, and still, if you didn’t know the right person, it was hard to learn about great opportunities and events happening in our diverse Black communities. I went home that night and thought about what we could do to address these problems. The next morning, I texted both of them that we needed to meet up again. We met at Spyhouse Coffee, near Uptown, and started strategizing on how to tackle racial inequality in our home state. We talked for hours and finally came to an ‘aha’ moment: “What if we built a platform that helped folks connect to their Black community?” From there we discussed how we could build a multi-purpose app that helps businesses hire diverse talent, and also assists Black creatives and entrepreneurs in branding themselves, marketing and selling their art, products, and services. We also developed ideas about how the app could be used to highlight upcoming, in-person and virtual events, from professional workshops to poetry slams, comedy shows, concerts and more. We even strategized on how the app could be used not just in the Twin Cities or the United States, but anywhere worldwide where there was a large Black or pan-African population. Long-term, we thought about how we could grow to tell unique stories of our diverse Black communities. We decided on the name Plugged, because our aim was to plug communities into Black creativity and innovation in their local ecosystems.  WITH YOUR SUPPORT In our incubation phase, we’ve heard from over a hundred Black creatives and entrepreneurs screaming for a platform like Plugged. These various Black creatives, innovators, and entrepreneurs are part of our growing Plugged community and they are seeking more opportunities and resources. At Plugged, we have a team lined up and ready to carry us to our next phase, but, we need YOU. Together, we are determined to turn these tragedies that launched the Black Lives Matter movement into a powerful community that uplifts the next generation. To accomplish our goals, we need YOU! With your pledge, we will build this platform and make the vision of Plugged App a reality! Black founders are disproportionately at risk of not having access to traditional funding methods, such as banking loans, venture capital, and angel investors. For this reason, our Plugged team is currently running our Indiegogo campaign to fund development of the app. Your contribution will help us invest in data storage, security and other intangibles, ahead of our launch this summer. A contribution to The Plugged isn’t limited to dismantling racial discrimination—it’s about the entire U.S. economy. Since 2000, according to Citigroup, the U.S. has lost $16 trillion dollars due to systemic racism. If we jumpstart Black-owned businesses and the Black workforce, Citigroup says the U.S. economy could also see a $5 trillion boost over the next five years. Your pledge to our Indiegogo campaign would create transformative economic and social change in Black communities in the Twin Cities, across the United States and worldwide! Be a plug and make a contribution to The Plugged App, today!

story:
AffirmActions™ is a pocket-sized life coach but cheaper than therapy, designed to help transform your mindset from meh to yeah!

Feel better mentally, vibe better emotionally, and perform better physically.

 

Three decks purchased = One deck donated to homeless young adults.

If TOMS donates a pair of shoes for every pair purchased…Warby Parker donates a pair of eyeglasses…and Bombas donates a pair of socks...why couldn’t Affirmation Darling™ donate a deck of Affirmation cards?

 

 

Feast. Your. Eyes.

 

On AffirmActions™, the nicest-looking, Affirmation cards out there.

Naw! Honestly, it’s the yummiest and glossiest looking Affirmation cards out anywhere!

 

As you can see by the name of the deck, it’s more than just Affirmations. It also has Actions! Because affirmations alone would be blah! So we decided to combine them both. And got a bit clever with the name. Say hello to AffirmActions™.

 

 

We interrupt your serious reading for an unnecessary but essential commercial break.

Your contribution with us is a guaranteed purchase. That means if you order a deck of our AffirmActions™ with us, you will get the deck of our AffirmActions™ from us. 

In other words – Delivery Guaranteed.

 

Back to your regularly scheduled reading...

 

 

So what is AffirmActions™?

Affirmactions™ is a pocket-sized life coach but cheaper than therapy. Its designed to help you move closer to your goals and keep you away from negative thinking and built to help you manifest a thriving life. Huge claims, eh?

Researchers estimate that we think about 50,000 to 70,000 thoughts a day – and about 80% of those thoughts are negative. That is a crazy amount of negative self-talk that can really take a toll on our mental health!

As Artists and Creatives, this negative self-talk is on a whole other level. Our pursuit of creative careers comes with marrying negative thoughts & giving birth to negative self-talk. Over time, this child can spiral out of control and become an insurmountable roadblock to joy.

But when we choose to think and speak positively despite the nature of our circumstances, we give ourselves authority to create moments of optimism, which can help improve our outlook towards life and inspire positivity to the people around us.

Words are the most powerful force available to humanity. With practice, declaring positive words of life (aka affirmations) can disrupt and overcome negative thoughts. Now, integrate that with action, and you get momentum that leads to tangible results.

It has been found that there was a strong connection between positive thinking and overall life satisfaction in the population. Scientists working at the Institute of Neurology in London discovered that people who visualize a better future are more likely to be able to bring that future into existence.

 

 

Umm...

Okay, let’s say you set your mind the night before to wake up early and start your day right. Sun rises and you turn off your alarm. So far so good. Then you see a couple of notifications and you unlock your screen to read them. An hour later…you’re still in bed, your eyes scoring through your Instagram feed. You’re now lost in time, weighing your worth against this person who happens to have more than you—money, acclaim, looks, whatever, you name it.

Here’s another – you have been burying your head in your creative project for the past 3 hours. You hear your phone buzz and you notice that your friend just texted you. She just got the thing that she wanted, the thing that you have been working so hard at, for the past three months! The thing! Whatever that thing is. Training? Writing? Filmmaking? Oh, Boyfriend?!

Boy, there are so many things we want to do but someone is just always better than us, always winning! And we are out here constantly trying to match up to that someone else’s accomplishments. How exhausting, isn’t it?

The spike of envy your social media platforms can trigger is natural, and they are primed to amp it up. But you don't have to take the bait anymore!

AffirmActions™ is here to tell you that you are better, you are worthy, you are smart, you are creative, you are talented, you are ENOUGH!

AffirmActions™ is designed to help you shift your negative mindset even before it takes shape in your mind. Cultivate a routine where you set your intention for the day by choosing an affirmation that resonates with your To-Do’s or your mood for the day. You can also hand-pick an affirmation by its highlighted word to reset your intention whenever you find yourself going down that rabbit hole of negative thoughts.

So, the next time you have a negative thought, declare a positive affirmation over yourself; follow the action steps behind the card to get your mind motivated; and thrive, knowing that you’re moving forward. Repeat if the negative thought returns or a new thought sprouts up.

Speak → Act → Thrive → Repeat

 

 

What makes AffirmActions™ different from all other Affirmation cards out there?

Like another Affirmation cards, we are one, too BUT we also come with a detailed Action plan to help you manifest that thriving life you have been desiring. It’s time to ditch those cards that only have Affirmations on them. Boring. Bleh! Pair them with actions and voila – you get affirmations that work. Actually work. 

If you're wondering how we are making such bold claims, skip to "So, what makes us qualified to make these cards?"
 

 

So, who is AffirmActions™ for?

This is for you if –

  • You are an Artist/Creative who believes in the power of positive affirmations.

  • You are not an Artist/Creative but believe in the power of positive affirmations.

  • You are not a big believer in positive affirmations but you’re curious.

 

What's in a box of AffirmActions™?

Each deck comes with 21 double-sided cards packed with powerful illustrations and delicious illustrations. Each of the cards feature strategic affirmations and a simplified action plan, and covers life’s complexities such as identity, productivity, anxiety, money, and more.

Therefore, the deck consists of –

  • 21 AffirmActions™ cards featuring Affirmations on one side and Actions on the other.
  • 1 Pièce De Résistance card featuring Affirmation Darling™’s ride-or-die Mantra on one side and a blank side to write your own.
  • 1 Surprise! Affirmation Statement card featuring a randomly picked, bold power-affirmation statement. Believe that what you receive is truly meant for the season you’re currently in.

 

 

How do I use the AffirmActions™?

Each affirmation has a highlighted word or phrase that makes it easy to resonate with. Draw one card at a time to supercharge your week. You can also write your affirmations down in a journal to make them more powerful and effective.

 

 

FEATURES AND CONTENTS

 

What is the Affirmactions™ box made of?

Make a Minimalistic Statement with our Minimalistic Box

Because there’s nothing minimal about our cards due to its colors and illustrations (sorry, not sorry) we decided to keep the design and detailing of the box to a minimum. The least we can do to make your study desk look good. You’re welcome, child.

The deck comes in a luxury rigid box with magnetic closure, that fits nicely in your hand. Please note that the box in the images is a prototype. A few fancy changes are being incorporated to improve its functionality.

The stunning illustrations by Phoebe Day @phoebeday.designs and the simple (but super cool) wisdom contained in this card deck will help you reclaim your jumbled thoughts, listen to your feelings when they are stirred, and accept the assistance of the Actions suggested behind the cards.

 

 

What are Affirmactions™ cards made of?

First things first - it is time to cut ties with traditional paper cards.

 

AffirmAction™ cards are Indestructible!
 

Unless you set it on fire.

Which you absolutely shouldn’t.

 

These one-of-a-kind 3.375 x 2.125”, 18pt cards (think credit card size) are made of premium-quality PVC plastic, hence, durable, flexible, fade-resistant, tear-resistant, and 100% waterproof. Its unparalleled aesthetic and unique illustrations make for one heck of a pocket-sized life coach, but cheaper than therapy.

 

 

       

 

This Is Our First Rodeo

We haven’t done this before. But we do plan to do it again - make more kinds and styles of affirmation-based stationery products.

 

So, what makes us qualified to make these?

 

We were HOMELESS for two years, until 2019.

 

 

Hi, I am Riji Raja. And the man in the picture is my sweet soulmate, Melween Varghese. The lil yorkie is our lover boy, Marcus.

I had always wanted to come to America ever since I watched Home Alone, so it was a dream come true when I met my American citizen of a husband on Facebook in 2013. To us, it was truly an “East meets West” long-distance love story where I was living in Kuwait and he was living in the US. 11 months later, we were married, and I moved to Dallas where we began our lives as a married couple with academic careers. Two years later, we would turn our gaze towards acting that would make us move to Los Angeles, California along with our little Yorkie. But with the high cost of living in Southern California, our living situation quickly fell apart, forcing us to downsize from a two-bedroom to a one-bedroom to an apartment shared with ten other people to finally live in our car. We knew it was not going to be easy to break into Hollywood, but we never imagined we would become homeless.

 

Here's some memories of us living in our car...

 

 

I had no context for Homelessness until I had to go through it myself. We came to a point where we considered quitting our dreams and passions, and almost considered even quitting on our lives. When we lost everything, we just didn’t feel like we had any purpose anymore. But it was a tragical two-year journey that I am thankful to God for, and I would not go back and change a single thing about it.

My husband and I slowly began to discover ways to make homelessness work for us rather than against us. And it all started with disciplining our minds into thinking positive thoughts and declaring positive affirmations over our negative circumstances.

So, we invested our time & energy in learning how to change our attitude, overcoming our internal barriers and mental blocks by replacing all of our negative thoughts with positive affirmations, and then turning those positive words into tangible action, while giving ourselves permission to fail. We eventually realized that our homelessness situation didn’t have to be a life sentence.

Oh yes, we emotionally broke down a lot. Literally too, in the middle of the road when our wheel fell off our car. (Story for another day!) Yes, we were rejected a lot as well. Talk about all those no’s during auditions. And yes, we were constantly feeling defeated, too. But when you keep reminding yourself that your passion is bigger than your failure, you turn into this fierce unstoppable force. That is how my husband and I overcame homelessness.

Therefore, I say this with tender love & grace - you will fall and fail too, more times than you can count. But darling, you will get back up 10x wiser and 11x fiercer.

*wipes away tears* from chopping an onion.

 

Stretch Goals

As the campaign hits certain funding goals, new stretch goals will be unlocked that will enable us to fulfill the mission of our company - Donations! When you support us, you become one of the founding investors into our mission!

Let's do this together! Let's be the changemakers. Let's transform those young minds!

 

 

WHO IS AFFIRMATION DARLING™? 

We are a for-profit social impact stationery brand built on powerful affirmations with purpose. 

1. A portion of every sale goes towards building our Darling packages, where we donate our inspirational stationery products to aspiring artists & creatives from underserved and disadvantaged communities facing homelessness and mental health issues. Every sale is also helping us get one step closer to creating jobs for this community.

As of 2020, it was reported there are over half a million homeless people in the United States on a given night. The top four causes of homelessness were (1) lack of affordable housing, (2) unemployment, (3) poverty, (4) mental illness, and the lack of needed services, and (5) substance abuse and the lack of needed services.

2. To improve the mental health of the homeless young adults by educating them on the benefits of a positive mindset and the power of positive self-affirmations.

A good mental health is central to everyone's well-being, particularly adolescents, teens, and young adults. But they are on the rise among adolescents and young adults. It is estimated by ChildTrends.org that approximately one in five adolescents has a diagnosable mental health disorder. These disorders can range from depression, anxiety, and autism spectrum disorder to personality and behavioral disorders. And, according to a new study, published by the American Psychological Association, rates of mood disorders and suicide-related outcomes have increased significantly over the last decade. Mental health is especially challenging for the homeless community due to a lack of resources and support.

 

We are elevating simple affirmations to affirmations with purpose.

 

Because we are in the infancy stage of our business’ life cycle, the above is no small feat. But we did not want to wait to make a change, hence, we created Project Darling, a unique initiative that will be launched in several phases -

Phase I

A portion of every sale will go to building Darling Packages that will be filled with our inspirational stationery products to be donated to non-profit organizations.

Phase II

Roll out mental health and self-care support programs such as workshops with non-profit organizations to help educate the youth on the importance of mental health.

 

MISSION:

Our mission as a company is to help you divorce your negative thoughts, cut ties with negative self-talk, and empower you to pave the way to the ultimate manifestation of the life you want, the way you want it.

Affirmations + Actions = Manifestation ™

 

VISION:

In 2020 (a year to remember for mankind), AFFIRMATION DARLING™ was launched with a 20/20 vision to create a culture of darlings that believe in themselves through unapologetic positive affirmations.

Speak. Act. Thrive. Repeat. ™

 

CAMPAIGN NOTES

 

- Where the Magic Happens...

Affirmation Darling™ headquarters are in a 600sqft studio apartment in Burbank, California. 

 

- When the Magic Happens...

Production is on schedule. Shipping as soon as possible is our Top Priority - so you can sit back, relax and get ready to transform your mindset in power & positivity! 

The estimated shipping is between mid-November & mid-December.

If any delays, we promise to keep you updated.

 

- How the Magic Happens...

The Affirmation Darling™ family of three is here to serve you. If you need anything, just let us know and our support team will take care of you. Marcus, our Mascot yorkie is thrilled to take over info@affirmationdarling.com.  

 

- Want to see what we're up to?

 

Follow us  on:

  

 

Risks & Challenges

  • The design and illustration of the cards has been finalized and approved by our Mascot.
  • Prototypes have been printed and tested for wear-and-tear, as you see in the images & video.
  • Printing and Shipping have been secured by a reliable company, used successfully in other funding campaigns and known businesses.
  • We anticipate production will begin as soon as we've been funded.
  • We are confident in our ability to deliver a great product on time. However, unforeseen events can occur in any business. In such a case, we are committed to work day and night in order to resolve any issue, and we will be 100% transparent.

 

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

  • How do I choose my Surprise! Affirmation Statement?
    You don’t. That’s why it’s called a Surprise! Affirmation Statement. Even though it’s randomly picked, believe that the statement you receive is truly meant for the season you’re currently in.
  • Do the charities get the same deck of AffirmActions™ that we do?
    Of course! No exclusions! No exceptions! They deserve the best, too.
  • What are you going to do with the money you raise?
    Once we reach our goal, we'll make your decks and ship them to you as quickly as possible. And for every three decks purchased, we deliver a deck to a homeless young adult so they can continue to dream and achieve in life. Any additional funds raised will go towards continued production and expansion of the current line to include decks for Kids & Teens, Pass-it-on Affirmation Cards, unique Affirmation Journals, as well as few extra surprises.
  • When do I get my purchase?
    Our manufacturing partners are standing by and excited to start producing. As soon as our campaign ends, they will get to work. Allowing for 20 days to receive the funds we raised we can expect to have your purchases delivered to you within 1 month after the end of the campaign. But we will do everything within our control to expedite the process to get them to you as soon as possible.
  • Will the cards tear?
    Never. Because they’re made of premium quality PVC plastic, hence exceptionally durable.
  • Will the colors on the card fade?
    Highly, extremely, surely not.
  • What if I don't like them?
    Unlikely, but stranger things have happened. That said, we stand by our product 100% so if for any reason you aren't happy with your purchases, just reach out to us at info@affirmationdarling.com and we'll arrange for an exchange or full return.
  • What do I do if I feel led to pass on an AffirmAction card to a friend in need but I don’t want to because I need it, too?
    Don't panic, you're not alone. The only answer to your question is to get an additional deck of cards so you have enough AffirmActions™ on hand to be able to pass on in singles. You can also gift it as an add-on. Happy Birthday! Happy Holidays!
  • What do I do if throngs of people follow me and try to steal my cards?
    Not surprising. We've seen it happen. Your significant other will steal your AffirmActions™. Regardless, your cards will go missing or get misplaced if you're not careful. Don’t say we didn’t warn you. The only solution here is to make sure these people have their own decks. AffirmActions™ are cool enough to make for excellent gifts. Remember, they last a whole lot longer than cardstock or paper affirmations.  And hey, you'll be helping someone less fortunate in the process, so win/win all around.
  • What's this whole "Speak. Act. Thrive. Repeat" thing about?
    When we say Speak. Act. Thrive. Repeat, we mean it as a mantra, our way of approaching any affirmation. It's the first card of our AffirmActions™ deck for a reason. It's a reminder that the next time you have a negative thought, declare a positive affirmation over yourself, and take action to make it happen. Then, you thrive baby, you just thrive! Because you are moving forward. And remember to repeat the whole exercise if and when the negative thought returns, or a new thought sprouts up. Also, a reminder that you helped someone in need with your purchase. And a reminder that we're all connected through words, and powerful affirmations & small actions can add up to make a big difference.

And we are out here constantly trying to match up to that someone else’s accomplishments. How exhausting, isn’t it?The spike of envy your social media platforms can trigger is natural, and they are primed to amp it up. But you don't have to take the bait anymore!AffirmActions™ is here to tell you that you are better, you are worthy, you are smart, you are creative, you are talented, you are ENOUGH!AffirmActions™ is designed to help you shift your negative mindset even before it takes shape in your mind. Cultivate a routine where you set your intention for the day by choosing an affirmation that resonates with your To-Do’s or your mood for the day. You can also hand-pick an affirmation by its highlighted word to reset your intention whenever you find yourself going down that rabbit hole of negative thoughts.So, the next time you have a negative thought, declare a positive affirmation over yourself; follow the action steps behind the card to get your mind motivated; and thrive, knowing that you’re moving forward. Repeat if the negative thought returns or a new thought sprouts up.Speak → Act → Thrive → Repeat  What makes AffirmActions™ different from all other Affirmation cards out there?Like another Affirmation cards, we are one, too BUT we also come with a detailed Action plan to help you manifest that thriving life you have been desiring. It’s time to ditch those cards that only have Affirmations on them. Boring. Bleh! Pair them with actions and voila – you get affirmations that work. Actually work. If you're wondering how we are making such bold claims, skip to "So, what makes us qualified to make these cards?"  
So, who is AffirmActions™ for?
This is for you if –
You are an Artist/Creative who believes in the power of positive affirmations.
You are not an Artist/Creative but believe in the power of positive affirmations.
You are not a big believer in positive affirmations but you’re curious.
 
What's in a box of AffirmActions™?
Each deck comes with 21 double-sided cards packed with powerful illustrations and delicious illustrations. Each of the cards feature strategic affirmations and a simplified action plan, and covers life’s complexities such as identity, productivity, anxiety, money, and more.Therefore, the deck consists of –

21 AffirmActions™ cards featuring Affirmations on one side and Actions on the other.

1 Pièce De Résistance card featuring Affirmation Darling™’s ride-or-die Mantra on one side and a blank side to write your own.

1 Surprise! Affirmation Statement card featuring a randomly picked, bold power-affirmation statement. Believe that what you receive is truly meant for the season you’re currently in.
  
How do I use the AffirmActions™?
Each affirmation has a highlighted word or phrase that makes it easy to resonate with. Draw one card at a time to supercharge your week. You can also write your affirmations down in a journal to make them more powerful and effective.  FEATURES AND CONTENTS What is the Affirmactions™ box made of?Make a Minimalistic Statement with our Minimalistic BoxBecause there’s nothing minimal about our cards due to its colors and illustrations (sorry, not sorry) we decided to keep the design and detailing of the box to a minimum. The least we can do to make your study desk look good. You’re welcome, child.The deck comes in a luxury rigid box with magnetic closure, that fits nicely in your hand. Please note that the box in the images is a prototype. A few fancy changes are being incorporated to improve its functionality.The stunning illustrations by Phoebe Day @phoebeday.designs and the simple (but super cool) wisdom contained in this card deck will help you reclaim your jumbled thoughts, listen to your feelings when they are stirred, and accept the assistance of the Actions suggested behind the cards.  What are Affirmactions™ cards made of?First things first - it is time to cut ties with traditional paper cards. AffirmAction™ cards are Indestructible! Unless you set it on fire.Which you absolutely shouldn’t. These one-of-a-kind 3.375 x 2.125”, 18pt cards (think credit card size) are made of premium-quality PVC plastic, hence, durable, flexible, fade-resistant, tear-resistant, and 100% waterproof. Its unparalleled aesthetic and unique illustrations make for one heck of a pocket-sized life coach, but cheaper than therapy.          This Is Our First RodeoWe haven’t done this before. But we do plan to do it again - make more kinds and styles of affirmation-based stationery products. So, what makes us qualified to make these? We were HOMELESS for two years, until 2019.  Hi, I am Riji Raja. And the man in the picture is my sweet soulmate, Melween Varghese. The lil yorkie is our lover boy, Marcus.I had always wanted to come to America ever since I watched Home Alone, so it was a dream come true when I met my American citizen of a husband on Facebook in 2013. To us, it was truly an “East meets West” long-distance love story where I was living in Kuwait and he was living in the US. 11 months later, we were married, and I moved to Dallas where we began our lives as a married couple with academic careers. Two years later, we would turn our gaze towards acting that would make us move to Los Angeles, California along with our little Yorkie. But with the high cost of living in Southern California, our living situation quickly fell apart, forcing us to downsize from a two-bedroom to a one-bedroom to an apartment shared with ten other people to finally live in our car. We knew it was not going to be easy to break into Hollywood, but we never imagined we would become homeless. Here's some memories of us living in our car...  I had no context for Homelessness until I had to go through it myself. We came to a point where we considered quitting our dreams and passions, and almost considered even quitting on our lives. When we lost everything, we just didn’t feel like we had any purpose anymore. But it was a tragical two-year journey that I am thankful to God for, and I would not go back and change a single thing about it.My husband and I slowly began to discover ways to make homelessness work for us rather than against us. And it all started with disciplining our minds into thinking positive thoughts and declaring positive affirmations over our negative circumstances.So, we invested our time & energy in learning how to change our attitude, overcoming our internal barriers and mental blocks by replacing all of our negative thoughts with positive affirmations, and then turning those positive words into tangible action, while giving ourselves permission to fail. We eventually realized that our homelessness situation didn’t have to be a life sentence.Oh yes, we emotionally broke down a lot. Literally too, in the middle of the road when our wheel fell off our car. (Story for another day!) Yes, we were rejected a lot as well. Talk about all those no’s during auditions. And yes, we were constantly feeling defeated, too. But when you keep reminding yourself that your passion is bigger than your failure, you turn into this fierce unstoppable force. That is how my husband and I overcame homelessness.Therefore, I say this with tender love & grace - you will fall and fail too, more times than you can count. But darling, you will get back up 10x wiser and 11x fiercer.*wipes away tears* from chopping an onion. Stretch GoalsAs the campaign hits certain funding goals, new stretch goals will be unlocked that will enable us to fulfill the mission of our company - Donations! When you support us, you become one of the founding investors into our mission!Let's do this together! Let's be the changemakers. Let's transform those young minds!  
WHO IS AFFIRMATION DARLING™? 
We are a for-profit social impact stationery brand built on powerful affirmations with purpose. 1. A portion of every sale goes towards building our Darling packages, where we donate our inspirational stationery products to aspiring artists & creatives from underserved and disadvantaged communities facing homelessness and mental health issues. Every sale is also helping us get one step closer to creating jobs for this community.As of 2020, it was reported there are over half a million homeless people in the United States on a given night. The top four causes of homelessness were (1) lack of affordable housing, (2) unemployment, (3) poverty, (4) mental illness, and the lack of needed services, and (5) substance abuse and the lack of needed services.2. To improve the mental health of the homeless young adults by educating them on the benefits of a positive mindset and the power of positive self-affirmations.A good mental health is central to everyone's well-being, particularly adolescents, teens, and young adults. But they are on the rise among adolescents and young adults. It is estimated by ChildTrends.org that approximately one in five adolescents has a diagnosable mental health disorder. These disorders can range from depression, anxiety, and autism spectrum disorder to personality and behavioral disorders. And, according to a new study, published by the American Psychological Association, rates of mood disorders and suicide-related outcomes have increased significantly over the last decade. Mental health is especially challenging for the homeless community due to a lack of resources and support. We are elevating simple affirmations to affirmations with purpose. Because we are in the infancy stage of our business’ life cycle, the above is no small feat. But we did not want to wait to make a change, hence, we created Project Darling, a unique initiative that will be launched in several phases -Phase IA portion of every sale will go to building Darling Packages that will be filled with our inspirational stationery products to be donated to non-profit organizations.Phase IIRoll out mental health and self-care support programs such as workshops with non-profit organizations to help educate the youth on the importance of mental health. MISSION:Our mission as a company is to help you divorce your negative thoughts, cut ties with negative self-talk, and empower you to pave the way to the ultimate manifestation of the life you want, the way you want it.Affirmations + Actions = Manifestation ™ VISION:In 2020 (a year to remember for mankind), AFFIRMATION DARLING™ was launched with a 20/20 vision to create a culture of darlings that believe in themselves through unapologetic positive affirmations.Speak. Act. Thrive. Repeat. ™ CAMPAIGN NOTES - Where the Magic Happens...Affirmation Darling™ headquarters are in a 600sqft studio apartment in Burbank, California.  - When the Magic Happens...Production is on schedule. Shipping as soon as possible is our Top Priority - so you can sit back, relax and get ready to transform your mindset in power & positivity! The estimated shipping is between mid-November & mid-December.If any delays, we promise to keep you updated. - How the Magic Happens...The Affirmation Darling™ family of three is here to serve you. If you need anything, just let us know and our support team will take care of you. Marcus, our Mascot yorkie is thrilled to take over info@affirmationdarling.com.   - Want to see what we're up to? Follow us  on:   Risks & Challenges
The design and illustration of the cards has been finalized and approved by our Mascot.
Prototypes have been printed and tested for wear-and-tear, as you see in the images & video.
Printing and Shipping have been secured by a reliable company, used successfully in other funding campaigns and known businesses.
We anticipate production will begin as soon as we've been funded.
We are confident in our ability to deliver a great product on time. However, unforeseen events can occur in any business. In such a case, we are committed to work day and night in order to resolve any issue, and we will be 100% transparent.
 Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

How do I choose my Surprise! Affirmation Statement?You don’t. That’s why it’s called a Surprise! Affirmation Statement. Even though it’s randomly picked, believe that the statement you receive is truly meant for the season you’re currently in.

Do the charities get the same deck of AffirmActions™ that we do?Of course! No exclusions! No exceptions! They deserve the best, too.

What are you going to do with the money you raise?Once we reach our goal, we'll make your decks and ship them to you as quickly as possible. And for every three decks purchased, we deliver a deck to a homeless young adult so they can continue to dream and achieve in life. Any additional funds raised will go towards continued production and expansion of the current line to include decks for Kids & Teens, Pass-it-on Affirmation Cards, unique Affirmation Journals, as well as few extra surprises.

When do I get my purchase?Our manufacturing partners are standing by and excited to start producing. As soon as our campaign ends, they will get to work. Allowing for 20 days to receive the funds we raised we can expect to have your purchases delivered to you within 1 month after the end of the campaign. But we will do everything within our control to expedite the process to get them to you as soon as possible.

Will the cards tear?Never. Because they’re made of premium quality PVC plastic, hence exceptionally durable.

Will the colors on the card fade?Highly, extremely, surely not.

What if I don't like them?Unlikely, but stranger things have happened. That said, we stand by our product 100% so if for any reason you aren't happy with your purchases, just reach out to us at info@affirmationdarling.com and we'll arrange for an exchange or full return.

What do I do if I feel led to pass on an AffirmAction card to a friend in need but I don’t want to because I need it, too?Don't panic, you're not alone. The only answer to your question is to get an additional deck of cards so you have enough AffirmActions™ on hand to be able to pass on in singles. You can also gift it as an add-on. Happy Birthday! Happy Holidays!

What do I do if throngs of people follow me and try to steal my cards?Not surprising. We've seen it happen. Your significant other will steal your AffirmActions™. Regardless, your cards will go missing or get misplaced if you're not careful. Don’t say we didn’t warn you. The only solution here is to make sure these people have their own decks. AffirmActions™ are cool enough to make for excellent gifts. Remember, they last a whole lot longer than cardstock or paper affirmations.  And hey, you'll be helping someone less fortunate in the process, so win/win all around.

What's this whole "Speak. Act. Thrive. Repeat" thing about?When we say Speak. Act. Thrive. Repeat, we mean it as a mantra, our way of approaching any affirmation. It's the first card of our AffirmActions™ deck for a reason. It's a reminder that the next time you have a negative thought, declare a positive affirmation over yourself, and take action to make it happen. Then, you thrive baby, you just thrive! Because you are moving forward. And remember to repeat the whole exercise if and when the negative thought returns, or a new thought sprouts up. Also, a reminder that you helped someone in need with your purchase. And a reminder that we're all connected through words, and powerful affirmations & small actions can add up to make a big difference.

story:
Who We Are
Educated Running is a coaching service dedicated to teaching runners about the sport. Our coaches offer athletes intuition, objectivity, and accountability. They help runners learn more about their training and themselves, and are committed to helping runners reach their goals.

The Educated Running App
With your help, we'd like to improve communication between our coaches and athletes by consolidating our current avenues of communication into one seamless platform. 

We also hope to build a network of running coaches, and provide them with our teaching resources. We want to connect coaches who want to teach with runners who want to learn.


Ways You Can Contribute

Contribute to our campaign, to help us reach our goals, and even earn a few rewards. If you can't make monetary contributions, share this page with a friend!

story:
WHY WE CREATED THIS CAMPAIGN


Hi, My name is El Ali and I'm the CEO of EDAY APP, 
My team and I have worked in politics and grassroots organizing for the last 15 years and that's why we named our app "EDAY".  

EDAY "Election Day" is a political term that is known across the country and symbolized for winning. We researched and found that many campaigns were using antiquated ways of canvassing and collecting voter data. As a field organizer, I hired hundreds of everyday citizens like you to work on election campaigns. Citizens want to be involved in creating change in their community and volunteering or working as a canvasser is they're first decision.  

Campaigns need to have  information in real-time! My team worked with political consultants, elected officials and organizations to find out their needs when canvassing.  EDAY was not only easier to input and view data, it ranked the highest among our focus groups.  By investing your donation into EDAY APP, you help secure the ability for anyone who wants to run for office or work on a campaign to be effective to achieve their goals. 

 

OUR GOALS - Get To Market

We are raising $15,000 dollars to finish programming and development. Our working prototype has received great reviews from political consultants, elected officials and businesses. We have waiting clients for the 2019 elections, but we need your help to get to the next level. One hundred percent of all contributions go to the programming and development of EDAY APP. Let's get their together!

story:
Important Update

I am no longer the owner of this app. If you are interested and want to learn more please reach out to info@smjweb.com

 

Links

  • AppStore 
  • Product Hunt
  • Website

 

App Description

Card is a modern solution to keep your connections alive. Store your social media profiles, websites, and files in your personalized Card profile and then share it in one click. Connecting with people is not only one-to-one interaction – you can include your QR code or link in virtual or in-person presentation, then see who saved you and connect with them. Organize your contacts into folders to keep your network neat.

 

It takes seconds to set up your Card profile. Edit your profile to add all your social media, links, and files and make it easier for people to connect with you. You are in control of what you want on your Card, and there is no limit to what you can share. 

 

Make yourself more accessible by using a single universal link. Immediately share all the information you want, without having to handle multiple usernames. Whether in a virtual or in-person setting, Card makes information exchange fast and easy.

 

Speed up the process with the Card QR Code. Go beyond one-to-one interaction and share your unique QR Code during a presentation or event to easily reach a wide audience. Access your profile offline and connect even without the internet presence. Card will update all the changes once you are back online.

 

Get notified who saved your profile and when, and keep a score on how many times you have been saved. Create color-coded folders to organize your contacts and keep your network neat. 

 

Whether you are a student trying to build your network, a working professional wanting to keep track of your connections, or an influencer tired of linking all the social media separately in your content – Card allows you to connect with others in a fast and easy way in any setting.

story:
Thank you for visit our Indiegogo founding campaign.  We hope you love this project and would like to be part of this amazing journey. 

VITAKORADESIGN.COM is a market-place specially created for independent designers and artists and people who love design and want to buy top-class design products. Our goal is to build a GLOBAL SCOPE PLATFORM  to provide an easy to use tool for designers and artists, in order to achieve their dream of create their own shop, open new markets, and sell their products all around the world.  Not matter where they are !!!

We want to create a community where creators and customers converge in a creative, unique and multicultural experience. Each dollar will go toward our outreach platform (development, announcements, marketing activities). We are a team of design lovers, help us to fulfill the dream of building the World Design District, an ideal venue where you can find unique stores within which the designers can exhibit their collections to the world and customers can find what they crave.


We are a startup and what are saying about us is…"Three young art and designed passionate friends  have created  www.vitakoradesign.com. It is a new website that provides a place for exhibition and sale high-style artistic and design products " - Mobiliari Magazine 155 Ed.




Why VITAKORA is different ? Our main users are independent designers and artists working and selling locally, who are looking for new options but they lose business opportunities elsewhere because some of them can´t invest in their own e- commerce and others can not access to current platforms because they limit the creation of the store only to some countries.

Besides attending artists and designers from around the world our platform will create new market opportunities and new jobs in this community so it will be able to generate connections and knowledge networks and exchange of ideas that will allow them to have new visions.

Your products will not be next to uneven items: This is the place where the authenticity of your creations and concepts will be valued. 
We know designers want a place that specializes in design, where their products don´t lose value with other categories. We guarantee that all items undergo a process of curating study before being published.
Your products can be physical or virtual so the group users could be extended to photographers, illustrators, etc.

Some platforms do not allow you to open your store bet on your location:
In VITAKORA World Design District you don´t have to be worry about it. You can create your store regardless the country where you are, plus we have a system that automatically calculates shipping prices.

You won´t have difficulty with shipments : With Vitakora you get in your mail the guide already filled with the information you submitted related to the size and weight of the product to be delivered along with the package to Fedex office closer to you.  Don´t lose money making prepayments shipping anymore

Low Rates: Our policy is fair trade, that is why, sales and display commissions are very low, so that way designers and artists get paid a fair price for their products so they can make money doing what  they love most.

Customers already will have better prices because they can buy directly to the designers.

Open you own shop,  it´s easy:

Login: You can access quick and easy to the dash board and personalize it with your own style.


Vendor: Create your own space by naming your store, telling your story, selecting your country and city and selecting the product kind. Don´t forget to choose one image that  identifies your store. 


Products: Display the products and add a complete description with pictures or any additional information you think is relevant for you product .  

 

Store: Check your store, verify all information and products, edit this information whenever you want. Share the link of your store to get buyers around the world.

Additional Features

Get your sales statistics, ratings and feedback from your buyers.  Display and sell your products around world next to the best designers from all over the world, fast and easy.


The platform will work just about anywhere in any device:  Desktop, laptop, iPad, tablet mobile phone (IOS or Android)




Vitakora is not just an idea.  We are a legally based company in Medellin, Colombia one of the innovative cities of the world.  We have a Beta version running in our web site www.vitakoradesign.com with local designers.  We want to make innovations and make strong the platform to be global, that´s why we need you. Your support will help us take everything we’ve built so far, and bring it to reality with the World Design District.

We have a lot of work to do.  Actually, we are building a complex development with payment and shipping systems, store´s customization and automatic user´s creations, and that is expensive. The funds raised will help pay for the development, besides communicating and marketing activities to spread out the voice and go to design events.

We want the world knows VITAKORA: The World Design District .  We have developed a marketing plan, aiming to reach thousands of designers and customers, which will generate greater variety of items, and higher sales for designers, creating a unique multicultural experience, where borders are traversed  with a click .


In return for your support we’ve put together some great rewards and perks, including huge discounts in all platform charges, discounts for displaying products, and shopping discounts for customers. Choose one and tell your friends.

Every single person who support us will be mentioned in a special place in our website.

Be a pioneer representing your country in VITAKORA World Design District.



This is why we created Vitakora Desing.

We’re a team working so hard to make the best platform for independent designers and artists.

WE HAVE THE RIGHT TEAM AND THE EXPERIENCE TO SUCCESFULLY DELIVER ON OUR PROMESS  



Our biggest risk is to complete the development on time.  Our challenges are having happy users and buyers in the VITAKORA World Design District community, where designers and artists can exhibit and sell their products to anywhere in the world. But we know with your contribution we will be able to do it

We want to sincerely thank you for all the support and hope, you can support us just a little bit more by spreading the news of our Indiegogo launch through your social media. It would mean the world to us.

Independent  designers and artist  have lots to offer . By sharing this project you are also helping!

1. Puersue us all over the Internet.  Follow us on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, Pinterest or whatever came out every morning while you drink your coffe. If you LIKE whatever we post, you will be helping your friends discover our greatest crowdfunding campaign  and they will ever join.

2. Tell your friends: we need to find as many followers as we can, and we can’t do it alone.  Help us spread the word. Don´t be shy an follow us, and then, Repost our stuff and later post your own, and if you make let us know then we’ll share it.

3. Do-good:  Pay it forward and do something big.  If you tell your friends and this friends tell others, we can make  our goal.

4. Share this video, and every thing you hear from us. And use hashtag #vitakoraWDD. 

If you can't give us money but want to connect with us, it would be awesome.  Write us:  contacto@vitakoradesign.com



What is the cost for opening the shop?

The openning is totally FREE

Can I listing more than one product of the same item?

Yes. You can management the number of items. If one transaction includes more than one of the same item, then a multiple quantity fee of listing per quantity sold is applied.

How long are my products available?

Each product is published and lasts for four months or until the item is sold. After four months if the item has not sold, then the listing expires but it is easy to renew the listing. 

What are the commission fees?

The commision fees will be a 4.5%  over the item sale price.  This percentage does not include other charges like banking fees, the shipping cost or taxes.  

Adicionally 0.25 USD for listing your product or renew it.

How long does the process of approval of the products?

The VITAKORA team will send you the response in 24 hours or less

Your products will not be next to uneven items: This is the place where the authenticity of your creations and concepts will be valued. We know designers want a place that specializes in design, where their products don´t lose value with other categories. We guarantee that all items undergo a process of curating study before being published.Your products can be physical or virtual so the group users could be extended to photographers, illustrators, etc.
Some platforms do not allow you to open your store bet on your location:In VITAKORA World Design District you don´t have to be worry about it. You can create your store regardless the country where you are, plus we have a system that automatically calculates shipping prices.
You won´t have difficulty with shipments : With Vitakora you get in your mail the guide already filled with the information you submitted related to the size and weight of the product to be delivered along with the package to Fedex office closer to you.  Don´t lose money making prepayments shipping anymore
Low Rates: Our policy is fair trade, that is why, sales and display commissions are very low, so that way designers and artists get paid a fair price for their products so they can make money doing what  they love most.
Customers already will have better prices because they can buy directly to the designers.
Open you own shop,  it´s easy:
Login: You can access quick and easy to the dash board and personalize it with your own style.




Vendor: Create your own space by naming your store, telling your story, selecting your country and city and selecting the product kind. Don´t forget to choose one image that  identifies your store. 



Products: Display the products and add a complete description with pictures or any additional information you think is relevant for you product .  



 
Store: Check your store, verify all information and products, edit this information whenever you want. Share the link of your store to get buyers around the world.



Additional Features
Get your sales statistics, ratings and feedback from your buyers.  Display and sell your products around world next to the best designers from all over the world, fast and easy.
The platform will work just about anywhere in any device:  Desktop, laptop, iPad, tablet mobile phone (IOS or Android)



Vitakora is not just an idea.  We are a legally based company in Medellin, Colombia one of the innovative cities of the world.  We have a Beta version running in our web site www.vitakoradesign.com with local designers.  We want to make innovations and make strong the platform to be global, that´s why we need you. Your support will help us take everything we’ve built so far, and bring it to reality with the World Design District.
We have a lot of work to do.  Actually, we are building a complex development with payment and shipping systems, store´s customization and automatic user´s creations, and that is expensive. The funds raised will help pay for the development, besides communicating and marketing activities to spread out the voice and go to design events.
We want the world knows VITAKORA: The World Design District .  We have developed a marketing plan, aiming to reach thousands of designers and customers, which will generate greater variety of items, and higher sales for designers, creating a unique multicultural experience, where borders are traversed  with a click .


In return for your support we’ve put together some great rewards and perks, including huge discounts in all platform charges, discounts for displaying products, and shopping discounts for customers. Choose one and tell your friends.
Every single person who support us will be mentioned in a special place in our website.
Be a pioneer representing your country in VITAKORA World Design District.





This is why we created Vitakora Desing.
We’re a team working so hard to make the best platform for independent designers and artists.
WE HAVE THE RIGHT TEAM AND THE EXPERIENCE TO SUCCESFULLY DELIVER ON OUR PROMESS  




Our biggest risk is to complete the development on time.  Our challenges are having happy users and buyers in the VITAKORA World Design District community, where designers and artists can exhibit and sell their products to anywhere in the world. But we know with your contribution we will be able to do it



We want to sincerely thank you for all the support and hope, you can support us just a little bit more by spreading the news of our Indiegogo launch through your social media. It would mean the world to us.
Independent  designers and artist  have lots to offer . By sharing this project you are also helping!
1. Puersue us all over the Internet.  Follow us on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, Pinterest or whatever came out every morning while you drink your coffe. If you LIKE whatever we post, you will be helping your friends discover our greatest crowdfunding campaign  and they will ever join.
2. Tell your friends: we need to find as many followers as we can, and we can’t do it alone.  Help us spread the word. Don´t be shy an follow us, and then, Repost our stuff and later post your own, and if you make let us know then we’ll share it.
3. Do-good:  Pay it forward and do something big.  If you tell your friends and this friends tell others, we can make  our goal.
4. Share this video, and every thing you hear from us. And use hashtag #vitakoraWDD. 
If you can't give us money but want to connect with us, it would be awesome.  Write us:  contacto@vitakoradesign.com



What is the cost for opening the shop?
The openning is totally FREE
Can I listing more than one product of the same item?
Yes. You can management the number of items. If one transaction includes more than one of the same item, then a multiple quantity fee of listing per quantity sold is applied.
How long are my products available?
Each product is published and lasts for four months or until the item is sold. After four months if the item has not sold, then the listing expires but it is easy to renew the listing. 
What are the commission fees?
The commision fees will be a 4.5%  over the item sale price.  This percentage does not include other charges like banking fees, the shipping cost or taxes.  
Adicionally 0.25 USD for listing your product or renew it.
How long does the process of approval of the products?
The VITAKORA team will send you the response in 24 hours or less

story:
the adventure's note, keep your inspiration safe wherever you go.





Many times inspirations, ideas and memories are invaluable. They come to our head randomly, if we do not write it, sometimes they leave forever. In general circumstance, it's acceptable to note important things in a notebook or sheets of paper. But in the journey time, which you cannot be certain with condition or situation, normal notebook tends to be a limit.
Jour the waterproof notebook is created for every adventure trip, which will give us 1) freedom to write or draw whenever and wherever we want. 2) peace of mind which we don't need to worry if our notes will get wet.

How it started?

It started three years ago somewhere near Zermatt, Switzerland. One day, we walked among trees , suddenly, there was a little raining. Still we carry on our walk until some point, then I saw a group of mushrooms whose forms were very interesting and gave me some ideas about table top decoration. (We designed and made some home decoration items in our business too.) But I could not pull out my notebook to sketch and write because it would get wet. In the end, I forgot the mushrooms but idea of Jour became very very clear in my mind.

So the idea of JOUR popped-up from that point.

Design Talks
  • To start from the most important part, paper. I found the material called stone paper which was perfect for making our dream notebook. 
  • To design the cover, we thought it would be great if it could get along very well with functional travelling backpack, another adventure's familiar accessory. 
  • Moreover, explorer's behavior when they hold the map was very inspiring. They rolled it, kept it firm touch, put it in the pocket or stuffed it in the backpack. Yes! we wanted that kind of notebook, "it must be rolled like that" we said.    
  • Most of our travels, they are  not long trips, We need not a thick - heavy notes. In contrast, we need  thin notes so we can separate a trip from another, 
  • It would be smarter if we can refill the note easily and keep using the same cover. 
  • The way the paper and the cover join together was very important, also. Since, it is supposed to be wet sometimes, they should be joint together by some technique but without glue. 

After all designs, talks, trials and errors, we got JOUR notebook as you can see below.

Design


Color Choice


PERKS


F O Q

Can we use any kind of pen writing on this notebook and still having waterproof attribute?

Actually any kind of pen can be used on this paper-like material. But to having waterproof attribute, it is necessary to use the pencil or pen with solvent base, like roller ball pen, or permanent ink pen.

How about writing under water?

Now as we have known, only pencil that able to do so.

What's paper-like material, what it is made from?

It is a mixture between calcium carbonate , and high density polyethylene (HDPE) . On top of waterproof characteristic, it is also tear resistant and photo-degradable.

How to buy refill in the future?

We are expanding our design and size afterward, absolutely customer can find the refill notes with in three month. And you can buy directly through our website.


Risk and Challenges

We had prepared the materials in advance, but the accident may comes if we have too small or too large quantity of support. So the shipment may be delay for  30 days due to material management. By this occurrence, every customer will be informed accordingly.


Team

JOUR - Design Team
JOUR consists of a group of designers and entrepreneur. Different in background but sharing the similar way of thoughts, love of travelling and nature. We created this side projects in order to fulfill our own needs; to have a notebook that we can bring anywhere and sketch in anytime. 

Folio - Collaborator and Manufacturer

Folio, a brand with 9 year experienced in producing and distributing stationery items in local and abroad. In Thailand, the brand is well known in stationary and small leather goods retail market. The company gradually working with the way to expose itself internationally through out branding and new invention. It's also a subsidiary of Leather Mine, the long-experienced exporter of the same type of goods. (www.foliobrand.com)

story:
What is Campus Essentials? 

What started as a school project by a student just trying to receive a good grade; has turned into a real life business in order to help millions of college students. Campus Essentials is the first of its kind; C.E is a free and private social market site for college students across the United States to use as a tool to interact, buy, sell, and trade with local students in their area. We noticed that there was lack of student to student structure at every school. So Campus Essential’s wanted to fill that void to bring students together to improve their overall college experience by providing a free hub to help them save money by selling and buying books, electronics, clothing, etc. from each other, improving grades by forming study groups, uploading papers to get peer edited, and finding study guides all for free. Campus Essentials also helps students find rentals, job and internship opportunities, and so much more listed by local or national businesses. Campus Essentials is the first business to directly bridge the gap between college students and businesses.

Who Are We?

Campus Essentials was started by recent graduate Matt Spanburg. Matt graduated Flagler College with a bachelors in Business Administration and ever since a kid dreamed of starting his own business. For instance, in the 4th grade he showed up to his school for Halloween dressed in a suit saying when he grows up he wanted to be a business man. Throughout the years he has started a couple small companies such as a small surfboard company out of his garage with his father and a water sports school that he ran during summers in Lake of the Ozarks, but nothing as been more special to him than Campus Essentials.  The concept was derived from a school project he did in his junior year at college. The project got so much positive attention from local students that after lots of thinking, Matt decided to go through with it and take the risk knowing how it had the potential to fill the void and create a stronger student body. So with personal money and money borrowed from his family he spent two years on getting the site developed to what he thought was a perfect first version of the site. Currently Campus Essentials has been live for just over 4 months now and is run and managed by Matt solely. He spends morning to night figuring out ways to get the business going and a way to fund it. He refuses to give himself any type of a salary yet because he believes the business must eat before he does. In order to get help, Matt's always bribing friends with food and drinks to come in the office to help come up with ideas, film skits, and any other necessary tasks to take Campus Essentials in the right direction. Spanburg states "Campus Essentials would not be what it is today without my great friends and family members giving me as much support as I need. One day I can't wait to hire and work with all the great people that have believed in me! Thank You All"  He has spent so much time and is taking all these risks because he truly believes that college students are an underappreciated group and that Campus Essentials will become a big tool one day to help students from all over. There is only so much he can do with the shoe string budget he is working with and that is why he and everyone who has helped and continues to support Campus Essentials is turning to the people he is trying to help to get help on pushing Campus Essentials into the future.

Why Are We Doing A Campaign? 

Campus Essentials is campaigning on Indie GoGo to help raise awareness of C.E to help students and colleges from all over. With the campaign, we are wanting to help become a college tool to help the everyday lives of people apart of colleges. College is already hard enough so any help you can get as a student can make a big difference.

What Will We Do With The Money Raised?

  1. Finish our mobile app for those students on the go. Will work the exact same as our website, but with better mobile and quicker on demand features. 
     
  2. Continue adding powerful productive features to the site in order for students to use as college tools to even further improve their college careers. 
     
  3. Create portals for every college in the United States. Then after this is accomplished, go global. Starting With Canada and then going overseas. 
     
  4. Marketing costs. Marketing anything is expensive, but with a site like this it only improves the lives of others as more and more users create accounts. (More Users= More items on site) 

We have lots of new and innovative ideas to implement over time onto Campus Essentials to take it to the next level to further make even more powerful tools for students, professors, and local businesses. So we need the campaignes help to raise awareness and capital to continue on our path of helping students and to keep adding features.

The Impact

Helping push C.E into the next level can open the doors for so many new opportunities for students, businesses, and faculty alike. We want to continue helping build a strong next generation of people. Now a days further education is so important and it shapes who we are as a society and we want to help create tools for people 

Other Ways We Are Helping

Other ways Campus Essentials is wanting to help is that every year we are going to take 5% of profits and create scholarships for students who may not be able to financially afford to go to college. Everyone needs a chance at higher education and we want to help create as many scholarships as possible. To show our appreciation, we want to offer 3 months of FREE service advertising starting January First. Which Means businesses of all sizes can post as many job and internship opportunities, apartment rentals, restaurant specials, events, and even pet adoptions targeted to any school page of their choice by using code "Campus123". Campus Essential’s also knows how expensive colleges can be to run, so we want to take a stand for colleges that contact us and set up an account to receive 5% of profits from the page that represents the students that attend their school each year. For example the students of Flagler College’s page makes $50,000 profit, we want to donate $2500 to that school.
