story:
Do you want to engage your customers in creative ways? 

 

Try our platform and experience it's advantages with Achiever's Special Marketing Package!

 

What is Achiever?

 

We all love to compete but in a funny, interesting and fair way. We believe there are so many advantages in competitions so we built a platform where you can compete in whatever you love.

Achiever is a platform able to gather every competition (sport, social, funny, intellectual etc.) from the offline world and bring it to the online world.

 

 

 

What you get?

 

Why Achiever?

 

 

How does it work?

1) Buy a perk and tell us a bit about your company or the product you want to promote

2) Wait up to 24 hours to get an email from us with ideas for a challenge

3) Reply with your preferred idea for challenge or your idea

4) We will send you the banners and start the challenge within a few hours

 

 

Our Competition

 

1) More Companies = More Exposure 

You are not only getting advantage from Facebook/Instagram/Twitter reach. Every other company who is submitting a challenge can also help you get new clients. Users who Join Achiever for a challenge are always looking around. We multiply your exposure every time we have a new challenge.

 

2) Different Pricing plan = cheaper and more efficient

Add-on services are marketing platforms. They are charging per month and they still have many limitations. You need to pay to create the challenge and you also need to pay extra to promote the challenge. The package we are offering has many advantages and you pay one price for creation and promotion. We even do your banners for Facebook and Instagram.

 

3) We can work simultaneously with many social networks

Using our competitors you can create a challenge specific made for Facebook or for Instagram or for Twitter and it is challenging to promote it to other Social Networks. We make it easy.

 

4) Participants can also share to all social networks

Our participants can easily share your challenge to Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and Google+ simultaneously. They can nominate friends to come onboard or asking friends' help to win. Either way you get more exposure.

 

5) Gamified Social Network

Our platform is made for competitions. We are engaging users to do more actions using a gamified model. 

 

Our experience

We have worked with 30+ companies making very interesting and popular challenges.

All kinds of companies use Achiever and we are expanding everyday.

Here are some of them:

 

We BELIEVE competitions can be so much more and we want to utilise how they work for people and companies!

 

 

Extra things to notice

We will never create challenges for competitive companies in the same country (if applicable) at the same time. 

There is currently a wait list in place and priority is being given to companies that enhance Achiever's user experience.

 

Team

 

Risks

The platform is already in place and it works for android and iphone smartphones. We have tested our platform several times. We worked with numerous companies and our team is feeling comfortable to manage even bigger projects. Your challenge will be made, we will work hard to get the best from it and we can guarantee a pleasant and easy execution for you and your clients.

 

Q&A

Q: In one simple sentence, what is Achiever?
A: Achiever is free platform made to host every kind of competition.

Q: Where can I find Achiever?
A: You can download it from your android/iphone smartphone here: www.achiever.pw
Or Check our Landing page here: www.achiever.team

Q: What competition/challenge can I create?
A: As we said, Achiever is able to host any kind of competition. For example it can be a measurable challenge based on units, a photo challenge or a video challenge. It can be an intellectual, sport, lifestyle, artistic etc. It actually depends on what is your goal. You can create a challenge for idea crowdsourcing, to get some feedback or just to engage with your clients. In any case you can download our app you can see many challenges and get some ideas.

Q: How long does my challenge last?
A: It is your choice! We recommend that it ranges from 2 weeks to 4 weeks. If you need an extension then you can email us and we are going to examine the possibility. Depending on the challenge and based on our experience we are going to propose you the most fitted timeline.

Q: What statistics will I get?
A: Provided statistics include unique views, returning users, engagement rate, Intention to Buy rate, daily usage and etc. If you want to get some more details like names or emails then we have to specify within the challenge that whoever is participating we are going to share the name/email with the creator of the challenge. 

Q: Why are you offering this Achiever Special Marketing Package?
A: We believe we have something unique and we are offering this package to test it by yourself. 

Q: How many followers does Achiever has on the Social Networks?
A: We have more than +15,000 followers on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter.

Q: How often are going to share my challenge in your social networks.
A: Once a day from the start of the challenge till the end. 

Q: How would you know my target group in order to send the custom emails and advertise the challenge better?
A: We receive this information from you. If you want our advice or research your target group then you can buy the extra perk. 

Q: What custom banners are you referring to? 
A: Since we leave in a connected world and most probably you have your own Social Networks there is no better way to let your clients about your new engaging challenge. So we are going to create banners fitting required specifications for you to share on your social media and increase your exposure. 

Q: What does it mean Achiever can work with Facebook, Instagram and etc.?
A: It means we can advertise the challenge to all social networks at the same time. Facebook, Instagram and the other social networks have a well built user database and we can take advantage of it, and we do. 

Q: Why do you recommend I should give a gift for the winner(s) of my challenge?
A: Simple, giving a reward to the winner(s) of the challenge is making users more willing to engage with your challenge. The gift should be related to your company. You may give a voucher or any other tangible or intangible reward.

Q: Who is responsible for the shipment of the gifts to the winners?
A: After the end of the challenge the Achiever team is responsible to contact the winner(s) for their permission to share their address/email with you. Once pass this point we will share the information with you and you will send the reward to the winner(s) directly. Otherwise, you will forward the reward to us and we will send it to the winner(s). We will also provide all necessary evidence that the reward has been send and received by the winner(s).

Q: During the challenge, who is looking after it?
A: Our platform as well as our team is checking constantly for falsified entries or any other problem that may come up. You have to do nothing, it's all on us!

Q: I have more questions, where can I find you?
A: You can contact us here. A team member will answer within 2 hours.
story_txt: Do you want to engage your customers in creative ways?  Try our platform and experience it's advantages with Achiever's Special Marketing Package! What is Achiever? We all love to compete but in a funny, interesting and fair way. We believe there are so many advantages in competitions so we built a platform where you can compete in whatever you love.Achiever is a platform able to gather every competition (sport, social, funny, intellectual etc.) from the offline world and bring it to the online world.   What you get? Why Achiever?  How does it work?1) Buy a perk and tell us a bit about your company or the product you want to promote2) Wait up to 24 hours to get an email from us with ideas for a challenge3) Reply with your preferred idea for challenge or your idea4) We will send you the banners and start the challenge within a few hours  Our Competition 1) More Companies = More Exposure You are not only getting advantage from Facebook/Instagram/Twitter reach. Every other company who is submitting a challenge can also help you get new clients. Users who Join Achiever for a challenge are always looking around. We multiply your exposure every time we have a new challenge. 2) Different Pricing plan = cheaper and more efficientAdd-on services are marketing platforms. They are charging per month and they still have many limitations. You need to pay to create the challenge and you also need to pay extra to promote the challenge. The package we are offering has many advantages and you pay one price for creation and promotion. We even do your banners for Facebook and Instagram. 3) We can work simultaneously with many social networksUsing our competitors you can create a challenge specific made for Facebook or for Instagram or for Twitter and it is challenging to promote it to other Social Networks. We make it easy. 4) Participants can also share to all social networksOur participants can easily share your challenge to Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and Google+ simultaneously. They can nominate friends to come onboard or asking friends' help to win. Either way you get more exposure. 5) Gamified Social NetworkOur platform is made for competitions. We are engaging users to do more actions using a gamified model.  Our experienceWe have worked with 30+ companies making very interesting and popular challenges.All kinds of companies use Achiever and we are expanding everyday.Here are some of them: We BELIEVE competitions can be so much more and we want to utilise how they work for people and companies!  Extra things to noticeWe will never create challenges for competitive companies in the same country (if applicable) at the same time. There is currently a wait list in place and priority is being given to companies that enhance Achiever's user experience. Team RisksThe platform is already in place and it works for android and iphone smartphones. We have tested our platform several times. We worked with numerous companies and our team is feeling comfortable to manage even bigger projects. Your challenge will be made, we will work hard to get the best from it and we can guarantee a pleasant and easy execution for you and your clients. Q&AQ: In one simple sentence, what is Achiever?A: Achiever is free platform made to host every kind of competition.Q: Where can I find Achiever?A: You can download it from your android/iphone smartphone here: www.achiever.pwOr Check our Landing page here: www.achiever.teamQ: What competition/challenge can I create?A: As we said, Achiever is able to host any kind of competition. For example it can be a measurable challenge based on units, a photo challenge or a video challenge. It can be an intellectual, sport, lifestyle, artistic etc. It actually depends on what is your goal. You can create a challenge for idea crowdsourcing, to get some feedback or just to engage with your clients. In any case you can download our app you can see many challenges and get some ideas.Q: How long does my challenge last?A: It is your choice! We recommend that it ranges from 2 weeks to 4 weeks. If you need an extension then you can email us and we are going to examine the possibility. Depending on the challenge and based on our experience we are going to propose you the most fitted timeline.Q: What statistics will I get?A: Provided statistics include unique views, returning users, engagement rate, Intention to Buy rate, daily usage and etc. If you want to get some more details like names or emails then we have to specify within the challenge that whoever is participating we are going to share the name/email with the creator of the challenge. Q: Why are you offering this Achiever Special Marketing Package?A: We believe we have something unique and we are offering this package to test it by yourself. Q: How many followers does Achiever has on the Social Networks?A: We have more than +15,000 followers on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter.Q: How often are going to share my challenge in your social networks.A: Once a day from the start of the challenge till the end. Q: How would you know my target group in order to send the custom emails and advertise the challenge better?A: We receive this information from you. If you want our advice or research your target group then you can buy the extra perk. Q: What custom banners are you referring to? A: Since we leave in a connected world and most probably you have your own Social Networks there is no better way to let your clients about your new engaging challenge. So we are going to create banners fitting required specifications for you to share on your social media and increase your exposure. Q: What does it mean Achiever can work with Facebook, Instagram and etc.?A: It means we can advertise the challenge to all social networks at the same time. Facebook, Instagram and the other social networks have a well built user database and we can take advantage of it, and we do. Q: Why do you recommend I should give a gift for the winner(s) of my challenge?A: Simple, giving a reward to the winner(s) of the challenge is making users more willing to engage with your challenge. The gift should be related to your company. You may give a voucher or any other tangible or intangible reward.Q: Who is responsible for the shipment of the gifts to the winners?A: After the end of the challenge the Achiever team is responsible to contact the winner(s) for their permission to share their address/email with you. Once pass this point we will share the information with you and you will send the reward to the winner(s) directly. Otherwise, you will forward the reward to us and we will send it to the winner(s). We will also provide all necessary evidence that the reward has been send and received by the winner(s).Q: During the challenge, who is looking after it?A: Our platform as well as our team is checking constantly for falsified entries or any other problem that may come up. You have to do nothing, it's all on us!Q: I have more questions, where can I find you?A: You can contact us here. A team member will answer within 2 hours.

story:
Who are We and Why this campaign?

Hi! Welcome to our Indiegogo campaign from James, Jeremy and Chris, the CrowdRender team! A little about us, we're nerds, we love computer graphics and we're programmers :)

For five years we've been working to save tons of time for anyone using computers for creative work. We got hooked on making 3D art in Blender, but we got sick of waiting for computers to render and got motivated to fix it! Here's what we came up with;

A platform which is easy to use;  that plugs into your application and accelerates intensive tasks by sourcing computer power from anywhere, cloud, friends, home, office; and it updates edits in real time, avoiding long file uploads. 

 

See it in action

In this short video you'll see how CrowdRender can save you time rendering. This is a very early stage prototype of the Beta system at work allowing peer to peer computer sharing!

 

CrowdRender has been in development for five years. We've grown to 1600 users and we just released the fourth revision of our alpha; and thanks to a grant we received from our government, we've built a system which lets you add powerful computers from Amazon to your own hardware whenever you need it, just like Chris demonstrated in the video above.

Now we're here at last to crowd fund the development of the whole project! We need your help to finish what we started!

What will it look and feel like when its finished? Imagine a platform where you can access computer power from practically anywhere on earth and then use it to make your application run faster. That's where we're headed.

Backing us means backing more speed to you and what you do.

So if your with us, whack your self a perk, and share this campaign with others on social media!

 

 

Would you like to know more? Check it out below...

 

 

 

 

 

 

User Testimonials

So far the feedback from the community of users has been very positive despite the early stage of the software, here's what a couple of those people said:

M.L.: "frigging amazing addon, seriously impressive work, especially because it is so easy to use, I did encounter a few problems making my gamer PC use GPU only, my MacBook pro does not like when blender is set to GPU, I semi solved it and chopped my render from 12 min to 4min pr. render test :D.... those guys' deserve a gigantic THANK YOU for doing this project"

Midge Sinnavae: “I no longer hate my slow-ass laptop when working on location. I’m able to access the power of my workstation working remotely. My workflow is a lot more flexible and I can show clients results on the spot. It’s really easy to set up and I can’t wait to see what other great additions the team will add in the future!”

 

Fan Art

We've also got fan art! Here's a short video that was created by the awesome Albin Merle. Albin made this without being asked; to show what the latest version of our plugin for Blender can do.

 

We use your feedback, really we do!

Since February 2017 we've been constantly updating and releasing new and improved versions of our current alpha system. There's been a ton of feedback from our users which now number 1500+. All that feedback has been used to fix bugs and improve or add features to the current release. And we're not stopping, grab a backing stick to help us whack more code ;) 

If you'd like to try our current alpha release, there's links at the bottom of the campaign page.

 

 

 

All funds of our primary goal go to development of our beta stage system, a huge upgrade of our current web platform and plugin/addon for Blender. If you use other software to blender, check out our stretch goals ;) of course we're going to develop for other applications! 

The completion date is estimated to be late November/early December 2018. We work in sprints which means we'll be completing parts of the system and they'll be shipped out to you as they're ready. So you'll gradually get the whole upgrade between the end of the funding campaign and the end of this year. We'll be listening to your feedback and adjusting as we release.

Here's what we're going to build.

Sharing computers online, peer to peer

Sharing your computer power with your friends or collaborators will be as easy as sharing files.  You'll be able to share computer power with others as easy as sending them a link, like this.

 

Thats it! Just click the link and you can start using the computer you've been given access to with all your own computers and even add computing power from Amazon on top.

You'll also be able to manage how and when others will be able to use your computers with a slick new tool we're designing that lets you control when your computers are available, how much storage space others can use and how much CPU, whether they can use your GPUs. Here's a wireframe of our design.

More Features, More Convenience

We're also going to upgrade the current addon, adding features that have been desperately wanted by our current users.

We'll build:

  • Management of external dependencies, like textures, 3D models, simulation data and so on. This data is sometimes stored outside the project file meaning it needs to be packaged up with the project file and sent to each computer you use. It also needs to be updated on each computer if you change it. This feature will take care of all that automatically.
  • Convenience by having CrowdRender able to start in the background automatically when you turn on a computer and login. You won't need to launch Blender or any other application your using, turn on and go.
  • Faster and more efficient transfer of all your data. All transfers will be resumable, faster and use less bandwidth while still being secure. 

 

Robustness

The current alpha system will have a major overhaul focussing on making our system super stable, we'll ensure each job you submit gets done, even if computers get turned off or networks fail, the job will get done. Our system will keep you notified of problems so you can take action.

What you'll get

The complete system will allow you use computers anywhere in the world that are shared with you or that you own or control. Add them from your home, office, wherever you find them!

Plus you'll be able to boost your computing power by adding computers from the cloud. Your edits will be synchronised in real time to avoid long file uploads.

But we're not stopping here. Take a look at our stretch goals below :)

 

 

If we exceed our funding goal, what shall we do with the additional funds? I mean apart from being able to buy more ramen noodles to survive? Make our free software even more awesome of course! 

Here's our plan.

 

If we reach this goal, we'll work Harder to make our addon Better than ever before.  

Here's how. We're working on a new design for distributing tasks which makes more efficient use of your machines. It will make sure no computer stands idle during a task.

We're also going to give you feedback even earlier with tasks like rendering being broken down into smaller parts which display as they finish, giving you more opportunity to preview your render and stop and correct if you spot mistakes.

CrowdRender will do it Faster, which makes you Stronger ;)

Estimated Delivery December 2018

You can batch if you want to! You can leave deadlines behind...

We will provide a suite of sweet management tools allowing you to batch, queue and schedule tasks, such as rendering, so that you can more easily control your projects. Imagine being able to simply setup a task like a render from your laptop, start it, then immediately begin working on another project, or close the lid and go to the beach or cafe, and the task keeps going all the way to the finish. Best of all it will be part of our free software that you can download for zero money.

Estimated Delivery December 2018

More and more of our users are suggesting what other apps we should be supporting. But, there can only be one.... for this campaign I mean! 

So we've set a goal to produce a plugin for one other app for this stretch goal, but there are so many to choose from. We need help to choose, so let the battle commence in the comments section, tell us there who it should be and we'll see... Who won? Who's Next? You Decide! 

Estimated Delivery Feb 2019

 

There will be some distributed physics solving, and then there will be some cake.*

If you've ever had to sit through baking some physics, you'll know this hurts. Having some way of speeding it up would be good wouldn't it? Luckily there is, there are parts of each type of simulation that can benefit from being processed on multiple computers.

Reaching this level of backing means we'll create a distribution system for physics solving and produce a set of solvers that run across multiple machines, allowing you to speed up your animation baking by as many machines you have available to you. This will also work with the cloud so if you need this solving in a hurry, we've got you covered.

*the cake is a lie...

Estimated Delivery April 2019

 

 

CrowdRender makes tasks faster by dividing them up into parts which get processed on other computers. Processing a large task this way is called parallel processing and can really speed up renders or animations or other long running intensive computations.

The process works by transferring your project file to all the computers you connect to. It then configures the application you're using to process part of the project on each computer. Here's an example, rendering a frame of animation.

An image is divided into chunks called tiles, each computer renders a tile. As each tile is completed its transferred back to the computer you are working on where its immediately displayed inside the application you're using.

This is incredibly effective, by dividing an image in half, each computer has half the work and so finishes in half the time (if both computers are equally powerful). Use three computers, your render time is now reduce to a third, and so on.

 

We've also designed our system to be easy to setup. It takes less than five minutes to install and use the current alpha release, take a look!

 

 

 

Be among the first to try the new platform out. You'll be given access to the latest versions of our addon for Blender and the CrowdRender Cloud platform for EVERY release; now and forever!

Estimated Delivery: You'll be granted early access when the campaign closes, new builds will be released every six to eight weeks as we build and test the new components.

Render credit allows you to access AWS EC2 servers on our cloud system which combine with your own hardware to boost your computer power. Our cloud system is in early access testing now and will be officially released in June after all the kinks have been worked out.

Estimated Delivery: June 2018

Each time we plan a new release, we look to our users to tell us what they want us to work on. Now we're introducing a way for our most avid users to be heard by allowing you to vote on what features make it into each release. You'll get a privileged view of our plan for release and get to vote on which issues and features get worked on. 

Estimated Delivery: Starting June 2018

We're SO EXCITED!! Blendtuts is supporting our campaign! They're allowing us to package their Dark Forest Tutorial content as one of the items in our perks. Dark Forest contains 11 chapters worth 12.5 hours of training and focusses on skills to help you stay on top of projects, taught to you by the presenter taking you through how to create your own dark forest scene. Includes all assets seen in the video.

 

Estimated Delivery: July 2018

Come join us as we get instructed by the masters. Oliver Villar from Blendtuts takes us through the world of hard surface modelling while The Mantissa (aka Midge Sinnavae) shows us how he does what he does (which is freakin awesome if you've ever seen it). Come, listen, ask questions and get enlightened on how to get the edge in your art.

Check out the mantissa's website -> https://themantissa.net

Checkout Blendtuts website -> https://www.blendtuts.com 

Estimated Delivery: July-August 2018

We're building a new service to access computers from popular cloud compute platforms like Amazon Web Services and Google Cloud Compute. You pay a flat rate each month for a share of a powerful dual xeon based server. These servers have 72 to 96 cores and over 200GB of RAM. 

Estimated Delivery: December 2018

Wooo! Our most sincere gratitude and thanks to Aidy Burrows and Gleb Alexandrov! They've been extremely generous in supporting our campaign by allowing us to package their literally epic tutorial series, Space VFX, as one of our perk items. This premium content is out of this world, as will your art be if you use it ;). Get in quick since there are limited numbers in the lower value perks and they're sure to go at close to the speed of light!

 

Estimated Delivery: July 2018

Backing at this level deserves a special shoutout, during our live stream, we'll recognise you for your amazing backing power! If you've got a website, artstation or portfolio, we'll give you a plug live on air which will also be uploaded to our youtube channel and shared on our twitter and facebook profiles giving you some nice exposure :)

Estimated Delivery: July-August 2018

Our slack channel is reserved for our very special supporters. We give them our immediate attention when they need us. Having access to slack means you can chat with us via skype and get support quickly when you need it. You can share screenshots, project files, logs and more all in one place.

Estimated Delivery: June 2018 

When your head explodes due to reasons related to our software, or if you just need a helping hand, lean on us, when you're not strong, we'll help you carry on. Ok, dedicated support basically means that when you need us, we'll setup a video conference with you and help you one on one until you're back up and running. 

Estimated Delivery: June 2018​

 

Custom Feature

If there is something you really want building we'll build it for you. There are conditions of course! We're not going to write you a AAA game or a whole new application! Basically if you think there is a feature that is missing from our addon that we're not building in this project, you can have it built for you :D.

We've had suggestions, some of the good ones have been a different mode of distributing rendering where each computer renders a different frame of the animation rather than a part of one frame. Others are to support other addons or plugins such as other render engines. 

Ok, some terms and conditions. To qualify your feature needs to be something we can add to the current project, which means:

  • It needs to be something we can actually do without requiring permission or help from another company or person. For example, if we need another piece of software changed to give you what you want, or enter into an agreement with that person or company, then we're not obliged to build that feature, even if you backed at this level. We will, however do our best to change it to get a similar result. 
  • It needs to be something we can build on our current platform. We totally want to make software for other apps and systems in the future but right now, we're keeping this to blender, otherwise you'd be waiting ages
  • It must be an extension of our system. We can't build a new addon, or web platform or anything else. 

So please decide carefully when you pledge. If you want to check with us first, before you pledge, then please contact us at info at crowdrender dot com dot au. We'll be super happy to hear your idea and tell you straight if we're happy to build it as a perk for this campaign.

 

 

 

The main risk with this project is simply not having sufficient funds to complete it. This is always an issue to any project right? Since we're running a software project, not a hardware project, we face less problems. We have no real regulatory hurdles like physical products do. Electronic goods for example have to be safe, especially if they plug into the mains supply. So for our project the main risk we're managing is sufficient funding.

We're up to the task of managing this. We've been working on this project now for five years and we've been able to build and ship software for our alpha releases with increasing pace in over the past twelve months. Our fourth publicly available revision of the alpha is now free to download including integration with the cloud which was built with funding from a government grant and friends and family. That project came in on budget. 

More importantly most of the problems we had in the developing the alpha we have today came from learning how to integrate with Blender. Our plugin for blender is now maturing and we've gained invaluable experience coding in this environment. We've now got the experience we need to develop more plugins and make the current one better. 

Another important fact is that most of the features being built in the new system will be in code that we totally own and have complete control over which makes it much easier and much less risky. 

So, maybe you'd like to try out the current release? You can access our latest alpha version using the link below. You'll need to also install Blender (Blender is 100% free software by the way) since the current alpha program only supports Blender, though if we reach the stretch goals we're setting we'll be able to support other applications as well!  

Our addon/plugins are/will be 100% free software! All you need to do is register with an e-mail to get access to the downloads section of our website (or use facebook or G+ to log in if you don't want to use e-mail/password to register).

https://www.crowd-render.com/

 

Well if you made it this far down the page, we congratulate you! Thanks for spending some time with us on our campaign page. If you have already backed, thank you so much! You have our gratitude and we're excited to be making some cool software :D

Thanks for giving the campaign a whacking!

Here's an example, rendering a frame of animation.An image is divided into chunks called tiles, each computer renders a tile. As each tile is completed its transferred back to the computer you are working on where its immediately displayed inside the application you're using.This is incredibly effective, by dividing an image in half, each computer has half the work and so finishes in half the time (if both computers are equally powerful). Use three computers, your render time is now reduce to a third, and so on. We've also designed our system to be easy to setup. It takes less than five minutes to install and use the current alpha release, take a look!   Be among the first to try the new platform out. You'll be given access to the latest versions of our addon for Blender and the CrowdRender Cloud platform for EVERY release; now and forever!Estimated Delivery: You'll be granted early access when the campaign closes, new builds will be released every six to eight weeks as we build and test the new components.Render credit allows you to access AWS EC2 servers on our cloud system which combine with your own hardware to boost your computer power. Our cloud system is in early access testing now and will be officially released in June after all the kinks have been worked out.Estimated Delivery: June 2018Each time we plan a new release, we look to our users to tell us what they want us to work on. Now we're introducing a way for our most avid users to be heard by allowing you to vote on what features make it into each release. You'll get a privileged view of our plan for release and get to vote on which issues and features get worked on. Estimated Delivery: Starting June 2018We're SO EXCITED!! Blendtuts is supporting our campaign! They're allowing us to package their Dark Forest Tutorial content as one of the items in our perks. Dark Forest contains 11 chapters worth 12.5 hours of training and focusses on skills to help you stay on top of projects, taught to you by the presenter taking you through how to create your own dark forest scene. Includes all assets seen in the video. Estimated Delivery: July 2018Come join us as we get instructed by the masters. Oliver Villar from Blendtuts takes us through the world of hard surface modelling while The Mantissa (aka Midge Sinnavae) shows us how he does what he does (which is freakin awesome if you've ever seen it). Come, listen, ask questions and get enlightened on how to get the edge in your art.Check out the mantissa's website -> https://themantissa.netCheckout Blendtuts website -> https://www.blendtuts.com Estimated Delivery: July-August 2018We're building a new service to access computers from popular cloud compute platforms like Amazon Web Services and Google Cloud Compute. You pay a flat rate each month for a share of a powerful dual xeon based server. These servers have 72 to 96 cores and over 200GB of RAM. Estimated Delivery: December 2018Wooo! Our most sincere gratitude and thanks to Aidy Burrows and Gleb Alexandrov! They've been extremely generous in supporting our campaign by allowing us to package their literally epic tutorial series, Space VFX, as one of our perk items. This premium content is out of this world, as will your art be if you use it ;). Get in quick since there are limited numbers in the lower value perks and they're sure to go at close to the speed of light! Estimated Delivery: July 2018Backing at this level deserves a special shoutout, during our live stream, we'll recognise you for your amazing backing power! If you've got a website, artstation or portfolio, we'll give you a plug live on air which will also be uploaded to our youtube channel and shared on our twitter and facebook profiles giving you some nice exposure :)Estimated Delivery: July-August 2018Our slack channel is reserved for our very special supporters. We give them our immediate attention when they need us. Having access to slack means you can chat with us via skype and get support quickly when you need it. You can share screenshots, project files, logs and more all in one place.Estimated Delivery: June 2018 When your head explodes due to reasons related to our software, or if you just need a helping hand, lean on us, when you're not strong, we'll help you carry on. Ok, dedicated support basically means that when you need us, we'll setup a video conference with you and help you one on one until you're back up and running. Estimated Delivery: June 2018​ Custom FeatureIf there is something you really want building we'll build it for you. There are conditions of course! We're not going to write you a AAA game or a whole new application! Basically if you think there is a feature that is missing from our addon that we're not building in this project, you can have it built for you :D.We've had suggestions, some of the good ones have been a different mode of distributing rendering where each computer renders a different frame of the animation rather than a part of one frame. Others are to support other addons or plugins such as other render engines. Ok, some terms and conditions. To qualify your feature needs to be something we can add to the current project, which means:
It needs to be something we can actually do without requiring permission or help from another company or person. For example, if we need another piece of software changed to give you what you want, or enter into an agreement with that person or company, then we're not obliged to build that feature, even if you backed at this level. We will, however do our best to change it to get a similar result. 
It needs to be something we can build on our current platform. We totally want to make software for other apps and systems in the future but right now, we're keeping this to blender, otherwise you'd be waiting ages
It must be an extension of our system. We can't build a new addon, or web platform or anything else. 
So please decide carefully when you pledge. If you want to check with us first, before you pledge, then please contact us at info at crowdrender dot com dot au. We'll be super happy to hear your idea and tell you straight if we're happy to build it as a perk for this campaign.   The main risk with this project is simply not having sufficient funds to complete it. This is always an issue to any project right? Since we're running a software project, not a hardware project, we face less problems. We have no real regulatory hurdles like physical products do. Electronic goods for example have to be safe, especially if they plug into the mains supply. So for our project the main risk we're managing is sufficient funding.We're up to the task of managing this. We've been working on this project now for five years and we've been able to build and ship software for our alpha releases with increasing pace in over the past twelve months. Our fourth publicly available revision of the alpha is now free to download including integration with the cloud which was built with funding from a government grant and friends and family. That project came in on budget. More importantly most of the problems we had in the developing the alpha we have today came from learning how to integrate with Blender. Our plugin for blender is now maturing and we've gained invaluable experience coding in this environment. We've now got the experience we need to develop more plugins and make the current one better. Another important fact is that most of the features being built in the new system will be in code that we totally own and have complete control over which makes it much easier and much less risky. So, maybe you'd like to try out the current release? You can access our latest alpha version using the link below. You'll need to also install Blender (Blender is 100% free software by the way) since the current alpha program only supports Blender, though if we reach the stretch goals we're setting we'll be able to support other applications as well!  Our addon/plugins are/will be 100% free software! All you need to do is register with an e-mail to get access to the downloads section of our website (or use facebook or G+ to log in if you don't want to use e-mail/password to register).https://www.crowd-render.com/ Well if you made it this far down the page, we congratulate you! Thanks for spending some time with us on our campaign page. If you have already backed, thank you so much! You have our gratitude and we're excited to be making some cool software :DThanks for giving the campaign a whacking!

story:
Our Team

   

Susan Clifton - Owner, Clifton Design Group

 Susan has been a web designer for over 20 years now, starting back in the early days of the internet.  Self-taught and using her graphic design background, she has created hundreds of websites for small and large companies, non-profit organizations and friends.

 

   

Doug Barkley - Owner, Video Dude Productions, Inc.

Doug has been in the video/TV industry in one form or another for almost 40 years.  His company, Video Dude Productions created videos for national entities like National Geographic as well as local businesses.  He partners with Susan on web projects to incorporate video into her web designs, as well as creating marketing and promotional videos for clients.

 

Together, Susan and Doug bring their expertise to help local businesses achieve their goal of creating their own business website without the high costs of hiring outside web designers.  They have seen the frustration of their friends and clients trying to build their websites on their own, and if they just had a little guidance and support/feedback, those friends and clients could be successful.  Fresh Media Lab was created to give those friends and clients exactly what they need to end up with their own small business website!

Wix & Squarespace?

Over the years we found that sites created at the very popular Wix & Squarespace just don't measure up. The limitations of the interface on both these services just do not compare to what WordPress has to offer.  The multitude of plugin developers worldwide enhance the WordPress community. Just about anything you want to build you can build easily with the use of plugins, adding to the functionality that you will not find at Wix or Squarespace. Our course shows you the best plugins and takes away the guessing game of best plugins to use. Don't make the mistake of using sub-par tools to build your site. Go with the most popular content management system, WordPress. There is a reason WordPress is used by 60% of all sites built with content management.

Take a tour of the program:

 

Check out a Sample Lesson:

 

 

How You Can Help

Our online course website is nearly completed, but we need more funds to finish it out.  Software licenses and other last-minute fees have to be taken care of before the site can be made "live" and start having students in the courses. Funds from contributors like you can help us reach our goal of turning this online course into a reality, helping people achieve the goal of a website for their small business.

Risks & Challenges

There always seem to be challenges with projects like this.

For example:

  • Software and information is constantly having to be updated to stay current. 
  • Communication issues between user group members or users and instructors.
  • Uploading/downloading homework, PDFs, etc.

Our team is staying on top of all the latest technologies, and funding from our contributors will help us bring a successful user experience to our students,  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to help at this time, that's ok! There are other ways you can help us achieve the funding goal of $7500 (or more!). 

  • Share this campaign with all your friends on social media
  • Tell your neighbors/co-workers/family

story:
Close this tab and it's gone

 

So don't miss it!

 

Fresh and innovative way to plan your day.

 

Save precious time, stay safer and bring the best out of you.

 

Just start your day with an #Inkk Planner - It is all you need.

 

It weighs nearly the same as your ordinary Planner. 

Having many features doesn't make us heavy. With just 700g, we're still on the light side and you barely know having it. Thanks to the technology and the compact battery inside it. 

 

It's about time your Planner evolves too, don't you think? 

 

Flat battery when you need it the most? It's history now. 

Charge your devices on the go with the powerful 8000mAh High Performance Power Bank. So the next time your device runs out of juice, simply charge it with your Planner.

Yes, your planner charges!

 

Have more than one device to charge? No problem.

Inkk Planner comes equipped with 3 types of charging cables - Micro USB, USB C & Lightning. So you can charge any device you want, anytime. 

 

 

If wires are a hassle, why not go wireless?

Fret not, as our Planner has a Qi Wireless Charger. Just place your compatible phone over the book and let it charge away! 

 

There's no need to get a new Planner every year

Did I tell you the pages are replaceable?

 

When you love this Planner so much, just refill the pages with new ones when your done and it's brand new again.

 

Go through your day safely

Covid-19 - Together we'll combat you!

This pandemic has left a huge change which we are still adapting too. The way we interact together with many other things is still new to us. 

Inkk Co has added a Safe Touch Hygiene Tool which is attached magnetically to the Planner. So the next time you need to open doors, press elevator buttons, switches and or even the public bathrooms, simply use this tool to avoid direct contact and never worry about getting germs infected on you! 

 

The worst happens when you least expect it

Having thought about this, Inkk Co comes attached with a keychain SOS Alarm.  The next time you feel unsafe, use it to get the attention needed and deter away attackers. 

 

Hard to focus on planning?

Sometimes, you just don't feel like it. We've been there and we feel you. But now with the Limited Edition Fidget Pen, use it when you can't focus and let your ideas flow naturally. 

 

Choose Your Perfect Color

 

7 Well Thought Layouts

To Enhance Your Productivity

 

 

Inkk Co. Rewards You In Extra 

With A Cool Desk Accessory

 

It's as unique it looks and goes amazing when simply placed on your desk. It comes at no extra costs. Why, you ask? Simply because you are special! 

*Limited To Super Early/ Early Premium Backers Only

 

Excitement from our our followers!

 

Why do we need you?

While we have gone through initial stages of designing and have a working prototype, which is ready to be produced by a reliable manufacturer, we still need to give them a minimum order of 200 units to produce the Planner Diary cost efficiently.

You fine backers can give life to our product.

 

 

The Reward 

 

How much would it cost you to buy everything Inkk Planner has separately?

Buying what Inkk Planner has separately, would cost you more!

With all the premium features and 12 months warranty, Inkk Planner is still the best bang for you buck!

 

 

Founder Member

Our backers are our lifeline. You help us bring this project to life. As an appreciation, every backer that has backed with a product as a reward, gets their name to be on our Founder Member Page, forever!

 

 

Product Stage

 

When Do I Get One? 

 

Risk & Challenges

Our designs have reached their final form, and we have already agreed with a reliable manufacturer. Everything is ready for Inkk Co to materialize! At this point, we can safely say that most of our hurdles are left behind and ready to deliver the end product to our customers.

 

 

You Get Only The Best

The Durability & Stringent Safety Of Our Product 

We wanted to make sure that our product meets the high standards set for durability and safety. To reflect this fact, we were very careful in selecting reliable manufacturers who have a valid track record of producing for other well known customers.

 

Unregulated batteries are like ticking time bomb. You don't know when it'll go off! 

We ensured our supplier's parts and our product meets stringent standards set by the regulatory bodies so that our consumers get to enjoy Worry Free Experience.

 

Our Team & Our Story

When we lost almost everything we had due to Covid-19, it didn’t stop us from starting all over again and here we are.

We’ve been working on this project for almost 2 years now. When we were about to finish this project, the pandemic struck hard on us. But we realized that giving up was never an option, ever!

With this in mind, we began our journey and it wasn’t easy. As expected, we faced many challenges. We were scammed, cheated, and had to start from the beginning many times. But every challenge only made us stronger.

We had to finish this project. So we begin learning new sets of skills to bring our idea to life. Website designing, advertising, product innovation, content creation, photography, videography, script, editing and almost everything were done by just me and my husband.

We believe that in every misfortune, there is a better opportunity if it’s perceived positively. We are thankful for every situation, for it only has lessons to teach and make us a better person.

We’ve done our part, and now it’s your turn to tell us if we’ve done it right. 

Selena.

Founder & CEO

 

Tomorrow Starts With A Plan Today

Imagine what this product could do for you. Imagine how it can change the way you plan. 

Back us today and let's find out together.

Imagine how it can change the way you plan. Back us today and let's find out together.

story:
The laptop is a great tool for working. But its low screen positioning and fixed keyboard force users into awkward postures, causing neck-and-shoulder pain and diminished comfort.

Problem is, the traditional laptop stand is too bulky to carry around and often takes a lot of time to set up - turning it into a productivity-killer.

 

We set out to make sure every road warrior can work absolutely anywhere with ease and comfort. That's where MOFT comes in. It’s lightweight, portable, convenient, patented and feels "invisible"——that it is MOFT invisible stand.

We truly believe“Good design is invisible" and put this philosophy into creating MOFT: unseen when attached, unfelt when worked on, unnoticed when carried. 

You will never be troubled by forgetting to take a laptop stand when going out, because MOFT acts as a natural, seamless appendage of your computer.

 

Nothing extra, only simplicity and reliability. Everything is "feeling right"  and you don’t even notice it.

We're super excited to get an honest review from Unbox Therapy, Thank you!

 

Five colors is available for MOFT stand: Silver; Space Grey; Gold; Rose Gold and Diamond.

 

It's very easy for you to use MOFT stand and only takes One Second to open and close it. so you won't have a frustration of spending much time on packing and unpacking the device.

Plus, MOFT is always with the Laptop, so you have the same mobility you are used to.

Weighing a mere 3 oz. and only 1/9” thick, you just might forget you’re carrying MOFT around with you. And for the benefits MOFT stand provides as a mobile workstation, its small measurements are that much more impressive! 

 

MOFT stand is constructed with unique PU and fiber glass material, meaning it’s as strong and stable as other bulkier stands at a fraction of the size! It can hold up to 18 lbs.

It's compatible with a wide range of Laptops - Fits up to 15.6" Laptops

Compatible Model: 11.6"-15.6" Laptops with no air vents underside(Not including Surface Book.)

With built-in magnets, you can unfold MOFT stand quickly and it securely attaches to the flat surface.

MOFT stand is equipped with two elevation adjustments, making it easy to find the ideal height and comfort.

 

The high-lifting mode significantly optimizes on your sitting posture, applying a 3 inches elevation to your computer screen. 

 

The low-lifting mode takes a 2 inches elevation and can be perfectly adoptive to standing desks.

MOFT stand’s removable glue lets it conveniently attach and detach from your laptop without leaving a single mark or scratch, re-attaching with the same strong effectiveness.

 

-Introducing the Universal Version-

Our adhesive MOFT stand has got a lot of support from backers worldwide. A huge success indeed, but we didn’t stop there. With the help of our awesome users, we’ve developed the Universal version in response to the market. The Universal version with perforated surface is compatible with more laptop models for better cooling, and can be folded and stored in 10 seconds as well.

---Important Notice---

This Universal version of MOFT stand does not adhere to the back of your laptop, so its setup is not as fast as the adhesive one, but it’s still as easy as pie. Please check the dimensions of each stand before you buy.

 

Special Edition: When MOFT Meets Classic Art

The adhesive MOFT invisible laptop stand customized with Katsushika Hokusai - The Great Wave off Kanagawa on the whole canvas to express your unique taste of the breathtaking art. Designed to make an impact, this MOFT stand won’t go unnoticed. Simple. Elegant. 

---Important Shipping Information---

Limited quantity. Pre-order now. Shipping is expected in July. However, please note that the delivery dates are estimates and subject to change based on a number of external factors.

 

MOFT stands for “Mobile Office for Travelers”. A collective focused on creating innovations that boost productivity from a variety of angles.  

As a multinational team with people aged from 23 to 33, we are on our computers at least eight hours a day, often on our laptops in a mobile state - from airplanes to rail, from cafes to parks, anywhere and everywhere.

And that has caused several of us to suffer from serious physical problems, specifically cervical spondylosis. We have tried many laptop stands on the market, but we are not satisfied with them.  They are often a burden to carry around and a chore to set up, and sometimes,  you may always forget to bring it. 

So, we decided to develop an easy-to-carry, lightweight laptop stand that was sturdy, ergonomically superior and aesthetically seamless.

Over the following three years, we spent time, effort and expense researching and then creating several prototypes, until we produced a laptop stand we wanted ourselves. And not only that, friends of ours wanted it! We were on to something.

From there, we made a number of crucial improvements to the angle, material and craftsmanship in an effort to reach laptop stand perfection.

In that process of creation and refinement, we also became determined to make the eventual retail price as low as possible.

With this entire package of quality, innovation and affordability finally coming together, we decided to bring MOFT to the people. 

We are excited and proud to present MOFT laptop stand to you. We hope that all our research, work and creativity have produced a product that will change your mobile life for the better. Your support is greatly appreciated. 

A Special Thanks To

This campaign is promoted by LemoreLab. Since 2015, LemoreLab has successfully helped creators crowdfunded over $10,000,000 from 30,000+ backers. 

Featured on BackerPlanet - IDEAL PLANET FOR CROWDFUNDING ENTHUSIASTS.

It's compatible with a wide range of Laptops - Fits up to 15.6" Laptops

Compatible Model: 11.6"-15.6" Laptops with no air vents underside(Not including Surface Book.)
With built-in magnets, you can unfold MOFT stand quickly and it securely attaches to the flat surface.


MOFT stand is equipped with two elevation adjustments, making it easy to find the ideal height and comfort.

 

The high-lifting mode significantly optimizes on your sitting posture, applying a 3 inches elevation to your computer screen. 
 

The low-lifting mode takes a 2 inches elevation and can be perfectly adoptive to standing desks.

MOFT stand’s removable glue lets it conveniently attach and detach from your laptop without leaving a single mark or scratch, re-attaching with the same strong effectiveness.

 
-Introducing the Universal Version-
Our adhesive MOFT stand has got a lot of support from backers worldwide. A huge success indeed, but we didn’t stop there. With the help of our awesome users, we’ve developed the Universal version in response to the market. The Universal version with perforated surface is compatible with more laptop models for better cooling, and can be folded and stored in 10 seconds as well.

---Important Notice---
This Universal version of MOFT stand does not adhere to the back of your laptop, so its setup is not as fast as the adhesive one, but it’s still as easy as pie. Please check the dimensions of each stand before you buy.

 
Special Edition: When MOFT Meets Classic Art
The adhesive MOFT invisible laptop stand customized with Katsushika Hokusai - The Great Wave off Kanagawa on the whole canvas to express your unique taste of the breathtaking art. Designed to make an impact, this MOFT stand won’t go unnoticed. Simple. Elegant. 
---Important Shipping Information---
Limited quantity. Pre-order now. Shipping is expected in July. However, please note that the delivery dates are estimates and subject to change based on a number of external factors.

 

MOFT stands for “Mobile Office for Travelers”. A collective focused on creating innovations that boost productivity from a variety of angles.  
As a multinational team with people aged from 23 to 33, we are on our computers at least eight hours a day, often on our laptops in a mobile state - from airplanes to rail, from cafes to parks, anywhere and everywhere.
And that has caused several of us to suffer from serious physical problems, specifically cervical spondylosis. We have tried many laptop stands on the market, but we are not satisfied with them.  They are often a burden to carry around and a chore to set up, and sometimes,  you may always forget to bring it. 
So, we decided to develop an easy-to-carry, lightweight laptop stand that was sturdy, ergonomically superior and aesthetically seamless.

Over the following three years, we spent time, effort and expense researching and then creating several prototypes, until we produced a laptop stand we wanted ourselves. And not only that, friends of ours wanted it! We were on to something.
From there, we made a number of crucial improvements to the angle, material and craftsmanship in an effort to reach laptop stand perfection.

In that process of creation and refinement, we also became determined to make the eventual retail price as low as possible.

With this entire package of quality, innovation and affordability finally coming together, we decided to bring MOFT to the people. 

We are excited and proud to present MOFT laptop stand to you. We hope that all our research, work and creativity have produced a product that will change your mobile life for the better. Your support is greatly appreciated. 






A Special Thanks To

This campaign is promoted by LemoreLab. Since 2015, LemoreLab has successfully helped creators crowdfunded over $10,000,000 from 30,000+ backers. 

Featured on BackerPlanet - IDEAL PLANET FOR CROWDFUNDING ENTHUSIASTS.

story:
VISION

Building futures for the children of Ukraine. Our project uses toy making  as a bridge to a child's social integration.


SCOPE

Wooden toys are loved worldwide. They exhibit a simplicity and elegance that readily surpasses plastics and mass production toys. The scope of this project is to teach children self reliance, craftsmanship and business sense. 

The goal is to generate income to supplement the school’s limited budget that each day faces greater austerity due to the conflict in Eastern Ukraine. Children will be responsible, after training and under supervision, to make toys and run all facets of the business. We aim in particular to teach problem solving skills to enhance their academic curricula. We strive to empower young girls with self reliance, confidence and entrepreneurial skills to  help them compete in the job market.

We are a registered organization with non-profit status in Ukraine under School of Our Dreams Vynnyky.

Visit our website here: www.vynnykytoys.com


INDIE GO GO GOAL

We need to raise $10,000 to equip shop with bare tools to meet two current contracts to build toys for NGO's toy drives. 


BUDGET


The budget is $23,000 over an 18 month period to get the program instituted. A $50,000 budget over a 24 month period or a $100,000 budget over a three year period can helps us run into the period of profitability and a fully staffed and equipped shop and office.

All expenses, investments earnings can be provided online for transparency and audit.

Amount

Description

$7,000

The principal cost goes to facility, creation of shop and wiring.

$4,500

Power tools, hand tools and safety equipment.

$1,400

Consumables and stock.

$1,200

Transportation. ($66 per month x 18)

$7,200

Technicians salaries ($400 per month x 18)

$380

Shipping of materials (wheels, dowels, round stock, axles)

$400

website creation, online store,  support and training

$1,000

printed material, packaging and office supplies

$ 23,080

TOTAL

Approximate yield is 1,500 to 2,000 toys if provided that the wood is free.

We hope to contract orders with NGO’s and groups that participate in giving toys to children around the world for the holidays.


RETAIL PRICING


Our toys will be competitively priced and will run on average less for similar items of equal or lesser quality.

Toys sold in Ukraine range in price from 200AUH to 600UAH ($6-$30)

Toys sold in Western Europe and the US ($10-$60) provided that buyer pays for shipping and exporting costs.

If average price is $15, then 1,500 toys would yield $22,500. No money made first year. Money is reinvested in training, supplies and tooling. Earnings for the next three years on a yearly basis is considered at $17,000-$65,000.


PRODUCTION COST PER $100 DONATION


Each toy costs on average of $2 - $2.31 to make. With a donation of $100, we are able to produce about 45 toys that will retail for an average of $15.

Per each $100 donation we can potentially create a total sale of $675 or a $575 profit.

This is an optimistic scenario once the facility and office are created and furnished with tools and equipment.

ONLINE STORE: TOYS BY CHILDREN FOR CHILDREN


www.vynnykytoys.com


Children will be responsible for managing the online store:

  • take orders

  • fill orders

  • maintain website

  • add new products or remove old products

  • create special offers

  • handle low level customer support

  • maintain a community of users

  • engage visitors in order to create and produce newer products

BUILDING AND DESIGN


The proposal calls for the manufacturing of simple, sturdy, quality toys made from repurposed wood and from wood scraps obtained for free from carpenters, cabinet makers and home improvement centers. The toys are non toxic and will be finished and coated with safe oils suitable for human consumption. The wheels, axles, dowels, plugs, round stock and other milled components is to be purchased from suppliers. This avoids a heavy investment in machinery and expedites turnaround time.

We are designing toys based on a long history of quality wood toys that require minimum cutting. We have professionals volunteering their time to help with design and setup of work space.

Design is dynamic and reflects quick adaptation to wood and material donated.

We are seeking to minimize equipment and propose that the toys have minimal curves and no hardware.

All drilling is done using jigs for depth and hole location accuracy.

The assembly of these is done by using non toxic wood glue applied with a brush and pieces are held together by clamps and jigs during the assembly. When necessary, pieces are held additionally with wooden dowels.

It is essential that children earn money from this apart from the school. This money goes to a trust to be used for special needs as defined by the children.


FINISHING


The toys will be finished through several sanding applications up to 220 grit and then polished with scouring pads. The toys are coated with polish made from  beeswax, olive oil and vitamin E for final finish. Instructions are provided how to clean toy and re-apply finishing. These organic products can be safely handled without gloves and are non-toxic.

The toys cannot have any paint as these can be toxic to children who often tend to put things in the mouths. Human-safe food colorant may be use to darken wheels or other parts or when color is needed.


WHERE WE ARE


We have completed our first round of design. We have two pending contracts from NGO's working within Ukraine to build their Christmas toys and other toys to give to children who have lost a parent or a relative in the conflict.

We have allocated eleven stores in Lviv and Kyiv that will carry our products at no cost to us.

We are in initial negotiations to have our toys sold at the Ukrainian Museum in New York and two major toy stores in New York.

We have contacted several pediatric centers and daycare centers in New York to supply them with our products and brand their names.


Other Ways to Help Us


You can help us locate partners:

  • NGO's
  • Religious Institutions
  • Toys Retailers

Many organizations have toy drives, let us build your toys. Help us place our toys at your local toy store.

Tool donation. We need tools that include:

  • Stationary Round Sander
  • Table saw
  • Drill Press
  • Band Saw
  • Bits and Consumables


IMPORTANT CLARIFICATION


This proposal does not espouse the use of child labor to yield a profit. It is a mechanism to empower children, especially those between 12-16 with life skills that will be vital and essential to their wellness and social integration. We strive to provide a sense of belonging and teach them discipline, responsibilities, self reliance and business sense. Many of these children leave the system at 16 or 17. Many young men and women have no jobs and are lost to the streets, to drugs, crime and gangs. Many of these young people need an extension of their schooling with marketable skills to ease them into professions. It is not uncommon for people to marry before they are 20 in Ukraine. The learning curve is steep and narrow. We are proposing to create a fully functioning and profitable enterprise to benefit children and young adults. The children who must leave the system can stay as salaried employees until they find placement in other jobs and they can use the skill set and reference their experience and knowledge learned to compete in the job market. We plan to partner with local businesses to create employment opportunities for our graduates and create a mentoring program to help them continue their education at local universities.

http://www.kerkinactie.nl/projecten/de-school-van-onze-dromen

(use google to translate from Dutch to English)]]

story:
Trace

Trace is a free app that allows you to keep track of your location, where you are, where you have been and lets you easily share your location with friends and family. I plan to make Trace multi-platform, meaning that you can share your location with people who have an iPhone, Android phone, Windows Phone or access to a web browser.

What Makes Trace Different

The problem with many location-tracking apps is that you and your friends need to have similar devices to use them; Find Friends works only on iPhones and iPads, for example. I plan to make Trace available for most popular devices: iPhone/iPad, Android, Windows Phone as well as a fully-functional website so you can share with people who don’t have these devices. 

There are many uses for tracking apps. They can be used to make life easier if you are meeting someone or hosting a surprise party; they can be used for security reasons if you have children or other relatives that you worry about; they can be used for personal reasons if don’t want to share with anyone and just want to keep a record. I personally use Trace for my family’s benefit: my mother and grandmother like to check up on me while I at university to make sure I am safe.

I have already started…

I have already begun work on the Windows Phone app and accompanying website. After working on this project in my spare time I have been able to get the base app functioning and have been slowly adding features over the past few months. As of the start of this campaign the app can be used to: 

  • Securely log in or create an account.
  • View your location on a map.
  • Background updates to the Trace service.
  • View your most recent location update from a live tile on your start screen.
  • Share your current location with anyone via a webpage.

A start has been made on the website; it supports:

  • Securely logging in or creating an account.
  • Showing your most recent location update from the phone app.

Security, for a location tracking app, is essential to ensure that your location information is only available to your chosen friends and family. I have put a lot of time into securing user account creation and authentication, and made sure all network traffic is over HTTPS.


What I want to achieve

The first thing that I want to achieve is to complete both the Windows Phone app over the next 10-11 weeks. To do this I will need to add the following features: 

  • Friends system (adding/removing friends)
  • Privacy (location sharing options, share location for an hour etc.)
  • Wifi only mode
  • Statistics (number of locations gathered, total distance traveled, number of areas visited)
  • Security (enhanced password security




Who am I?

My name is Robert Small, I am a second year Computer Science student at Northumbria University, Newcastle, UK. I have spent the past few years developing games and utilities for Windows Phone and have successfully published two apps to the store. For years I have been able to share my location with my family by using apps like Google Latitude (defunct), which is one of the reasons why this project is so important to me.

Help spread the word

If you like this project please help spread the word by sharing this page on Facebook, Twitter,Google+, LinkedIn, Pintrest. I you have any questions don't hesitate to contact me or leave a comment.


Risks and challenges

I am qualified to see this project through to completion. I am motivated and have experience in developing apps and websites. Up until now I have been unable to spend much time working on this project because of my other obligations with studying for university. Over the summer I will treat this project as a full-time job, and I believe that by doing this I will be able stick to the time schedule I have outlined above, finishing Trace before next semester in September. 
If time runs out my progress will be drastically reduced but I will continue to work in my spare time until it is finished. I will work on any stretch goals after Trace’s initial release, which will run into term time, but will be released in the following months.

.
