story:
For the past 6 months, a group of friends, neighbors, family members and I have been diligently working and preparing for the launch of the first product of our company PropheZee; it is called HireMeNot. While it may sound cliché, I would like to think of it as the marriage of Uber, Pokémon, Yelp & Fantasy Football; by first targeting the Recruiting & HR Industry, but ultimately leveraging this platform for handling referrals and ratings thru gamification and crowdsourcing across any service industry; whether you need a database administrator, a real estate agent, a doctor or a contractor of any type, we know our platform will help improve your quality of life by building a community that will help you find the right person for the right job, yet weed-out those who your friends would not hire. Please read-on and allow me to explain what I mean by sharing my experiences backed by empirical data.

Let me start by asking, how many “connections, “friends” or “followers” do you have in your social networks? hundreds? thousands? – out of those, how many do you interact with on a daily, weekly, monthly basis? If you are like me, not that many; there is perhaps a handful you do keep in touch with and only a few of those with whom you don’t, yet are able to pick-right-up where you left off when you do.

The challenge with this on and off and then on again, is that relationship gaps grow, and your 2 degrees of separation may become, 3 or 6; nonetheless you remain “virtually” connected and should not be afraid to reach-out, even if it has been a while. I have been lucky enough to have connections which have lasted 10, 15, 20+ years, with whom I don’t interact often, yet I know I can count on them when needed, especially when looking for a new job (you can read more about this serendipitous journey in my book “The $100 Journey” ).

It occurred to me that the reason why these lasting relationships are so important stem from the fact that they physically know you, they know what you do well (and not so well), who you are personally, socially and how you work; this is more than any recruiter could hope to accomplish during a 30 minute in-person meeting at the nearest Starbucks while constantly glancing at their phone; yet we fail to have the courage to ask those who really know us for help and prefer to entrust our future, and that of our loved ones to complete strangers. I personally believe that is this fear which prevent us from knocking on someone’s virtual door and ask for help when stranded.

This I know, we have done to ourselves; we failed to prepare for a job-drought, and do not have any money stored in our Karma bank, hence at the last minute we have no option but to reach out to whoever will listen, especially those who have made a living building relationships on our behalf, and are willing to stick their neck out for us – of course, for a hefty price. HireMeNot is the platform which will allow you to take back control of your network, and help you make these kind of Karma deposits painless, even fun! by enabling you to share and refer your contacts across your network without a broker.

In an effort to validate these ideas, I decided conduct a social experiment and identify the roadblocks preventing job-seekers from landing their next dream-job and with over 1,000 connections in the various social networks that exist today, I set-up to better understand how to truly leverage the well-known “6 degrees of separation” and how advantageous would it be to actually network with my connections as intended and not just collect them as we often do with business cards. For 3 months I spent 2-3 hours a day searching for jobs, and applying blindly using every single job-board out there; from those applications, I chose and picked a few jobs I felt I was a perfect fit for and further researched the companies and their employees. During these 3 months, I reviewed 1057 e-mails with an average of 10 jobs within each e-mail. This means, I read over 10,000 job-descriptions ranging from Manager to Vice-President of Software Development. Out of those, I applied to 308 jobs which resulted in 17 follow-up conversations with recruiters (5.5%) and from those only 2 resulted in follow-up interviews with a hiring manager (0.6%) – these are not very good odds.

Concurrently to the unsolicited job alerts/reviews and applications previously described, I targeted 33 positions via on-line networking/job-board by connecting, and messaging the recruiter and/or hiring manager but only after first connecting with the highest executive at that company I could connect with without a premium account; this approach helped reduced the “degrees of separation” and increase the success rate. Out of those 33, all (100%) accepted to connect, 21 (63.6%) followed-up, 12 (36.4%) resulted in a screening interview and 5 (15.2%) resulted in an interview with a hiring manager, 2 of which became formal job offers – these are much better odds if you ask me!

Now remember, these are people who do not know me personally, but are part of my network; contacts I collected when looking for a job. In fact, 15 out of the 33 jobs were brokered through a recruiter from an agency; regretfully, only 1 out of the 5 interviews with a hiring manager came from a professional recruiter; the other 14 recruiters, I never heard from again nor was there any follow-up (even after I pushed the issue and pressed forward requesting feedback – nothing, not a one came back with a yea/nay or provided any closure to the process; without naming names, you know who you are). In my experience, I had better luck reaching out, asking for referrals and following-up with the hiring and/or HR manager directly than working with a recruiter; in fact, 5 of my last 6 jobs were direct hires or referrals from someone that knew me. I can only imagine what kind of success-ratio anyone would be able to achieve if there was a mechanism in social-networking/job-board sites to do what HireMeNot will enable us to do starting today, which in addition to providing crowdsourcing-type referrals, will allow you to rate and hold accountable those who give this profession a bad name. HireMeNot will initially be focused on facilitating and leveraging your social networks as they were intended; especially for those who feel disenfranchised by a minority of unscrupulous brokers, staffing agencies and professional headhunters due to age, gender, religion or ethnic background. This I know for a fact happens more often than not in this somewhat unregulated industry; I will spare you the details regarding questions someone like me - an immigrant with an accent - has to field from these kind of recruiters in addition to their lack of follow-up or follow-through. I feel so strongly about this that the only recruiters that will remain in my network after today will be those that have taken the time to know me and earned my respect, those that fall out, will indeed become the HireMeNots in my network.

Do note, that the majority of my existing network (prior to this exercise) was comprised of people I’ve known over the years at my previous jobs and/or places I have lived who very likely continue in those jobs. There is no mechanism today for them to openly refer me to any job they may encounter (outside from their current employer) where they would think I could be a good fit. Even if they do tag me or mention me on a post, there is no incentive for them to do so, or for me to make them aware that I am looking for a new job (in stealth-mode). Additionally, there is no easy way to search which of them have switched jobs and are working for companies in my area (who may be hiring). In a nutshell, there are no open-search mechanisms for me to tap my network of over 1,000 professionals and have them become my personal champion, a freelance recruiter of sorts; this indeed is what we are going to accomplish with HireMeNot. We are going to empower anyone to become a freelance recruiter and share, trade or sell contacts in exchange for in-app currency, reputation points and badges (Karma points which can be used for the same purposes) and real money from sponsored jobs; the platform will empower your network (who knows you best) to refer you to any job and compete with others on a number of successful referrals that may land you a job via “Fantasy Recruitment & Referral Leagues” chockfull of curated opportunities.

With embedded playbooks, drafts, ratings, rankings, playoffs & leaderboards, we hope to provide a fun and effective mechanism of checks & balances for the recruiting & HR industry and help those who are struggling to find a job, internship or contract; in fact, we are striving to help you find not just any job, but the right job via referrals, ratings and healthy competition. Not only will you be able to crowdsource recruitment; additionally, with the Karma points you collect you will also be able to create your own “League” or post ad-hoc jobs whether you need to find a new doctor, or a babysitter or a UI/UX designer, HireMeNot and your network will be there for you ready to help.

If you feel strongly about changing how this industry operates, help us by supporting our campaign and pledging or by purchasing my book where you can learn more about my journey in the hopes that it can help you in yours.

Additionally, if you want to be part of this initiative, help us by spreading the word globally, especially those of you in the US, UK, Australia, India, Russia & Latin America who know me, I need your help to get the word out, get us across the line and in your backyard. Lastly, if you are interested in learning how to get started as a free-lance recruiter for jobs, internships, or any service industry where referrals and ratings are key, and want to volunteer your time and expertise or work with us, reply here and we will contact you!

To my friends, neighbors, co-founders, employees & family members; especially my wife Sokny, my daughter Sydney and son Tony who altruistically dedicated their time to this endeavor, thank you.

Sincerely,

J.C. Novoa – Chief Zee Officer – PropheZee.
story_txt: For the past 6 months, a group of friends, neighbors, family members and I have been diligently working and preparing for the launch of the first product of our company PropheZee; it is called HireMeNot. While it may sound cliché, I would like to think of it as the marriage of Uber, Pokémon, Yelp & Fantasy Football; by first targeting the Recruiting & HR Industry, but ultimately leveraging this platform for handling referrals and ratings thru gamification and crowdsourcing across any service industry; whether you need a database administrator, a real estate agent, a doctor or a contractor of any type, we know our platform will help improve your quality of life by building a community that will help you find the right person for the right job, yet weed-out those who your friends would not hire. Please read-on and allow me to explain what I mean by sharing my experiences backed by empirical data.Let me start by asking, how many “connections, “friends” or “followers” do you have in your social networks? hundreds? thousands? – out of those, how many do you interact with on a daily, weekly, monthly basis? If you are like me, not that many; there is perhaps a handful you do keep in touch with and only a few of those with whom you don’t, yet are able to pick-right-up where you left off when you do.The challenge with this on and off and then on again, is that relationship gaps grow, and your 2 degrees of separation may become, 3 or 6; nonetheless you remain “virtually” connected and should not be afraid to reach-out, even if it has been a while. I have been lucky enough to have connections which have lasted 10, 15, 20+ years, with whom I don’t interact often, yet I know I can count on them when needed, especially when looking for a new job (you can read more about this serendipitous journey in my book “The $100 Journey” ).It occurred to me that the reason why these lasting relationships are so important stem from the fact that they physically know you, they know what you do well (and not so well), who you are personally, socially and how you work; this is more than any recruiter could hope to accomplish during a 30 minute in-person meeting at the nearest Starbucks while constantly glancing at their phone; yet we fail to have the courage to ask those who really know us for help and prefer to entrust our future, and that of our loved ones to complete strangers. I personally believe that is this fear which prevent us from knocking on someone’s virtual door and ask for help when stranded.This I know, we have done to ourselves; we failed to prepare for a job-drought, and do not have any money stored in our Karma bank, hence at the last minute we have no option but to reach out to whoever will listen, especially those who have made a living building relationships on our behalf, and are willing to stick their neck out for us – of course, for a hefty price. HireMeNot is the platform which will allow you to take back control of your network, and help you make these kind of Karma deposits painless, even fun! by enabling you to share and refer your contacts across your network without a broker.In an effort to validate these ideas, I decided conduct a social experiment and identify the roadblocks preventing job-seekers from landing their next dream-job and with over 1,000 connections in the various social networks that exist today, I set-up to better understand how to truly leverage the well-known “6 degrees of separation” and how advantageous would it be to actually network with my connections as intended and not just collect them as we often do with business cards. For 3 months I spent 2-3 hours a day searching for jobs, and applying blindly using every single job-board out there; from those applications, I chose and picked a few jobs I felt I was a perfect fit for and further researched the companies and their employees. During these 3 months, I reviewed 1057 e-mails with an average of 10 jobs within each e-mail. This means, I read over 10,000 job-descriptions ranging from Manager to Vice-President of Software Development. Out of those, I applied to 308 jobs which resulted in 17 follow-up conversations with recruiters (5.5%) and from those only 2 resulted in follow-up interviews with a hiring manager (0.6%) – these are not very good odds.Concurrently to the unsolicited job alerts/reviews and applications previously described, I targeted 33 positions via on-line networking/job-board by connecting, and messaging the recruiter and/or hiring manager but only after first connecting with the highest executive at that company I could connect with without a premium account; this approach helped reduced the “degrees of separation” and increase the success rate. Out of those 33, all (100%) accepted to connect, 21 (63.6%) followed-up, 12 (36.4%) resulted in a screening interview and 5 (15.2%) resulted in an interview with a hiring manager, 2 of which became formal job offers – these are much better odds if you ask me!Now remember, these are people who do not know me personally, but are part of my network; contacts I collected when looking for a job. In fact, 15 out of the 33 jobs were brokered through a recruiter from an agency; regretfully, only 1 out of the 5 interviews with a hiring manager came from a professional recruiter; the other 14 recruiters, I never heard from again nor was there any follow-up (even after I pushed the issue and pressed forward requesting feedback – nothing, not a one came back with a yea/nay or provided any closure to the process; without naming names, you know who you are). In my experience, I had better luck reaching out, asking for referrals and following-up with the hiring and/or HR manager directly than working with a recruiter; in fact, 5 of my last 6 jobs were direct hires or referrals from someone that knew me. I can only imagine what kind of success-ratio anyone would be able to achieve if there was a mechanism in social-networking/job-board sites to do what HireMeNot will enable us to do starting today, which in addition to providing crowdsourcing-type referrals, will allow you to rate and hold accountable those who give this profession a bad name. HireMeNot will initially be focused on facilitating and leveraging your social networks as they were intended; especially for those who feel disenfranchised by a minority of unscrupulous brokers, staffing agencies and professional headhunters due to age, gender, religion or ethnic background. This I know for a fact happens more often than not in this somewhat unregulated industry; I will spare you the details regarding questions someone like me - an immigrant with an accent - has to field from these kind of recruiters in addition to their lack of follow-up or follow-through. I feel so strongly about this that the only recruiters that will remain in my network after today will be those that have taken the time to know me and earned my respect, those that fall out, will indeed become the HireMeNots in my network.Do note, that the majority of my existing network (prior to this exercise) was comprised of people I’ve known over the years at my previous jobs and/or places I have lived who very likely continue in those jobs. There is no mechanism today for them to openly refer me to any job they may encounter (outside from their current employer) where they would think I could be a good fit. Even if they do tag me or mention me on a post, there is no incentive for them to do so, or for me to make them aware that I am looking for a new job (in stealth-mode). Additionally, there is no easy way to search which of them have switched jobs and are working for companies in my area (who may be hiring). In a nutshell, there are no open-search mechanisms for me to tap my network of over 1,000 professionals and have them become my personal champion, a freelance recruiter of sorts; this indeed is what we are going to accomplish with HireMeNot. We are going to empower anyone to become a freelance recruiter and share, trade or sell contacts in exchange for in-app currency, reputation points and badges (Karma points which can be used for the same purposes) and real money from sponsored jobs; the platform will empower your network (who knows you best) to refer you to any job and compete with others on a number of successful referrals that may land you a job via “Fantasy Recruitment & Referral Leagues” chockfull of curated opportunities.With embedded playbooks, drafts, ratings, rankings, playoffs & leaderboards, we hope to provide a fun and effective mechanism of checks & balances for the recruiting & HR industry and help those who are struggling to find a job, internship or contract; in fact, we are striving to help you find not just any job, but the right job via referrals, ratings and healthy competition. Not only will you be able to crowdsource recruitment; additionally, with the Karma points you collect you will also be able to create your own “League” or post ad-hoc jobs whether you need to find a new doctor, or a babysitter or a UI/UX designer, HireMeNot and your network will be there for you ready to help.If you feel strongly about changing how this industry operates, help us by supporting our campaign and pledging or by purchasing my book where you can learn more about my journey in the hopes that it can help you in yours.Additionally, if you want to be part of this initiative, help us by spreading the word globally, especially those of you in the US, UK, Australia, India, Russia & Latin America who know me, I need your help to get the word out, get us across the line and in your backyard. Lastly, if you are interested in learning how to get started as a free-lance recruiter for jobs, internships, or any service industry where referrals and ratings are key, and want to volunteer your time and expertise or work with us, reply here and we will contact you!To my friends, neighbors, co-founders, employees & family members; especially my wife Sokny, my daughter Sydney and son Tony who altruistically dedicated their time to this endeavor, thank you.Sincerely,J.C. Novoa – Chief Zee Officer – PropheZee.

story:
AI - Fiction or Reality
 

The notion of an ultra-smart humanistic robot that can augment and amplify human capabilities and improve their productivity isn't new - it has dated back to as early as 1873 and has captured the imagination of sci-fi writers and their readers for many decades. 

AI has always been associated with increased productivity and better quality of life - as long as it works as prescribed :)

However, it hasn't been until the last decade that artificial intelligence and machine learning have become a tangible and undeniable reality and have started to improve our lives and enhance our abilities to predict, decide and favorably improve our work outcomes. AI has found its way into many sectors and industries including marketing, banking, finance, agriculture, and many more.

 

Our Platform's Beginnings 

 

As early as 2017 and driven by our belief in the potential of "humanized AI" to ethically augment the abilities of humans and all living creatures, driving sustainability and environmental conservation efforts, our team have decided to work on harnessing the power of AI to democratize software application building allowing anyone with no prior computer science training to build applications.

Our engineers have concepted and raised a one-of-a-kind AI being, we call her Julia, the ultimate coding-bot that will forever change the way web and mobile applications are built.

Trained on millions of lines of code from publicly available applications and combining the collective wisdom of thousands of developers, Julia will assist and guide no-code entrepreneurs, makers, and dreamers as they develop the applications that will touch millions of lives and make for a happy future.

 

Enter iRithm
 

We’re building iRithm, the world’s first fully AI-driven app builder empowering anyone to build web and mobile software products whenever the inspiration strikes and without writing a single line of code. It is the first Text2APP platform that we know of. Describe your application to the chatbot and we build it for you.

 

iRithm builds serious apps. By serious we mean rather complex and functionality-rich apps and platforms - think platforms like Airbnb, Amazon, and Fiverr for both mobile and web. Unlike, other popular players in the field like Wix or Webflow - we don't just build websites or eCommerce Apps, iRithm allows its users to build any App they can imagine.

 

A serious App doesn't have to look serious - it actually gets you closer to your dream and saves you a ton of money - it will make you smile!

 

There is an idea in your mind somewhere – a vision of the app that you would build, if only you could write the code for it. This is a problem that, over and over, dreamers and entrepreneurs worldwide are encountering. Like you, they know what they would like to build but feel like they can't do so. Looking out over all of the technical work that goes into building an app, too many people have concluded that just can't get the job done.

Our solution is simple: forget about the code. Using iRithm, you never need to think about writing code again. Instead, you can keep your focus on your idea, your vision, and your business.

Who is iRithm for?

 

How iRithm Works

 

Working via next-generation AI and machine learning algorithms, iRithm generates the code you need automatically. To accomplish that, we are using a technology of popular, open-source systems for maximum maintainability and continuity. We then deploy your app on Google's industry-standard cloud computing infrastructure to ensure hosting, security, and scalability – again, without ever requiring you to type in a single line of code.

Our tech team just released this sneak-peek of Julia in action. Watch how, Julia, helps iRithm users throughout their entire app development journey by offering smart recommendations based on the context of the application being built. Julia, evolves and grows smarter with every interaction with each platform user.

 

 

 

 

Our platform allows you to create your applications from the design phase all the way to having your app hosted on the cloud

 

In this short video, as our team demonstrates the build of a rather simple BMI (Body Mass Index) calculator, you’ll get familiar with iRithm builder’s core modules you’ll use to build serious web and mobile applications including the lego-like visual builder interface, the data modeler where the application data and database are defined/created and the Formula builder that allows for the specification of how the App should behave (app logic); for example, when a button is clicked a certain calculation is performed or a new screen is presented, etc...

 

Our Key Differentiators

While you may not know it, AI has progressed to a level that you can use to build fully functional, robust software. You can delegate the technical work to Julia, never worrying again about any of the hardcore development work.

That means you can save money on development costs. It also means you can save time getting to market.

The Wide-Reaching Benefits of iRithm

  • Industry's most comprehensive AI-based coding assistant: You must have gotten quite familiar with Julia our wise coding assistant that is based on cutting-edge AI and machine learning algorithms and rigorous training to build robust applications alongside iRithm's platform users.
  • Extremely User-Friendly: iRithm uses the type of visual programming platform that even a 6-year-old can learn. Our visual drag-and-drop builder is inspired by the very popular scratch visual programming language widely adopted for teaching programming to kids and absolute beginners.
     
  • Enterprise-Grade Output: Anyone can build anything for any platform, thanks to iRithm
     
  • Fully Customizable: You decide what your experience is, building anything from the Towers of Hanoi to the next Amazon.com.
     
  • Bug-Free, Pre-Tested Code: Even though you never need to look at any code, you can feel confident that the output will be free of bugs and errors.

  • Affordable Subscriptions: Instead of a 17-page licensing guide, what you see is what you get – affordable access to the subscription of your choice, without any hidden and additional costs. Pay in a month less than what a junior developer would charge you in a day.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Working in IT for more than 23 years, including 17 years in SAP Implementation, Support, and Training, our founder Ahmed has put together a winning, global team to create iRithm. We are confident that we can get the platform out onto the market in a timely manner. If we do run into any unforeseen challenges, though, we promise to keep you in the loop. You can count on us to provide regular updates about the progress that we are making and to involve you in this process every step of the way. We will let you know any time we hit a milestone or complete a feature. Every new feature we ship comes with great excitement on our team's part and brings iRithm's platform closer to becoming the industry's most powerful app builder and helping thousands of dreamers, makers, and entrepreneurs to build life-changing products all around the globe.

From here on out, you are a part of iRithm too.

 

Our Pricing Plans

Below are our intended pricing plans for the public launch later this year. We have clearly set ourselves apart from the competition by:

  1. Making our platform free to register and use to build and test any number of Apps on your account. You will only pay when you are ready to publish your App and go-live.
  2. Our pricing logic is very simple and you don't really have to scroll through 10s of benefits and perks you get with each tier - basically a) pricing is per month per app and b)you pay more as your app grows!
  3. We have listened to the needs and concerns bigger enterprise clients have for no-code platforms. Yes with iRithm there is a clearly priced option for you to extract, download and reuse your application's source code for a fraction of the price of traditionally developing these Apps 

 

Making It Happen
 

Right now, we are turning to you for help raising the funds that we need to launch iRithm. Our goal through this campaign is $ 100,000, which will cover the ongoing development costs that we are facing. Funding will also defray our marketing and user acquisition plans, including our digital marketing activities, user testing focus groups, and content marketing. The platform is almost ready for public release with over 95% of the features now up and running including drag-and-drop interface builder, a huge chunk of our formula/logic builder, data modeler as well as many aspects of the AI and machine learning algorithms. Your funds will help us ship a few remaining key components in order to make the platform ready for public use including:

1- Rest API integration

2- Advanced Security Features

3- Payment and Cart functionalities to support e-Commerce applications 

Recipients of both an R&D grant and a Callaghan Innovation Loan, we are nonetheless short of the capital that we need to bring this project home. When you contribute to this campaign, you are playing a major role in its realization.

To say thanks to everyone who supports us today, we are offering some exclusive rewards, such as discounts on our subscription packages. Our perks also include a very exclusive training course with iRithm's Tech team to give you an in-depth walkthrough of the platform and get you started with no-code development on the right foot plus many more perks exclusive to Indiegogo-ers! 

See which reward seems like the best fit for you and make your contribution now!

Our Product Release Plan
 

We are well on our way to hit our next targets. Your support will help us nail our next milestones. Our backers will be the first users to get access to the platform when we go public and you're all more than welcome to join our beta versions right now.

One Last Way to Help
 

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for iRithm by sharing a link to the campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. If there are any entrepreneurs, business owners, or no-code enthusiasts in your life, make sure that they are aware of iRithm. Fill them in on all of the features, including Julia, and what drag-and-drop app development could mean to them.

On behalf of all of us at the iRithm team, thank you for your support. We appreciate you!

story:
Motivation

From fake luxury goods to mock medicines and baby meal, the business of counterfeit goods is one of the largest underground industries that is rapidly growing. Current estimates of the overall annual economic value of this industry exceed $1500 billion and demonstrate a positive trend of about 10%. Consequently, the losses in tax revenue account for $78 billion and the number of non-created working places overpasses 2.5 million annually. A quick analysis of the fake industry composition allows easily identify the risks it brings to the individuals. First of all, it concerns counterfeit medicine, food, cosmetics, toys, car and aircraft spare parts, as a non-exhaustive list of possible examples leading to life and health danger. On the other side, the brands are suffering due to non-generated profit, reputation damages and loss of customers.

What is “Trust your product”?

“Trust your product” is a mobile platform that is designed to help us, ordinary customers, and brands distinguish original products from counterfeits, thereby protecting the lives and health of us and our loved ones, as well as preventing damage that counterfeits can inflict on brand’s reputation and their relationships with customers. Its goal is to accomplish this task with no extra charge, without any specialized, costly equipment, yet, by anyone, anytime, and anywhere.

How does it work?

The main idea of “Trust your product” is to exploit invariant unclonable random features inherent to materials and processes used for products’ manufacturing that serve a similar purpose as human biometrics serves in person identification and authentication. The results of recent scientific research that were partially obtained by this project originator, demonstrate that such features acquired using cameras of habitual smartphones at a certain zone of the product surface, or its packaging or label, are discriminating enough to uniquely represent every of them, whether it concerns watches, carton packaging, or rubber labels.

“Trust your product” in its core is about how to accurately and reliably extract these features, analyze them, and transform them into informative signals to finally generate functional decisions and is designed according to the following theoretical model.

The platform functions in two modes: enrollment and verification.

At enrollment that is organized by the brand in-house, the invariant unclonable random features are extracted from corresponding products, analyzed, transformed and stored in a secure database.

At verification that is performed by an end user, it is sufficient to capture a photo of a product using a smartphone camera that is operated by a specialized mobile application and to wait for product originality confirmation/rejection verdict that will be displayed on its screen in a few seconds. You need one click only to get originality of your product certified!

Despite its amazing simplicity offered to the end user, the “Trust your product” is full of mathematical sophistication and technology that constitute the core of the patent that will be filed shortly.

Main advantages

  • Regular customers:

  • Brands

Timeline

Where is your money going?

Mostly, your contribution will go towards:

  • Research and development – we still need to invest in this domain in order to be able to optimally protect a wide range of products.
  • Testing – in order to finalize the development of the ready-to-market platform prototype, we need to purchase a server and several models of smartphones. At this stage, we assume to follow the LEAN strategy in order to minimize our budget.
  • Marketing – we are planning to launch several marketing campaigns to be initiated via various communication channels such as press, exhibitions, workshops, etc., that will allow us to reinforce the global awareness of the “Trust your product” as an available efficient option in combat against counterfeiting and to further grow its community.
  • Fees – payment of various fees (including the ones due to Indiegogo).

We chose $75’000 in order to at least compensate for the cost we have already invested and still need to invest in order to produce our LEAN product prototype. If more money will be collected, we plan to extend our initial goals via adding some additional options to the original design, for instance, a possibility to analyze the data generated by the platform to address a brand marketing needs.

Who are we?

Oleksiy Koval possesses substantial experience (more than 15 years) in the field of product protection against counterfeiting and multimedia security. Along with his professional career, he was engaged in world class research in the referred domains in the Swiss academic environment as well as actively participated in collaboration with Swiss and European industrial partners as researcher and consultant. His overall implemented project portfolio includes more than 15 titles. He has two Ph.D. degrees, in mathematical modeling and computer science, respectively, authors and co-authors 1 book, more than 120 peer-reviewed publications, and 3 patents.

Olga Kalynovska is creative designer and artist who will help make your participation in this campaign unforgettable.

Risks & Challenges

The main strength of the project is that the “Trust your product” functions! This result was possible by dint of our investment of time, effort and due to our passion that we put into the project. We strongly believe in the project and in the value that its outcomes will have to every person and every brand. Our determination to succeed with its complete implementation is additionally confirmed by the monetary investment made in order to reach the project’s current status.

Our former experience, qualifications, and prior obtained results should serve an additional guarantee of the minimization of risks such an adventure could meet along its way towards success. However, we should be aware of the innovative character of the project that involves the use of hardware components that might reveal unforeseen obstacles. Additionally, we should not fully eliminate the chance of making mistakes that are typical of humans and that might introduce some extra delays into the project timeline.

Would the project go along its original planning or suffers from unexpected time modifications, we promise to always keep you timely updated.
story_txt:
Motivation
From fake luxury goods to mock medicines and baby meal, the business of counterfeit goods is one of the largest underground industries that is rapidly growing. Current estimates of the overall annual economic value of this industry exceed $1500 billion and demonstrate a positive trend of about 10%. Consequently, the losses in tax revenue account for $78 billion and the number of non-created working places overpasses 2.5 million annually. A quick analysis of the fake industry composition allows easily identify the risks it brings to the individuals. First of all, it concerns counterfeit medicine, food, cosmetics, toys, car and aircraft spare parts, as a non-exhaustive list of possible examples leading to life and health danger. On the other side, the brands are suffering due to non-generated profit, reputation damages and loss of customers.
What is “Trust your product”?
“Trust your product” is a mobile platform that is designed to help us, ordinary customers, and brands distinguish original products from counterfeits, thereby protecting the lives and health of us and our loved ones, as well as preventing damage that counterfeits can inflict on brand’s reputation and their relationships with customers. Its goal is to accomplish this task with no extra charge, without any specialized, costly equipment, yet, by anyone, anytime, and anywhere.
How does it work?
The main idea of “Trust your product” is to exploit invariant unclonable random features inherent to materials and processes used for products’ manufacturing that serve a similar purpose as human biometrics serves in person identification and authentication. The results of recent scientific research that were partially obtained by this project originator, demonstrate that such features acquired using cameras of habitual smartphones at a certain zone of the product surface, or its packaging or label, are discriminating enough to uniquely represent every of them, whether it concerns watches, carton packaging, or rubber labels.




“Trust your product” in its core is about how to accurately and reliably extract these features, analyze them, and transform them into informative signals to finally generate functional decisions and is designed according to the following theoretical model.


The platform functions in two modes: enrollment and verification.
At enrollment that is organized by the brand in-house, the invariant unclonable random features are extracted from corresponding products, analyzed, transformed and stored in a secure database.

At verification that is performed by an end user, it is sufficient to capture a photo of a product using a smartphone camera that is operated by a specialized mobile application and to wait for product originality confirmation/rejection verdict that will be displayed on its screen in a few seconds. You need one click only to get originality of your product certified!
Despite its amazing simplicity offered to the end user, the “Trust your product” is full of mathematical sophistication and technology that constitute the core of the patent that will be filed shortly.

Along with his professional career, he was engaged in world class research in the referred domains in the Swiss academic environment as well as actively participated in collaboration with Swiss and European industrial partners as researcher and consultant. He has two Ph.D. degrees, in mathematical modeling and computer science, respectively, authors and co-authors 1 book, more than 120 peer-reviewed publications, and 3 patents.
Olga Kalynovska is creative designer and artist who will help make your participation in this campaign unforgettable.
Risks & Challenges
The main strength of the project is that the “Trust your product” functions! This result was possible by dint of our investment of time, effort and due to our passion that we put into the project. We strongly believe in the project and in the value that its outcomes will have to every person and every brand. Our determination to succeed with its complete implementation is additionally confirmed by the monetary investment made in order to reach the project’s current status.
Our former experience, qualifications, and prior obtained results should serve an additional guarantee of the minimization of risks such an adventure could meet along its way towards success. Additionally, we should not fully eliminate the chance of making mistakes that are typical of humans and that might introduce some extra delays into the project timeline.

story:
Let's ask the basic question 1st! Why OrGo?

Being a graduate in Business Management with Masters in Business and a working professional for 6 years, I was done with the traditional organizers with planners which gives me a notepad and nothing useful or creative. We live in an age where everything else around is advanced, yet we stick to the notepads and diaries disguised as planners.

I, with the help of my wonderful teammates, designed a planner which combines technology while keeping the essence of nature in it.  We have created an interactive planner which helps you plan and act on your goals and more.

When I say it’s more than just a planner, I mean every single word of it! Let me show you why!

OrGo is made of beautiful Art Leather, has a Bluetooth Keyboard, 4000 mAh power bank with Lightning, C-Type & Micro cable. We give you a customizable planner according to your need with a never seen before Habit Tracker to elevate your lifestyle!

What You Thought Is What We Made And More!

 

 

Supports Various Platforms

Supports Mac, iOS, Windows, and Android offering you seamless configuration and ultimate convenience.

 

Don't Worry! We Have Taken Care To Satisfy Your Urge For "Little More"!

 

 

After Working With The Best In The Industry, We Have Customized The Planners According To Your Need!

 

MOM's Planner!! For THE Hero Of Our Life!

A planner specially designed to help mothers balance their personal, work and children’s lives. It has a host of segments which help mothers to manage their time effectively and every segment in the planner has the purpose of being helpful!

 

Student's Planner! Babe Ruth Quotes, "It's Hard To Beat A Person Who Never Gives Up"

Our Student Planner is designed to help you get a head start on critical life organization skills. Student's can use the weekly spread to plan school, chores, activities, and responsibilities.

 

Executives Planner! For That Hard Working Soul In You!

Our executive planner keeps you organized, while letting everyone around you know that you're BUSY, VERY BUSY!:)

 

Planner For Everyone! It's All Too Much And Not Enough At The Same Time!!

Well, are you a jack of all and always want to be on top of the things? We have a planner for you as well! Our Planner For Everyone helps you keep track of all your activities with minimal effort!

 

Habit Tracker! You Will Never Change Your Life Until You Change Something You Do Daily!!

Irrespective of the planner you choose we also have introduced a habit tracker behind every page to elevate your lifestyle!

Want More! We Know You Do!

OrGo Also Comes In Another Color!

 

So This Is How It All Started!!

 

Here Are Few Production Pictures From Our Production Site! We Are Excited To Ship It To You By End Of Dec'17!

 

FAQs

What do I get with OrGo?

1 Customized Planner (100 pages, 80 customized planner with Habit Tracker behind every page & 20 plain pages arranged systematically for hassle-free usage), One Bluetooth Keyboard with Magnetic Mount, 4000 mAh Inbuilt Power Bank with Lightning, C-Type & Micro Cable, Pen Holder, Space to keep all your Credit Cards, Extra Space for Boarding Passes, Passport and much more!

Do you ship worldwide?

Yes! We have partnered with major courier companies so we can ship anywhere in the worldwide.

When will I receive my OrGo?

Our manufacturing unit has a capacity of 2500 units per week! We start the production once we hit our goal & subsequently start shipping them 7 days from the date of starting production!

What are the shipping costs?

It is very minimal, once the campaign is over we will update the shipping cost.

Can I choose more than one perk?

You can claim multiple perks by initiating a new contribution for each perk.

Do you have a warranty?

Yes! Every OrGo comes with a 1 year guaranteed warranty.  If OrGo is ascertained to be faulty irrespective of the Keyboard or Power Bank, we will replace it for you at NO COST!

What are the dimensions?

We have tried to keep it in the perfect size for you to carry – 9 x 7 inches.

story:
It’s good to challenge the status quo, especially when you have a positive goal. At GIV, we like to be a little rebellious and evoke change through innovative thinking.  But, as a profit-for-good social enterprise, we are also very driven by good causes, so we like to call ourselves ‘Rebels with a Cause’.

The GIV dashboard enables you to fund good causes without disrupting your life or your bank balance. Our revolutionary new model for GIVing makes it easy, simple, and free for you to support what matters most to you. Join our community of ‘Rebels with a Cause’ and help us make a positive and happy impact in our world.  #rebelwithacause

At GIV, we believe in total transparency and complete honesty. The internet can often be shrouded in mystery and full of technical terms that no one understands. We want to make everything  100% clear, easy, and uncomplicated. So here is a simple overview:

To make it free, easy, and uncomplicated for individuals to support the good causes they care about by incorporating GIVing into our everyday lives online through creative, purposeful, and positive use of technology and commerce-for-good.

A fairer and more balanced world where individuals can have their say on the development of their surrounding environment by using their purchasing power to catalyse positive social change within local communities and global societies.

Above all else, we value creativity, community, positivity, kindness, acceptance, empowerment, development, and happiness.

This is a demo of your personalised dashboard.

On the right, is your creative dashboard. The dashboard contains feeds of photography, art, and information - specially designed to reflect the feel-good vibe of the GIV community. In your dashboard, you will have access to your own social media feed, a news feed, a space for art and creativity, inspirational and positive messages from around the world, as well as a summary of the good you and your fellow GIVers have spread by using your shopping dashboard.

On the left, you will be able to navigate through your own individualised toolbar. The toolbar is a space for you to organise all your favourite online shops and websites into personalised categories, making it easy and simple for you to access your favourite retailers - and other parts of the internet - and avoid online noise.

We plan to add additional features to the dashboard in the near future, but we need your help to make our platform reach its full potential.

More on this below.

It all began with a small dot. A little niggle in the back of our minds. A small dot as pen touched paper and little snippets of ideas were written down. Little pictures eventually grew into one common idea. An idea that we believe can have a big impact on the world.

Time and time again, each of us have been met with the cliched old adage: ‘Business is tough’. At GIV, we don’t believe in tough business, we believe in kind business.

Through technology, we want to enable you to harness your purchasing power and create a fairer and more balanced society for us all. We want to make it easy, uncomplicated, and free for you to support the good causes that are important to you and your community.

Follow our campaign on Instagram and Facebook. Search #itstartedwithadot.

 

Whilst we really love our dashboard, we know we can make it even more awesome. We have loads of great ideas already, but we will also allow you and our users to have your say on how the functionality will develop in the near future.

To increase the good we can spread, we need more hands on deck. We would like to employ a team of passionate and talented people to help us develop our good-cause area, help us build relationships with retailers, and help us spread the word and engage with our users.

Part of your funding will be invested in developing a system for purchasing transparency. We want to help our users gain a better understanding of the processes behind the products they buy. This system will GIV people the ability to choose - not only which good causes they want to support - but also which retailers they think are doing a better job at supporting their community and protecting our shared environment.

At the core of any successful social enterprise is a strong outreach and communications program. Our focus will be on authentic two-way communication with our GIVers community. Your money won’t be spent on pushy and distracting ads, but on informative, transparent, and honest content.

Rebel with a cause who loves GIV’ng out feel-good vibes and splashes of colour.

Hi. I’m Elkie. I am a design and marketing professional with a tenacious entrepreneurial spirit and a mastery of reinvention and versatility. I am a visual communicator and brand builder. My natural positivity, creativity and appreciation of the simple things in life have shaped the essence of GIV. I have worked in a variety of sectors, ranging from fashion to packaging, education, travel, and technology. I have an eye for aesthetics and harmony, which has helped me create numerous award-winning, feel-good products and brands. I’m excited to be channelling my extensive experience and knowledge of design and entrepreneurship into supporting good causes around the globe.

Rebel with a cause who loves GIV’ng great ideas to the world.

Hi. I’m Nico. I am a seasoned business and technology professional and a ‘business artist’ at heart. I am an ideas guy with a ‘can-do’ attitude. Above all else - I value integrity, passion, and zeal. From a very young age, I have strived to build innovative and trail-blazing companies within a multitude of sectors. I am proud to have won several awards for entrepreneurship over the years, but now I have an ambition to GIV back. Philanthropy and business-for-good is a sector I have always dreamed to take part in - and with GIV, that dream is now coming true.

Rebel with a cause who loves GIV’ng knowledge and a sense of community.

Hi. I’m Maja Alice. I serve as GIV’s resident wordsmith, ethics expert, and community manager. I have an honours degree in Intercultural Market Communication from Copenhagen Business School - home to leading research in the subjects of ‘corporate social responsibility’ and ‘creating shared valued’. I am a social entrepreneur at heart and have helped several start-ups build their brand presences through authentic storytelling and community engagement. I am a passionate environmentalist, egalitarian, vegetarian, and foodie. I like to approach life with a sense of humour and a smile - even on Mondays. I am incredibly excited to take part in the GIV journey and can’t wait to get to know you all.

Rebel with a cause who loves GIV’ng through technological brilliance and magic.

Hi. I'm Giannis. My love for computer technology struck me at the tender age of five, when I started to play around with my father's PC. My fascination and curiosity for computer software finally drove me to study Computer Science at the TEI of Piraeus in Athens. I am a dedicated software engineer with a passion for creating a better experience for internet users. To make this happen, I always keep myself updated on the latest tricks of the trade. I have a friendly, happy, and positive outlook on life and never shy away from a challenge. I am a hard-rock music enthusiast with a soft spot for computer games and family life. I am really happy to be part of the GIV team and love using my technological skills to help drive good in the world.

Share the kindness

Help us have a positive impact. Share our page with your friends and family.

  

Get in touch

We are on email, you simply have to be these days. So if you have any questions, please feel free to drop us a line or post a comment.

Get social

We’re also on social media. Well on some of them at least. Because who has the time to be on all of them, right?

   

Follow our campaigns via the hashtags #investinkind and #itstartedwithadot and connect with us using the handles @giv.club on Instagram and @givdotclub on Facebook.

Credits

A massive thank you to Oliver from 'Deep Dale Productions' who is the creative talent behind our videos. Follow us on YouTube to see more of our videos in the near future.

Thank you to the artists and photographers whose creative work have made it possible for us to tell our story.

story:
The story

If you've Googled any question about ProPresenter, it's likely that one of my tutorial videos has come up in the search.  I started making tutorials for churches in February of 2011, but it wasn't until June of the next year that people started noticing.  That's when I went from teaching about video production, in general, to how to use ProPresenter in specific.

Since then, I've done over 200 tutorials (216 at last count) on  ProPresenter and am always looking for ways to help you get more out of this incredible program.  That's why I've decided to create this keyboard skin.

Why crowd funding?

I need your help for this to work.  I'm sure that you know people who would be interested in a keyboard skin that I don't know.  So, first and foremost, share this campaign with them.

Secondly, for this to work, I need to get together an order that is larger than anything I've ever put together before.  That doesn't mean it's impossible, but just that I need your help to make it a reality.

  • The design is done and the shortcuts have been tested in ProPresenter 6.
  • I've been talking with a contact at the factory and have a quote to make them.
  • Because of the economics of scale, I can't just order one for me.  I need to order 1000-2000.  That's where you come in.

Results

If you join me in this, you'll be making it possible for me to get a keyboard skin to not only you, but other churches who haven't yet heard about this product.

  • Once they're printed and delivered, I'll mail yours out to your church or organization.
  • You'll be able to save time each week and start to memorize the keyboard short cuts you use most often.  
  • You might be able to cut off enough prep time that those last moments of a push to get your presentations done in time, become a thing of the past.

Risks & Challenges

This isn't without risk, though.  I'm not making each of these skins by hand, in my office.  This requires the help of a factory.  This is something new, though.  I've never made a keyboard skin before.  I've never contracted with a factory to take an idea and make it a reality.  Sure, I've self-published books I've had printed.  I've designed t-shirts which could be printed in small batches.  This requires a larger order, though.

There's a couple of reasons why these are just challenges to be overcome, not roadblocks.

  • I have a community of subscribers on YouTube that I can tap into to help this become a success.
  • I have a group on Facebook devoted to ProPresenter who said, one after another, "Yes, that's a great idea," or "I'd buy a couple" or "Shut up and take my money."
  • You're here and I believe you will push this over the top.
  • I have seen enough support for this that I'll refuse to quit until it's a success.

"How can I help if I use a different keyboard or am on Windows?"

If this isn't exactly right for you, here are some ways you can help anyway:

  • Pray.  I believe it changes things and can help difficult things become a reality.
  • Share this campaign with others.  Just because it's not right for you, that doesn't mean it's not right for them.
  • Check back often.  If we reach the goal for the first skin, we can make others.  
  • Give me feedback.  If you catch a typo or see a mistake, let me know.
  • Keep in mind that if this campaign gets fully funded, I'll make other skins and maybe even a dedicated keyboard (probably starting with Windows, since there's no single PC manufacturer).

Stretch goals

Whichever is more popular first:

  • Apple Magic Keyboard with numeric keyboard skin
  • Windows keyboard or keyboard skin

Thanks for your time; together we can do this and help churches who use ProPresenter to use it better and, more importantly, reach more people.
story_txt:
The story
If you've Googled any question about ProPresenter, it's likely that one of my tutorial videos has come up in the search.  I started making tutorials for churches in February of 2011, but it wasn't until June of the next year that people started noticing.  That's when I went from teaching about video production, in general, to how to use ProPresenter in specific.
Since then, I've done over 200 tutorials (216 at last count) on  ProPresenter and am always looking for ways to help you get more out of this incredible program.  That's why I've decided to create this keyboard skin.

Why crowd funding?
I need your help for this to work.  I'm sure that you know people who would be interested in a keyboard skin that I don't know.  So, first and foremost, share this campaign with them.
Secondly, for this to work, I need to get together an order that is larger than anything I've ever put together before.  That doesn't mean it's impossible, but just that I need your help to make it a reality.

The design is done and the shortcuts have been tested in ProPresenter 6.
I've been talking with a contact at the factory and have a quote to make them.
Because of the economics of scale, I can't just order one for me.  I need to order 1000-2000.  That's where you come in.


Results
If you join me in this, you'll be making it possible for me to get a keyboard skin to not only you, but other churches who haven't yet heard about this product.

Once they're printed and delivered, I'll mail yours out to your church or organization.
You'll be able to save time each week and start to memorize the keyboard short cuts you use most often.  
You might be able to cut off enough prep time that those last moments of a push to get your presentations done in time, become a thing of the past.


Risks & Challenges
This isn't without risk, though.  I'm not making each of these skins by hand, in my office.  This requires the help of a factory.  This is something new, though.  I've never made a keyboard skin before.  I've never contracted with a factory to take an idea and make it a reality.  Sure, I've self-published books I've had printed.  I've designed t-shirts which could be printed in small batches.  This requires a larger order, though.
There's a couple of reasons why these are just challenges to be overcome, not roadblocks.

I have a community of subscribers on YouTube that I can tap into to help this become a success.
I have a group on Facebook devoted to ProPresenter who said, one after another, "Yes, that's a great idea," or "I'd buy a couple" or "Shut up and take my money."
You're here and I believe you will push this over the top.
I have seen enough support for this that I'll refuse to quit until it's a success.


"How can I help if I use a different keyboard or am on Windows?"
If this isn't exactly right for you, here are some ways you can help anyway:

Pray.  I believe it changes things and can help difficult things become a reality.
Share this campaign with others.  Just because it's not right for you, that doesn't mean it's not right for them.
Check back often.  If we reach the goal for the first skin, we can make others.  
Give me feedback.  If you catch a typo or see a mistake, let me know.
Keep in mind that if this campaign gets fully funded, I'll make other skins and maybe even a dedicated keyboard (probably starting with Windows, since there's no single PC manufacturer).

Stretch goalsWhichever is more popular first:
Apple Magic Keyboard with numeric keyboard skin
Windows keyboard or keyboard skin
Thanks for your time; together we can do this and help churches who use ProPresenter to use it better and, more importantly, reach more people.

story:
Uber lets you make money from your car; Airbnb lets you make money from your home; now PowerMyData lets you make money from your data. A key challenge today is that businesses and consumers don’t understand each other. You want the best products and services, for the best price, while maintaining your privacy. Businesses want to understand you better so that they can provide products and services you’ll buy, and keep you happy. The current system of advertising allows middle-men (ad tech companies) to take and sell your information without your control. However, technology is now at a place where consumers and businesses can work together directly, while protecting your privacy. PowerMyData is the answer.


Currently, advertising-middlemen take your valuable data when you use an app, browse the web, or search, and use it to sell ads. This makes these advertising and internet companies rich while flooding you with annoying ads that waste your time, put your identity at risk, and expose you to malicious software. Our app is different; it works for you. In a mature digital economy we conservatively forecast that PowerMyData will make you about $1000 a year and save you about $1250 a year on things you want to buy.


The following diagram briefly illustrates how it works: 


The following video offers another, simple overview of the app:


The largest companies collect and use your data to increase their profits. They embed hardware sensors and software trackers to collect data about you - even when you sleep. Companies use their sensor laden products in your home to record your location, behavior, mood, habits and your personal conversations. These products are in effect, spying on you. Why do they do this? The answer is simple: your data (information) and attention are worth a lot of money. We are asking for you to fund the PowerMyData mobile app & service that will help you own, control, and profit from your data & attention.





Here is a quick summary of the features you will receive in the first version of the mobile app:


Here is a more detailed look at key features in the first version of the mobile app:

Data Security: Get peace of mind. Using cryptography, data isolation, and the separation of personally identifiable information from non-identifiable data, we ensure privacy. Additionally, as we build out our DApp (Decentralized Application), we’ll be able to adopt decentralized data and cryptography consensus capabilities. This will ensure unequaled data security and availability.

Privacy: Get real privacy. Our systems are designed so no hacker, client, partner, or employee can access your identifiable data in conjunction with your commercial profile. We do not own your data and we do not tell you what data you must provide in your commercial profile. You are fully in control at all times and completely free to erase your data and leave our service any time you want. 


The following video presents specific examples about how PowerMyData can improve your life and help the people & causes you love.



In order to make extra special incentives, we decided to make our t-shirts glow-in-the-dark. Yes, that’s right. Our t-shirts glow-in-the-dark, because once you join our service you are empowered and your data is now turned on. Here is a quick overview of all the perks we offer:



  1. Fund us here at Indiegogo.
  2. Register on our website www.PowerMyData.com.
  3. Share our story with family and friends. Visit us at Facebook, YouTube, and Twitter.
  4. Receive your rewards when our campaign ends.
  5. Receive notification when the mobile app launches. 
  6. Create a small profile to begin the PowerMyData free service.
  7. Start making money and saving on things you want.
  8. Bank it, or give to people you love or causes you believe in.

Here is how we plan to invest your contribution:



With your support we can finish our platform to allow all your connected, electronic devices (including the appliances in your home, like your TV, internet router, washer, dryer, security camera, thermostat, etc.) to be generating data that works for you. Moreover, we believe these products should be making money for you, not someone else. With PowerMyData, the next consumer technology wave becomes an internet of things that make money for you. With your support, we can make that happen.



We are building secure, world-class Android and iPhone mobile apps, a personal monetization engine, and the supporting partner ecosystem. We built a prototype and now need to make a decentralized solution to give you full control of your data that makes and saves you thousands of dollars every year.





1. The largest risk for building the service is to get enough funding to secure and retain the best most qualified team.

2. The biggest risks for success after the app is released is growing fast and large enough to create the market momentum to be a self-sustaining service. 

If you have questions, we've answered a lot of them already in the Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) section of our website. Please click here to see them: PowerMyData.com

story:
Learn More About Adsaki

 

Innovation, imagination, hard work and perseverance lives here.

Kamal Dhanoa: BSc. Computer Science, Marketing Professional , Entrepreneur

I’ve always been a process efficiency enthusiast, an “idea’s person” – always finding opportunities to create better processes at work.

During my position as a Marketing Officer, I discovered core tasks that were incredibly tedious and time consuming. As I began to formulate a possible solution, I quickly realized it would benefit beyond my workplace to Marketing Professionals and Businesses across the globe. 

After spending months working on the concept and receiving positive feedback, I realized that full time commitment would be required. I began my startup journey.

One year later, I've conducted research and development, created a prototype and have run successful series of feedback trials. Interest has been intense which has led me to this campaign. I need your support to help fund the development of Adsaki. Be part of the solution that will change marketing forever.

 

 

Testimonials

The Adsaki protoype has received notable interest from marketing specialists who work in organizations of varying size: large companies, small business, not-for-profit and solopreneurs (influencers, athletes, etc.). Here is a small snapshot of feedback obtained: 

 

Awards and Achievements:

Receiving honours in recognition of passion, hardwork and dedication.

 

Your Support

Thank you for backing Adsaki, your funding support will help power the development of the application and algorithm design, the backbone of our smart technology.

Using principles of emerging technologies in AI, Machine Learning, Predictive and Big Data analytics, Adsaki aims to be an incredibly intuitive, smart and productive technology.

 

Funding

Funding raised ($16,500) would be used as follows:

 

https://www.mitacs.ca/en

 

Rewards

Thank YOU so much for your support!

Adsaki is offering 4 rewards for pledge levels of ($25, $50, $100, $500).

There is also 1 exclusive Corporate reward for pledge levels of ($2,000).

* There is no minimum pledge, you can contribute any amount you would like, every bit helps!

* There is no obligation to claim a perk, there are options to fund at each of the 4 pledge levels without a reward.

 

Your Impact

Your support will afford opportunities to students, small business and bring more diversity of products and services for you to discover as a customer.

 

Risks & Challenges

Working towards getting Adsaki first to market means obtaining the necessary funds to expedite development.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

It takes a village to raise a startup, I sincerely appreciate your support in any capacity - Thank YOU.

LinkedIN: https://www.linkedin.com/in/kamal-dhanoa-92529a5b

Twitter: https://twitter.com/adsaki_com

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/adsaki_com/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Adsaki-314060169012166/

 

Thank You

Heartfelt thanks for supporting me!

I would simply describe myself as a genuine, hardworking person who has a knack for process improvement and problem solving. I'm a creative "idea's" person who loves efficiency!!

I'm also a sports and fitness enthusiast. Inspired by Bo Jackson's multisport background, not only from an athletic perspective, but from the greater philosophy of reaching outside convention, to touch the "impossible" and declare impossible is nothing.

Another passion of mine is the sense of "community" and "the greater good". One of my dreams once Adsaki reaches maturity is to eventually launch a sustainable and self-perpetuating model of charity. A hybrid approach that would support (via funding) new startups in return for their future contributions to charitable causes. "Pay it forward".

 

Kamal Dhanoa

story: NA

Summary

Despite the latest version of Aeroo Reports being for Odoo v8, it remained the favourite choice for a big number of Odoo and Python (yes, Aeroo Reports library can be used for other of your Python projects as well) developers around the world. Very often community contributions are just not enough to sustainably develop and maintain Free Open Source Software projects, now this is the time, we need some funding from you, the community.

So, what will be done?

  • The Immediate goal is porting for Odoo v11, so that we all can continue enjoying the easy, versatile and powerful turnkey reporting solution for Odoo, affordable ERP package of choice for a large number of people around the world.
  • The next milestone is to move the free documentation from our website www.alistek.com to github, next to the code itself.
  • The documentation shall be updated as well.

What if it happens that community is generous enough to raise more funds?

Well yes, sometimes it happens that way...We'll do our best to spend the funds on making documentation better and more exhaustive, on supporting community members and what's most important, sustaining just another FOSS project.

What We Need & What You Get

The short answer is: project needs funding, so that Aeroo Reports does not become obsolete.

While there are lot of customer projects providing constant revenue for our developers, that allowed us to pay our bills, we have been doing all the development and maintenance, funded only by our company - Alistek.

Now that's not the case, we need your help. We estimated time investment in porting at USD 1900,- and some extra 600,- for moving the documentation. You get Aeroo Reports functionality for Odoo v11, and more accessible and better documentation.

Besides the good feeling of being a helping hand...

  • ALL contributors will be hailed to our Twitter followers;
  • 1st USD 100+ contributor will receive our special thanks in form of promoting the company logo to our Twitter followers + listing in the documentation and module summary page;
  • ALL USD 100+ contributors will be listed in the project documentation and module summary page in Odoo;
  • ALL USD 500+ contributors will receive our special thanks in form of promoting the company logo to our Twitter followers and Aeroo Reports module configuration banner;

No mugs will be presented, this time... ;(

Risks & Challenges

The main risk is that Odoo releases next version in next couple of months. ;) Just joking...

Other Ways You Can Help

What if you do not feel like contributing funds? Here comes two ideas...

If you do not know what is Aeroo Reports -

- shall nothing stop you from testing Aeroo Reports and trying out the most versatile and easy reporting engine for Odoo ERP, despite not being available for the latest versions of it. Then you can move to other options.

You know Aeroo Reports, but still you'd prefer helping in another way -

- spread the word about this funding campaign in the social media, helping reach the goals faster. You could help by testing the beta versions, after funds are raised, pointing out or exterminating bugs.

story:
Why do we all need BeeUp?

BeeUp tackles a problem we all know. In big cosmopolitan cities, people often feel alone even with millions of people around them. This is a world we refuse to live in. 

With your help, BeeUp will be the most user-friendly social planner for friends, combining the:


BeeUp is not another platform to kill time online, but a medium facilitating offline meetings with friends. Let's be(e) together.


Our buzzing features 


The next BeeUp steps after Indiegogo:

We are just as excited as you and want to be able to use BeeUp tomorrow, unfortunately all great things take their time. 


What do we need the money for?

We are raising money on Indiegogo to provide the best possible solution that would allow people to better connect with their friends.  For those of you who are curious about how your money will be spent, this is a breakdown of our expenses: 


You've reached the pot of honey! Rewards and perks for our sponsors:

If we haven't said so already: thank you for your support! What better way to show that than showing our gratitude with amazing perks? 

                 


The team behind BeeUp 

We are six enthusiastic entrepreneurs that met while studying in London. We bonded over our shared interest in new experiences, meeting people, and visiting new places. As a team we bring together different fields of expertise, from International Management, to Psychology, Economics, Literature, and Marketing. By collaborating with experienced consultants in app development and design, we will ensure that BeeUp is an accessible, useful, and above all, fun addition to your home screen.

Together, let's create a better tool for connecting with friends - not just online but, more importantly, offline.

We want to see a more united and vibrant social scene worldwide, built on common denominators of music, food, culture, and so many others. Let’s stop missing out and start experiencing!


Special thanks to LGN_LDN for video production (info@lgnldn.com) and Dan Phillipson for music.
