The team behind BeeUp 
We are six enthusiastic entrepreneurs that met while studying in
London. We bonded over our shared interest in new experiences, meeting people,
and visiting new places. As a team we bring together different fields of
expertise, from International Management, to Psychology, Economics, Literature,
and Marketing. By collaborating with experienced consultants in app development
and design, we will ensure that BeeUp is an accessible, useful, and above all,
fun addition to your home screen.




Together, let's create a better tool for connecting with
friends - not just online but, more importantly, offline.
We want to see a more united and
vibrant social scene worldwide, built on common denominators of music, food,
culture, and so many others. Let’s stop missing out and start experiencing!



Special thanks to LGN_LDN for video production (info@lgnldn.com) and Dan
Phillipson for music.

story: See PROXABYTE in action!
story_txt: See PROXABYTE in action!

story:
First of all, I am a hobby who loves to cook for myself. I look at the recipes on the Internet and buy fresh ingredients. DIY is my own leisure activity.

And I have ever tried a lot of expensive knife and very cheap knives in the past 20 years, and I have sharpened my own knife.

Often there is no maintenance or rust, otherwise it is to buy a popular brand of knives, of course, the price is also high...

One day, I went to an old restaurant for dinner. I met an old chef looks around 60 age, the restaurant style is ordering and interact with customers, push the dining car and cooking tools on the spot, boiled steak or vegetables on the spot, and set the plate... etc.

I am thinking that the knives used in this high-end restaurant should be high-grade. I asked the professional chef what brand of knives he bought.

Hi said that he asked the craftsman to custom knife for himself.

He has been a chef more than 40 years and told me to go and get it.

Therefore, I went to the old craftsman to assist me custom the knife,

according to my length / weight / counterweight.

I also told myself to the process of making the knife, therefore I start looking for how to make a perfect knife batter then now super market sold those knives.

I want to produce economy price but high-quality tools for myself.

Nowadays, the people are like enjoy life and taste new different style food. More and more people love sashimi and sushi when they fall in love with cooking. Enjoy meat at home and then the problem comes up: Is your kitchen knife "cutting" soft fish? The sushi rolls that have been rolled up are sure to be "bad" by an unsharp knife. The "sashimi knife", which is specially designed to handle sashimi, is very slender, has a small blade angle, and is hard and sharp. The cut sashimi is bright.

The professional chef said:

The knife in the kitchen is like a tool in a garage, and different tools deal with different problems. Kitchen knives are also used. In reality, many families are "a knife to cook the world." "It is difficult to explain to them the basic idea that different functions should use different kinds of knives." Even for ordinary household cooking, a knife is really not enough. It is very tired to use a heavy Chinese kitchen knife to simmer meat. Take a knife like this, how to separate the fish fillet and the fish bone? How to cut the roast chicken to the table? Some people at home, a knife flower USD 50 money may already be a lot, how can you tell them that they need 6 knives? This is a bit difficult."

 

Use is the first consideration when buying a kitchen knife. For professional chefs, kitchen knives are an extension of their hands, which is about their business, reputation, work efficiency, and of course, depending on the type of use. In general, the boundaries of cooking and use in the home are vague, and they are often used in a few ways. They are not so fine, but at least one of the most basic concepts should be established: kitchen knives must never be used across applications.

 

Many people are used to Chinese-style kitchen knives and are unwilling to change. They always feel that they are not comfortable. In fact, a Western-style chef's knife is lighter and better to control, and it is almost a universal knife in addition to cutting bones or cutting ribs. One of the Japanese kitchen knives is called Santoku, translated as "Three Germans." Third, it includes the meaning of slice, dicing and mince, which is the universal knife in the traditional Japanese knife type. In recent years, Sande Knife is quite popular in the family kitchen, because its knife type is between the Chinese kitchen knife and the Western chef knife. It is light and versatile.

 

The advice for buying kitchen knives for general household use is: don't buy the most expensive ones, don't chase famous brands, buy the best ones you can afford, feel it in your hand and see if you like the length of it. shape, feel the feeling of the handle held in the hand.

 

Finally, I found use Fe3O2 Black Oxidation Technology on the Knife surface,
It will form an anti-protect film. This layer of dense oxide film protective layer, anti-corrosion ability can achieve anti-rust effect, the tool surface is healthier and more hygienic when used.

* Fe3O4. Means Feo.Fe2O3. Its name is ferroso ferric oxide. It is also known as magnetite due to very good magnetic property. We know that when valency of Iron is 2 it is known as ferrous and ferric when its valency is 3.

   

 

PLA tableware made from wheat straw and rice straw is healthy and natural, and can withstand high temperature, reuse, and natural decomposition.

Tableware made of starch + cellulose

The so-called tableware made of straw, rice straw, and corn actually uses the starch and cellulose rich in these plants. Cellulose can increase strength and is easy to understand; what about starch?

 

In fact, it is necessary to make tableware that is tough and suitable for daily use. It is not directly used for starch. Instead, starch is fermented to produce lactic acid. Then these lactic acid are polymerized and combined to form polylactic acid (polylactide).

 

"Polylactic acid? I haven't heard it."

It’s normal to haven’t heard it, because I haven’t said its most famous and magical name: PLA!

 

PLA is a biodegradable polymer material that undergoes simultaneous hydrolysis and thermal degradation and changes back to lactic acid under high humidity and high temperature. This is why PLA is called "biodegradable environmentally friendly material". The most magical place of PLA is that it has the same ductility as ordinary plastics, can be processed, and can be decomposed and non-toxic, so it quickly became the darling of the material industry.

The earliest application of PLA was on biomedical materials. In medical surgery, "decomposable sutures" that do not need to be removed, "decomposable bone nails" that do not require more than one knife, and bone plates are made of PLA.

However, pure PLA is not suitable for use as a tableware directly: because it exceeds 60 degrees, PLA will begin to soften and deform. So if you take a pure PLA cup to the microwave, it is a cup when you go in, and it may become a beach when you come out.

 

There are two main methods for upgrading. One is to mix two kinds of lactic acid D-form and L-form (Poly(D, L-lactic acid)) in a specific ratio, which can make the material properties of polylactic acid stronger and more durable. This method is commonly used for bone nails and bone plates. Because although it is upgraded, it is still lactic acid, and there is no doubt. Another way is to mix with plastic.

Package Type: Basic or Gift Package

The value is not the "knife"; is the process of forging a knife...

It takes a lot of effort to make a hand-made knife. From forging, quenching, tempering, to the completion of the knife type, every link is very important. For the master of the knife, the performance of the knife is the first consideration. They strive to achieve the best performance of the tool according to the different functions of each knife.

The most important thing in heat treatment is "quenching". After repeated heating and forging, the steel is basically formed, and then the hardness and strength of the steel are strengthened by quenching.

After quenching, the steel becomes brittle and the cutter usually performs a "tempering" process in order to reduce the brittleness of the tool. The tempering is an appropriate temperature at which the quenched steel material is heated to a temperature lower than the austenite transformation temperature (i.e., the temperature at which the orange light is mentioned), and is kept at a high temperature for 1 to 2 hours and then cooled. (Austenite is the structure of steel at high temperatures, there is a certain temperature and composition range)

The knifemaker cools the steel heated to the orange-red light into mineral water or oil. The master of the knife saw the color of the tool in the furnace and knew the quenching temperature of the tool.

In other words, quenching is like rapid cooling, and tempering is like using a slow fire and then cooling it, which is more soothing. After tempering, the structure of the steel tends to be stable, its brittleness is reduced, and toughness and plasticity are improved. Quenching and tempering are also often referred to as "tempering."

 

Grinding and pickling

After the heat treatment, the tool needs to be ground to have different lines and curvatures.

story:
Smart CupHolder Saves you money and time It is perfect for anyone who feels thirsty while driving by keeping Soft Drink/Coffee accessible at all times. The Smart cup holder device is used by connecting 12V DC power socket which is available in the most of the car as a cigarette lighter, It makes hot/cold drinks – Perfect Cool as much as -5°C Temperature and makes it warm as much as 55°C Temperature. Importantly The figures depend on the usage conditions and room temperature of the car or place.

 

Colour Combinations 

   

         Golden Black

         Golden White

 

 

          Silver Black

          Silver white

 

 

 

 

POWER SOURCE

Smart CupHolder Uses 12V 36W DC power from the source, The cup holder is Very energy efficient and Consumes less power.

 

COOL YOUR DRINK ON THE GO!

Cool your Drink on the Go, Within 12 minutes, Smart CupHolder is very efficient in cooling.

 

WARM YOUR DRINK ON THE GO!

Warm your Drink on the Go Within 12 minutes, Smart CupHolder Works well on heating. Note: Do not use carbonated beverages 

 

SMART CHIP

The Smart CupHolder holder has a Smart Chip which makes auto cut off at 10.5V – Device will switch off when the battery goes Low, and car battery will be safe.

 

UNIVERSAL DESIGN!

No worries, Smart CupHolder Fit for all Type of cars with standard 7.2CM Cup size.

 

LOW WEIGHT

Your Smart CupHolder can Easy to carry on the go Smart CupHolder is Low weight and Portable in size.

 

Technology 

The Peltier effect is the presence of heating or cooling at an electrified junction of two different conductors and is named after French physicist Jean Charles Athanase Peltier, who discovered it in 1834. We build perfect semiconductor to use the Peltier Effect Theory and used in our product successfully.  Our efforts in this New innovation of Semiconductor will make a number of changes in existing technology we are using to cool and We are motivated towards the end the use of Fluorocarbons and Reduce environmental causes, Where also Semiconductor’s are energy efficient.

 

Technical Specification

 

 Cup Size  10*10 CM
 Box Size 10.5 * 10.5*17 Inner Cup Size 7.2CM Diameter
 Voltage Power Dc 12 V- 36 W
 Materials Aluminium 6061 _ ABS +Pc
 Weight 500g
 Usage Range Metal containers only within 7 CM Diameter

story:
The creator

The developer and maintainer of the project is Radostin Cholakov - 7th grader from Bulgaria involved in programming. He, actually has a ton of experience despite the age of 13 and has been awarded by multiple companies and organizations, including Google and Axosoft. More about Radi:

  • TV and newspaper appearances.
  • Another software projects created and maintained by him:
    • List of almost all projects: http://bit.ly/30xkAvq
    • Open source projects: https://github.com/radi-cho
    • "Gravity Flight Space Adventure" - a game by Radostin

I was firstly involved in programming when I was ~9 years old. I saw "the magic" my aunt and her husband were doing (software engineers). They were writing "text" and getting a beautiful and powerful websites and apps as a result. That was unbelievable for me back then. Day over day I was searching Google and Youtube for tutorials on different programming topics. Over time evolved.. Now I can safely describe myself as experienced web and mobile "developer".

I've worked with various web technologies based around JavaScript, back-end solutions, mobile development with Java and Kotlin, cross-platform development with Flutter and React Native, game development with Unity and C# and machine learning with Python.

- Radostin Cholakov

The project

There are multiple applications for digital well-being, health, exercise, goals & statistics already in the store. They, however are somewhat too specialized, some are hard to use, and others lack important features. The idea behind Project Chocolate  is the ability of getting powerful insights of what you're doing but with simple to use and beautiful UI. To better understand what actually a user will be able to do with the app let me tell about some use cases:

Encouraging

Let's say you wanna complete a book for 2 weeks. You can just read it and not deal with any apps ;), but in case you decide to do you will be able to create your custom template, enter the amount of pages and the time you wanna complete the book. Then everyday after you read you can log how much you've read, with 2-3 clicks (open app -> enter quantity -> click 'record data'). That's it. The data which is collected over time shows you if you read more or less than you should. It will remind you with notifications if you want when necessary. You can skip the book today because someone invited you to a party, but tomorrow you will read twice as much, right?

You will be able to set minimum value. For example - minimum of 40 pages per day. But yesterday you've read 90 so it won't be "fatal" if you skip today ;)

As mentioned above you can do it with 3 clicks, but if you wanna more detailed insights you can get them! The app will include feature called 'Record Types' so you can log not only how many pages you've read but also how much time it took you. Today you've read 30 pages for 30 minutes, tomorrow 35 pages for 50 mins.. You can track your speed over time with beautifully designed diagrams and the app will calculate everything you may possibly wanna track - your average speed, the days you read the most, which book is more boring :) , ect.

Limiting

Now you wanna limit how much time you're spending on your phone, computer and other devices. You will be able to set maximum value - 3 hours a day, for example. The app will include built-in timer. You can let it run while you're playing Fortnite and it will remind you when to stop. If your average time is more than the average maximum we will send you some recommendations on what to do. :)

Tracking progress

You work on a important project - let's see how you're doing. Log how much time you've spent on different tasks, how much money it cost, ect.

Templates

As you see you can use one app for vastly different approaches. That will be possible with custom Topic Templates. Let's say you wanna eat less chocolate. You can log how many grams you've eaten or how many calories consumed, but for simplicity you can add Record Types (as mentioned above) to your template. You frequently eat Snickers. Create a record type for how much grams and calories a Snickers has once and then every time you want to log a Snickers consumption you can just do it with 2 clicks without need to include the quantity of all the units you may possibly wanna keep track of. Over time you create record types for all kinds of deserts. But a friend of yours wanna do the same? Do not worry! You can share your templates with friends so they do not need to recreate all the record types or enter unnecessary template details.

How the campaign funds will be used

The funding from this campaign will be used for:

  • Developing the overall project;
  • Building iOS version and distributing it. If the campaign is not successful only Android app is coming.
  • Financing the project so no ads will exist in the app.

Early Access Program

Every backer will be eligible for early access program so you can watch the process of development on your own device. Any feedback and recommendations are appreciated. More info in the perks section.

The technology

The app will be supported for both Android and iOS with Google's Flutter framework. The user data will be stored in Firebase Firestore and the user insights will be generated algorithmically in Google Cloud Functions and Compute Engine.

Agenda

  • Once we have backers they can start registering for the early access program. I'll reach out to them directly via email.
  • Around August 1st I may start releasing public alpha/beta versions, inviting more testers and teasing the app.
  • The first public 1.O releases are scheduled for August ~25th

story:
BeLLAir + MOON

SIZE:

Class 1: 28 X 20 (cm) | 11 X 7.87 (inch)  

iPad Air, iPad Air 2 & iPad Pro 9.7",  iPad mini 4, iPad mini 2 & Kindle Paperwhite  

color: Feu, Dark Side of the Moon, Deep Ocean, Brown & Antique Red

INCLUDES:  

- BeLLAir Bag  

- free Moon

- free tile tracker as a gift  

- Full Leather Strap 

SpaceMaster + MOON

size:

Class 1: 37 x 28 (cm) | 14.56 x 11.02 (inch)

- Macbook Air 13, new Macbook pro 13 & Surface book 12.3"

Class 2: 40 x 30 (cm) | 15.75 x 11.81 (inch)  

- new Macbook pro 15"

color: Feu, Dark Side of the Moon, Deep Ocean, Brown & Antique Red

INCLUDES:  

- SpaceMaster Briefcase   

- free Moon

- a tile tracker as a gift

- Full Leather Strap  

The other feature of solaris products is the taste of customers. It's very important for us to give this opportunity to customers to have their favorite bag by choosing different Moons. They can choose every of them which is more fictional for them. by this feature, you have many choices to design your own bag according to your taste and favorites. 

Risks & Challenges

One of our aims is, reducing the risks for our backers before launching the project. For this project, all of the products are produced by hands and entirely in our workshop. We are a young group that loves our field and work in the workshop, we study about needs and solve problems and design special products then we do many activities like cutting, sewing and assembling process of products. finally, at the end of these steps, we test and examine our products then we control details and make our bags more useful. We try to make all parts of bags beneficial without any vain space. 
We had a serious rule during preparing these products which were making products from the best natural leathers, so we flew to Italy and spent two months sourcing the best leather in the world from tanneries in Tuscany. We made fine leather goods with the best fittings and the best natural colors. As we told, we produce all of the orders by hands so one of our challenges is to be on time in preparing them, so we made a contract with a professional leather goods factory in the Genoa to prepare them very fast and with the Italian quality. 
We will make a great scale of our production to meet our progress schedule and we will be sure to communicate any schedule changes honestly and openly. 
Thank you for support of our products, be sure that our products have high quality and you chose the best leather bags.

Quality Risks: 
We choose the material from the best quality of leathers and the best zipper in the world. all of the leathers which we choose are natural. When we finish preparing a bag, we test it and consider all of the criteria of the best bag.

Supply Chain Risk: 
Sometimes a machine or tool breaks. Sometimes a factory loses power for a day. These things happen from time to time and can affect how long it takes to build our products. But we do our best to solve all of the problems very soon. We are strong and we believe it. BUT... BUT, WE ARE PROMISING TO SEND ALL REWARDS BEFORE THE END OF APRIL! We want you to support us and help us to be successful in this way.

story:
Summary:


EShake Networking allows you to spend more time interacting and strengthening your reputation with new clients, while the app securely gathers crucial follow-up information in the background, without you having to focus on it. The amount of time and effort we spend attempting to memorize information about the important people we meet diminishes our chances of making an impression greatly, and EShake has the power to change that. With this app, automating the information-sharing process during crucial conversations with future connections will preserve a better first impression and allow you to better engage yourself with your new connections.

What YOUR Contribution Will Do:

  • $3,000 will hire an adept User Interface Architect for the App
  • $2,000 will allow a Software Engineer to map out the basics of the App
  • $10,000 will be in recruiting the main App developer on our team, that will be working around the clock to produce this app.
  • $5,000 allows us to market the app, build brand presence, and get our names out there as a solution to networking!

Our Mission for YOU

The mission is to change the future of business meetings, investor-business searches, or professional conferences by forever dissolving the need for people to remember contact information, social networking profiles, and company profiles while building their relationship with other professionals. By integrating a system that replaces this necessary component to first impressions, people are given the freedom to spend more time getting to know each other and their ideas, and constructing a stronger reputation within their network.





"What was his name again?"


I'm tired of shaking hands with my next mentor or professional resource, and having to stop the conversation cold to make the awkward transaction of contact information. The most critical moment of building relationships with clients, future suppliers, and potential employers starts with the introduction and ends with a solid understanding of both parties as they walk away. Every second with this person counts, and the more variables to encounter the less chance there is to leave an excellent first impression.

As a business student in college, I spend a lot of time meeting new people, building my network up, and making myself and my reputation known to the business community at my university. However, I find it very troubling that the connection strength with my network is so weak. Some of my most important network connections only vaguely come to me in the visions of their LinkedIn profiles, because I spent less time learning about them and our interaction, and more time trying to memorize who they were and how I could keep them in my social circle. How many possible business ventures, employment opportunities and friendships have been compromised because society's socialization revolves around remembering Instagram usernames and company names instead of real information?


Too many... But there is hope:

  


How Does it Work?


Imagine having the ability to concentrate less on memorizing names, company positions and attributes, personality traits, and contact information during a crucial conversation with a future connection, and instead focusing on more important matters, such as the future of the relationship and innovative brainstorming. This is the idea behind the Eshake Networking project, and it is a problem that I am passionate about solving.

This app will be versatile across multiple devices and will give people the opportunity to connect instantly, sharing and storing essential contact information, and connecting them on professional networks such as LinkedIn so that these factors do not have to be worried over during that first introduction. More time will be then be spent actually creating a resource within that connection, and building a stronger tied network that users can work with. The purpose of this app is to make a professional's network an asset, rather than simply a social status. The first impression is the single most important force in making a future relationship fruitful, and Eshake Networking is here to ensure that each handshake makes an impact.

User Interface Architects, Software Engineers, and App Developers will be needed to create the product. Over $15,000 of the contributions will be used to manage a team of three professional programmers that can develop the best possible version of this app. I currently have gone as far as I can in terms of building the workflow map, sharpening the outline of how it will operate, and finding validation in the market for this product. Once the programmers begin developing the app, $5,000 dollars of the contributions will be steered towards marketing and brand development to ensure that this app is established in the busy app markets!



Initial Challenges to Conquer


While this might be a great idea for those who want to contribute or support this mission, there are challenges that come with it. Eshake Networking faces the challenge of diversifying its functionality across devices, such as smart watches, smart phones, iPads, etc. This means that the app will have to start by providing the networking solution to the device that the market is most comfortable with at the time. Once established, Eshake Networking will have the resources to expand into secondary devices, to allow universal access to effortless connecting power.

Eshake Networking also faces a new market, as this idea has not necessarily been utilized by apps on devices like the Smartwatch. This project would be opening a new method to networking, by focusing on introductory connecting instead of connecting over the internet. We will have to look into ways to promote the traditional methods used in meeting new professionals, while still enabling users to connect and communicate across the network.




Interested?

Help us out! Contributions are very much appreciated, and sharing this page would also mean the world to us!

story:
I think the best way to start this message is with my story. Please if you have 5 minutes, take a moment to read this.
My Name is Nathan Giddings, I’m 18 and live in Blackpool, England. In 2010, my mother was involved in a car crash which has left her permanently disabled, my baby brother had just recently been born, leaving me with the full responsibility to look after her and my baby brother, obviously, at 14 raising a baby is pretty difficult. I’m so tired of seeing her break down and cry with depression because she can’t do anything and is in constant pain. Now, the worst part is, a year after that, I was diagnosed with a Liver disease that effects my immune system, causing my own body to attack itself and my nerves, this in turn, has resulted in me having Multiple Sclerosis , this leaves me in constant pain and a state of despair and deep depression. And self hatred at how my own body failed me. As you can imagine, this makes it so difficult having to look after everyone else, with no one to care for me, and no treatment for my illness, I just have to get on with it. After being a huge Apple enthusiast since the very early days, because you know, I'm a geek, I thought “wow, I wish there was a way I could get my own app's on the store.”, then I started reading into you more, to find you can make some serious money, as well as have a huge reach by putting apps on the store and doing the exact thing I want to do! As it stands, with my illness I missed the last year of school  And this has obviously affected my life, I’m too ill too go to college, and if I could go on my good days, I can’t afford a car, as you can imagine, with both me and my mum being out of work, and relying on my step dads meager wage who works away, we struggle. I only get £60 a week from the government, and I almost always end up giving it to my mum to buy food, this Christmas just gone will be the 4th year that me and my mother have gone without, to ensure that the kids have a good Christmas. One suggestion to help mine and my mum symptoms is a hot tub! How we are expected to afford done I have no idea. We really need a break, I haven’t been on holiday since I was 9. I have no social interaction as you can imagine. SO here is my problem, I want to code, to one day maybe earn enough money to buy my mum a house, and all the dreams cars of mine, I’m dying buy a PS4, as I sold my PS3 I got for Christmas 2011 so my mum could buy nappies, but as you can imagine, those are far out my reach. So, I come to the community to help me get that massive boost I need to start my life. I'm limited when learning Objective C as I use windows, as I'ts all I can afford, even my iPhone 5 I got in 2012 seems like it's about to explode. Even if I made an app that can earn £50 a week, that would be a life changer for me! I’d love for the  help to get me going and give me the start I need, and help me get from rags to riches!

Now you may think, this is just some kid who wan't to make money with a rubbish app, but I have bigs plans for an App, as I have had the idea in my mind for years, and have every detail planned out, I don't wan't to reveal any details as of you, in-case it get's stolen, but Medi-Mind is designed to help people like myself, who are ill, and also to help carers. I thought the best way for me to go about this is to make an App I need, and would personally use on a daily basis.

I know I ask for a lot, but not as much as other campaigns, all I need is a Mac(No hackintosh comments please) and an iPhone/iPad to test my App on. Those two things could be the foundation to my life, and can allow me to build the skills I need to finally get my idea out of my head, and into the world! As for perks, I can't really offer much in return, except my unconditional gratitude, of course anybody who helps will be credited, and who know, if I gain an income, I might even be able to give donations back!  


Obviously it will be a challenge, and will require sleepless nights to get the App out there, but I have so much time and dedication to put into the app, I feel my abilities and potential are going to waste, as an honest person I will say, it could fail, but so could any business venture. But if I suceed, not only will it change my life, but it could also affect other people for the better, by using my app and improving their health.

Maybe you don't want to donate cash,maybe you have an old Mac lying around? Anything that can help me will be so appreciated.
My condition obviously makes it hard to function sometimes, and often, I can't even play video games like a normal teenage due to the pain I am in, as you can imagine, my social life has been severely affect by thus, and I know have very little friends, because I could never go out, I ended up leaving college and sixth form, and that has had me so worried about my future and financial security, but then I realized I had the ability to make my own money, by putting out my app that can change not only my life, but others in need too, because the amount of medication I am on now, is nothing compared to what I will need in the future, as unfortunately as I get older my nerves degrade more and my condition worsens, it's even possible I will be completely paralyzed by the time I'm 40, and possibly die. So on top of your normal life costs, I'll have medical bills too.. So please consider helping me shape my future into one I can look forward too! 

Thank you so much for reading. 

Nathan.

story:
How many times have you tried to sell something on the internet and not been able to?Even if the ad had a lot of views they do not share a lot! People just browse your ad and if they are not interested, they forget about it! And if they are? In our new application, each user will have a personal link! Every registered user will be able to receive a percentage of sales, which they have advertised, Interest rates and the number of people that will work for you, you pick and choose! You can assign specific rewards for your best sellers, even if the product is not new, you can more likely sell it!The principle operation is that you sign up for our application, create your ad and  assign a percentage that you are willing to pay for sales and the number of sellers.


 when you have received a notification from those interested and you can choose those with whom you want to work!

They sharing your ad whith thei friend or followers!


You selling your product and everybody are happy!


 Now imagine that you are currently not working, and  won't be for the foreseeable future And in the morning with a cup of coffee you can just share a few links and earn real money! Do you have an account on Facebook?  A blog? Or just a page on the Internet? you already have a job!  This Simple and user-friendly application for mobile phones and tablets will bring you real money!  This Application will be free and free  to sign up! You only pay for real results!

You can sell!

You can buy!

And you can work here!

Your opinion is important to us! 

Do you like this idea?

Would you make your ad in our app?

Would you like to work with this app?

You can leave your comments here,or on our fb page! We need to know if this a good idea!

What we have and what we need?

Now we are working on a beta version of app this are some screenshots from a process:





At the moment, the beta version of this application is scheduled  to be released in May this year, but our real problem is that we do not have enough computer scientists! This is the weakest inconvenience at the moment. 
Some of our perks!
A cool vintage t-shirt!


And a coffee cup!

story:
Short Summary        

       

This technology transforms the heat from any source including the Sun, to usable AC electric power.

Rod Nelson is the inventor of the technology, he owned a construction company and a coal company, due to the cost of fuel to run heavy equipment, he realized that something needed to change.  He began research in an effort to find a way to improve the efficiency of the internal combustion engine.  This led to the patented engine design that can either be run by injecting pure oxygen safely or powering it with CO2, either dramatically decreasing the amount of fuel, less fuel more money in the pocket.


I am Margaret aka Pegi Males Nelson,  a cosmetologist by trade, I have taught, run a school, worked for a company,  published for my trade, and  other aspects of the industry.  I am also a genealogist. Research for genealogy and cosmetology have been a passion most of my life. 

Tarheel Tooling a precision machine shop has been with us for a number of years, they are successful machinists, engineers and businessmen. 


  What We Need & What You Get

 

The Nelson engine is the heart of the technology, what you have seen is not the finished product.

To bring it to commercial quality there are components that must be upgraded.

The tanks must be redesigned for this reason. . Redesigning the tanks using chrome, copper, brass or stainless steel, because CO2 does not react with any of these metals,

Stainless steel is the most expensive but the most enduring, a necessity for commercialization, giving the consumer a trouble free, and long lasting product.

The tubing must also be changed to stainless steel.

Casing or housing for the generator.

$15,000.00 will bring the CO2 technology to a commercial demo level.

What this means to you the consumer:

   Freedom from the power grid

  • Freedom from power outages, 7 ft. of snow, hurricanes, ice, any destructive occurrence that knocks out your power for days or weeks, as long as your house is still standing you have electricity.

  • Freedom from electric bills, this is your own power plant powering your home 24/365.

  • Electricity generated for 2 cents or less per KWH.

  • Electricity generated by CO 2 with a minimal amount of traditional fuel or a solar concentrator to heat the CO2 to a working level.

  • Replaces standby generators, with your own standalone generator/power plant, one meeting all of your needs. 

  • Adds value to your home and dollars to your pocket. 

The Impact


Every aspect of our life is based on carbon based fuels, through the utilization of alternate renewable means to generate power such as carbon dioxide, we can  become independent and richer. 

Carbon Dioxide has become a tool used by people who have profited from the eradication of this compound. 

Without CO2 we would not exist, it is necessary for every bit of vegetation on this planet. 

Fossil fuels emit not only CO2 but other noxious chemicals, they are a necessity at this time to transport and grow your food, manufacture everything you see and use every day.  Prices grow higher your paycheck buys less and less. 

The utilization of CO2 can and will change that, no longer will the government look for ways to tax your carbon footprint, no longer will wars be fought over oil, face it we are held hostage by the people who own all the rights to fossil fuels, oil, coal, and natural gas. In time our planet is going to become one big garbage dump. We will no longer need face the danger of using nuclear to generate electricity, a substance that takes 40,000 years more or less to degrade.  Electric vehicles are not the answer, the infrastructure alone costs billions to put into place so the owner can recharge their vehicle.  Ion batteries to produce power are dangerous, they self- ignite and where and what is the method of disposal.

We believe that the most sensible solution is the utilization of CO2, it is a forever compound that can be made to work for us not against us, and it is a God given gift to this earth.

Risks & Challenges

Our risk is that we have spent our lives and all of our money on this technology to never live to see it get finished and out to the market place, where it belongs.

Our challenge is to raise the money to finish, to gain acceptance, not from the government or the folks who think if I did not think of it, it must not be any good, our acceptance has to come from the people who are looking for a better way, people who are intelligent and forward thinking, I have met you through Facebook and you come from all over the world, together we can change the world

Receiving a patent is not a sure path to making money, they are costly and must be maintained, also costly.  Getting a new product on the market is a tedious money pit, the people who are already established don’t want the competition. We are common ordinary people who dared to think outside the box, we have messed with the comfort level of those who don’t want change.

  Through Facebook people all over the world have expressed a need for this technology.  It is not just about us but everyone, people who suffer from power outages for days and weeks, as well as big power bills.  People who don’t have access to any kind of electricity, and it happens here in America as well as those in developing countries.

It is only through crowdfunding that we can raise the funds to finish this technology, we are out of money, with help from all of you, giving a little or a lot we can get this on the market and out to the consumer. 

We have hit a financial brick wall, we need all of you to help us get over the wall. Together we can do this!
story_txt:
Short Summary                
This technology transforms the heat from any source including the Sun,
to usable AC electric power.
Rod Nelson is the inventor of the technology, he owned a construction
company and a coal company, due to the cost of fuel to run heavy equipment, he
realized that something needed to change. 
He began research in an effort to find a way to improve the efficiency
of the internal combustion engine.  This
led to the patented engine design that can either be run by injecting pure
oxygen safely or powering it with CO2, either dramatically decreasing the
amount of fuel, less fuel more money in the pocket. 
I am Margaret aka Pegi Males Nelson, 
a cosmetologist by trade, I have taught, run a school, worked for a
company,  published for my trade,
and  other aspects of the industry.  I am also a genealogist. Research for
genealogy and cosmetology have been a passion most of my life.  
Tarheel Tooling a precision machine shop has been with us for a number
of years, they are successful machinists, engineers and businessmen.  

  What We Need & What You
Get






  


The Nelson engine is the heart of the technology, what you have seen is
not the finished product.

upgraded.

story:
Do you know where you can get a business card printed?

Have you ever needed something to print but finding and booking a print shop was just too difficult? That's exactly the experience I had when I moved to Metro Manila. When I asked other people, nobody knew where the good shops were at. And those aren't the only problems people have.

If you found a print shop you might ask yourself: 

  • "How do I know their quality is good?"
  • "How can I reach out to them?"
  • "Do I have to walk to the shop to get something printed?"
  • "By when can they have it printed?"
  • "Shoot! It's Friday and I need something printed by tomorrow - can they still rush print this for my event tomorrow?!"

Those and many more questions and problems trouble most people that need something printed. Pigments is the solution that comes to the rescue!


Finding print shops made easy


It doesn't have to be this hard. That's why we came up with Pigments, a site where you can conveniently find print shops around you based on what you need to print. Even better, you can then book the shop right on our site. All the details of the shop are easily understandably laid out for you, so you don't get overwhelmed. 


You request an estimate from the print shop and once you're happy, you book the shop through our site. As you wait for your prints to arrive or be ready to be picked up, you will always be kept up to date on Pigments about the current progress of your job.


Are you a business that just needs to reprint their old letterhead again? Or even a whole set of collaterals? No problem, you'll be able to have your stuff printed again with the click of a button for your convenience, because searching for your print PDFs and sending them to the shop again is just annoying!


Our humble beginnings

We are currently two members on the team and we launched a basic directory site of shops for Bangkok today. We are following up on shops in Singapore and some in the Philippines next. As we grow our database of print shops and improve our site, printing is going to become easier for you step by step. 

Pigments is still basic as of now, we are not yet a fancy print shop marketplace. We cannot yet make sales automatically, in fact we're just looking for our first paying customers with our MVP (Minimum Viable Product, the bare minimum product you could build to test your business idea) and intend to do everything manually, truly MVP style!

Are you looking to print something? We can find a print shop for you based on your needs, coordinate with the print shop for you and ensure your print PDFs get submitted to the shop error-free.


Raising Friends, Family & Fools Funds to go from MVP to a fully fledged, awesome product

Are you a friend of ours? Are you a family member? Or perhaps you are simply a crazy fool who believes in the product and the vision we believe in ourselfs? That printing needs to be improved in Asia? Kindly consider donating to this fundraiser and grab one of our awesome perks! The funds raised are going to be used to keep Pigments running until we're the place to get your stuff printed at. Our goal is to use those funds to bridge the gap between what we have now and the marketplace model that we are going to have soon. 


Our milestones from 1 to 3

But for what exactly are you giving your money away? 
  1. Our first milestone is a diverse list of print shops all over Asia.
  2. Followed by milestone number two, the launch of our shop sites that let you enquire for a detailed print estimate. 
  3. After that, milestone number three is making it possible to upload your print PDFs through our site, so you can book and pay without hassle.


The rewards for supporting us

5$ - Shine in our office forever

We will be painting your name amongst everyone else's in our office included as a giant artwork, so you are going to shine forever, so we are never going to forget who supported us!

25$ - Support a charity you love with Pigments' revenue for a month

Pigments donates money to charities on special occasions. You get to choose a charity of your liking that Pigments is going to donate to with parts of our revenue for one whole month!

50$ - Get a 3% discount for 3 months

Do you print a lot of stuff for your business? You are going to receive a discount for anything on Pigments for three whole months!

100$ - Watch a dark lord of the Sith pitch on stage!

We feel a disturbance in the force!  Fall to the dark side soon you will! You are going to witness the pitch of Andreas Galster, also known as Kylo Ren, the dark lord of Pigments. We are going to crush our startup enemies with a pitch that will never be forgotten. Our traction blasters are set to kill and our light sabers are as sharp as our pitch. 

Witness a startup founder pitch being dressed up as a dark lord of the Sith for the first time! We will finish, what we started!

story:
Easy to use, stylish, just amazing.

Have you ever left your home and forgot to turn off the coffee maker? Have you ever been too tired to get up from bed and turn off the light? Have you ever wished to have the control of your home right on the palm of your hand?

idomotics is a home automation product. Apart from allowing you to turn on/off the lights, RGB lights, electrical devices, open the doors or gates, it also has a light & temperature sensor to set your different rooms according to your preferences.



Hi indiegogo. My name is Gabriel Giani. I am the CEO of idomotics.  A long time ago, I had to see my closest relatives suffer from diseases that would leave them bed-bounded. My grandfather, who had Parkinson disease, was in bed for many years, and then my dad, battling against cancer, spent his last days on a chair where he used to be hours demanding things from us, such as turning on the lights or opening the blinds.

How many people with disabilities, impaired mobility or terminally ill spend their last days unceasingly depending on someone else to help them?

For this reason, considering that the percentage of elderly people or with impaired mobility requiring assistance is considerably high, and that it’s likely that most of us will unavoidably get to that point somehow, we thought it was necessary to give more technology to our home, making it more comfortable. And this way, we saw we could offer from the pure eccentricity of having an intelligent home to the basic need of turning on the lights for an elderly person or with impaired mobility.

These amazing opportunities led us to develop a product which allows you to control any electrical device in your home using the smartphone, and soon using the Smartwatch.

This way, the lights, gates, irrigation systems, heaters, air conditioners, RGB lights, are about a touch on the phone of distance.

Imagine the amazing change we could make for a person with impaired mobility, letting him/her turn on the lights, using idomotics.

Imagine a recent mother with her baby living on the second floor and having to open the door to her friend. She doesn’t have to go downstairs anymore. She could just use idomotics

Imagine a country house perfectly warmed for us. We could turn on the heater a few hours before arriving, using idomotics.

idomotics is highly committed to help improve the quality of life to those who need it the most. For this reason, for every 20 kits we sell, we will donate 1 kit to a foundation, for these people to have a more comfortable living.




We combined Software & Hardware, making a system easy to install, accesible for everyone and simply charming, to give a touch of technology to the world that surrounds us.

idomotics consists of controllers to connect lights or electrical devices to your smartphone, to control them using your smartphone, no matter where you are.



idomotics has a gateway that you need to connect to your home’s router. Then the controllers are connected to the light switches or to the electrical devices you wish to control, and using a software SERVER in a tablet that remains indoors, you can have access to every controller, from an Android or iOS smartphone.








                                                  

 

You can get the STARTER KIT, which contains 2 light controllers (plus one sensor each), 1 RGB controller and 1 plug, to have any electrical device automatised. This way, you can start installing idomotics in the living room and the kid’s room, and then the garden and the kitchen. 



idomotics adapts to your requirements. You can set up the KIT as you wish:



idomotics does not depend on the Cloud to work. This way, the security and privacy of your home are protected on the Tablet which acts as the SERVER.


idomotics does not have a ‘black box’. Therefore, the company does not recall information about the client and the actions taken in the house.


The software has a simple interface for every member of the family to use it.


The sensors automatically adjust the air conditioner and the heater to the         temperature you prefer, as well as the light in the room.


               YOU choose who can see and have access to your idomotics WiFi. 




 




Our team is made of 8 fantastic people, dedicated to the innovation of technological products and passionate about new technologies.





Q: Do I need internet to use idomotics?
A: idomotics system does not require internet to work if you are in your house. However, if you leave, you will need internet.

Q: Does the kit include a tablet?
A: No. The tablet (which will be the SERVER) must be provided by the user.

Q: Can I use the tablet which will be the SERVER while idomotics is working?
A: Yes. But the SERVER has to remain open and the Tablet should not be turned off.

Q: Do I have to change the structure of the wall to install the controllers?
A: No. Light controllers go behind the light switch, therefore no wall breaking is required.

Q: Can I install the controllers myself?
A: We recommend a suitable qualified person to do it.

Q: How many controllers can I install in my house?
A: As many as the lights or electrical devices you want to control.

Q: How many controllers can I connect to the central?
A: All the controllers you wish to install can be connected to the central.

Q: Can I use a computer as the server?
A: No. The Server must be Android.

Q:Do I have to charge the controllers or change the batteries?
A: No. The controllers do not have batteries to change or charge.

Q: How many centrals do I need in my house?
A: It is recommended one per floor if it is a house of many floors or an office, for example.

Q: Does it work only in houses or can I install it in bars, schools, hotels, etc?
A: You can install idomotics anywhere you want.

Q: Can I use the traditional light switch once idomotics is installed? 
A: Yes. Traditional light switches keep on working. 

Q: How many users can be connected to the server?
A: As many as you allow to.


If you can't find here the answer you are looking for, please contact 
info@idomotics.com
Skype: support.idomotics

story:
OUR STORY

Here at The Guap Foundation, we are on a mission to serve as cryptocurrency champions of our community. By economically empowering businesses and individuals we strengthen the generations to come. The Guap Foundation leverages Guapcoin, its blockchain technology, our multi-tiered educational program (covering technology, ﬁnance, and occupational trades), as well as grants to businesses to advance community economics and build a strong foundation for long-term economic wealth.

For Us, By Us, To Empower Us!

By integrating Guapcoin into our everyday lives we give ourselves a powerful voice and a solid financial foundation that is "For Us, By Us, To Empower Us". The Guap Foundation provides a bridge to financial & technological education and sound revolutionary economic solutions for the underserved, underestimated, unbanked/underbanked and usually financially under educated minority.

Guapcoin is an open source, public, blockchain-based cryptocurrency.

Stage I, which focused on technology development and early adoption, proved that Guapcoin was not just a good investment, it showed that Guapcoin supports real world use cases, personal financial security and community development.

Currently in Stage II, the focus is: blockchain enhancements, on-chain governance, growing the global Guapcoin community, and continuing education around blockchain technology, cryptocurrency and what it means to be your own bank.  

We are now seeking a minimum of $350,000.00 to support this growth. Your donations assist technological developments, foundation growth, and the overall Guap community. Some of the key projects at this time, are hardware and software development, payment solutions, micro lending, exchange listings and expansion into the Defi (decentralized finance) space.  

Donations are linked to a "perk" which is either a product (digital or physical) or service provided by a Guapcoin merchant or a member of the Guapcoin community. By donating you will be a part of funding the growth of Black & Brown communities, businesses, and the Guapcoin ecosystem. 

Cryptocurrency is here to stay and Guapcoin’s peer-to-peer use is on the rise.

According to www.guapexplorer.com:

  • The non reward based transactions on May 14, 2020 totaled 3,300.  As of June 6th, 2021, there has been 150,725 non reward based transactions. That's a 4,467% increase.
  • There has been an increase of over 524%, as of June 6th, 2021, in Guapcoin wallet addresses.

The Guapcoin community is steadily growing. Our merchant community is expanding globally, by leaps and bounds, to provide more goods and services you need and want. Guapcoin is the cryptocurrency that can and will increase accessibility and re-circulation of currency to empower and accelerate growth within Black & Brown communities.

Through the Guap Foundation and your donation(s), we can help underrepresented communities develop sustainable wealth. You can play a pivotal role in fueling financial success that transforms current and future generations. Your generous contribution will help us accomplish this mission.

As we work to obtain our goals, we understand that Guapcoin’s mass adoption, blockchain enhancements, merchant integration and liquidity are critical to our success.  Our plan to ensure sustainability and longevity is to  broaden the ways one acquires Guapcoins, expand the #1MillionGuapWallets campaign and merchant on-boarding, to expand our educational series and academy, and provide the software and hardware required to support the Guapcoin ecosystem.

By demonstrating the use of Guapcoin, through trading Guapcoin for goods and services, Black & Brown communities get to experience first hand the impact of having a complementary currency.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are more ways than one to back The Guap Foundation!

  • For starters you can help make Guapcoin a household name by spreading the word. Tell family and friends about Guapcoin and The Guap Foundation by posting this campaign on social media using Indiegogo share tools and hashtags #cryptofortheculture #guapisgrowing #1millionguapwallets #currencyfortheculture #guapseason.
  • Join the community via Telegram or our official Facebook group.
  • Download a mobile (andriod or iOS) or desktop wallet today!
  • Become a Guap Merchant.
  • Learn more about Guapcoin and blockchain technology and its social & economic impact.
  • "Like and Subscribe" to our socials.
  • A strong advocate may also become a Guap Ambassador.

 

Please review the FAQ section to get answers to common questions and campaign guidelines.

The Guap Foundation & the Guapcoin community thank you for your generous donation(s) and continued support.
story_txt:
OUR STORY
Here at The Guap Foundation, we are on a mission to serve as cryptocurrency champions of our community. By economically empowering businesses and individuals we strengthen the generations to come. The Guap Foundation leverages Guapcoin, its blockchain technology, our multi-tiered educational program (covering technology, ﬁnance, and occupational trades), as well as grants to businesses to advance community economics and build a strong foundation for long-term economic wealth.
For Us, By Us, To Empower Us!
By integrating Guapcoin into our everyday lives we give ourselves a powerful voice and a solid financial foundation that is "For Us, By Us, To Empower Us". The Guap Foundation provides a bridge to financial & technological education and sound revolutionary economic solutions for the underserved, underestimated, unbanked/underbanked and usually financially under educated minority.

Guapcoin is an open source, public, blockchain-based cryptocurrency.
Stage I, which focused on technology development and early adoption, proved that Guapcoin was not just a good investment, it showed that Guapcoin supports real world use cases, personal financial security and community development.
Currently in Stage II, the focus is: blockchain enhancements, on-chain governance, growing the global Guapcoin community, and continuing education around blockchain technology, cryptocurrency and what it means to be your own bank.  

We are now seeking a minimum of $350,000.00 to support this growth. Your donations assist technological developments, foundation growth, and the overall Guap community. story:
GIGCO is the Genuine Gig Economy Marketplace:

GIGCO is available on Apple App Store & Google Play Store and at WWW.GIGCO.WORK

Scan our QR code to check out our mobile app!

The gig economy is a common phrase for short term and freelance opportunities in our ever-evolving job market. Employers are able to choose from a talented pool of GIGsters (service providers) to outsource work on demand.

Freelancing, when done right, can bring flexibility to the home front, freedom to choose who you work with and, for the seasoned practitioner, it can also bring a higher income than that earned in a regular full-time job. However, not all is rosy and green. All marketplaces need standard rules of engagement. When everyone is trying to bid at the lowest prices for gigs, GIGsters are often making illogical wages and require some form of protection.

GIGCO is born out of necessity to allow the genuine gig economy to thrive. To truly value talent.

GIGCO strives to provide freelancers with Jobs, Training and Community.

 

Our Values:

  • Protect and humanise the gig workforce with equitable wages and logical work hours 
  • Nurture the continuous development of talent through training and workshops with guidance from professionals and experts who can help fine tune and hone their skills 
  • Foster a sense of belonging to a community where GIGsters can come together to do bigger and greater things and achieve the unimaginable.

 

GIGCO 1.0 

Marketplace for Jobs

GIGCO is the perfect marketplace for all sorts of jobs where freelancers (GIGsters) can pick and choose and select the jobs of their choice. Jobs can come to them from any part of the world and payment done easily through established payment gateways (e.g. PayPal).

Employers (GIGmakers) save time and money finding talent across 300 skill set categories to outsource job needs. They browse online to find talent, see ratings, recommendations and complete projects within their budgets.

 

The mobile app is available on both the Google Play Store and Apple App Store and allows posting jobs and working on gigs from the convenience of the mobile phone.   

 

Within 30 days of its launch, our mobile app ranked 103 in the business app category on the Apple App Store.

 

GIGCO BRAND AWARENESS

1. GIGCO at Echelon Asia Summit 2018 (28th & 29th June 2018)

GIGCO made its first real splash at this start-up convention – even before it was formally launched.

 

2. GIGCO was invited to participate in Mendaki's MSENSE Career Fair  (12th & 13th Oct 2018)

Dr. Mohamad Maliki Bin Osman, Singapore’s Minister of State, engaged GIGCO executives to better understand GIGCO’s on demand job portal and app. 

 

3. GIGCO was invited by Singapore Enterprise Association to participate in  SMEs Digitalisation Transformation event (1st Nov 2018)

We were given a booth to promote GIGCO to their attendees of over 300 SME CEOs & Managing Directors from diverse industries.

 

4. GIGCO Superheroes Fly About - Episodes 1, 2 & 3: GIGCO is probably the only company in the world with real live superheroes to showcase that people can do extraordinary things almost as if you had superhuman capabilities. This is because the GIGCO platform will take away the mundane tasks of organising schedules, negotiating on prices and working seamlessly in communities allowing one to focus on delivering world class jobs at a greater capacity.

 

 

GIGCO Superheroes sharing love for the Freelancer community

 

TRAINING  

GIGCO provides workshops and training sessions open to all in response to industry needs. GIGCO trainers are some of the most well-respected professional photographers, videographers, narrators & models. However, they need a proper studio to continue to impart their professional knowledge and expertise. 

Here's an example of an end state result of a property walk-through video professionally produced by GIGCO GIGsters: videographer, model, narrator and scriptwriter.

 

The Ask: Funding to set up the GIGCO Studio (GIGspace) 

GIGCO studio (GIGspace) will be an integrated multi-purpose studio run by professionals for the community.

This will be the first in a series of envisioned studios that will cater to the following disciplines:  

  • Media skills development (Photography, Videography, etc)  
  • Presenting, Emceeing, Hosting, Narration & Voice-over 
  • Editorial, Creative & digital design skills 

GIGspace is the first step in creating this incubator for the creative powerhouses of tomorrow to allow them to grow and share expertise and experiences and to realise dreams and goals. 

Your contribution will help aspiring artists attain greater heights.  

This is what we need for our first studio, our ask is only a fraction of this amount.  Any amount of contribution greater than our ask will help defray our cost as tabulated below:

 

What happens next after the funding?

GIGCO is the future - the GENUINE GIG ECONOMY

Our vision is to allow all GIGsters an opportunity to develop to their fullest; hone their talents, skills and intellect enabling them for a greater  deliverance up to peak levels bordering on achieving brilliant and genius outcomes. Our intention is for this to happen through a continuous culture of learning through both open and curated training that is delivered face-to-face, streamed online and recorded sessions. This allows harvesting of the greatness of the shared social economy where User-Generated Content (UGC) can spread through community and training disseminated in nano-sized training sessions based on experiences and experts.

Through GIGCO, we believe GIGsters will become the true next generation 4th industrial revolution workforce of total transformation and digitisation of all jobs as we know today.

GIGspace is the beginning of an exciting journey in the global market to meet the needs of over 77 million freelancers worldwide.

We need your help in delivering GIGCO’s studio expansion plans in the GIGCO 2.0 roadmap towards digital training, e-learning and integration with educational institutes.

 

Gig Economy Industry Trend

https://www.cnbc.com/2018/10/22/silicon-valley-using-contract-employees-to-drive-profits.html

https://www.cnbc.com/2018/10/31/the-future-of-work-wont-be-about-degrees-it-will-be-about-skills.html

https://www.nytimes.com/2018/10/13/opinion/sunday/chee-gig-economy-guild-union.html

http://business-review.eu/news/will-college-degrees-matter-in-getting-jobs-in-the-future-study-job-skills-will-takeover-189832

http://www.digitaljournal.com/business/q-a-why-freelancing-is-the-future-of-work/article/536493

https://www.fastcompany.com/90260886/should-you-include-freelancers-in-your-talent-development-program

https://www.fastcompany.com/90251797/we-studied-freelancing-for-five-years-heres-how-work-is-changing

https://www.entrepreneur.com/article/321885

 

GIGCO Perks

GIGCO Job Posting Voucher

 

GIGCO Training E-Ticket

 

GIGCO Creative & Educational Collectible Bookmark Series (set of 4) 

 

GIGCO 'Jobs Revolution' collectible astronaut themed flag

 

GIGCO Studio Launch Party Entry Ticket (VIP)

 

GIGCO Studio Launch Party and Virtual Studio Tour

 

GIG Times Newsletters

 

GIGCO Professional Executive Photoshoot

 

GIGCO polo t-shirt (a classy fan favourite) and GIGCO round neck t-shirt (a fan favourite and collectible by our in-house Digital Arts & Creative Designer) 

 

GIGCO festive greetings professional digital arts designed and customisable e-cards

 

GIGCO decorative wallpaper for desktop and mobile phone

 

Photoshop Actions Selection - Creative, Portrait, Wedding & Landscape 

 

Risks and challenges

The real risk we face in building up the creative landscape of the future is eventually losing the creative talent.

How is that?

When a talent keeps producing brilliant and outstanding work, that person will get noticed and approached by some of the best companies in the world to work for them. It will be very difficult for the talent to refuse. We, in GIGCO, therefore, have to accept the possibility that each individual we grow may become a genius photographer, videographer, voice-over or model who will be picked up by other companies. 
That is a risk, but it is also a definite pat on our back. It simply means we have actually done our job well and provided a true opportunity for a person to have a better life.

It's a risk we can live with.

Our system of providing jobs, training and community along with portfolio recognition, ratings and recommendations will entice GIGsters to stay connected. They will always be part of the GIGCO community and can come home to GIGspace any time.

story:
One Platform to Rule Them All

The best innovation in Online Digital Presence has arrived!

We provide a one stop platform for you to grow and enhance your business with your own Website, Marketing Funnel and Native Mobile App. You can build them ALL with AppZoola.

We'd love your support to help take bring it to the millions of businesses out there.

 

AppZoola is an online platform where you can build an Amazing Website, add a Marketing Funnel  with built in A/B testing, and build your own Native Mobile App to showcase your business's awesomeness.  All this from one platform at a very affordable price.  Customers can choose to pay by either by monthly subscription, or a reduced Annual subscription.

No coding knowledge is necessary - its all simple drag and drop.  You can select from our beautiful pre-built themes,  and even modify them to suit your needs. 

It's simple to build on AppZoola. Have a look at the just one of our video tutorials which demonstrate just how easy it is!

If you are not that technologically minded, we can also build it for you.

You will love our affordable monthly subscriptions too, and if you are looking at long term savings, then our reduced annual subscriptions will suit you perfectly.

We know you want to be a great success, whether you are a small or medium size business. Now you can expand into the online world without breaking the bank. We want to help you build your Website, Funnel and Mobile App so you can focus on what is most important - your business.

 

Features

Some of the amazing website features include:

  • An Online Store where you can sell physical products, Digital products or subscriptions
  • In built funnels for marketing with A/B testing to test your advertising campaigns.
  • Widgets for every purpose
  • Use our domain or connect your own domain.
  • Inbuilt SEO
  • Multi lingual site
  • EU Cookie and GDPR Compliant
  • Connect external apps, Facebook, Mailchimp, your own email server and more.
  • Create Pages and Popups with ease.
  • and much more..

 

So what's unique about AppZoola?

  • Other Website Builders don't offer you a NATIVE Mobile App. 
  • Other Website Builders don't offer you a built in Marketing Funnel.
  • Other Mobile App builders don't offer you a Website or Funnel.
  • Other Funnel Builders don't offer you a Website and Mobile App.

Up to now, you would have to pay separately for each of them. AppZoola gives it all to you in a single subscription, from a single platform.

You can mix and match:

  • A Website starting at £4.60 ($5,99) per month
  • A Website with Funnel starting from £11.60 ($14.99) per month,
  • If you include a Mobile App, you only add an additional  £12.30 ($15.99) per month. 
  • Or you can have just a Mobile App on its own for only £19.30 ($24.99) per month.

 

All our development has been completed, and we're in the final testing stages now, with a go live date of the 5th November 2019.

AppZoola has taken close to 6 months of long hours of work, but finally we are almost ready to launch. Our roadmap for the future includes adding more modules, additional templates,  additional industry specific builders and a whole host of amazing features to make your Website, your App and your Business even more awesome.

 

We are looking to raise £30,000. So what do we need funding for?  We want to get the word out there, and so we need to market AppZoola to a wider audience. We'll advertise on Facebook, YouTube, Linkedin and Instagram - but we'll need your help to do this.

We will use a portion of the funding for additional development, but this will only take place when we reach 100% of our goal.

 

 

As an early backer,  the perks  include:

  • Reduced Website Subscription for one year.
  • plus a FREE subscription to the mobile App Builder for one year.

Your contribution will help the millions of small to medium businesses who simply don't have the knowledge, or means to:

  • build an amazing Website.
  • create a Funnel to market their product.
  • plus have a  truly Native Mobile App. A traditional native Mobile App alone can cost many thousands of dollars to build.

We bridge that gap and make it affordable for anyone to have all three.

 

 

Our biggest hurdle is to build a community of subscribers.  We can overcome this through advertising, and with your help, we can tell the world about the awesomeness of AppZoola. 

Our other challenge was to ensure a good strong stable platform, Our current platform now has a 99.9% track record of stability and uptime, so you are free to focus on growing your business.

 

 

 

 

 

Some of our early adopters during our Beta phase have this to say!

Michelle

 

Barbra

 

 

 

If you can't contribute, you can still help us. Spread the word on all your social media platforms. Please share our links on Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Instagram etc.

Tell your friends how incredible  AppZoola is!  Invite them on board!  

And, oh yes! You can simply join as an affiliate on our site and get commission for everyone you introduce. You don't even have to have your own website or app with us.

We are standing by to answer your questions on how to make your business the success that you want and deserve!
