A Website starting at £4.60 ($5,99) per month
A Website with Funnel starting from £11.60 ($14.99) per month,
If you include a Mobile App, you only add an additional  £12.30 ($15.99) per month. 
Or you can have just a Mobile App on its own for only £19.30 ($24.99) per month.

 

All our development has been completed, and we're in the final testing stages now, with a go live date of the 5th November 2019.
AppZoola has taken close to 6 months of long hours of work, but finally we are almost ready to launch. Our roadmap for the future includes adding more modules, additional templates,  additional industry specific builders and a whole host of amazing features to make your Website, your App and your Business even more awesome.

 

We are looking to raise £30,000. So what do we need funding for?  We want to get the word out there, and so we need to market AppZoola to a wider audience. We'll advertise on Facebook, YouTube, Linkedin and Instagram - but we'll need your help to do this.
We will use a portion of the funding for additional development, but this will only take place when we reach 100% of our goal.

 

 
As an early backer,  the perks  include:

Reduced Website Subscription for one year.
plus a FREE subscription to the mobile App Builder for one year.


Your contribution will help the millions of small to medium businesses who simply don't have the knowledge, or means to:

build an amazing Website.
create a Funnel to market their product.
plus have a  truly Native Mobile App. A traditional native Mobile App alone can cost many thousands of dollars to build.

We bridge that gap and make it affordable for anyone to have all three.
 
 


Our biggest hurdle is to build a community of subscribers.  We can overcome this through advertising, and with your help, we can tell the world about the awesomeness of AppZoola. 

Our other challenge was to ensure a good strong stable platform, Our current platform now has a 99.9% track record of stability and uptime, so you are free to focus on growing your business.

 





 
 
 

 
Some of our early adopters during our Beta phase have this to say!
Michelle


 
Barbra
 
 

 
If you can't contribute, you can still help us. Spread the word on all your social media platforms. Please share our links on Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Instagram etc.
Tell your friends how incredible  AppZoola is!  Invite them on board!  

And, oh yes! You can simply join as an affiliate on our site and get commission for everyone you introduce. You don't even have to have your own website or app with us.
We are standing by to answer your questions on how to make your business the success that you want and deserve!

story:
Shortly

Add plus is the innovative paper-free  project developed for a new way to manage document and digital content, simple and fast. What do we want to make for tomorrow?

To create an even faster and more effective tool to do all this with Artificial Intelligence.

Addplus today is an online platform, based on the proprietary patent, aimed at optimizing the process of archiving and tracking document management, private and professional, and to promote online content with MULTIPLE-LINKS binders and QUICK RESPONSE trackers.

QUICK RESPONSE TRACKERS GENERATOR

 

All was born from the desire to reduce the paper and from the need to manage digital content and documents to the fullest, being able to augment their data, track them, share them and, above all, in portability.

The heart of the system is the innovative multi-dynamic technology attributed to quick response codes, used as digital traceability markers and which allow multiple types of document/content to be connected simultaneously (WEBSITE, URL, FILE, V-CARD), making it possible to create multi-media and multi-link digital filing system.

AUTOMATIC MULTI-LINK GENERATOR

We have made the document and the editorial content management process faster and more usable by anyone, wich for our competitors is still complex, long and not very adaptable to the most common needs and everyday life. 

 

So why this new project? Why this campaign and why asking your contribution?

Helping to reduce the papers is our first reason for pride, a mission that Add plus continues to support.

But Time can also become a waste if the available technologies make it possible to reduce it.

This is what we are working on: reducing access time to the multiple document information increasing addplus platform with the features of Artificial Intelligence and Augmented Reality.

Less time to get information from a document just framing it! It will be recognized and augmented information will immediately appear on your screen.

Bring your smartphone closer, the Augmented tools will do all the rest! 

It's a fact, improving work improves the quality of your life:

the Idea was born

the Project is on the table

we need your Contribution to start

 

 

 

The Contribution We Need & What You Get

We need the contribution of those who, like us, believe that the new digital age and the highly specialized knowledge of the experts must contribute to solving the most common problems, as far as possible shared by many,  improving their work and the quality of the life.

Your contribution to the project will be a drop but it will allow us to put together the money that will help to develop it, to put it on the market and promote it.

Thanks to this project we will offer a unique service on the market and you can prove the advantages of using the addplus.it  app and platform to organize and track your documents, manage deadlines, share your content and more with A.I. Whatever your contribution, we guarantee you at least one year of use of both the current and future versions!!

Milestones of the whole project:
1) development of the mobile app (1st New Release);
2) 1st A.I. integration (PaaS);
3) 2nd A.I. integration (advanced document research).

 

We will not lose heart if the funds are less than expected; the advantage of this project is its scalability and, in any case, it will be pursued. The funds raised will always be used for this project and if they exceed expectations (WOW, WE HOPE SO!) they will be used to continue the implementation of additional Augmented Intelligence features (voice research, virtual assistant, automatic documental research, etc.) and each Supporter will know he is part of it.

 

The Impact

It doesn't want to be a challenge for the future, on the contrary, it's the firm conviction of a feasible present to which we want to give life.

The project will have significant social and environmental impacts. It will help simplify the digitization processes of small businesses and professionals, responding in a targeted manner to their needs for simplification and low cost of services.

We do not pretend to save the world, but helping to apply the principles of environmental sustainability such as the reduction of printed paper actually motivates us to go further, knowing that we have preserved something precious for our children.

 

Risks & Challenges

Every project has its risks, it is undeniable, first of all, its replicability. However, the experience and skills already accumulated in the formulation of the "Add plus" platform, made with proprietary funds, the knowledge of the needs of potential clients, the high level of training accumulated over the years on the subject and finally the awards obtained,  and  , reassure about the concrete possibility of achieving the final goal.

Proper planning is certainly the best tool to verify and control processes like this and for this development, it has been done carefully, you can check it in "more details".

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We want everyone to know that we will love any contribution. Not everyone will support us by donating money, but surely you will be able to do it with your ingenuity and your best ability to spread this project and our intentions. We will be happy if you will share our campaign with your friends, so we invite you to do it immediately with your social media and with Indiegogo, if you wish, it will be important for us and we will give credit to your shares.

story:
We wish to help our Indigenous peoples to plant more Abaca trees in the barren and naked hinterlands and to promote products made out of abaca materials. We hope to mass produce quality and stylish bags, baskets, bins, wallets made out of natural fiber called Abaca or Manila Hemp. This material is extracted from the tree called Abaca, that's native in the Philippines, and belongs to the banana family. Its fiber is very strong and durable when woven into useful items, such as bags, baskets, bins, wallets or even belts. Please check our sample photos.

By using these products, we encourage the use of green and environmentally friendly materials. We encourage the planting of these Abaca trees in our barren and naked hills and mountainsides and therefore, we discourage the use of toxic and non-biodegradable plastics.

story:
Your Planner is with You Everyday & You want to be Sure it is the Right One! This is the Way to take control of your 2018!

No app, no list, no chart can replace the effectiveness of a Paper Planner! And no other Planner can compete with the neuroscience embedded into "Your Life Planned Your Way". Because the ONLY way to get YOUR (life) time back is to PLAN ON IT.

We've got bad news for you - if how you Plan, Manage Yourself or Manage Your Time is the same way as last year, you will have the same productivity, distraction and procrastination issues as last year. 

BUT we've got great news for you too!  There is a way now to create precise visions and strategies that move you forward in life! There are powerful secrets to achieving success on your terms!  Pledge now! This is a life changing, 21st Century, 5th Generation of Time Management and YOU want to have it. 

We recommend the Double Planner Perk. All successful people have 2 Planners: A Personal one filled with Pleasure Time Activities & a Professional one for Goal Achieving Activities. 

Go beyond just "realistic goals"! Craft and reach those that are most motivating!

As a Corporate Trainer, Executive and Entrepreneurial Coach for 25 years, I have seen the evolution of personal and professional development, as well as what works and what doesn't. 

Your Life Planned Your Way is about YOU since YOU are the REAL PLANNER! And this Process is ONLY available here!

The Process of Pre Planning to Plan "Your Way" is based my research and experience as a neurobiology therapist. 

Whether you want to lose weight, find love, change jobs or increase your finances, when you plan on it "your way" you are more likely to get it.  Imagine the shift when you increasing your productivity at work to free up your time to pursue the things that bring meaning to your life! 

You have been taught Planning tools based on the 19th Century Industrial Revolution and outdated 20th Century Time Management strategies.  And haven't you noticed the increase in burn out, stress, depression. There's a reason! The "old ways" don't work to help the human being! So we believe there's a better way - Your Life Planned Your Way which offers the most advanced, yet simplest, most natural, and accessible way to manage yourself, your goals and plans! You've never seen anything like it!

Or everyone would be reaching their goals! The New Way is Your Life Planned Your Way. And Pre Planning is KEY.

Albert Einstein sais: "If I had an hour to solve a problem and my life depended on the solution, I would spend the first 55 minutes determining the proper question to ask, for once I know the proper question, I could solve the problem in less than five minutes."

Is it worth your time to get the the right questions so you can get the best results?

So many people have turned to technology to schedule, keep track of and manage their time. We think some technology makes our lives easier, but not when it comes to personal productivity! The endless maze of apps, notifications and other interfaces just create more confusion, distractions and scattered attention.

The “old way” of paper planning has been taken to an “new level” with Your Life Planned Your Way. Always on paper with the addition of the most effective proces to reach your goals and feel accomplished everyday.

You will have people asking you... "How do you do it all?"

Use your Planner to structure your time optimizing that spent at work to free up more time to be with those you love. 

And to take up hobbies and to get exercise. With specific tracking pages you see how realistic you are with your time, where it is wasted and how to best manage what is a fixed routine and what is your flexible schedule.  

See the Look Inside Video for a glance at the layout of the Year, Months, Weeks, Review Pages, Goals, Inspirational Quotes, Tracking pages for Bills & Chores, and the numerous "To Remember pages" as well as "Great Idea" pages.

 
Looks aren't everything - but why carry around a bland looking Planner!
 

Successful People are Simply the Best at Staying Motivated... and Your Life Planned Your Way is how! 

 

 

Pre Planner & Planner Specs - Designed in Italy

Here are the specs of the Pre Planner & Planner. Know that the real planner is You. That is why my primary goal is to support You to know yourself better, to then plan better (and live the spontaneousness of life too) so you feel great about yourself and your life. Catch the daily inspirational quotes, Blog posts and Podcast Episodes throughout this campaign here: https://www.facebook.com/YourLifeYourWayGlobal/

Your Life Planned Your Way is the only way to stay motivated, reach goals and your fuller potential. It also includes an AUDIO Training on Planning, Time Management & Productivity for Success & Life Fulfillment. 

With the Pre Planner, you learn how to set truly compelling goals that you can be committed to reaching. And with the Planner, you transfer these to better organize your weekly tasks and to track your progress so you keep moving forward. 

Whether you are used to a "traditional planner" to keep your appointments or prefer a "creative planner" to mind map your ideas, now you have it all in one "Your Life Planned Your Way". 

Grab some of these Perks and Rewards Now! 

See the amazing list of Perks - both physical products and PDF downloads when you support this campaign. And remember to hear about why we are doing this in the About the Project video below.

So many people feel they have "lost themselves" in a role - be it in being a spouse, parent, professional, care giver... and that after a while they don’t really know WHAT they want anymore. They actually don't know WHO they are anymore! So many people have put their dreams "on hold" living their life on "standby".

This Project goes way beyond the Planner! 

Speaking Internationally at events and coaching people from 16 countries, most people feel they can make a difference. Getting laser sharp clarity, planning it out and taking action gives them a giant leap forward to making "their difference" a reality. Find out more here: https://yourlifeyourway.global/pages/scholarships-for-college-students

 

You might be a "What's in it for Me Person"... We are in this for you and many others!

Would You be Willing to Help in other Ways? Simply Share! 

We would be delighted if you could share our story and project on social media. Here some links for you to follow us on too: The Facebook Fan Page Your Life Your Way:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/YourLifeYourWayGlobal/

 Twitter: https://twitter.com/DianaDentinger 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dianadentinger/ 

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/dianadentinger 

Your Life Your Way Podcast: https://itunes.apple.com/it/podcast/your-life-your-way/id1241300825?l=en

The world is a better place because of you! Thank you!

More than just a Paper Planner - it's a Profound Movement

These issues touch each and every one of our lives! Let's take off the blinders and see how to best support people who need clarity and confidence! 

Not only feeling lost, people are pulled in too many directions, frustrated, misunderstood and disconnected. They are bombarded with over 3000 marketing messages a day about "how to be" and taken away from "being themselves" and living their way. Serious social issues are on the rise and unfortunately these touch each and every one of our lives! We see people feeling powerless. It's time for this to change!

I have first hand experience with many of the situations above so I have utmost compassion for those who are going through them right now. But compassion is not enough. Real self understanding, a keen mentor and committed action taking is what it takes to shift these unpleasant issues so people get their life back again. 

 

We want to prevent these issues by giving people clear answers about their potential so they feel empowered inside, no matter what goes on in the outside world.

The Risks of this Campaign & Our Challenges

In all honesty, this project has come together with such synchronicity (and due tenacity) that there are few risks. With your help, we can get there sooner. We can reach more people faster. We can have a positive impact on people's mental, emotional, physical and spiritual wellbeing.  

A few famous people stated that their dream was to see a TV or a computer in the household of everyone in America. For me, it's NOT about technology. It is YES about the inner connection you have with yourself.  My dream is that in every heart, each person feels empowered to reach their fullest potential and Live their Life Their Way for the betterment of our world. 

Thank you for supporting Your Life Planned Your Way. For more information please visit our website: www.yourlifeyourway.global

Thank you for your support! Reach out to us via email or social media if you have questions. 

Every Perk over €15 includes the Audio Version of Diana's Best Selling Book "Modus Vivendi - Your Life Your Way".

Enjoy the Inspiration and thank you again for your support!

 
For Diana's project "Women of Meaning" and "Your Life Your Way" she has been featured on over 200 Media Channels. Share this campaign to get the word out that there is a better way to plan, find meaning and fulfillment among all the things that somehow seem to have lost sense.

Enjoy the Inspiration and thank you again for your support!

 
For Diana's project "Women of Meaning" and "Your Life Your Way" she has been featured on over 200 Media Channels. Share this campaign to get the word out that there is a better way to plan, find meaning and fulfillment among all the things that somehow seem to have lost sense.

story:
Crappy Internet Cramping your Lifestyle?

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are boaters, campers and have a lot of kids (7 to be exact).  We like to operate our business from where we want and on our own terms.  Who wouldn't want that?

But we ran into a problem.  We couldn't run our business, keep our kids entertained, or our sanity in check with the constant griping.  All because of slow, unreliable, or non-existent internet.  Something needed to change.

Being an engineer, serial entrepreneur, and hardwired to solve problems I knew that there must be a better way.   Konnected Technology was born with a mission to help people achieve the lifestyle that they dream of through the use of technology.

Why not create a portable, weatherproof self contained internet module that has reliable, high speed data with no limits?  Use it in your boat, at the campsite, in the car, at the cottage.  Anywhere.  Sounds like a good idea to me.

We've teamed with Indiegogo to give you the opportunity to be an early adopter of our Konnected Wifi Module, lock in great internet rates and get on with living the lifestyle that you dream of.  By crowdsourcing we are able to use the power of the crowd to get the word out and help fund our accelerating growth.  

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help to get the word out  and to help fund the growth that we are experiencing.  The old adage that it takes money to make money has never rung more true.

 

The Perks that we are offering give you a chance to join the revolution and become

The Service

  • Reduced Rate Internet Subscriptions that allow you to keep the preferential rate for up to 3 yrs - maybe beyond.
  • High speed internet with speeds of 10Mb/s to 40Mb/s with bursts to 80 Mb/s.
  • Unlimited Video Streaming always at the Highest Data Speeds.
  • Unlimited Non-Streaming Data.  Speed Prioritization (not to be confused with Throttling) could possibly occur after 100GB but only during periods of extreme network traffic and only for the minimum amount of time required.
  • The most reliable internet available with greater than 99% uptime.
  • For our Canadian Friends we have unlimited roaming available at an extra cost.

The Module

  • Weatherproof.  Want to mount it outside?  No problem.
  • Portable.  Works anywhere and while on the move.
  • Plug and Play.  Just needs either 110VAC or 12VDC power.
  • Fully remote managed for service or firmware upgrades.
  • Ships pre-configured and live.  You are up and running in less than 2 minutes.
  • Purchase outright (no contracts) or finance for 1, 2, or 3 years at 0%.
  • Equipment purchased outright qualifies for seasonal suspensions of up to 6 months.

Where will the Money Go?

The good news is that the  Konnected Wifi Module is developed, tested and is currently shipping.  We need the money to help fund our marketing and equipment financing strategies.  Our friends in the cell phone world have us all trained to want equipment with no upfront cost.  I love it as a consumer but, as a business owner, it is very expensive.

 

Why not choose a perk and give it a try.  I guarantee that you will be glad that you did.

Need more detail on what the module is capable of? 

Here is the techno speak:

Device Summary:  

The Konnected-SIM4 is a high performance mission critical enterprise grade rugged router with a cellular embedded LTE Advanced (LTE 2) modem that supports LTE bands B1, B2, B3, B4, B5, B7, B8, B12, B13, B17, B20, B25, B26, B29, B30 & B41. It is made for customers that want the best signal reception and speed. Since this router has band 12, customers using the new 700Mhz frequency will get the best performance. This module also supports Carrier Aggregation. Carrier Aggregation is like having 2 modems in 1 device as it bonds and connects multiple times to the provider to get the fastest and most stable connection possible with the lowest latency. 

Made to work for M2M applications, the Konnected router packs a powerful punch with its 2 x 5dBi wifi external antennas that are able to push the wifi signal as far as possible while maintaining the fastest speeds. Also includes 2 x 5dBi 3G/4G/LTE external antennas for the cellular signal that are able to get the strongest signal reception possible. 

The Konnected SIM-4 is a completely remotely managed network device. 99% of the time we package the device with T-mobile but do have options for AT&T and Verizon.  

Want to actually earn money with your internet service? We have software that creates a captive portal with the ability to monetize the service that you provide to others. We handle all of the technical details, money collection and revenue share with you. You are able to control access times, bandwidth and data limits for each user.  

Advanced Wireless Security  

The Konnected-SIM4 creates a secure Wi-Fi® network by supporting the latest wireless security features to prevent unauthorized access. It supports many security options including 64/128-bit WEP, WPA, and WPA2 + more commercial grade security options to ensure that you will be able to secure your Wi-Fi network, regardless of your client devices. In addition, the 3G/4G/LTE mobile router utilizes dual active firewalls (SPI and NAT) to prevent potential attacks from across the Internet.  

Easy to install and Use  

Simply receive the device and plug it into power (12VDC and 110VAC versions available). The system comes ready with a data account and preset to the SSID and Password of your choosing. For those that use the router in a critical situation, enable the Watchdog system that will reboot the router automatically if there is a loss of an internet connection.  

Feature Details:  

• Built in 3G/4G/LTE Cellular Embedded Modem with multiple LTE bands that supports LTE, xLTE and LTE2 (LTE Advanced)  

• Carrier Aggregation support to get the fastest speeds possible (up to 300Mbps download and 50 Mb/s upload using latest cat 6 module)

• Band 12 support for T-Mobile customers looking to get the best coverage possible using the new 700MHz band  

• Wireless Bridge/Repeater mode to extend your wireless range and/or have the ability to use an Ethernet connection with any wifi signal including those from a hotspot device  

• Konnected to Konnected VPN mode to allow a secure encrypted connection between offices • Super Fast (wireless speeds up to 300Mb/s full N speeds) up to 1000 ft range  

• Virtual Private Network (VPN) + OPENSWAN IPSec and OpenVPN Support  

• Multi-Wan with fail safe (if one connection fails, can set to auto connect to another)  

• WiFi Fail Over (great for boater or anyone that gets free wifi and only use 4G/LTE when not in range)  

• Detachable 7 inch 5dBi antennas allowing flexible gain performance antennas both wifi and 4G/LTE  

• Dynamic DNS full support including customized option  

• Available Ethernet out cable to attach to wired network

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Most of the risk is gone away as the product development component of the project is complete.   We have successfully designed, developed, tested this product and have real customers in the marketplace.  Our biggest challenge is getting the word out and keeping up with the equipment financing options that we offer.  The more successful the indiegogo campaign, the faster we can ramp up production.

This is not our first rodeo.  We have been entrepreneurs for the last 25+ yrs and have brought many successful products and companies to the marketplace including Malibu Boats and Action Security.  The Konnected Wifi module is one of several products in the Konnected Ecosystem that we have designed and brought to market.

Please visit Konnectedtechnology.com for more information.

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether you are able to contribute or not, please help us get the word out.  Everyone knows someone with a tragic story that involves not having good internet!

story:
We Need Privacy and Security In Cyberspace

The Internet is so pervasive in our life, it has become a fundamental tool for us to communication, work and entertainment. As we become more and more dependent on it we as becoming more aware of the vulnerability of the present Internet environment, especially with Internet of Things (IoTs).

There is a growing need as we are becoming aware that if one of the world greatest unauthorized surveillance agency would not prevent from being hacked, how can we protect ourselves. More troubling is most entities on the Internet had been hacked, one form or another, including our financial institutions.

 

What Is the Significant of Internet 2.0

 

Cyberspace Is Insecure

The reason current Internet will forever be vulnerable to hacking is due to the fundamental design of the Internet system. In order to survive nuclear attack, the Internet was designed and operated using connectionless broadcast transmission and implements static Internet addressing for transmission. Said data delivery scheme is similar to the postal delivery system.

Using static Internet routing addresses and cast mode of data delivery, hackers capitalize on it to target and capture data packets, as well as, for clone others’ IP addresses for intrusive attacks.

 

Internet 2.0 – Multimode Internet

The need for privacy and security will inevitably usher in a new transformative technology to fulfil such need, a more secure Internet whereby we can held hackers accountable for their actions in Internet 2.0, a multimode Internet could be such a solution.

The Internet 2.0 is the brainchild of Alex Lee Chooi Tian. He invented a new set of network protocol suite for enabling Internet-like and Web-based capability natively over any telecommunication systems without using the Internet platform.

A new transmission media network protocol known as Transmission Media Adaptation Layer (TMAL) was created to enable Internet 2.0. Internet 2.0 is able to provides both dedicated-media and private mode of communication for internetworking environment, coined as Virtual Dedicated Media Internet (VDMI), as well as having the ability to provide connectivity to existing Internet services. For further technical detail, please refers to US Pat No. 9,866,499 B1, entitled “Apparatus and Methods for Multimode Internetworking Connectivity”.

Current Internet does not operate natively on the telephony system, instead the Internet piggy-back on it. This rendered the present Internet unable to fully capitalize on the capabilities of the telephony systems. With security-enabled Internet 2.0, VDMI is able to fully capitalise on inherent strengths of telephony systems to provide for private line of communication and reliable call tracing and recording, enabling cyber-security enforcement.

 

What is DNS?

The two most important components for the Internet to function effectively are: IP suite of protocols and Domain Name System (DNS). In addition to the differing data delivery systems, there is a need for ease of use and access to said multimode internetworking platform and environment. 

 

Why Do We Need TelephonyDNS?

While computer identifies and associates any end-nodes to numbers, we are more accustomed to associate any entities with names. There is a need for human-to-machine interface for associating network device numeric addressing to domain name in both, IP-based and VDMI environment.

 

IP-based DNS

IP-based Domain Name System is for the mapping of domain name to an IP address.  It’s Resource Record Table was developed to register a domain name either IPv4 or IPV6 numeric addressing.  

 

TelephonyDNS

VDMI network platform would require similar capability. IncepXion DNS Holdings Limited is presently undertaking to develop telephony-based DNS, where a VDMI’s domain name will be mapped to a telephony number. said telephony-based DNS is coined as TelephonyDNS.

 

Differentiating TelephonyDNS From IP DNS

For ease of usage its imperative to mimic existing DNS domain name naming convention as must as possible. The objective is not to have two different name for any entity associated to a domain name. We did it by incorporating an invalid IP-based DNS character to our embodiment. Should the domain name preceded with a “+” character, the domain name query will be routed to TelephonyDNS resolvers. Otherwise it would be routed to the current DNS as shown below.

 

Telephony-based DNS Perks

The followings are the reward perks for your support in this revolutionary project. Thank you. 

 

Project Timeline

TelephonyDNS registration when launched, will be temporary be hosted in a “sandbox” environment for a short period of time.  During that period, we will give our Backers the opportunity to register their preferred name for their companies, business entities, and the likes, before the others. The types of top level domain name categories are similar to that of the present IP-based DNS.

Thus, backers of TelephonyDNS will have the opportunistic chance, as well as, choice to obtain great domain name in the Internet 2.0 environment.

 

Key Personnel

 

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Q1.  Is TelephonyDNS the same as IP Telephony, aka, “Enum”?

No, Enum or IP Telephony provides the means to maps a telephony number to IP Address and utilizes said IP address for routing. Enum does not provides for the ability to natively maps a telephone number to a domain name.

Whereas Telephony DNS provides means to maps a telephony number to a domain name. For TelephonyDNS, IP address was neither catered for nor implemented.

 

Q2. Several emerging technologies claimed to be Internet 2.0, like Web 2.0 and Blockchain technology, so why are you different?

In the technological realm and definition for the Internet, the term "Internet" was allocated to the ability to provide both connectivity and data delivery capabilities in a network environment to enable for the internetworking of remote application programs.

Web 2.0 technology provides the capabilities for a hyperlink User Interface and connectivity. Web 2.0 does not has the ability to provide for data delivery services. Technically, Web 2.0, aka http, lies in the OSI Model Layer 7 functionality or Application-layer functionality. Other Application-layer programs are like smtp, ftp, and the likes, to name a few.

Blockchain technology is an encryption technology for enabling unalterable blocks of hashed certificates to ensure the authenticity of the data. It is lies within the Application-layer functionality of the OSI Model. Blockchain technology can neither provides the ability for connectivity nor data delivery services.

TMAL, has several functionality for the OSI Model services, such as Session-layer, Transport-layer, rudimentary Network-layer, and Data Link-layer. Thus TMAL is able to provides for both connectivity and data delivery similarly to tcp, udp and the likes. Basically TMAL also provides for the internetworking capability among remote application, similarly to tcp/ip, aka the Internet. In short, TMAL will transforms the present Internet from a single-mode internetworking environment to a multimode internetworking environment, thus it was coined as Internet 2.0.

 

Q3. Why do I need Domain Name if I don't have a website?

The use for Domain Name is more than just for website address. Website address is only one of resources for Domain Name. Basically a Domain Name is like your contact information within the phonebook of your mobile phone except on a global scale. While present DNS is the contact directory for the Internet, TelephonyDNS will be the contact directory for Internet 2.0.

As global contact directory, one can register a domain name for personal or for any statutory entities. Statutory entities are like, governmental agencies, NGO,  corporation, partnership, consultants, sole proprietors, architect, accountants, lawyer and the likes, so long as it is recognised by law.

story:
The coolest way to make iced drip coffee with 3 simple steps.  

#ICEBERGcoffee
If cold drip and cold brew coffee are your favorites, the ICEBERG will surprise you with a soothing experience.

                  Yeah! it's really soft and floral!

 

You will never know the taste until you taste it!

 

With 3 simple steps, you can enjoy your iced drip coffee at home. 

 

 

 Measuring of  ice and ground coffee can never be this simple through our design.

 

 

NO weighting of ice, water, and ground coffee is needed, just fill up to the indication lines.

 

 

Uniquely designed, iced water is evenly distributed through the 8 outlets and moistens ground coffee in a 360° manner, from boundary to core. This ensures effective moistening of ground coffee and extracts the full flavor of every coffee grain.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ICEBERG Combo is best for “me-time” coffee lovers that like to explore the flavor of variety of coffee beans with a quick and easy set up. The extra ice mold significantly shortens the turnover time and increases the harvest efficiency.

ICEBERG Party Combo is a “show-time” package that supports lovers to make specialty drinks or desserts for gatherings and to be echoed with applauds. Colorful icebergs should absolutely catch focus of eyeballs and cameras. 

LOOKS COOL and TASTES GREAT!

 

 

All Backers can enjoy great discount and early delivery arrangement, which is planned in mid November. Be the first to play with the ICEBERG combo, post awesome photos of your specialty drinks to your social media accounts. Received LIKES from your friends and followers!

The extra ice mold significantly shortens the turnover time and increases the harvest efficiency.ICEBERG Party Combo is a “show-time” package that supports lovers to make specialty drinks or desserts for gatherings and to be echoed with applauds. Colorful icebergs should absolutely catch focus of eyeballs and cameras. LOOKS COOL and TASTES GREAT!  All Backers can enjoy great discount and early delivery arrangement, which is planned in mid November. Be the first to play with the ICEBERG combo, post awesome photos of your specialty drinks to your social media accounts. Received LIKES from your friends and followers!

story:
About

ARRIM ONE is the first AR multi-functional measuring device that actually works. Simply attach ARRIM ONE to your smartphone. It immediately transforms your phone into a powerful AR measuring device.

FUNCTIONS

Arrim ONE is truly multi-functional. It can be used to measure the dimensions of straight lines, circles, angles and curves. It is also a leveling and dividing tool.

 

MEASURE STRAIGHT LINE

 

MEASURE CIRCLE

 
MEASURE ANGLE

LEVELING & MULTI-SECTION

 

There are much more functions, such as continuous measurement, curves, unit conversion. And many new functions will be added in the future. 

We just add an update of Floor Plan function. It is still early development version, but you will get the idea how it works.

 

Arrim ONE supports both Imperial & Metric Unit System. You can measure in ft, inch, yard, mm, cm, and m. And you can also choose the maximum precision.

Arrim ONE has only one physical button for power on/off. All the controls and display are done over the phone. It means we can continuously improve the performance and add new features by only updating the software.

The smart phone has already become the center of our digital life. It has powerful CPU, large display, and is connected to the Internet all the time. Working with a smartphone allows Arrim ONE to instantly have all of them. So users can precisely conduct multi-functional measurements, can review the results on the large screen, and can easily share the results with others.

Demo (Raw footage)

ACCURACY

ARRIM ONE has the precision of +/- 1.5 mm within 20 meters range*. To achieve this level of accuracy, ARRIM ONE uses a series of sophisticated technologies, including virtual 3D coordinate system, Phase-shift laser measurement, Characteristic point tracking, Augmented Reality, and our patented algorithm.

In some cases, ARRIM ONE can achieve the level of precision which is impossible for other tools. For example, if you want to measure the radius of a circle, because you are not sure where the circle centre is, the measurement with other tools may lead to a large deviation. ARRIM ONE can easily solve the problem with an algorithm based on the principle of three points defining a circle.

Recently, there are a few AR measuring apps on the market. However, if you have ever tried them, you would find out that they are just a concept demo. As they all depend on the software hit-test results, the precision is not reliable at all.

Benchmark Video

* Precision for straight line measurement within 20 meters indoor environment. The bright sunlight may affect the laser accuracy in long distance measurement.

DESIGN

Being durable, compact and simple is our design goal from the very beginning. ARRIM ONE is only 5 centimeters long, 3 centimeters wide and 1.5 centimeters thick, and weighs just 35 grams. The outside housing is made of aluminum, and all the internal parts are precisely assembled together. Arrim ONE can be securely attached to your smartphone with and without phone case.

SPECIFICATION

Dimension: 5 X 3 X 1.5 cm

Weight: 35 grams

Laser Module: FDA approved 635 nanometre Class II laser module with 40 meters measure range

Bluetooth: BLE 4.0

Battery: Built-In 100 mAh Lithium-Ion battery provides enough power for 1000 times measurement with a single charge

Charging Voltage: 5 V

Compatibility (updated on July 23, 2018)

iOS: iPhone X, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone SE

Android (requires Android 8.0 or later)

Google: Nexus 5X, Nexus 6P, Pixel, Pixel XL Pixel 2, Pixel 2 XL

Huawei: P20, P20 Pro, Mate RS Porsche Design

Nokia: Nokia 8 Sirocco, Nokia 6 (2018), also known as Nokia 6.1

LG: G6 or later, G7, ThinQ V35

Motorola: Moto G5S Plus, Moto G6 Plus, Moto Z2 Force

OnePlus: OnePlus 3T, OnePlus 5, OnePlus 5T

Samsung: Galaxy A5 (2017), Galaxy A7 (2017) Galaxy A8, Galaxy A8+ (2018), Galaxy Note8, Galaxy S7, Galaxy S7 edge, Galaxy S8, Galaxy S8+, Galaxy S9, Galaxy S9+

Sony: Xperia XZ Premium, Xperia XZ1, Xperia XZ1 Compact

Xiaomi: Mi Mix 2S

Arrim ONE supports both Imperial & Metric Unit System. You can measure in ft, inch, yard, mm, cm, and m. And you can also choose the maximum precision.

PRICE & AVAILABILITY

Here are the prices of some popular measuring tools on Amazon. People are spending hundreds of dollars on these tools for different applications. ARRIM ONE costs only $89. You can do so much more with it.

We have finished hardware and software development. We are confident that we can ship the products in Oct. 2018.

TEAM

We are a group of engineers, programmers and designers who have great passion in design and technology, aiming to find and solve problems to make life easier and better.

The founder of Arrim ONE got the master’s degree of engineering from Imperial College London, a world-class university of technology and engineering. He has worked on AR technology since 2005 mainly in industry area. Before he started his own business, he had worked in Bosch and Siemens as R&D manager for many years.

As the smartphone is getting more and more powerful, we realize that we can finally create a breakthrough AR product for consumer market. We are confident that Arrim ONE will definitely make the measurement easier and better.

Using Arrim ONE is so simple and intuitive. The idea of measuring in this way is what we are all familiar with. We have waited for a long time until the technology gets there. And It's real now.

We need your support to bring this revolutionary product to the world.

Contact Information

Email: marketing@arrim.net

Facebook: facebook.com/ArrimLLC

 

Risks and challenges

We have the experience of measuring tool design and manufacturing for years, and have designed some popular models for big brands. With our design and engineering team, we are confident that can minimize the risk and deliver the products on time. However, unexpected things can happen. This includes unexpected mold change, software bugs, and shipping delay. If anything may possibly cause the delay, we will keep our backers updated.

story:
Our Story

Totemm Wrap-On is a low-tech way to help you and your stylus or pen be one. Wrap-it-on and you'll realize you can use it most of the day. And you didn't even know that you needed it, right?

The Impact

Totemm Wrap-On is a great product for people working with computers, screens and drawing tablets, but did you know that there are over 50 million people living with debilitating arthritis that can seriously limits their ability to uses writing instruments or stylus? And we can't wait to launch our kid size version for those just learning to write and struggling with grip issues. 

What We Need & What You Get

We need $5000 to get started with production and deliver to our Indiegogo campaign supporters. Anything raised above and beyond that will help us produce more product and also realize some of our other ideas we've got for iterations of Totemm Wrap-On. 

Our perks are THE product. For the largest perk (for SF Bay Area locals only), we will offer a visit to your office/studio to introduce your staff to the product, personally fit them, answer any questions and show them our tricks for using Totemm.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you think this is a great idea that might help you... chances are, it can help others too. IndieGoGo is our initial launch platform and we are super excited to get our product out there. Don't be shy, we'd love it if you shared the news with your Facebook friends, on your blog and more.

Because we are manufacturing locally in San Francisco, we have the ability to adjust quickly and get production started immediately. In fact, we'll be working on our deliverables during the campaign. We promise to ship the first product within 14 days of the IndieGoGo campaign end.

story:
VOVIE is the 1st device to device (D2D), secure global communications software, designed by lifelong technologists. D2D direct connectivity is simply the best way to communicate. VOVIE direct; triples your devices connection power, lowers data cost over 50%, doubles or more your call or chat resolution, extends your battery life 30-50% and secures everything. We seek your donations now to launch true communications freedom and unleash smart device restrictions, worldwide. 
   
VOVIE: Online Communications Freedom Goals. 
  • Team Conference HD Calls & Text; Q1, 2016
  • Share, Play, Video, Movies, Photos, Music, DVR Q2, 2016
  • Social Posts, HD Video Chat, 2-8 Ways; Q3-Q4, 2016
  • Magic; Highest rez, lowest cost, longer battery life and safest. 
Do You Know? 

  • Most of YOUR DATA COST powers remote copies of YOUR DATA!
  • All calls & information are sent off to others servers to copy!
  • Copies drop call quality, up Data Cost & delay everything!
  • Regulator Codes are in all devices now powering their copies! 

VOVIE D2D connections are direct, fast, high rez, and secure from: All Spies, Viruses, Malware, Trojans, Hackers, Manufacturers, Operating Systems and ISP's.

With your help we will Upgrade Windows/Android/Apple Communications.

Try VOVIE Free now on Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10. Need Microphone & Speakers.

Download:   http://vovie.com/downloads.html

It takes a couple of minutes to download and install VOVIE App, then you will be able to speak in HD with a VOVIE Team member; 12:00-5:00 EST Monday - Friday. Make your first, safe Pro HD Audio phone call NOW!

Like what we are doing? "Pick a Perk!"
Not convinced? Read on... 

Listen to what the experts are saying:

Arxan Annual Report: ‘State of Mobile App Security’ Reveals an Increase in App Hacks for Top 100 Mobile Apps                                                                                               97% of top 100 paid Android apps have been hacked                                                         87% of top 100 paid iOS apps have been hacked                                                                       90% of Android Healthcare/Medical apps hacked 

https://www.arxan.com/arxans-annual-report-state-of-mobile-app-security-reveals-an-increase-in-app-hacks-for-top-100-mobile-apps/

Industry Publications: 

950M Androids Hacked, Again? http://thehackernews.com/2015/08/hacking-android-smartphones.html  

Skype, Facebook, Twitter, Gmail, Yahoo, Hotmail, Passwords Hacked Free Here:  http://hackpwd.com/hack-skype-passwords-within-2-3-minutes-without-survey/  

                                        

What does VOVIE mean for you?

Secure fast HD communications, lowest data cost, and extend battery life over 2G/3G/4G cell, WiFi, blue-tooth, home & small business connections.              


Compare VOVIE D2D to iPhone/Skype/Instragram/Snapchat?             

  • 100% Private, No Spies, No Copies, No Malware Ever
  • 200% to 500% Higher Call Resolution, 1/3 Data Cost
  • 7X Faster File Share: Video to 4K, Photos, Music +
  • Video Chat to 1080p, 2-8 Ways, 1/6 Data Cost
  • VOVIE Text Messages 1 to 1400 Characters
  • 30% Longer Call Battery Life, 50% Longer for Video
  • They Send Direct Signals 400 meters. VOVIE's Global

Don’t Let This Opportunity Slip Away! "Pick a Perk!"

VOVIE D2D revolutionizes communications for years to come.  

Our Team Believes: Direct Communications will Rule The Cloud!

VOVIE: Exclusive Choice for; Simple, Safe, Low-Cost, Communication!

Direct communication is faster, safer, higher resolution & lower cost. Middlemen bring spies, high data cost, data loss, delay & weak signals. Why send everything around the world for their copies to degrade your quality and increase your data cost 50-80%. Go device to device, direct 2 friends, and not to others first!

VOVIE Injects 3 Smart Soft-Digital Signal Processors, 17 Smart Software Engines & a Contact Communication Server Directly into Your Smart Device. 

Secures & Amplifies: Calls, Share Speed, Video Chat & All Connections.   

 

VOVIE connects if you have a pulse.

Below ugly PDF shows what VOVIE looks like inside your device's memory. RAM-RAM No Wait State Magic from input to enhancing rendering to you.

Meet Our Founders:

After decades building advanced computing technology, our founders wanted a better way to communicate. Private clear voice calls, HD video conferencing & faster streaming over low-cost, low speed connections. We decided to build a new communication system for friends, family and businesses. After 5 years of self-funding, design and programming the no wait state engines required, we are ready to launch and seek your crowdfunding support. 

                 

Norm Towson started building telegraphs and radios in 4th grade, helped build a computer in high school, started programming & building mini computers in college & never stopped. Since, nearly 100 products including: 1st fail safe computer system, 1st battery powered portable PC (Pivot), 1st high storage capacity PC, 1st zero wait state PC (Silicon Valley Computer) & 1st all in one single board PC (Intel). His last product: US Patent 8073675, disk storage computer on chip, is now used by YouTube, Netflix & Amazon to store-stream HD videos & movies worldwide.  

Ted Rybicki, began working on ham radios, repairing and manufacturing computers in high school and college. During his 26 year career at HP; he became an HP Fellow and co-inventor of communications and security hardware, software, firmware & protocols for: HP printers, computers, routers, network controllers, switches & internet attached storage. President; HP HAM Radio Club, Audiophile, Guitarist, Order of the Arrow & Eagle Scout.

Norm, Ted & Team are committed to deliver VOVIE to the world. Over 30 years we have enjoyed building technology products for; HP, IBM, NASA, JPL, Intel, MIPS, ARM, Seagate, Cisco & others. 

Our team plans to deliver all goals to the world. However, without your funding help, it will take us much, much longer. Your donations allow us to hire more engineers, launch, on more devices, add more features and service you better. Together we will make secure high performance, low cost communications a reality.

 Voice & Video Comparison Charts:                                                                      Voice Call, Music Advance: Go Pro 48 kHz & pay Carriers Less!



Video Chat Longer & Save Money.
VIDEO CONFERENCING: 2 - 8 Users at a time, Auto Lip Sync!

 


We have already ported VOVIE control to Android, MAC & iPhone, Screens, Speakers, Microphones & Cameras. Your money goes for: Simple user interface, self-servers & recompiling VOVIE high performance audio and video codecs on Androids & Apples. 


Press Articles:

 

IMPORTANT DELIVERY NOTE: 

Every Indiegogo Donor can start downloading VOVIE HD Calls Encrypted for Windows 7-8-8.1-10 now and Windows/Android, HD Calls & Text in January! This is why all perk deliveries begin by December! Below timeline identifies all of our goal deliveries. 


All Perks Have AES Unbroken Encrypted VPN.


FAQ

Why are we doing this?  

We love delivering wait-stateless computing technology. Our team simply wanted everyone to have better, safer and lower cost communications: clearer calls, HD video chats, fast share/play of videos, photos & music, over low cost connections, without disconnects, high bandwidth cost & spying of existing communications suppliers today. VOVIE is the 1st direct network transport for people.

What is the Problem?

Today 30 year old "free standard control & copy everything protocols" are inside every device, being hacked and hijacked every day. Their delays & remote copies drop your signal quality and Increase Your Data Cost (50-80%), open many many outside access ports into your device & make you wait on everything. "These regulators protocols" and browser hijacks cost users billions of data $$$ extra per month, lower quality & billions are hacked using these slow, regulated codes.

"Any  intelligent fool can make things bigger and more complex. It takes a  touch of genius - and a lot of courage to move in the opposite  direction."  Albert  Einstein

How Do You Solve this Problem?

Get professional infrastructure technologists to build a wait-state-less, 12X faster smart device to device, direct software control system that produces a 300% more bandwidth efficient encrypted signal for clean communications. Bonuses Include, weapons grade encryption at less than 1/2 the others unsafe data rates, Go 48kHz Audio, 100% of Human Hearing Range Calls over 2-3-4G WiFi or any connection while others send as little as 17% of human hearing range. Encrypt, random rotate keys, & scramble every packet. Make sure access requires your device, password & user name, All at Once (Unlike "The Others"). Stop powering others copies, go private, low data, higher quality and direct to friends and associates.

Why the names? 

Meeting to You Corporation (MTY), was formed in 2009 to develop and patent our secure communications technology after finishing US patent 8073675 which now stores & delivers YouTube's, Netflix & Amazon Movies. We simply want people to have reliable safe, HD Live Meetings come to them directly over low cost connections whenever/wherever they desire. Hook over any connection you have.  

VOVIE (Voice, Video, Encrypted) came in 2011 after 1st seeing our intelligent software computers & engines deliver Live HD 1080p video encrypted to our PC’s using as low as 10% of the data packets required by Skype, Apple, Cisco & others. 

How Secure is it?

Very Secure. We cannot break it and experts estimates are it will take 1 Septillion years (that's a 1 followed by 24 zeros) to brute force access 1 PDF if it is AES 128-bit Encrypted by packet, our way. VOVIE connects to your selected, authenticated contacts device only, with no back doors (even us). Even If you are sent a virus, malware, Trojan attached to a text/pic/doc/video/whatever from another VOVIE user, it cannot activate at all. It is permanently locked up and cannot jump to your device's operating system like the others do. Link below states: AES 128-bit Encryption has never been broken & is estimated to be 725 billion times harder than breaking 1, 64-bit key was in 2002. Access requires your device, password & user name all at once.

Link: http://security.stackexchange.com/questions/61346/how-long-would-it-take-to-bruteforce-an-aes-128-protected-pdf-knowing-the-key-is

How Do You Ship & To Who?

Export Terms for Encryption: We will not ship to N. Korea, Syria, North Sudan, Iran or Cuba at all, or for use in any criminal activity. VOVIE is for friends only.

*US Citizens can order: AES 256-bit Encryption or 128-bit. Both Unbroken.  

Other counties will receive AES 128-bit Encryption (Unbroken) 1st, while we deliver text, video chat, share play goals reached and apply for EU Plus 28 countries to receive 256 bit. EU Plus 28 are Austria Australia Belgium Bulgaria Canada Cyprus Czech Republic Estonia Denmark Finland France Germany Greece Hungary Iceland Ireland Italy Japan Latvia Lithuania Luxembourg Malta Netherlands New Zealand Norway Poland Portugal Romania Slovakia Slovenia Spain Sweden Switzerland Turkey and United Kingdom.

Instructions to register for 1 yr free unlimited HD calls encrypted immediately will be sent to each donor. Select your user name, email address for updates, country you are from, accept friends only terms. All above can start using VOVIE HD Calls on Windows 7-8-10 devices in December and Windows/Android, Calls & Text in January, while we work on Apple's store APP & all goals reached. Check our goals!

What are the Risks:

Our team is confident, has the technical expertise, has tested VOVIE encrypted HD Calls worldwide, and are committed to delivering every VOVIE goal funded. Yes, there are risks in all investments, including crowdfunding. We have successfully delivered new technologies for over 30 years. We are using Windows HD Call VPN daily for team conferencing. Our Windows features are well tested over 2/3/4G, Wifi, Satellites, Wire, Radio, & Bluetooth. All VOVIE code has already been ported to Android & Apple except AV Codecs. Our audio is up on Android. We have to add our video codec to Android, Audio & Video codecs to Apple, improve our user interface (GUI) and improve our software to support thousands of users to accomplish all goals. This is certainly a challenge but one we have the collective experience and desire to overcome.

What does VOVIE mean
for you?


Secure fast HD communications, lowest data cost, and extend battery life over 2G/3G/4G cell, WiFi, blue-tooth, home & small business connections.              

Compare VOVIE D2D to iPhone/Skype/Instragram/Snapchat?             


100%
     Private, No Spies, No Copies, No Malware Ever
200% to 500% Higher Call Resolution, 1/3 Data Cost

7X Faster File Share: Video to 4K, Photos, Music +
Video Chat to 1080p, 2-8 Ways, 1/6 Data Cost

VOVIE Text
     Messages 1 to 1400 Characters

30% Longer Call Battery Life, 50% Longer for Video
They Send Direct Signals 400 meters. VOVIE's Global


Don’t Let This Opportunity Slip Away! "Pick a Perk!"
VOVIE D2D revolutionizes communications for years to come.  

Our Team Believes: Direct Communications will Rule The Cloud!



VOVIE: Exclusive Choice for; Simple, Safe, Low-Cost, Communication!
Direct communication is faster, safer, higher resolution & lower cost. Middlemen bring spies, high data cost, data loss, delay & weak signals. Why send everything around the world for their copies to degrade your quality and increase your data cost 50-80%. Go device to device, direct 2 friends, and not to others first!
VOVIE Injects 3 Smart Soft-Digital Signal Processors, 17 Smart Software Engines & a Contact Communication Server Directly into Your Smart Device. 
Secures & Amplifies: Calls, Share Speed, Video Chat & All Connections.   

 
VOVIE connects if you have a pulse.
Below ugly PDF shows what VOVIE looks like inside your device's memory. RAM-RAM No Wait State Magic from input to enhancing rendering to you.


Meet Our Founders:
After
decades building advanced computing technology, our founders wanted a better way to communicate. Private clear voice
calls, HD video conferencing & faster streaming over low-cost, low speed connections. We decided to build a new communication system for friends, family and businesses. After 5 years of self-funding, design and programming the no wait state engines required, we are ready to launch and seek your crowdfunding support. 
                 

Norm Towson started building telegraphs and radios in 4th grade, helped build a computer in high school, started programming & building mini computers in college &
never stopped. Since, nearly 100 products including: 1st fail safe computer system, 1st battery powered portable PC (Pivot), 1st high storage capacity PC, 1st zero wait state PC
(Silicon Valley Computer) &
1st all in one single board PC (Intel). His last product: US Patent
8073675, disk storage computer on chip, is now used by YouTube, Netflix &
Amazon to store-stream HD videos & movies worldwide.  
Ted Rybicki, began working on ham radios, repairing and manufacturing computers in high school and college. During his 26 year career at HP; he became an HP Fellow and co-inventor of communications and security hardware, software, firmware & protocols for: HP printers, computers, routers, network controllers, switches & internet attached storage. President; HP HAM Radio Club, Audiophile, Guitarist, Order of the Arrow & Eagle Scout.


Norm, Ted & Team are committed to deliver VOVIE to the world. Over 30 years we have enjoyed building technology products for; HP, IBM, NASA, JPL, Intel, MIPS, ARM, Seagate, Cisco & others. 
Our team plans to
deliver all goals to the world. However, without your funding help, it will
take us much, much longer. Your donations allow us to hire more engineers, launch, on more devices, add more features and service you better. Together we will make secure high performance, low
cost communications a reality.
 Voice & Video Comparison Charts:                                                                      Voice Call, Music Advance: Go Pro 48 kHz & pay Carriers Less!













Video Chat Longer & Save Money.

VIDEO CONFERENCING: 2 - 8 Users at a time, Auto Lip Sync!

 





We have already ported VOVIE control to Android, MAC & iPhone, Screens, Speakers, Microphones & Cameras. Your money goes for: Simple user interface, self-servers & recompiling VOVIE high performance audio and video codecs on Androids & Apples. 




Press Articles:

 


IMPORTANT DELIVERY NOTE: 




Every Indiegogo Donor can start downloading VOVIE HD Calls Encrypted for Windows 7-8-8.1-10 now and Windows/Android, HD Calls & Text in January! This is why all perk deliveries begin by December! Below timeline identifies all of our goal deliveries. 



All Perks Have AES Unbroken Encrypted VPN.







FAQ
Why
are we doing this?  
We love delivering wait-stateless computing technology. Our team simply wanted everyone to
have better, safer and lower cost communications: clearer calls, HD video chats, fast share/play of videos, photos & music, over low cost
connections, without disconnects, high bandwidth cost & spying of existing communications suppliers today. VOVIE is the 1st direct network transport for people.


What is
the Problem?
Today 30 year old "free standard control & copy everything protocols" are
inside every device, being hacked and hijacked every day. Their delays &
remote copies drop your signal quality and Increase Your Data Cost (50-80%),
open many many outside access ports into your device & make you wait on
everything. "These regulators protocols" and browser hijacks cost
users billions of data $$$ extra per month, lower quality & billions are
hacked using these slow, regulated codes.
"Any  intelligent fool can make things bigger and more complex.
It takes a  touch of genius - and a lot of courage to move in the
opposite  direction."  Albert  Einstein
How Do You Solve this Problem?
Get
professional infrastructure technologists to build a wait-state-less,
12X faster smart device to device, direct software control system that produces a 300%
more bandwidth efficient encrypted signal for clean communications. Bonuses Include, weapons grade encryption at less than 1/2 the others unsafe data
rates, Go 48kHz Audio, 100% of Human Hearing Range Calls over 2-3-4G WiFi or any connection while others send as little as 17% of human hearing range. Encrypt, random rotate keys, & scramble every packet. Make
sure access requires your device, password & user name, All at Once (Unlike
"The Others"). Stop powering others copies, go private, low data, higher quality and direct to friends and associates.
Why the
names? 
Meeting to You Corporation (MTY), was formed in 2009 to develop
and patent our secure communications technology after finishing US patent
8073675 which now stores & delivers YouTube's, Netflix & Amazon Movies.
We simply want people to have reliable safe, HD Live Meetings come to them directly over
low cost connections whenever/wherever they desire. Hook over any connection
you have.  
VOVIE (Voice, Video, Encrypted) came in 2011 after 1st
seeing our intelligent software computers & engines deliver Live HD 1080p
video encrypted to our PC’s using as low as 10% of the data packets required by
Skype, Apple, Cisco & others. 
How Secure is it?
Very Secure. We cannot break it and experts estimates are it will take 1 Septillion
years (that's a 1 followed by 24 zeros) to brute force access 1 PDF if it is AES
128-bit Encrypted by packet, our way. VOVIE connects to your selected, authenticated contacts device only, with no back
doors (even us). Even If you are sent a virus, malware, Trojan attached to a text/pic/doc/video/whatever from another VOVIE user, it cannot activate at
all. It is permanently locked up and cannot jump to your device's operating system like the others do. Link below states: AES 128-bit Encryption has never been broken & is estimated to
be 725 billion times harder than breaking 1, 64-bit key was in 2002. Access requires your device, password & user name all at once.
Link: http://security.stackexchange.com/questions/61346/how-long-would-it-take-to-bruteforce-an-aes-128-protected-pdf-knowing-the-key-is
How Do
You Ship & To Who?
Export Terms for Encryption: We will not ship to N. Korea, Syria, North Sudan,
Iran or Cuba at all, or for use in any criminal activity. VOVIE is for friends only.
*US Citizens can order: AES 256-bit Encryption or 128-bit. Both Unbroken.
 
Other counties will receive AES 128-bit Encryption (Unbroken) 1st, while
we deliver text, video chat, share play goals reached and apply for EU Plus 28
countries to receive 256 bit. EU Plus 28 are Austria Australia Belgium
Bulgaria Canada Cyprus Czech Republic Estonia Denmark Finland France Germany
Greece Hungary Iceland Ireland Italy Japan Latvia Lithuania Luxembourg Malta
Netherlands New Zealand Norway Poland Portugal Romania Slovakia Slovenia Spain
Sweden Switzerland Turkey and United Kingdom.
Instructions to register for 1 yr free unlimited HD calls encrypted
immediately will be sent to each donor. Select your user name, email
address for updates, country you are from, accept friends only terms. All above
can start using VOVIE HD Calls on Windows 7-8-10 devices in December and
Windows/Android, Calls & Text in January, while we work on Apple's store APP &
all goals reached. Check our goals!
What are the Risks:
Our team is confident, has the technical expertise, has tested VOVIE encrypted HD Calls worldwide, and are committed to delivering every VOVIE goal funded. Yes, there are risks
in all investments, including crowdfunding. We have successfully delivered new
technologies for over 30 years. We are using Windows HD Call VPN daily for team conferencing. Our
Windows features are well tested over 2/3/4G, Wifi, Satellites, Wire, Radio,
& Bluetooth. All VOVIE code has already been ported to Android & Apple except AV Codecs. Our audio is up on Android. We have to add our video codec to Android, Audio & Video codecs to Apple, improve our user interface (GUI) and improve our software to support thousands of
users to accomplish all goals. This is certainly a challenge but one we have the collective experience and desire to overcome.

story:
is your data safe in the cloud?
Most cloud storage providers, such as Dropbox, Google Drive, supports data encryption (storing and transferring). However, the encryption protocol is not as secure as we expected and cloud providers can read our data anytime. That's why Edward Snowden discourages Dropbox and Dropbox Head also suggests us to do encryption ourselves.

Furthermore, from January to June 2014, Google alone received 31,698  government requests for information affecting 48,615 user accounts. In 2014, Dropbox received 275 government requests. Beside that, Snowden unveils NSA and state-level spy programs in which tells that anyone can be watched by government because of their present on the cloud. 

what's safebox
SafeBox is a client-side encryption for popular cloud storage providers. It ensures that your data is encrypted before persist on your device, transfer to cloud storage, and sync to other devices. Encryption key is your and do not share with anyone, even us. 
At this time, it supports Dropbox and Google Drive. We are working to add more cloud storage providers. It supports Android OS. We plan to support iOS, Windows, Mac OS.
SafeBox for Android download: Google Play
 how safebox protects your data

In short, you keep the key. We use proven cryptography algorithms with your key to encrypt your data before leaving your device. You should provide your key before decrypt your data, even on your device.


Checkout this page for more information about algorithms we use.


safebox features


where we are
who we are

SafeBox is brought to you by AntTek. AntTek is an app studio located in Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam. We have served over 30 millions download worldwide. Visit http://www.anttek.com for more information.

why we need you

With your help, SafeBox supports more features. Please see our fund distribution below.

story:
LV8 ∞ Consciousness EVOLution: Rise & Vibe ∞

You certainly have experienced at least glimpses of intuition; we all have. That's part of what attracted you here right now. The level of attention we assign to such glimpses determines our connected awareness...our consciousness. 

We each inherently possess the ability to become more in-tune, or aligned, with our authentic self. With any aspect of life – fitness, nutrition, education, career, communication & relationships – growth and improvement arrive as a result of the right kinds of consistent choices and practices. Which actions are we currently consistently choosing each day that reinforce our state of life & belief systems so far?

How are we limiting ourselves, in ways which we are often not even fully aware? Until we seize the reins in our own life – diving deeper in order to understand and consciously shape the direction of what we are creating (and dismiss the pervasive distractions) – we can only continue to be as fulfilled, sincerely happy, and authentically abundant as we have come to be today. 

Until now, no single source of signposts and streetlights have been available to guide the way along the spiritual awakening journey. There are indeed some enlightened elements in books or videos; but, the type of direction we seek (and are conditioned toward gaining through traditional learning processes) prevails as the missing key. When we’re lost and struggling in the dark, we seek assistance...we need to be able to gain that assistance from a trusted source and process.

For the same types of reasons that some find comfort and solace in church organizations, this series of tools and insights intends to offer a type of structured guidance. In this case, with some profound distinctions: everything provided here guides and nurtures growth, encourages you to check how it feels for you against your own internal intuition, prompts you to question often in order to learn more profoundly, and all occurs without demands of eternal allegiance or a hierarchy of intermediaries. 

True growth – not worship, not limitations or qualifications or pledges of loyalty, nor imposing fears of being ostracized – is cultivated through self-development toward conscious awakening. Such self-development is a process filled with questions, which requires authentic support that is not attached to any alternate agenda.

In other words, rather than worship, we promote and support a connection: your own relationship with Higher Wisdom. Without structural hierarchies, we offer illumination and direction that each tribe member can use to aid themselves along the path of their personal journey.

In truth, every instance through which one of us improves does create ripples from that elevation which then serve to enhance the climate for all. It is in everyone’s best interest to cultivate self improvement; thus, elevating conditions both individually and collectively.

This campaign focuses on creating a proprietary sacred space where that dedicated guidance for improvement can occur ongoing. As a proof of concept, a social media group/tribe – organically attracting over 500 members in just 2 months – verifies the need and demand (find the group link at the end of this message) for input via a similar sanctuary. Our active tribe members want more.

Of course, creating and providing more requires dedicated resources: time, tools, and funding. The aim is to preserve the level of quality provided already, and continue to be in a position to augment the top priority capabilities.

My Part…?

As a seasoned business professional (an MBA with more than 25 years of real world experience, I grow businesses in market-leading countries all over the world...and have been doing this for almost 2 decades), I see the impact of good – as well as various manufactured distractions – day in and day out. Through the years, it has become increasingly clear why it is essential to leave a legacy that can uplift and empower us all. You and I, together, can cut through most of those distractions with this endeavor: tending to the many blossoming lotus buds in search of sunlight.

Extensive development experience has convinced me that many (or most) of us want to leave a positive legacy; but – at the moment – some may feel relatively powerless against the weight of our chosen life responsibilities and other obligations. This is a chance, now, to make an enormous difference...for each person directly reached by this message: with ripples extending far beyond.

Since business has been a proven career vehicle, management of a pending Member Site (and/or other related tools for guidance) will be professionally accomplished. As a Backer here, you can feel confident about the level of quality and caliber of results that your investment will beautifully contribute toward. Further – energetically:  as a Healer, an Empath, and an Intuitive Coach – I understand the types of high vibe resources and tools that can resonate for optimal flow for our tribe members...to uplift, elevate, and inspire.

Faith and spirituality have been paramount throughout my entire journey so far. After all, that yearning we all feel for more (at one point or another) comes from our soulful desire to express our authentic self and develop even more fully from the core of our spiritual nature. We are each, indeed, spiritual beings having a human experience.

So, it has become profoundly clear that any differences we tend to perceive typically come merely from distinctions in language and concepts. Through understanding, and ego release, we bridge these gaps easily and readily. Our experiences, understanding, and awareness intend to prepare us for even more significant roles and contributions through which we will serve the greater good.

Why Here…& Now?

Any of us who have been paying attention can see that the level and frequency of crisis incidents has been escalating in recent months and years. The fear quotient is rising, and media coverage plays upon that to exacerbate its influence too. We need better solutions, perpetuating growth.

Ultimately, one such solution arises as a result of profoundly shifting our focus. The process of shedding ego and reactive behaviors may be gradual; yet, even beginning to catalyze more of that awareness boosts benefits. Change and improvement begins with each of us: right now, today.

While maintaining consistent practice for growth is indeed up to each of us, the signposts and support (i.e. providing direction, with guidance) are now already available on a small scale via the LV8 ∞ Tribe. The goal of this campaign intends to increase their range and impact. This clear series of processes will: (1) light the way, (2) accelerate growth, and (3) improve circumstances on an individual level, plus with much wider-reaching reverberation.

Magnitude of Impact - Contagious Uplift!

Those of us who have been paying attention to the state of the world know that something must change. This solution can only come from transformation that begins on a personal, individual basis: a collective positive EVOLution rather than the tearing down of destructive "revolutions."

We know that a concept as simple (with implementation as equally complex) as being able to self-identify our own personal orientation toward love versus fear – about a topic or decision – can make all of the difference in the approach we embrace, and the outcomes that follow. This outlook we each embrace goes on to impact our personal relationships, self confidence, career mobility, family dynamics, finances, health & wellbeing: it truly impacts everything.

By each of us starting with our self – nurturing growth, and seeing from a balanced perspective of awareness – we cultivate the capacity for broader-reaching improvements. When the value of consciousness is more widely revealed & embraced, enhancements can occur at every level.

LV8 ∞ What You Get to Access & Gain ∞

Funds contributed go toward the specifically designated Perk (i.e. if you choose a Retreat, that must be also funded first; then, an allocation from that will contribute to the main goal here as well) or Perks, with the top priority – overarching goal – being a Member Site (or similar delivery vehicle and global online community hub) as the dedicated site circulating resources and tools to guide the growth journey. Research tells us that our minimum listed goal amount will get us started with a baseline range of capabilities. Funds received beyond the listed minimum can enable us to provide a more robust range of offerings, with broader integration of value-adds.

The Sanctuary for our tribe will ultimately graduate into a subscription service platform, enabling ongoing continuity and reach: a protected proprietary hub for tools, resources, and community. We hold a clear vision for how to maintain the level of care that the tribe member levels request accordingly, and we will be consistently looking at feedback and input to sustain that direction.

It is also important to emphasize that – because each journey is unique, rooted in individualized experiences and vantage points – our aim is to provide levels of support that are fully congruent according to the levels of subscription and services offered. You will find some augmentations highlighted in the Perks to showcase starting points; we will scale with others, as per demand.

In order to provide a nurturing level of quality and care from the start, the extent of available support will be a component factored into launch costs based upon funding. Depending upon the volume of subscriptions following the first live month of launch, we will determine and allocate support types and volumes accordingly in subsequent months and years.

Having worked with a range of influential tech companies over the past decade and a half, as well as earning awards from Motorola and other top global brands prior, the aim is to bring confidence and peace of mind to all Backers regarding effective implementation of this passion project. By showing proof of concept and viability with my own skin in the game first (investing ability & time via an initial tribe: https://www.facebook.com/groups/LV8.RiseVibeContinuum/), you can transparently see how both the demand – and need – for such a solution persists right now.

If you’re reading, and as excited about this as we are, but find yourself without ample financial resources to be a Backer today: be sure to offer support by sharing this campaign as widely as you can. Talk it up with your friends, share it daily in social media, and put the powerful intention force of your energy behind creating additional possibilities that will manifest toward abundance.

See the value & have the means? Choose your Backer Perk right now: secure your access to LV8 ∞ Rise & Vibe Tribe…and the Consciousness EVOLution for Contagious Uplift!
