We hold a clear vision for how to maintain the level of care that the tribe member levels request accordingly, and we will be consistently looking at feedback and input to sustain that direction.It is also important to emphasize that – because each journey is unique, rooted in individualized experiences and vantage points – our aim is to provide levels of support that are fully congruent according to the levels of subscription and services offered. You will find some augmentations highlighted in the Perks to showcase starting points; we will scale with others, as per demand.In order to provide a nurturing level of quality and care from the start, the extent of available support will be a component factored into launch costs based upon funding. Depending upon the volume of subscriptions following the first live month of launch, we will determine and allocate support types and volumes accordingly in subsequent months and years.Having worked with a range of influential tech companies over the past decade and a half, as well as earning awards from Motorola and other top global brands prior, the aim is to bring confidence and peace of mind to all Backers regarding effective implementation of this passion project. By showing proof of concept and viability with my own skin in the game first (investing ability & time via an initial tribe: https://www.facebook.com/groups/LV8.RiseVibeContinuum/), you can transparently see how both the demand – and need – for such a solution persists right now.If you’re reading, and as excited about this as we are, but find yourself without ample financial resources to be a Backer today: be sure to offer support by sharing this campaign as widely as you can. Talk it up with your friends, share it daily in social media, and put the powerful intention force of your energy behind creating additional possibilities that will manifest toward abundance.See the value & have the means? Choose your Backer Perk right now: secure your access to LV8 ∞ Rise & Vibe Tribe…and the Consciousness EVOLution for Contagious Uplift!

story:
Learn Mobile Entrepreneurship

Never hesitate to encash an idea, how is this possible?

1 idea, That's all it takes

plan, propose, share & encash with VCUME

 

We need to ask our-self which was the last idea that we wanted to try but kept it aside, due to lack of resources or knowledge or experience. Wouldn't it be great to turn any idea or a dream into reality or encash the thought with a smart phone? and if its worth a million dollars, well, that's why we need VCUME, the mobile application.

 

Introducing The idea Incubator

Turn a simple idea into a business vision like a pro, by just proposing & following 6 stages of transformation guided by Artificial intelligence on VCUME.  Learn to build key relations needed to become a successful Mobile Entrepreneur.

 
Visionaries Paradise
  • Build a business with just an idea and leave the rest to our future technology
  • Store dreams and Ideas and choose to built them at convenience assisted by our advanced programming logic
  • Trade & encash less unique ideas every day to gain additional sources of income on the go
  • Shape any idea into a concept or reality with step by step guidance 
  • Self engage on the mobile application to experience  mobile Entrepreneurship
 

Professionals Benefit

  • Earn @ease even while at vacation
  • Sign up for instajobs for participating in live projects
  • Unlock new streams of revenue generation with the help of Artificial intelligence
  • Gain cost effective business intelligence for your self owned or small & medium businesses

Become a part of millennial lifestyle  of unlocking new streams of revenue

  • Additional revenue programs
  • Learn to reap benefits of technology
  • Experience the future of idea mining 
  • Gain great benefits on integration of block chain in the near future

 

What We seek 

Currently we are sitting behind our laptops coding and designing, we are growing team in keenly  in lookout for supporters & visionaries who love to try our mobile application. We would like to invite you to be our first lucky million subscribers, our impact investors & empowering co-founders.  

  • Our team involves technocrats and subject matter experts who spends hours and hours of coding to build a error free product
  • We have great perks to share with you to endure us to progress and deliver your our unique mobile application
  • The funds would be utilized for development and deployment for inviting our supporters to try first hand 

Advanced user functionalities

VCUME intends to revolutionize the experience of Entrepreneurship & employment by various participation programs for professionals with limited time to spare:

  • Based on the convenience of the user, the revenue generation programs can be customized
  • Point out your successful track record of ideas & concepts
  • Make it real for interested supporters and build trust for a great buddies

 

Our Timeline

We value our milestones and intend to cater to 1 million visionaries to transform into mobile Entrepreneurs  in the very first year of launch. Every hurdle and challenge to be faced involves time, resources and skill hence we intend to fuel ourselves by inviting every individual with an idea to sign up and prebook our mobile application.

In the near future,  integrating block chain technology keeps the unique startup ecosystem out of market fluctuations or economic changes bettering the interests of the users.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • You could try annual membership which wouldn't cost you more than couple of dollars, all it takes is one idea to make a million dollars
  • And word spread is one way to support, or maybe a post on your favorite social media would keep us going
  • Juice is worth the squeeze, don't forget to signup

 

And that's the lot about it.

Our product website - www.vcume,com

story:
The VAIO S11 will be coming to the US market in December 2018.  As a special offer for Indiegogo users only, we are offering a limited number of pre-sale “Support Now, Buy Later” coupons.  The coupons can be used on the VAIO website to purchase the S11  for up to $300 off the regular price.

The S11 will be sold in three configurations starting from an Intel Core i5 base model up through an Intel Core i7, 16 GB memory, 1Tb PCIe SSD storage model.  The VAIO S11 features the latest Intel 8th generation quad-core processor (usually found in 13-inch and above models) and Windows 10 Pro.  The chassis is constructed with carbon fiber making this laptop extremely durable and light at only 1.85 lbs. The VAIO S11 comes standard with VAIO TruePerformance which extends Intel's Turbo Boost Technology to help you be more productive. This VAIO also includes a full range of ports making it the ideal business use laptop. 

These are just some of the stand out features. Continue reading below to see everything the new VAIO S11 has to offer.

 


The VAIO S11 is the definition of mobility. Produced with carbon and aluminum, and weighing only 1.85 lbs, the new VAIO S11 was made to accompany you at all times.
 

 


Intel CPUs, such as the Core i7 adopted by VAIO, have "Intel® Turbo Boost Technology 2.0" installed, which enhances performance at peak usage. However, the period during which maximum performance can be maintained is limited by power consumption and temperature, and the performance will degrade. "VAIO TruePerformance" is technology designed to maintain higher performance for a longer period of time by increasing CPU power limits and more efficiently eliminating heat.
 


 

 

 


With the fingerprint reader in conjunction with Windows Hello there is no need to enter your password every time to log in. Access your VAIO S11 quickly and safely with a simple touch.
 


 


Equipped to provide the best connections everywhere. The VAIO S11 features 3 high-speed USB 3.0 ports, has card reader, Bluetooth 4.1 and Wi-Fi 802.11 a / b / g / n / ac input that is three times faster than the previous generation. In addition you can connect up to two monitors simultaneously, thanks to the two HDMI and VGA inputs, ensuring practicality to your day to day.

It also has a USB 3.0 Charge port for faster device loading, even when your VAIO is in idle or off mode.
 

 

 


The VAIO S11 is extremely secure and fast thanks to high-speed storage - 256GB SSD, which is six times faster than a conventional hard drive, speeding up your boot and load time so you have more time for what you really have it matters.

 

 


Built to withstand the intense labor that comes with on-the-go work demands. The molded carbon and aluminum casing ensures robustness and impact resistance.
 

 


VAIO S11 is changing the rules on productivity, when the computer screen is open the keyboard is automatically tilted, reducing stress on the wrist.

 

 


To guarantee precision and maintain exacting standards, every new VAIO S is completed at VAIO headquarters in Nagano, Japan

story:
Short Summary

If you do not work in theatre, you may not know much about stage management. Your experience may be attending shows and being wowed by the performance, the lights, the staging, the soundscape and the story. But have you ever wondered how it all happens?  We all know about the director and the actors, but for the most part we don’t stop to think about the people behind the scenes that make it all happen, and that is how it should be. If you as an audience member were sitting there thinking about the lighting operator pushing buttons or the crew shifting scenery, then we as stage professionals have failed to create magic.

Having said that, for the purpose of this campaign I need to fill you in on some behind the scenes secrets. The stage manager on the book has one of the most important roles in the production of theatre. The prompt book is the version of the script that the show is run from. From the very beginning the “stage manager on the book” or DSM (Deputy Stage Manager)/PSM (Production Stage Manager) is responsible for circulating all the information each department needs throughout the rehearsal process. They sit in rehearsals and take down the actors’ movements as directed, called blocking. They take line notes to disseminate to the actors so that they may be word perfect. They track scene changes, props, write down cues for lighting and sound, and all other technical aspects, and they even sometimes make the coffee and sweep the rehearsal room floor!

DSM/PSMs are the first to arrive and the last to leave meaning their days often last 14 hours or more in a 6-day week. They don’t get breaks, and through it all they smile. Once the show moves out of the rehearsal room to the stage, the stage manager on the book is in charge of cueing all the technical aspects of the show. They have to practice to get the timings right to create the director’s vision.  Calling a show is an art form.

Until now, all this note taking and paperwork has been done by hand with ring-binders, reams of paper, pencils, erasers, late nights, and lots of caffeine.  For years stage managers have discussed the dream of creating their books digitally. They already use laptops in rehearsal to write lists and reports, and send emails, but the prompt book is still done by hand. Some of the younger stage managers are desperate to make the shift to digital prompt books and are using between 6 – 8 apps to achieve this; apps that are not designed specifically for theatre.

BlockIt will achieve everything in one app with the ability to disseminate information to the production team and acting company. 

The beauty of BlockIt is that it is not just for show! It is a highly sophisticated notation tool allowing the user to upload and notate on any document, allocate tasks, and share information.  I see it being used by students, educators, filmmakers, and event managers. But that is just the tip of the iceberg. It will have features that anyone can use and enjoy.

 

BlockIt Features

  • Ability to upload scripts from PDF 
  • Add pages for line updates (eg. p25a)
  • Add page tabs
  • Upload musical scores
  • Upload and edit ground plans
  • Format the book from template or create your own
  • Add a cast list
  • Add in contact information for your company members that links to your address book
  • Color Code your actors for blocking and line notes
  • Block the show on the ground plan
  • Easily editable
  • Option to notate blocking with shorthand using a “hidden” page behind the ground plan
  • “Draw/write” anywhere on the book
  • Add furniture from pop up menu of templates
  • Select items on the ground plan and shift or edit them
  • Chose spike colors for each scene 
  • Notate furniture movements the same as actor movements
  • Take Line Notes on a “hidden” page opposite the script
  • Highlight line infractions
  • Email or print line notes
  • Write in cues from pop up menu or manually
  • Write and email rehearsal and show reports
  • Save the book as a calling script (CallIt), where the extraneous information is hidden, leaving a clean prompt copy which can be used offline in show mode
  • "Show mode" will have the option of white text on a black background to reduce the glare from the screen
  • Download and print the Book

 

What Others are Saying

"As an instructor of theatre I try to keep my students abreast of the new technology that is constantly making theatre easier and more streamlined. Theatre technology advances so quickly it is almost difficult to keep up. Every area, that is, except stage management. I have been warning my students for many years to be on the lookout for a computer based option for stage management, but it simply hasn't come. BlockIt is exactly what I've been waiting for. The ability to keep a digital prompt book will not only bring stage management into the 21st century, but it will allow my students to work in a format that is common and understandable. My methods of teaching stage management have left the old ways of taking notes with a pencil, contacting people through snail mail, and sharing information via pigeon holes and have turned to digital document formatting, what font to use when typing notes, and how to compose an email, but the prompt book has remained the same; a format my students simply don't work with anymore. BlockIt will provide the necessary tools that my students need when learning to stage manage such as working with a PDF script, taking down blocking, and inserting cues, and all of this in a digital format. All of this helps to eliminate the tons of paper that a stage manager usually has to deal with, and shrinks the traditional three-ring binder down to the size of a laptop."

Jonathan Wehmeyer, Instructor of Theatre, Southwest Baptist University, MO

 

"My rehearsal and tech tables are always a mess. Between the necessary supplies actors need PLUS at least 3 binders full of stage management paperwork, there's barely room for any of it to sit in an organized fashion. An app like BlockIt would not only cut the clutter in my workspace, it would streamline my process. Information would be easily shareable with designers, actors, understudies--anyone who needed them. As we move further into the digital age, apps like this are necessary. I look forward to seeing how it improves my process."

Jen Nelson Lane, AEA Stage Manager, Adjunct Professor University of Montevallo.

 

“Putting together a book is part labour of love, and part really hard work! It is a stage manager's (or DSM's) bible, not just for the show, but for the entire production. BlockIt! presents an opportunity to collate all that information into a laptop rather than bulky lever arch files (yes, often more than one!), while retaining the ability to make changes at the touch of a button - regardless of the actor who just stole your last pen...”

Sarah Lavelle, Freelance Stage Manager, England

 

"If /when you were required to take over a show or provide show cover the electronic prompt copy appears more legible and accessible."

Gail Pallin. Stage Management Lecturer, Scotland

 

“An electronic prompt copy can be a great way of saving time and effort, freeing you up to focus on the human aspect of stage managing, as well as giving you a clean copy for teaching and archive purposes.”

Calum Wylie, Stage Manager, London’s West End

 

What We Need & What You Get

Sadly software development does not come cheap and with BlockIt being quite a complex program, I want to hire the best developers I can to create the best product. 

  • Development will cost $14,000. This will achieve a prototype for Beta testing.
  • Web hosting, maintenance, monitoring, backups $1000  
  • Marketing $3000
  • Legal $2000

 

Perks

As a start up with no product to sell as yet, the perks are small but heartfelt; your name listed on our web page with our thanks, BlockIt thumb drives, BlockIt T-shirts, and BlockIt Totes as well as an opportunity to take part in the Beta testing.

If the entire goal is not met in this campaign, I will use the funds as proof of support to secure a business loan to get BlockIt off the ground.

 

The Impact

By contributing you will be helping BlockIt come to life. You will be providing the theatre industry with a much-needed technological boost and making a lot of stage managers very happy. A happy stage manager means a cleaner, more beautiful performance.

 

Risks & Challenges

I do not expect the build and launch of this app to be easy, but I have a lot of support from friends, family and other stage managers. I have also a great development team eager and waiting to get started who not only build the product, but host it, maintain it and update it.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute but would like to help, there are several ways you can do this.

  • Share this page with your friends and families and on social media.
  • Follow our progress on Facebook  and Twitter, and share our posts.
  • Take part in the 20 for $20,000 Social Media campaign.  Form a kick line and video yourself and your friends doing 20 kicks for $20,000. But remember to let everyone know why you are doing it and direct them to our Indiegogo Campaign page.

story:
What is the Nomatik App?

Nomatik is an app that enables freelancers to find and share projects.  If you need a project or have a project, open up Nomatik at your favorite coffee shop, hotel lobby, or coworking space and find collaboration opportunities.  Geo-location + Work Tags+ Messaging = Mutual Support.  Unlock free coworking wherever you are.

Nomatik was created by the folks at Conjunctured Coworking.  Conjunctured was the first coworking space to open in Austin, Texas, in 2008, and we had a great 6-year run in a small Victorian house in East Austin.  We now want to extend the coworking experience to more people in more places. 

Features  

  • Cowork Anywhere: Check in and turn your favorite coffee shop into a coworking hotspot.  Invite others to cowork with you at your table.  
  • Messaging: Let others know where you are, what you are working on, and what you are looking for.
  • Project Board: Post a gig or search for a gig.
  • Tribes: Join or create a tribe around your work and/or passion. 



The Journey

Over the past year we have been building momentum for Nomatik.  Last year we submitted an entry for the MIX (Management Innovation Exchange) Prize for new ideas in how to enhance Human Potential.  The MIX prize was sponsored by SAP, and the entry was rather ambitious. Luckily we were chosen as one of the winners of the prize, for which we were included in a Design Thinking workshop at SAP in September.  The purpose of the workshop was to help us work through the original vision for Nomatik and turn it into a viable platform.  We went through several iterations of what we wanted Nomatik to be.

Our first mock-up in the MIX application:


Our second idea incorporated Seats2Meet’s Serendipity Machine:

 
A brief video of our SAP experience:
            
 




The Technology

This is where we need support.  We have a development team ready to help us build out the platform beyond the mock-up and basic functionality stage.  Nomatik will be open source, as we want users to run with it and add features and tools that work for them.  At the end of the day this isn't about the technology.  The platform is merely a way to get people coworking and co-creating together, and the app will be a success when it more or less ‘gets out of the way.’  But we want to get it right from the beginning!

story:
When will there
be 1Billion Apps?

MobileAppsPost.com is a collaboration of three family members believing we can accomplish something great together.  We started working on a local small advertising project together and the ideas and visions flowed and grew. Our research revealed that there are hundreds of thousands of apps which are unknown. We think there will be millions of unknown Applications in the next few years. MobileAppsPost.com (M.A.P.) offers all app owners and developers, from the unknown to the most popular, a platform to expose their apps. 

Our female lead company is driven to progressively develop an affordable and practical means for all other professionals to advertise and gain the exposure and information they need to succeed with any Application. Your contributions will allow us to continue developing our site. We will continue to improve research which allows us to implement ideas and our users suggestions.  It will allow us to be the leader in everything apps.

Apps are from Earth!

When each and every User visits Mobileappspost.com, we want them to experience the best apps and tech information site available. Reaching our campaign goal of $72k puts us further in the realm of being the best site for apps statistical and tech information.

New, innovative and exciting programming will be implemented. Users will be able to share the apps which are exciting and useful to them with other users on a social platform. Users will be able to share what they like or don’t like about their apps, rate apps and view apps before they download them.  With so many apps becoming practical, entertaining and useful throughout the world, Mobileappspost.com will be the app database for all things Apps!

Sure, anyone can just get their apps from the existing platforms.  But Mobileappspost.com will continue to offer so much more than a place to download apps.

Users will experience much more than what's "Trending" and "Free". Users can search the M.A.P. app directory for any and every want or need they may have for app information. Developers and Owners can promote and advertise their apps. The M.A.P. "Interchange", located on the right side of each page, for every category, can be used to expose apps which are unknown, new or needing promotion. Popular brand apps have the exposure of a huge billboard area on the front page.  

Users will be able to learn how to use their apps and get new downloads/updates for them.  Users, from individuals to gigantic corporations, will be able to find fun, informative and useful statistical information about apps which will multiply and increase over time. They will be engaged with information about apps pertaining to their geographical areas, professions, sports, devices, cultures, hobbies, interests, and much more. 

Users will be able to find the latest tech news about their apps and devices interest. Users will be able to purchase iTunes, Android and all apps on other platforms.  Users will be able to purchase devices from our Amazon, Wal-Mart, BestBuy and other affiliates.

Want or have a need for your own app? Mobile Apps Post will have competent developers to help you create and launch your ideal apps.

That's so right!  If it pertains to or involves apps, MobileAppsPost.com will be the M.A.P. to find it, do it, learn about it, try it, talk about it and get it.


What you are helping to create.

Mobileappspost.com will be "THE" social media and news site for all apps on Earth. You will be an indispensable and essential factor in promoting M.A.P.'s success. All Indiegogo campaign funds will be used to:

- Create and launch a more professional informational video.

- Fund development of our "MapApp".

- Fund programming for implementing Users features (social media interaction, statistics, instructional, etc.).

- Fund employing writer(s), branding, researchers and social media managers.

- Fund programming, marketing, developing, improving and maintaining site.

- Fund other dynamic and awesome events and user experiences which need to be kept undisclosed until they can be launched on site.

- Fund advertising for M.A.P.

- Provide promotional items and events for M.A.P.

We sincerely appreciate your Contributions!

Our appreciation will be endless for every act and effort given on M.A.P.s behalf. Your Contributions will surely make this female principle owned business a complete success! Please mention us positively on all your social media sites.  Sign up for a free 100% no obligation account. Ask everyone you know who develops or owns apps to sign up and receive 30 days free no obligation advertising for their apps.  Whatever you can do that is tasteful, respectable and complimentary to help M.A.P. reach all of its goals will be received with overwhelming gratitude. 

Investors Welcomed.

Investors are welcomed to send their inquiries and proposals to; customerservice@mobileappspost.com.  

Your Perks are our pleasure !

Perks will be distributed shortly after our campaign ends. All Perks are expected to be completely delivered between April 9 and April 18, 2015. No delay is anticipated but if there is, notification and details will be updated on Indiegogo. We will ensure that any delay is promptly completed.  A history* page will be created on M.A.P.'s website and social media pages. Also, a historical plaque will be purchased to commemorate M.A.P.'s success on Indiegogo.  All contributors will be listed with sincere and immeasurable gratitude.

story:
Producktiv

At Producktiv, we are developing user-friendly productivity software that works like a fitness tracker for your work day. 

We leverage research on workplace efficiency and human behavior, as well as peer accountability, to make your computer-based work time up to 20% more efficient.

That's like having an extra day each week. Think about what it would be worth to you if you could get everything done in up to 20% less time?

Because right now, our team has a beautiful working prototype of an easy-to-use app that is designed to do exactly that.

Our mission is to create a world where everyone is empowered to do their best work, get more done in less time, and have fun doing it

Existing productivity apps help you block websites, make lists, or manually enter in everything you’re doing so the app can summarize it back to you;

Producktiv is different because it automatically tracks your activities, provides reports to tell you stuff like how many hours you spent on email last week, and actually tells you what to do differently to maximize your productivity-- stuff like “9:00 AM is your most productive hour of the day, so maybe don’t schedule meetings then...”

The other thing it does is let you share your scores with friends, team members, or collaborators so you can get the motivation of social rewards, accountability, and friendly competition when you want it, or switch all that off and keep everything private if that works better for you.

When you fire up the Producktiv app, your dashboard gives you a quick view of your productivity score, most productive times of day, break-downs of your activity (by day, week, month, or quarter)- or you can tab through to see what your connections are doing:

Features

1) The application monitors productivity and measures the time you spent on all applications on your computer allowing you to see where you are wasting time and when you are performing at peak efficiency.
2) Producktiv uses our proprietary algorithm to provide you with a producktivity score based on how you spent on your day. This score is customizable based on the specific activities that are most important to your work.
3) The application will utilize these data and proprietary analytics to allow users to turn data into insights so that users can see not only what they are doing, but how to improve their workday and make themselves more efficient. 
4) The application will provide positive messaging, rewards, and/or badges for performing well to provide you with a positive feedback-loop to continue to reach your goals (coming soon).
5) The application will leverage opt-in social accountability so you can share your performance with peers, colleagues, and co-workers when you want to motivate each other or spark friendly competition; you can also keep everything private when that works better for you (coming soon; privacy is always the default for new users).

 

What all this means is that Producktiv can give you back up to 8 hours each week at very low cost-- for most of us that’s better than a 100X ROI-- for some of us it's a lot better...

More importantly, when you add up that extra time - it can mean you make it to the gym more often, finish that project you never get to work on, or make it home for dinner every night

 

Why Us?

1) Producktiv's proprietary algorithm and unique design make the app smarter, easier, and more customizable than existing tools.
2) Unlike existing website blockers and employee monitoring software (which are designed to constrain user autonomy), Productive puts you in the driver’s seat. Our customers want to crush it at work, and we build tools that empower them to create an optimal balance between work, meetings, relaxation breaks, physical activity, and life outside of work. This commitment to user autonomy is designed to make Productiv rewarding and enjoyable to use, while enabling improvements that help your whole team.
3) Producktiv will be designed to have customizable sharing (controlled by you) so that users can leverage transparency and accountability across teams, projects, and networks in the way that works best for them (coming soon). This makes Producktiv more social than existing solutions, while protecting privacy when you need it.
4) We have a team of talented individuals who understand the need for a product that helps top performers get better; we are driven to continuously identify new ways to improve our product, better serve our users, and deliver massive value while recognizing that many of the most productive people take regular breaks, connect with others, and actually love what they do.

The Impact

As a donor to Producktiv, you will be helping a team of entrepreneurial students and faculty from University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill fulfill our goal of helping as many people as possible get more done in less time, and have more fun doing it. We truly believe Producktiv is a tool that can improve work-life balance and allow people to have more time to do do their best work and live their best lives, by creating an extra day in the week.

In addition, we are currently pursuing partnerships with organizations that deliver safe water to communities in need, freeing up households to spend less time carrying water and more time on school, work, and life, so they can create an extra day in their weeks as well. This means your support can benefit you, your team at work, and populations in need of accessible safe water.

Check us out:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/producktiv/

 

Disclaimers:

1. Producktiv is currently a working prototype with many of the above features, and we are in the process of building the remaining features (those labeled "coming soon").

2. We are launching this campaign to seek your support to build and optimize the remaining features, because we think these will be amazing!

3. We will work in good faith to deliver all of the above features as soon as possible after the completion of our campaign, to the extent feasible based on our fundraising efforts!

4. However, our ability to implement the remaining features described above depends on the success of our fundraising activities, and on the feasibility of proposed feature implementation. If insufficient funds are raised, or if selected implementation goals prove infeasible as specified, it is possible that some features may not be implemented, or may not be implemented precisely as described.

5. Furthermore, the possibility exists that there may be some delays in delivering the anticipated features. In addition, the possibility exists that one or more anticipated features may not be feasible to implement, or may not be feasible to implement in the exact manner described above, regardless of the amount of funding raised.

6. Finally, Producktiv currently exists in a PC version. If sufficient funds are raised, and if sufficient demand exists, versions for Mac and/or other platforms will also be developed. However, in the event of insufficient funds or insufficient demand, it is possible that a Mac version may not be developed, or may not be developed in a timely manner.

7. The ability to deliver Producktiv depends on the cooperation of multiple partners and service providers, including but not limited to app stores, internet service providers, and members of the Producktiv team. In the unlikely event that any of these partners and service providers are unable or unwilling to facilitate our proposed development activities, this may delay or even prevent the delivery of Producktiv.

8. Other unforeseen events or challenges may prevent us from delivering Producktiv to you in a timely manner. We do not anticipate any of these problems or issues, and will act in good faith to deliver an amazing product to you quickly, even if problems arise. However, we need to make you aware of these risks, so that you can have all the necessary information before deciding whether to back our campaign.

9. If for any reason or no reason, after backing our campaign, you are unsatisfied in any way or wish to request a refund for any reason or no reason, we will make a good-faith effort to provide you with a refund, pending availability of funds. 

Thanks for your support!

story:
Short Summary

We can and currently are beating the big guys at fulfillment, meaning our clients can compete by providing SAME DAY delivery and pick up for e-commerce in Ottawa.  How did I get here?

I studied and worked in the Indigenous justice system for 20 years.  This included government and non-profit work.  I am a comedian and speaker and write for CBC radio.  The next step was OBVIOUSLY to start a delivery and eventual logistics company.  

Perhaps not as obvious :)  See, in 2013 I left  Correctional Service Canada, or some might say I escaped!  Yes boo, bad joke but see, we do what we can to take the efficient but monotonous world of logistics fun!  Yes fun!

Digressing, my husband and I began working for our local Friendship Centre, and unfortunately due to funding cuts we both lost our jobs the same week!  I had just finished gastric bypass surgery (lost 210 lbs, yes you may applaud) and looked at my husband and said "oh dear, we should, do something to make money for ourselves".  

Not only were we unemployed but one of the reasons we left the government was I needed balance to raise our three children adopted from foster care.  We raised them from ages 4,5,6 and anyone who has gone through older child adoption will understand that at work you have to take calls all day from social workers, doctors, teachers, and eventually police officers!  Knowing this, we said "we need to start our own company" and wanted to figure out what we could do that used my management skills and my husband's ability to do what I say!  (kidding, he never does!)  So we had a car, I knew people and poof, we started a business in one day.

We grew, and let me tell you, in four years I feel like I have taken an MBA.  I have learned some key things:

-Remittance is a real thing, do not delay!

-Get an accredited bookkeeper, not one that will embezzle

-Surround yourself with like-minded hustlers figuring life and entrepreneurship for themselves.

So here we are, four years later in the fastest growing industry due to Covid, so why are we here on a platform asking for money?

Good and relevant question, see, we are not here for just us, but because we have built something that can help local businesses compete on a large level with the Big Guys by offering same day fulfillment and delivery at a fair price.  This is why we are here, but read more below, just know that as a person and company our testimonials speak for themselves.  We have worked hard, learned everything the hard way and are now positioned to help others have great success and that's where we need you.  If I was better at business from the beginning I am sure I'd have money to do this myself, but what can I say?  They sure don't teach business skills at while getting one's Bachelor of Human Justice at the University of Regina!  So here we are...

What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for contributions adding to $25,000 to help onboard new businesses to our fulfillment centre.

Wait what?  That's it?  That's not very groundbreaking Jenn...

Ok critical inner voice and "mom", I hear you but keep listening to why IT IS SO GROUNDBREAKING.

1.  Small businesses have been hit HARD this year.  During the first lockdown when Amazon and other Big Box stores had order after order in record-breaking numbers, questions were asked: "why not support local??"  The reply was always "not convenient and not fast".  We have the answer.

2.  Small businesses who want to take the plunge into fulfillment and compete with the Big Guys will have to pay for start up fees.  This is standard.  There are inventory costs, scanning and adding to the warehouse system.  The fees may be from $30-$500 depending on the size of the business.  It may not seem like much, but to them at this time, it is everything.  That is an amount keeping the employer's lights on, internet on and staff on the payroll.  Every.  Penny.  Counts.

3.  We are offering small perks, basically, as money is collected we'll pay it to a small business that you have, individually or a group, sponsored.  You will get a certificate and be part of that business's success.  Yes, we will track and we will share!  Success for them means success for everyone!

4.  We have built the fulfillment centre and had been negotiating with a large partner that didn't pan out, but we believe it is for the best as our passion is supporting local businesses and have a platform that allows them to increase their sales and decrease their work.  They are even making money and having things sent out on their weekends or while sleeping.  It is a simple solution but sometimes, simple works!  Logistics is about NOT overcomplicating things!

The Impact

Bluntly, the impact will be great for small businesses.  Yes, some may be reading and say "hey Jenn, don't you ultimately benefit?".

The answer is yes, if small businesses win so do we.  That's something I can be proud of.  By offering fulfillment at our already great rates we further reduce delivery charges and they are able to do more with less and that's a win.  We would love to start 200 new people tomorrow, but onboarding them would take a long time and cashflow that they or we don't have.  So let's work together and support a goal of 250 small businesses minimum in 45 days!!

Risks & Challenges

There are always risks, covid may end and shopping habits may change; however, online shopping has only increased every year, and so to has the demand for NOW and we can offer the NOW for all small businesses, seven day as week.

The risks are also minimized by an amazing team at Gopher It Deliveries, a passion for justice (in this case for small businesses, some who have been forced to shut down twice while large box stores stay open) and a true belief that we are making a difference.  At Christmas when we delivered package after package making people happy we KNEW we had to do more and here we are.  There are risks but they are carefully mitigated by years of mistakes and fixing those mistakes and surrounding ourselves with the best team possible!

Other Ways You Can Help

While we will have perks and rewards, but in this covid economy we know not everyone will be able to contribute, but if you can go out and support a local business today, any of them, you are part of the solution.  We are just a mechanism to make life easier for small businesses, but it's you, I and everyone as consumers who can keep small business alive through daily shopping habits!

story:
Olelow Came From Hawaii 

Olelow came from the Hawaiian word Olelo which means "to estimate" then we added the letter 'w' from the word "Work".  Hence, Olelow means "to estimate work".

 Olelow Understands English

It uses natural language processing to read and breakdown even very large specifications written in English.  It then counts the needed code blocks to implement each section of the specification to come up with an accurate estimate.

 

Olelow Doesn't Get Tired 

Olelow doesn't mind if you make it read and analyze dozens of specifications in a day.  It will give you consistent estimate every time.

Even with a work estimation excel template, it takes hours or days to come up with an estimate.  You will need to read the specification and understand it.  It's like doing simulation coding in your mind which is very tiring.  Sooner or later you will miss some details when you get tired analyzing the specification.  Hence, most likely you will underestimate.

 Olelow Learns From Your Previous Projects

You can create or assign reference projects with your actual man-hours used to complete that project.  Olelow will learn from them and will give you an estimate that closely matches your capability.

 

Olelow Can Break It Down 

Olelow doesn't just give you the total man-hours for the entire project, it can break it down for you for each section of project specification.  You can quickly assign each section to each developer and provide them with the budget man-hours for their tasks.

Olelow is Embeddable In Your Website

Olelow can act as your first line of sales representative that can take in client work estimation requests without human intervention.  You can see Olelow actually embedded on our website:  https://www.stableapps.com

  Olelow Protects Your Closely Guarded Ideas

Even Programmers, Administrators and Technical Support Teams don't have access to your specification.  Your specification is encrypted and stored on the server.

Olelow is Created, Maintained and Used By Actual Programmers

We at StableApps, Inc so far have completed two projects successfully all within budget using Olelow.  We have completely put our trust now on Olelow and we have stopped doing manual work estimation.

Olelow Can Help You Earn More

Olelow will help you earn more by providing you with accurate estimates to your clients.  This means less chance of underestimating a project.  This also means less chance of shouldering the additional cost needed to complete a project.

Olelow Can Help You Save Time

It takes hours or days to come up with an estimate doing it manually.  With Olelow, it reads the specification for you and generate an estimate in seconds.  You can do more of the things you love.

Olelow Can Tell You How Much and How long It Would Cost to Develop Your Killer App Ideas 

It's like having your own Programmer Friend that you can trust with your closely guarded ideas.  Let's take for example you're the first one to think of creating LinkedIn.  LinkedIn has 5 founders.  How long do you think it took to get LinkedIn from project concept to project launch?  Olelow says 5 months and 3 weeks.  See the video below how it's done:

 

Olelow Can Make You a Better Programmer

Are you always delayed with your task?  Is it because of lack of skills? Or is it because of not having enough man-hours allocated to your task?  With Olelow, you can quickly get an insight on how many hours it would take to finish your task and then you can negotiate with your project manager to increase the allotted man-hours.

Olelow Can Make You a Better Project Manager

Does your technical team always under estimate the projects you are managing?  Does the blame always fall on you every time your development team is delayed on their tasks?  With Olelow, you have a reliable partner that can give you detailed and accurate estimates on every project assigned to you.

Olelow Can Make You a Better Teacher

As a teacher, have you ever wondered whether you're giving enough time for students to finish the machine problems you give them?  Olelow can give you a consistent basis on how much time you should give your students.

Olelow Can Help You Graduate

As a student, have you ever wondered how much time you should spend working on your thesis or project versus partying?  Olelow can give a student an expert opinion on how much it would take to finish their thesis or project.  This helps them plan how much hours they should dedicate every day or every week working on it.  This will save a lot of students from cramming or worst failing on their thesis or project.

How Can Olelow Deliver Accurate Results?

We used natural language processing combined with our years of software development experience and knowledge of standard software development architecture to come up with our own accurate work estimation algorithm that can take into account previous projects performance.

 

Olelow Decided For Itself How Much Funding It Needs To Launch

Olelow itself is the one who estimated the amount of funding needed to launch.

What We Need

We have already put in $24,000 of our own money to develop the core version of Olelow.  We just need to raise $25,000 more to make it available for everyone to use.  This should cover the cost of the following:

  • Making Olelow Commercial Ready
  • 2 Years Server Cost
  • 2 Years Support Cost 

There will be paid and free subscription of Olelow.  The paid subscription will be priced at very low and reasonable $10 per month and $20 per month.  The free subscription will be via credits with an initial credit allocated to free users. For every new user that a "Free User" successfully invites to use Olelow, the Free User's credit will increase by 1. This is ideal for teachers and students wherein a teacher can invite students to use Olelow so they can get more credits to continue using Olelow for free.

Here are the list of features to be added:

Here is Olelow's project timeline:

What You Will Get

Everyone who will contribute to Olelow will get the following:

  • Your name or username or logo will appear in our Contributor's page that is viewable by everyone in the internet.  The first ones to contribute will appear on top of the list.  As long as Olelow is up and running, your name or logo will appear in that page. (Note:  We reserve the right to request a contributor to change his logo or username or to refund contributions for names, username or logo that may be offensive to other people or that are violating the copyrights of other people or entities.)
  • A free subscription to Olelow that you can use yourself or give it to someone else you know who you think will need it.  It can be your wife, your son or daughter in college, your best friend that is an IT professional or someone you know that have a killer app idea.
  • The ability to vote on which next features and bug fix requests to prioritize next after launching Olelow.
  • Your name will have an icon showing your contributor status on every page where your username will appear.

Here's our sample Contributor's Page (All names and images there are just samples):

What Will Happen If We Don't Reach Our Funding Goal

If we don't reach our funding goal, the funds will still be used to accelerate the development of Olelow. Even without funding, we're still continuously developing Olelow by having one developer working on it full time and me working on my free time.  This current setup works but it will take 9 months to 1 year to get Olelow to market.  We want to scale this up so that we can dedicate 3 developers working full time to deliver it to market in 3 months.

Olelow Guardians

We're a team of 4 passionate programmers in StableApps, Inc.  We've been working together now for more than 2 years.  Together, we have already successfully finished and delivered more than 5 projects.  One project that we did has more than 700,000 lines of codes that is used for back testing options trading strategies.  Our client, IOTA Technologies Pte. Ltd.,  was eventually bought by Gammon Capital mainly because the back testing tool that we help  developed improved Gammon Capital's trading performance last year and second half of 2015.  If you want to read more about IOTA and Gammon Capital, please read this article:  https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/singapore-fintech-invades-wall-street-larry-richards?trk=hb_ntf_MEGAPHONE_ARTICLE_POST

I'm also a stockholder of IOTA Technologies Pte. Ltd. that is duly registered in Singapore. 

Meet The Guardians

ARISTOTLE ISAIS

PROJECT CONCEPTOR AND TECHNICAL ARCHITECT

Has more than 15 years of software development experience in Java desktop and web applications. Project Lead for IOTA's Options Back Testing Desktop Application. Founding member of StableApps.

 

AHMYLOU ISAIS

QA MANAGER

Has more than 12 years of Quality Assurance and Testing experience.  Founding member of StableApps.

 

JEREMIAH PAJARILLO

TECHNICAL LEAD

Has 5 years of software development experience in Java Web and Desktop Applications. Have been with StableApps for more than 2 years.

 

MARICRIS ESGANA

FULL STACK DEVELOPER

Has 7 years of software development experience in Java Web and Desktop Applications. Have been with StableApps for more than 2 years.

Risks & Challenges

The risks we see here is that we might not able to raise the target funds.  This means that it will take longer than 3 months to deliver Olelow to market.  As a solution to this risk, we will also make Olelow open for seed investors that can provide large enough funds that can cover not just development cost but can also cover the big marketing cost and advance features development cost to make Olelow main stream.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you think Olelow will be useful to someone or to the world in general, please share our fund raising campaign to them using Indiegogo sharing tools.  That will greatly help to get the word out about Olelow and hopefully we can reach the target funding needed.

 

Copyright © StableApps Inc. All Rights Reserved. 

Other logos or product and company names mentioned herein are the property of their respective owners.

 

Credits:
Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC 3.0 BY

Music: http://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music

story:
Do anything for angling in one place on

ReelFinatics®...The Anglers Network™

You love fishing.  Admit it, you are always planning your next fishing trip, watching fishing videos, comparing fish pictures, wanting to learn about and buy new tackle and dreaming of the one that got away.  You also find yourself enjoying the connections you've made with other anglers on your social networks.  We know!

How We Got Here:

Ray and Dave, two guys who love to fish

What We Want To Build:

ReelFinatics®,  The Angler’s Network™, will be THE destination where you can 

  • share & view pictures

  • see what people are catching, how  they are catching and buy the tackle with a click

  • find, book and review a charter, guide, lodge or resort - Grand Sol Mar Resort
  • watch cool videos like Fish the Baja - Roosterfish w CaboSurfCaster
  • learn how to tie a fly or the proper knot for any situation

  • keep up on all the angling news 

  • and make new fishing buddies


What We Have & What We Need:
You can join the The Anglers Network™ now at reelfinatics.com.  It contains our guide, charter and lodge directory with camera and sharing capabilities.  ReelFinatics® offers its affiliates unparalleled exposure through our proprietary interactive directory.  What we want to create is a complete Network, in every sense of the word, across all platforms that can preform all these type of tasks:

We need your help to build ReelFinatics2.0.  We've built the foundation for V2.0 but with your help we'll take Reelfinatics to the next level.  In order to make our vision a reality we need to seriously build out the new website, create an iOS app for phone and tablet, an Android app for phone and tablet, compatible apps for SMART TVs and DVD players, apps for STREAMING devices and we need to hire people to help us populate and manage the platforms. 

Our goal, not only build an engaging website and app but a Community, a Network where anglers worldwide can come together.  The time is now for anglers to have an all encompassing Network and you can be part of making The Anglers Network™ a reality.  Buy some cool REELFINATICS® gear in Perks and help build ReelFinatics2.0.  Thank You.


Crowd Funding Campaign Perks

The Anglers Network Intro – Contribute $1

Donate $1 and get three different downloads: 

1) 4  Great Looking Wallpapers

In addition to those Fine Wallpapers get a e-Copy of ” My Surfishing Set Up” Blog by Dave Maynard

…thank you for helping us build The Anglers Network™!


The Anglers Network Wall – Contribute $5

Donate $5 and get your Name on TheAnglersNetwork™ Wall of Fame and receive a Big Thank You! …also receive the Wallpapers above,  “My Surf Fishing Set Up” Blog & a link to “My Ghosting Set Up” E-Book to learn how to set up your tackle , try some technique & land a few Carp on the Fly. 

…thank you for helping us build The Anglers Network™!


ReelFinatics®
Sticker – Contribute $10

Show the World who you are …a Reelfinatic!!! These attractive color stickers look great on your truck & boat and explain to people why you are gone from civilization some much …also why your truck needs washing too! One Size Fits All!

…thank you for helping us build The Anglers Network™!


Overseas Shipping- Contribute $15

We are not sure where you live but know that there are some 100 million PLUS ReelFinatics® around the Globe. So help us if you live outside the U.S.A. to defray the cost of shipping your perks. (Some Countries may be extremely expensive & beyond what makes sense but we will let you know)

…thank you for helping us build The Anglers Network™!

Flip Pallot’s Flippin Stick™ – Contribute $25

Ever just want to release a fish with greater ease, especially those subject to damage by handling? The Flippin’ Stick helps you do just that and can either pull or push hooks loose with minimal effort. Light and durable with a floating handle the Flippin’Stick attaches easily to your retractor for convenient access while catching! Flip Pallot and I are beginning to market this handy tool worldwide soon but you have the chance to get one before the masses!!!

…thank you for helping us build The Anglers Network™!

 

ReelFinatics® Visor- Contribute $25

Not a “hat person” perhaps the ReelFinatics® logo Visor is more your game! One size fits all. This Visor keeps the sun out of your eyes when you are stalking those finned adversaries! 

…thank you for helping us build The Anglers Network™!

ReelFinatics® T-Shirt or Tank Top- Contribute $30

Show your passion with a logoed Reelfinatics® T-Shirt! These heavy duty cotton shirts are available in M,L, XL and are sure to be comfortable! Also Available is a Women’s Tank Top! Styling!

…thank you for helping us build The Anglers Network™

ReelFinatics® Baseball Cap- Contribute $30

ReelFinatics® logo , one size fits all Snapback hat. This hat keeps the sun out of your eyes when you are stalking those finned adversaries!

…thank you for helping us build The Anglers Network™

ReelFinatics® Logo Hoodie- Contribute $55

Heavy Duty ReelFinatics® Logoed Hoodie. Stay warm and styling with this great hoodie that is all the rage in NY, Paris, Chicago and Monument, Colorado!

…thank you for helping us build The Anglers Network™!


ReelFinatics® Micro Fiber Shirt- Contribute $75

RedZone® Apparel moisture wicking shirts are a great addition to any anglers wardrobe. The ReelFinatics® logo on the front & back show other you are a passionate angler while delivering SPF 30 protection! Available in 3 colors, White, Light Blue & Chartreuse in M,L & XL …thank you for helping us build The Anglers Network™!

 

FishPond Native Net –  Contribute $150

Carbon Fiber & Fiberglass composite 

Waterproof/weatherproof & buoyant Clear rubber net bag included–

Black bag sold separately 

RiverKoat finish (rubberized paint for the greatest grip when wet)

Patent pending 

..thank you for helping us build The Anglers Network™!

FishPond Cimarron Bag -Contribute $225

Large capacity, anvil-style wide-mouth main compartment

Separate ventilated bottom compartment for wet wader and boot storage

Fold-out, padded and removable wader-changing mat Integrated backpack straps

Removable see-through interior “essentials” pocket

Four interior zippered pockets

Two exterior zippered pockets

Two Fishpond rod tube straps

…thank you for helping us build The Anglers Network™!

Troll Pro Camera Housing -Contribute $225

Ever wonder whats back there behind your boat when trolling? 

The Troll Pro housing holds a GoPro camera that you troll in your wake letting you “see” as fish come up from the depths to eat your lures or baits! 

We have used these for years while shooting “Fish the Baja” for NBC Sports with excellent results!!! Troll Pro

…thank you for helping us build The Anglers Network™!

 

TFO BVK 5Wt. Fly Rod -Contribute $400

TFO developed the BVK rods with Lefty Kreh’s expertise behind them. Casting like rockets they are great for delivering a fly right where you want it to go and then subduing that trophy fish for a picture …right before the release of course!!!   TFO BVK Series   …thank you for helping us build The Anglers Network™!

Dave Whitlock Personalized Print – Contribute $450

Dave Whitlock is amazing at capturing the spirit and nuance of fish in their natural habitat! Own one of Dave’s fantastic prints that he will personalize as a gift, for a friend or for yourself.

Dave Whitlock Studio       …thank you for helping us build The Anglers Network™!

Horse Creek Wyoming Trout Adventure -Contribute $750

Spend the day with Dave Maynard catching large Rainbow, Brown and Brook trout in a Private Wyoming Ranch! The 78,000 acre fishing wonderland near Cheyenne is sure to deliver an amazing day with many fish over 20′ typical. Trophies as large as 15#s have been landed during these guided trips!   …thank you for helping us build The Anglers Network™!

Silver Lining Charters -Contribute $1,200

Awesome guide Capt. Jay Withers will take you and a friend for the trip of a lifetime out of Charlotte Harbor on the Gulf Coast of Florida. Redfish, Snook, Speckled Trout & maybe even Tarpon are the catch of the day with one of the Gold Coasts premium guides & tournament anglers! Trip is for 2 or 3 persons for 6 hours depending on the length of the tide! Silver Lining Charters  …thank you for helping us build The Anglers Network™!

story:
WHY ARE WE CROWDFUNDING?


Our One-For-One tree planting initiative is a good start, but creating a positive change in the lives of coconut farmers cannot be done by just sourcing coconut oil from a large manufacturer. Despite the popularity of coconut products there is very little awareness or evaluation of fair-trade standards, and farmers are severely exploited.

The problem we’re trying to solve simply needs more attention, understanding, effort, passion, and heart. Most importantly, it needs a community of great people to support a change.


HOW?

WORKING IN PARTNERSHIP WITH SMALL-SCALE FARMERS TO PRODUCE THE FRESHEST COCONUT OIL IN THE WORLD, MADE BY HAND IN SMALL BATCHES



THE PROBLEMS

The idyllic coconut palm setting may be extraordinary, but the industrialization of this magnificent “Tree of Life” has a troubled history, responsible for more than 60 percent of the Filipino coconut farming community living in extreme poverty. Coconut farmers exist at the subsistence level and are considered some of the poorest people in the Philippines. Their existence producing Copra at the terminal end of the coconut distribution chain often leaves entire communities hopeless, as they’re most vulnerable to exploitation and environmental disasters.
Copra - A Vegetable oil commodity made from the dried flesh of often rotten coconuts & processed using chemicals at large factories.







THE SOLUTION

The solution to many of the problems and constraints that coconut farmers face can be solved with the implementation of a hand made DME (Direct Micro Expeller) production method for Raw Organic Coconut Oil.

The method uses no fuel or other resources and is fully sustainable. There is zero waste and no negative impact on the environment. It also allows for the use of often wasted parts of the coconut to be developed into other "downstream products".

While Copra production is primarily for men, the DME process creates opportunities for both men and women, while creating a community-driven working environment tat encourages collaboration and teamwork. From the time the coconut is cracked open, it takes less than one hour to produce the finest quality Raw Organic Coconut Oil. The freshest coconut oil in the world.



THE IMPACT

By creating opportunity in a high-value market and making more effective use of the existing resource, we can work towards growing self-sustaining communities. 

Much of the returns from DME Coconut Oil flow through the community, creating significant development and opportunity. When we are able to assist in the production of downstream products, additional industries are developed, reaching local and international markets.

Our long-term goal is to implement 10 small batch  coconut  oil facilities in Eastern Samar. We have the infrastructure and support in place. Our focus now is on building a community and establishing our place in the market. As demand grows for Kapuluan products, we will build additional facilities to meet the demand, while strengthening our operation and significantly affecting the positive impact of our efforts all over Eastern Samar. 


DR. DAN ETHERINGTON

DME INVENTOR / PARTNER


HOW YOU CAN SUPPORT

Our ultimate goal is to Improve the livelihood of Coconut Farming Communities - connecting Customers with Farmers - growing a community of change for a better world.

When you contribute to the campaign you directly impact the lives of small farmers and their community. Your contribution will go towards the building of a small batch Coconut Oil production facility in Eastern Samar, Philippines. It will also extend to the equipment, training & education, the infrastructure with proven system & support, and a quality assurance program. 

Coconut trees are not only needed to help farming communities recover from the destruction from Typhoons. One of the primary constraints Coconut Farmers face is that their income is too low to invest in the planting of new trees, creating issues with sustainability and growth, perpetuating poverty. 

Planting new Coconut Trees also helps in the fight against global warming!


WHAT YOU GET 

DME Coconut Oil is the Freshest and Finest Quality Coconut Oil in the World. Handmade in Small Batches by Small-Scale Coconut Farmers

     

    

REWARDS

We’ll not only plant a coconut tree in your name but also give you early access to raw, handmade coconut oil at lower than retail prices. You’ll get to experience for yourself the benefits of DME handmade coconut oil while also playing an important role in improving the livelihoods of these coconut farmers. Ultimately, you are making this all possible.


THE SPACE

Designing and building in an impoverished rural village poses a few challenges including typhoons, rain, excessive heat, lack of electricity and water. We designed a minimal space that uses the land to keep the building cool while increasing its strength. The green roof will help deal with heavy rain and naturally filter into a water storage tank. The finishing touches will come in the form of solar panels and rain shading which will be affixed to the exterior of the building.   

 



TIMELINE


FAQ

WHAT IS KAPULUAN COCONUT’S MISSON?

Kapuluan Coconut’s mission is to improve the livelihoods of impoverished coconut farming communities in the Philippines by working in partnership with the farmers to produce the finest quality, handmade coconut oil. Kapuluan has an overall goal of helping 10 communities in the Philippines become completely self sustainable through these partnerships.

IS KAPULUAN A NOT-FOR-PROFIT?

Kapuluan is a for-profit social enterprise. We fill the needs of the farmers by providing capital, equipment, training and support, and then we close the loop by purchasing the coconut oil they produce. In addition, we intend to work with the communities to develop “downstream products” from often wasted parts of the coconut to further the impact on the community. 

WHY IS KAPULUAN LAUNCHING A CROWDFUNDING CAMPAIGN?

We could have just sourced some coconut oil like almost every other company out there, but our ability to create a meaningful impact would be extremely limited. By working in partnership with small farmers, we'll be able to help develop skills and empower impoverished communities, improving the well being of coconut farming communities and growing change for a brighter future. 

Our goal is to raise $90,000 to be put towards building a production facility in Eastern Samar and support our ability to fulfill product orders. Any additional funds raised will be put towards other initiatives such as building infrastructure needed to produce downstream products for additional revenue streams. 

HOW DOES KAPULUAN CONTRIBUTE POSITIVELY TO THE ENVIRONMENT? 

Each time we sell our coconut oil, we plant a coconut palm tree in the Philippines. By planting coconut palms, we’re helping Filipino coconut farmers rebound from the destruction of typhoons while improving crop quality and mitigating global warming.

story:
Introducing Jolt Mate

The Jolt Mate App, uses your Personal Network to put you in contact with the right candidate quickly, and easily. Existing Big-Name job sites like LinkedIn and Monster have taken away the personal connection required to guarantee fulfilling and productive work relationships. Jolt Mate brings the principles of strong foundations and trust into the process of finding the right candidate.

Why shouldn’t you hire your friends? Finding and posting jobs directly to the people you already know and trust has never been easier. The ability to communicate directly with candidates through Jolt Mate creates a fast and personal hiring experience.

Main Features

Jolt Mate provides a seamless job market through:

  • Using your own Network to find the most suitable employee or to get hired.
  • Replacing CV’s with its own quick profile builder tool to create a more focused, informative profile with one-click applying.
  • Ability to make your job posting public or just exclusively visible to your contacts.
  • Great, simple user interface for posting and applying to jobs.
  • Allowing multiple jobs to be posted at once via the website's Recruiter tool.
  • Local Jobs feature. Allowing users to make contact with other local users through friend requests.

What We Need & What You Get

To develop and market the app we need at least $10,000. This will fund:

  • Development of Android App (Current prototype only IOS).
  • Extra Features to improve the user experience.
  • Effective marketing campaigning to grow the Social Network.

If we raise more than our $10,000 target, the surplus will be used to host and maintain the app, create new content, and support the development of future versions, 

A future partner app is a similar concept but for buying and selling goods. A personal network version of Gumtree.

What you get!

  • All contributors can experience at least early access and other exciting Perks depending upon the generosity of the contribution.

The Impact

By supporting this project, you are helping to bring back a more trusting and rich job market experience.

In contributing to this campaign you’re not supporting another big corporate job site company. You are supporting a community building social network that allows users to help their friends and family first.

We plan to use the financial stability provided by our generous donors to ensure that we do not have to stop developing the platform and allow it to blossom into a truly powerful platform.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone who likes us can contribute financially, but you can still help support our goals!

  • You can support us by getting the word out and making some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to promote our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, on your blog, etc!

We really do appreciate every single bit of support and thank you for taking the time to read this far!
story_txt:
Introducing Jolt Mate
The Jolt Mate App, uses your Personal Network to put you in contact with the right candidate quickly, and easily. Existing Big-Name job sites like LinkedIn and Monster have taken away the personal connection required to guarantee fulfilling and productive work relationships. Jolt Mate brings the principles of strong foundations and trust into the process of finding the right candidate.

Why shouldn’t you hire your friends? Finding and posting jobs directly to the people you already know and trust has never been easier. The ability to communicate directly with candidates through Jolt Mate creates a fast and personal hiring experience.
Main Features
Jolt Mate provides a seamless job market through:

Using your own Network to find the most suitable employee or to get hired.
Replacing CV’s with its own quick profile builder tool to create a more focused, informative profile with one-click applying.
Ability to make your job posting public or just exclusively visible to your contacts.
Great, simple user interface for posting and applying to jobs.
Allowing multiple jobs to be posted at once via the website's Recruiter tool.
Local Jobs feature. Allowing users to make contact with other local users through friend requests.

What We Need & What You Get
To develop and market the app we need at least $10,000. This will fund:

Development of Android App (Current prototype only IOS).
Extra Features to improve the user experience.
Effective marketing campaigning to grow the Social Network.

If we raise more than our $10,000 target, the surplus will be used to host and maintain the app, create new content, and support the development of future versions, 
A future partner app is a similar concept but for buying and selling goods. A personal network version of Gumtree.
What you get!
All contributors can experience at least early access and other exciting Perks depending upon the generosity of the contribution.
The Impact
By supporting this project, you are helping to bring back a more trusting and rich job market experience.
In contributing to this campaign you’re not supporting another big corporate job site company. You are supporting a community building social network that allows users to help their friends and family first.
We plan to use the financial stability provided by our generous donors to ensure that we do not have to stop developing the platform and allow it to blossom into a truly powerful platform.
Other Ways You Can Help
We understand not everyone who likes us can contribute financially, but you can still help support our goals!

You can support us by getting the word out and making some noise about our campaign.
Use the Indiegogo share tools to promote our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, on your blog, etc!

We really do appreciate every single bit of support and thank you for taking the time to read this far!

story:
Introduction

My name is Brian Matambo. I am an entrepreneur based in Zambia, Africa, I am 37 years old, married to Chipo and we have three kids. The youngest in only 1 year 4 months. Our passion is to bring local and international news, deals and discounts, and lots of relevant content to the small screen, the Smartphone. 

Lifeztyle is an androind mobile app. The app is all about bringing all the "NEED TO KNOW INFO" to the smartphone. Visit this link to download it on your android phone LIFEZTYLE MOBILE APP

Lifeztyle has already being built and is available on Google Play Store for download. The stage we are on now is populating it with constantly fresh content, and getting more downloads for the app to become economically viable. 

$5000 will enable us to do the following
  • Enable the app to grow and become a big player in news and advertising in Zambia and around the world. 
  • Help us give employment to 10 young vibrant youths who will be working for Lifeztyle

What We Need & What You Get

Lifeztyle need $5000:

  • About $1000 will go to mobile app hosting for 12 months
  • $2500 will go to promoting download via facebook and Twitter to get 5000 downloads.
  • $500 will go to operational logistics such as internet data and office expenses for only 3 months. 
  • $500 will be used to complete the iOS version of the app 
  • $500 will be used to promote the app on other traditional platforms such newspapers, radio stations, and TV. 
  • Funds that may remain will be channeled to increasing downloads. 

The Impact

Lifeztyle App is not just another business. We are providing an holistic platform for news, deals, SME directory, Live TV screaming, among other things. 

  • You want to be involved in this project because it's destined to succeed. Lifeztyle is set to be a leading Zambian app and revolutionize how media houses diseminate news. 
  • This is only the second app to complete. The first belongs to a government department and its called travela, also available on Google Play Store. 
  • Your support will go a long way in making my dream come true, making the app a success, and helping me to create emplyment for 10 youths. 

Risks & Challenges

Part of the challenges and risk we face is that potential advertisers take long to catch on a new trend such us mobile app based advertising. This means we might take a little long to get a full house advertising on the app. The second challenge is that the cost of advertising is very low in Zambia so it may take longer to break even. 

  • To overcome the first challenge we plan to hold workshops for Marketing managers to show them cost effective alternatives in advertising. We are also planning a partnership with a radio station. in the partnership we will have airtime to educate the public about the app, and the radio station will in turn stream through the app. 
  • For the second challenge our plan is to ensure that we maximise on having more clients on the app. 

Other Ways You Can Help

In case you cannot help financially, you can still download the app and share the link with your friends and family. You can also use the the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you and looking forward to your hand in partnership.
