story:
Welcome to our campaign!

We are conducting this crowdfunding campaign to make it possible to further develop Ansofy, and eventually launch the app globally.  But most importantly, we want to give you the possibility to from an early stage be a member of the Global Ansofy Tribe.  Our plan is to build a world wide movement, starting here and now in this crowdfunding campaign. It will be an exciting journey, and the most important part for us is to create a strong and powerful community with people around the world who are ready to stand up and defend our democratic societies. 

If you don't want to miss the chance to be an important part in the process of reinventing the media landscape, it's time to jump on this train today!

Short Summary

A sustainable society needs trustworthy news, Global News with a broader view on what really happens. That is why we are launching Ansofy. And we want YOU to be a part of our global tribe!

Ansofy gives you the freedom to build your own news feed and that opens up the possibility to mix different perspectives on the same news event. Instead of letting someone else decide for you what news is the most important, you can make your own digital news feed and find out more of what really happens in the world. Ansofy is a politically and religiously independent news source. We don’t need to track your profile and therefore we can offer you data privacy and integrity. 

One of our most important missions is to burst the filter bubbles and fight fake news.

Ansofy gives you the freedom to build your own news feed and that opens up for the possibility to mix different perspectives on the same news event. Instead of letting someone else decide for you what news are the most important, you can make your own newspaper and find out more of what really happens in the world. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

In this crowdfunding campaign our first goal is to collect 100 000 SEK, meaning roughly 11 000 USD/10 000 EUR in today's exchange rate. If we succeed with that we will be able to:

-  Deliver our MVP (Minimum Viable Product) that will contain news and magazines from a limited amount of global sources. 

BUT... if we exceed our first goal you can expect so much more than this! Already today we can reveal that our first strech goal is to reach 250 000 SEK, meaning 28000 USD/23000 EUR.

If we reach that goal we will be able to:

- Add more functionality to the app, for example the possibility to enjoy Ansofy without ads, access to more categories and a high amount of data privacy. With 250 000 SEK funded you'll simply get a more powerful and go-to-market ready version of our MVP.

AND.... we have more streach goals up our sleeve! But those will be revealed further on as the campaign moves on. To be more precise, you will find out what's included in streatch goal #2 when we reach 200 000 SEK funded! So please stay tuned and come back here regularly to follow our progress.

So, what's in it for you then?

As we've already told you this is not an ordinary campaign, it's the start of a global movement and we call for everyone who wants to fight for democracy to join our cause. But of course we have perks for you! Here are some examples on what you'll get in return when you engage in our campaign (except from meeting people with common values and join in on fun activities here on the platform…)

- Pledge 10 EUR and get a basic membership in the Global Ansofy Tribe (including our newsletter,  early access to download the app and an invite to our members only Facebook group.)

- Pledge 40 EUR and get a basic membership in the Global Ansofy Tribe (including our newsletter, get a personal Beta test invite for our closed testflight beta test, early access to downloading the app and an invite to our members only Facebook group)

- Pledge 80 EUR and get a basic membership in the Global Ansofy Tribe (including our newsletter, get a personal Beta test invite for our closed testflight beta test, early access to downloading the app, 3 months free premium Ansofy subscription and an invite to our members only Facebook group)

- Pledge 150 EUR and get a GOLD membership in the Global Ansofy Tribe (including everything that comes with the Basic membership, an invite to our members only Facebook group + 6 months premium subscription, your name on our website and a personal video call with our CEO Theresa Weber-Quarfort where you can influence the development of Ansofy)

 

The Impact

Our world gets more and more polarized each day. The reasons for this are many, but the change in how we consume media and the increase of conspiracy theories are both important parts of this development. Democracy depends on people knowing what is happening, and that is why we need to burst the filter bubbles and create a structural change in how we consume news. We all get different perspectives on what’s going on in the world based on the sources we follow combined with AI that gives you more of what you already have. This includes our feeds in social media and who we trust and listen to (influencers, celebrities etc).

Why is this a dangerous situation? We have already seen many examples on how conspiracy theories and the spread of complete lies have inspired people to do ruthless things. People around the world are being told that mainstream media is spreading fake news and that governments are the enemy. Eventually this distrust of the pillar stones of our democratic societies is questioned and seriously threatened.

If you don't want to miss the chance to be an important part in the process of reinventing the media landscape, it's time to jump on this train today!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you doesn't have the possibility to contribute with you money (we know, it's hard times now with the pandemic and so on) but you'd like to help anyway, here are some things you can do:

- Share our campaign with your network in social media
- Be an active member in our community
- Follow our social media channels (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter) and invite your friends to join our cause
- Go to our homepage and join our Beta testing as an active tester, answer our surveys and give us your feedback on the app, make suggestions and give us your most creative idéas to help us launch, market and build the best news app in the world!

story:
Short Summary

Short Summary

The world of words is changing. The publishing industry is at a crossword as technology challenges the current system. Words and creative people matter a great deal to us so, Wordeee's alternative platform aims to support them as we co-create content with our creative community.  At Wordeee, we are building something special for diverse creators of stories that has the power to disrupt the value chain, change lives, impact cultural understanding, and create financial and lifestyle freedom. We'll even throw in world peace.

Global connectivity benefits artists by expanding opportunities across media platforms and geographies which in turn, could lead to the financial freedom many artists need to unshackle from their DDJ (deadly day job).  Wordeee's goal, as we democratize the world of words, is to remove barriers so it  no longer matter where you are, who you know or what you look like Putting power back into the hands of the creators of words is empowering.

We serve creatives who have something of value to share with their audience—people who are focused on delivering quality work and in making a difference in the world of thought and creativity.  Those who are committed  and willing to roll up their sleeves  to do whatever is necessary to achieve those goals, is our ideal client.  We want our creators not just to be about money, though that's very important. Those who know in their hearts and at their very core that that art is something true, valuable and transformative will create  works that can certainly be monetize.  Think Hamilton here. 

As big dreamers, (the nature of our craft) we believe creators should make a living through their art.  Today, authors may hope their work will be translated to film, television, or theater and wait to be discovered but our fully-built Wordeee platform will support more active attention across all entertainment fields. Support from the Wordeee community too, has the power to change lives and amplify a creators’ opportunities, keeping our platform evergreen. Joining Wordeee as their strategic co-partner, creatives ensures quality work, distribution, active cross-platforming opportunities and superior support that allows them to be more confident and competitive as they pursue their dreams. Commitment to upholding their truth through actions, we welcome them  to put their creativity to work at Wordeee who hires talent for opportunities from its community. 

Why are we Crowd-Fundng?

Our vision and mission for Wordeee  and the community  we serve are so important that at this stage in our development we want to build the full prototype platform before welcoming strategic investors interested in helping to expand creative opportunities for artists. 

Wordeee is a store, a social media platform, and a literary hub supporting emerging - and established- creators and enabling the growth of their tribes. Creating, publishing, distributing, marketing, and connecting all happen on Wordeee. Our platform offers a superior alternative for serious authors to publish and market their work, one that provides a more generous return for authors’ efforts than more traditional publishing models.  Wordeee provides a dynamic social space where authors and readers build real relationships with tools that empower and facilitate engaging global communities. Authors, through their personal green room, can create content from posts, audio and video updates, social media connectivity, instant messaging, and events. Beyond authors and readers, the fully developed platform will grow to engage actors, composers, musicians, designers, directors, and producers as who can co-create Wordeee's content from the page to film, television, podcasts, and theater. We free the words from books, and move them into every media!

What We Need & What Our Collaborators Get

There is strength in numbers. Together, we can get this done. The value of the crowd economy is in creating intimate and targeted services to a specific audience, leading to greater reach and success. Wordeee has the ability to do that. Your support now will influence the scalability of  Wordeee’s content and the evergreen environment for creators that we envision. Your help will let us showcase the value of a more fully developed platform and ready us to welcome strategic investors who appreciate  an align with the potency of the Wordeee platform. 

The funds we are raising here will pay for:

  • Full marketing strategy to include traditional and social branding and marketing, production of an explainer video, etc.
  • Development of the new features and channels to complete the platform for creatives beyond books and because:
  • It’s time to generate and promote a critical mass of content.
  • It’s time to get the message out on social media to grow our community.
  • It’s time to expand the core platform we already have, to deliver all the features that support our mission and vision.

What Comes Next

The Wordeee team has spent the past 18 months developing and testing the platform with early adopters. All efforts so far have been funded by the founders. The results have been amazing and now, we are ready for Wordeee’s public unveiling. Please be part of it!

This 4:32 minute video explains how Wordeee works for authors. We’re building similar features for other creators.

The Impact of Technology:

  • Imagine the quality of artistic expression if artists do what they do best-- create without interruption. Competing issues like making a living, the distribution bottleneck, getting past gatekeepers of power and the frustration of getting their work to their audience saps creative time.  In the greatest artistic epoch, a period that has transcended time, Wordeee wishes to become the 'patron' of great artists by:  
  • Democratizing the industry
  • Giving artists more control of their intellectual properties
  • Decreasing speed to market from the traditional 18 months to 6 months
  • Providing higher royalties for creatives with the ability to request royalty on demand
  • Providing demographic insight: Ability to know audience. Where they are and who they are so better marketing decisions can be made
  • Providing superior quality control support
  • Providing wide distribution opportunities
  • Active scouting for cross-platforming opportunities
  • Financial freedom: Opportunity to live as a creative. Let's chuck the  DDJ-9-5. Dreaded Day Job)

Risks & Challenges

Over the past 18 months, we have published amazing books in our beta phase.  Authors have had the benefit of having personal relationships with the founders which has been amazing.  As we expand our bandwidth, we want to create the same feeling of trust and collaboration through our platform be it 1 or 100,000 people through great marketing, attentive staff, and feedback modules. This means we have to build a high tech, high touch platform, that allows our community to support each other. We have been up and running for 18 months and all roads lead to a greater launch.  Risks are minimal at this point but without your support, we won't be able to catalyze momentum  and speed to market to engage as wide an audience. 

Wordeee is an ambitious project and, we believe, so is anything seeded in greatness. With your help we can attract the kinds of talent we need to exceed expectations and to reach a tipping point to serve truly creative people.  

Our comfort: Wordeee is led by seasoned, serial entrepreneurs who understand the acorn story.  We have significant, award-winning business experience and passion for words. We also have a track record of entrepreneurial success and the skill set to manage any challenges that may arise. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • We understand if you can't financially contribute ( maybe you're a starving artist...smile).  We want to change.  What we ask, even if you are unable to make a financial contribution, is that you help us by getting the word out so we can some noise about our campaign.  Indiegogo has generously provided us with awesome share tools.  
  • Join the Wordeee platform so that you can be in the know and get valuable tips through our monthly newsletter. 
  • Send us any feedback: contact@wordeee.com
  • And that's all there is to it!

Enjoy a fabled story of Wordeee's journey.  We hope you also enjoy the especially curated perks from our Wordeee community.

https://wordeee.com/book/30/The%20Book%20of%20W...

The Wordeee team has spent the past 18 months developing and testing the platform with early adopters. All efforts so far have been funded by the founders. The results have been amazing and now, we are ready for Wordeee’s public unveiling. Please be part of it!
This 4:32 minute video explains how Wordeee works for authors. We’re building similar features for other creators.
The Impact of Technology:

Imagine the quality of artistic expression if artists do what they do best-- create without interruption. Competing issues like making a living, the distribution bottleneck, getting past gatekeepers of power and the frustration of getting their work to their audience saps creative time.  In the greatest artistic epoch, a period that has transcended time, Wordeee wishes to become the 'patron' of great artists by:  
Democratizing the industry
Giving artists more control of their intellectual properties
Decreasing speed to market from the traditional 18 months to 6 months
Providing higher royalties for creatives with the ability to request royalty on demand
Providing demographic insight: Ability to know audience. Where they are and who they are so better marketing decisions can be made
Providing superior quality control support
Providing wide distribution opportunities
Active scouting for cross-platforming opportunities
Financial freedom: Opportunity to live as a creative. Let's chuck the  DDJ-9-5. Dreaded Day Job)

Risks & Challenges
Over the past 18 months, we have published amazing books in our beta phase.  Authors have had the benefit of having personal relationships with the founders which has been amazing.  As we expand our bandwidth, we want to create the same feeling of trust and collaboration through our platform be it 1 or 100,000 people through great marketing, attentive staff, and feedback modules. This means we have to build a high tech, high touch platform, that allows our community to support each other. We have been up and running for 18 months and all roads lead to a greater launch.  Risks are minimal at this point but without your support, we won't be able to catalyze momentum  and speed to market to engage as wide an audience. 
Wordeee is an ambitious project and, we believe, so is anything seeded in greatness. With your help we can attract the kinds of talent we need to exceed expectations and to reach a tipping point to serve truly creative people.  
Our comfort: Wordeee is led by seasoned, serial entrepreneurs who understand the acorn story.  We have significant, award-winning business experience and passion for words. We also have a track record of entrepreneurial success and the skill set to manage any challenges that may arise. 
Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if you can't financially contribute ( maybe you're a starving artist...smile).  We want to change.  What we ask, even if you are unable to make a financial contribution, is that you help us by getting the word out so we can some noise about our campaign.  Indiegogo has generously provided us with awesome share tools.  
Join the Wordeee platform so that you can be in the know and get valuable tips through our monthly newsletter. 
Send us any feedback: contact@wordeee.com
And that's all there is to it!

Enjoy a fabled story of Wordeee's journey.  We hope you also enjoy the especially curated perks from our Wordeee community.
https://wordeee.com/book/30/The%20Book%20of%20W...

story:
The Idea.

Since 1999, Auriscrib CEO and founder David Akerson has worked at international organizations investigating and prosecuting genocide and war crimes.   One organization he worked at spent over two decades having its investigators and lawyers interviewing thousands of witnesses.  Most of the time, the investigator or attorney scribbled notes listening to the witness recounting their story.  Later, those notes were turned into a formal witness statement.  But because these statements were based on notes and memory, they were inaccurate and sometimes damaging to the case.  

In his twenty-five year working as a senior attorney and technologist investigating mass atrocities, David worked on numerous complex investigations.  He knows there is an acute need for a better tool for witness interviews.    

Auriscrib is that tool.  It is an app that will save these organizations a substantial amount of time and money with by making the process of witness interviewing cheaper, faster and better. 

It's simple.  The interviewer will use Auriscrib to securely video or audio record an interview with his phone, iPad or laptop.  Then, with the click of a button, Auriscrib uses artificial intelligence to produce an accurate transcript within minutes.  Auriscrib then synchronizes the audio of the interview to the transcript.  And Auriscrib throws in a few bits and bobs that investigators and lawyers need.  For example, if the witness has security concerns, AuriScrib can pixelate their image, distort their voice and conceal their personal information to conceal their identity.

Auriscrib is a much-needed tool in human rights investigations.  If we are going to end the impunity of dictators and despots who commit crimes against humanity, we need new and better tools.   

But Auriscrib is also needed around the world in domestic law enforcement agencies, investigative bureaus, and intelligence operations as well.  Using Auriscrib will make domestic law enforcement agencies more transparent and more accountable. 

This campaign seeks funds to fund the development of Auriscrib.  Investigators and attorneys who rely on witnesses want this tool.  And they want it soon!   

Background.

In 1984, David graduated with a computer science degree.  Seeing no future in computers, he proceeded to go to law school.     

David's foray into the complex investigation field began in 1988 when he went to work for Lawyers for Human Rights in South Africa, a human rights organization fighting Apartheid.  Since then, he worked as a lawyer and technologist investigating conflicts all over the world, including Rwanda, Yugoslavia, Sierra Leone, Cambodia, Lebanon, Syria, Iraq, the United Arab Emirates and others.  He has also taught as a full-time lecturer at the University of Denver College of Law.

Because David has law and computer degrees, when he worked for international investigative bodies he tended to be involved with the IT infrastructure and workflow on top of his lawyer duties.  So he knows what lawyers and investigators need.  He understands the workflow of a complex atrocity investigation.   This has permitted Auriscrib to develop a clear and focused vision for an interview tool.   

Auriscrib has clear expressions of interest from several large international investigative missions, and Auriscrib will be able to generate an immediate revenue stream when the product is ready for release that should sustain its continued development and evolution.  

What We Need.

Auriscrib is looking to raise $30,000 to build a working prototype of the app.  This will get Auriscrib into the hands of beta testers later this summer.

The Impact

Auriscrib is a game changer.  It will change the way atrocities are investigated by human rights organizations and help end the impunity of perpetrators committing genocide, war crimes and crimes against humanity.  Auriscrib will help create a clear and objective record of the stories witnesses want to tell.  And Auriscrib will do it quickly and inexpensively, saving human rights organizations resources to do their important work.   

Auriscrib will also help to change in the culture in local law enforcement agencies to be more transparent.  Auriscrib eliminates inaccuracy and reliance on memory, creating a crystal-clear and bias-free record of interviews. 

There are many other applications for AuriScrib.  It has many general business applications to record meetings and discussions.  Court reporters and educators could use it.  Anyone who feels like they can't effectively simultaneously take notes and carefully listen to a lecture or meeting, or anyone who wants to make sure they have a completely accurate record of a conversation -- they all need AuriScrib. 

Risks and Challenges

There are a few competitors in the market.  Some produce AI transcriptions, others out-source transcriptions to human transcribers.  Auriscrib's strategy is to combine both of these into one app, allowing users to produce an AI transcript with a click of a button, and then click a second button if they want a professional editor (a genuine human!) to edit and polish it up.  It's the best of both worlds. 

An additional challenge is the expectation of users that a transcript produced with artificial intelligence will be perfect.  It won't be perfect, but it will be really good - around 75% accurate.  It will be incumbent upon Auriscrib to manage the expectation of users by explaining that an AI-produced transcript that is 75% accurate is still much better than the scribbled notes and memory of the interviewer.  More importantly, Auriscrib will synchronize the audio and transcript so that, if a transcript is not accurate, the user can listen to the audio of that corresponding section of the transcript and edit as necessary.

How You Can Assist.

If you can't contribute, Auriscrib needs your help getting the word out.  Please pass the word about Auriscrib to any law enforcement officers, detectives, prosecutors, defense counsel or anyone else that might benefit from the automatic and accurate transcription of a recorded interview.  We would love to speak to chiefs of police, head prosecutors or public defenders, and any other decision-makers in similar kinds of enterprises.  If you know a big-wig, connect us!

story:
Good Teaching Platforms Are Far And Few! But WeYakYak Is A Very Bold And Different Podium

The internet boom in foreigners teaching China’s children online

Firms providing overseas internet tutors could share US$165-billion market in five years, says one research report, as parents look to give their children a head start.

http://www.scmp.com/news/article/2110115/boom-f...

  • Welcome to the launch of www.weyakyak.com!   Our hope is that you take the time to read this valuable information.  This project is not only for teachers and students, but in fact for those around the world who need help and hope.  
  • Founder Kelly Carroll 
  • Kelly Carroll has been a self employed entrepreneur for over 35 years and retired by returning to school at ITTO-TEFL to learn the skill of teaching English as a foreign language.  Not only did she graduate with the highest honor, she has been online teaching since 2016 and listed as one of the "Most Popular" teachers with one of the online companies she is currently working with.  Kelly's passion for her students has driven her to this innovative project because she cares about what the students want.  Not only does she care, but she wants the online learning platform to be the best on the market for teachers and students alike.  Her ideas have developed with over 650 hours of teaching online and over 100 students currently learning with her.  Kelly says " I know what teachers want, and I know what it takes to keep a student online with you ".
  • We are going global and still in the process of bringing on more partners and investors to make WeYakYak a success.  There is more strength with more people who want to help and take on a position or role in this endeavor.

Two are better than one, because they have a good return for their labor: If either of them falls down, one can help the other up.  But pity anyone who falls and has no one to help them up.  Ecclesiastes 4:9-10

THIS IS A GLOBAL EFFORT TO CHANGE THE WAY WE TEACH AND LEARN!

This campaign is very important locally and globally because it impacts every teachers life and income in the world.  After living abroad Kelly learned how hard it is for teachers to make a living with low income teaching jobs.  She had every opportunity to work at CHC English School in Ecuador but instead went with online global teaching.   Why?  Everything they teach and every class is online and she was able to set her own price.  It is safe, done from the comfort of your home and there are no risks in this type of teaching/learning environment. 

Because it is global, teachers can choose the price they want to charge according to their economies.  Some global areas are hard hit by the lack of jobs (like Venezuala, Mexico, Etc.).  Other areas in the world are being compromised by violence against teachers and students.  We can't fix this issue in our world but we can help create the alternative for teachers who love teaching.  Teachers across the globe are losing the passion they once had to care and share with students.  

Teaching opportunities online will open more doors for both Teacher and Student because their will be no by-laws against our teachers to follow strict and political correct jargon.  We are a Christian community that will allow a teacher to speak of God freely and give students the opportunity to share their views without attack or predjudice. 

  Backers will help create a safe global platform for whole communities, families and students.  The main passion in WeYakYak comes from the violence and abuse that is happening in our school systems on a widespread geographical impact.  Also, this will help spur teachers to rekindle their teaching passion once again.  These kind of hurdles barricade both parties and extinguish the dedication in our teachers.  

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Currently we are already in the development stage with our technical developer.  We have signed all our contracts for the current project and have spent up to $17,500.00 of personal monies for the web platform alone.  API cost, Marketing, SEO, Print Advertising, TV and Internet Advertising will the most important cost to see our Platform preform to its fullest potential.  We know that the teachers and students are the key players in making our opportunity a success.  With your help and trust we are starting with a funding amount of $50,000.00.  We also have teachers who are waiting and anticipating the launch so that they can begin teaching.  Advertising will be the biggest expense because with out it, our teachers and students will suffer.  We want the world to know who we are!
  • If you would like to learn a new language your self then this is your moment to help us with even the smallest funding amount possible.  If you are an investor or a business who can provide substantial funding then you have this opportunity to earn your perks for your employees or friends and family.  Check out all the FREE language classes/courses we will provide for you!  You can earn FREE classes for up to a year.  
  • Our first part of funding will go back into the capital we have already spent to keep the business strong and pay outs to our teachers.  Teachers are the most important people in this project.  We need to pay them WEEKLY and on time while we build.  The first year our focus will be to grow the online experience through hiring a professional marketing team that will expertly design and improve our site continuously, Market our name and giving us branding that anyone will recognize, SEO and internet presence, Email and newsletter marketing and on going educational opportunities for both staff and teachers.   

 

The Impact

Remember that with out teachers our society crumbles.  Every talent, every skill and degree comes from a teacher.  Your help will impact the world of knowledge!  It will impact the lives of people who live in parts of the world where they have no opportunities.  You will help people be able to stay at home to raise a family and still work and provide.  You will be a huge impact globally to children in poverty stricken countries because we are marketing and reaching out to a global need.  You will also be that encouragement for higher education.

  • In a world that is easier to access via internet, your contribution will impact you as well, your business and any cause you want to be recognized your links and logo to be displayed on our front page!
  • Teaching online is a very real opportunity for the global community.  Personally it has given me the freedom to live and work anywhere in the world.  It allows me freedom of time and create my own income according the economy I live in.
  • Help us not disappoint the teachers and students that are waiting patiently for us to officially launch our DREAM.  

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

Our biggest risk is lack of money to operate out of gate from launch date.  Another challenge is definitely our ability to pay for professional help to keep us running strong.  But as an online teacher, I know what works and it is the teachers and students that keep the wheel turning 24/7!  We are starting big because we want to be the best, this is a challenge.  But I think and believe the world needs us.  The site I work on is inundated with teachers, and students have a hard time trying to choose a teacher after hours of perusing through the profiles.  So that makes us ripe for room to grow and grab a huge piece of the pie in this market of language learning.

  • With our strong  Entrepreneur skills we will conquer every challenge and embrace the changes needed to make this a success.  Kelly will be teaching on the platform and monitoring all the administration for the website.  
  • With the support of partners and investors most challenges will be solved before it becomes detrimental.  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not contribute we still need you.  By Word of mouth and also teaching with us, we need you!

  • Make some noise for us!  Tell everyone about this amazing website that is about to launch!
  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools!  If you want to teach, we will help you get Certified with ITTO-Online
  • We at “We Yak Yak “ are dedicated to providing a safe delivery of education and a safe environment for our teachers. We are a organization committed to the values of education and Christianity.

And that's all there is to it.  Let's help our teachers build a safer teaching environment for their family's and communities.   We can't fix ALL the problems teachers face in todays uncertain times....but WE CAN OFFER ALTERNATIVE HELP AND SOLUTIONS BY OFFERING A SAFE ONLINE ALTERNATIVE FOR THE FUTURE.

God Bless you!

Kelly Carroll and the TEAM at www.weyakyak.com

story:
Short Summary

I have been developing this idea for 2 years. Being a trainer/assessor, business owner, mum to 3 - I knew nothing about App development. I can see that this mobile application can meet the needs of a vast range of industries, organisations and compliance standards.

I have networked widely in my sector, and had lots of professionals tell me to hurry up and do this, before someone else beats me to it! I researched App Developers, I visited Apple stores and questioned unsuspecting staff, I ran surveys, I read and watched videos, I studied, I met with marketing professionals, had many sleepless nights. I am convinced this product is going to be a success!

What We Need & What You Get

To get this dream off the ground I will use the campaign pledges to fund the remainder of the development of the mobile application, a comprehensive marketing strategy and $8000 in wages for the initial development of documents for future clients. This mobile application will be self-sustaining once clients commence purchasing the product and services of UCA.

My perks are simple including recognition of contributors on my website, donations to a not-for-profit organisation supporting people living with a disability, and for the larger contributor, development of documentation for their organisation.

If the target is not achieved initially, I will explore other ways of raising the capital required. I am confident in this product following all the research and industry consultation.

The Impact

This mobile app is focused on supporting businesses (particularly small-medium) to streamline their systems and processes to increase their efficiency and reduce their costs and overheads. A lot of businesses want to make the move to technology based compliance and documentation but may be scared of the transition or not have the skills and knowledge to make the conversion and train their staff.

I have spent my entire career developing projects within the organisation I am working for, or for their clients. Short term projects, and projects spanning 6 months - from negotiation and concept development, to validation and implementation, training and tracking. I have managed projects in excess of $100K.

I have worked consulting for businesses for the past 7 years, including international travel with a client to review and compare practices and business operations. I thoroughly enjoy working with businesses and not-for-profit organisations to develop their core business, set and track KPI's and increase their sales, operations, training, quality, achievement of Standards and marketing plans.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest struggle I have in a business sense is securing the start up funding required to make this concept become a reality. 

In forecasting my challenges, it is ensuring I have enough people to facilitate the development of documents to meet client's specification. I have sourced a number of specialists from a range of industries, available as consultants to assist with industry specific Standards, legislation and details. UCA has 5 staff - mainly part-time, who are all committed to moving full-time.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Share the campaign and get the word out to everyone you know about the exciting journey of UCA.
  • Share through Indiegogo.
  • Share the video.
  • Share our blog and website.
I sincerely thank you all in advance for taking the time to read my story. For sharers and contributors, you are all making a difference to my dream - and thank you just does not seem enough!
story_txt:
Short Summary I have been developing this idea for 2 years. Being a trainer/assessor, business owner, mum to 3 - I knew nothing about App development. I can see that this mobile application can meet the needs of a vast range of industries, organisations and compliance standards.
I have networked widely in my sector, and had lots of professionals tell me to hurry up and do this, before someone else beats me to it! I researched App Developers, I visited Apple stores and questioned unsuspecting staff, I ran surveys, I read and watched videos, I studied, I met with marketing professionals, had many sleepless nights. I am convinced this product is going to be a success!   What We Need & What You Get To get this dream off the ground I will use the campaign pledges to fund the remainder of the development of the mobile application, a comprehensive marketing strategy and $8000 in wages for the initial development of documents for future clients. This mobile application will be self-sustaining once clients commence purchasing the product and services of UCA.
My perks are simple including recognition of contributors on my website, donations to a not-for-profit organisation supporting people living with a disability, and for the larger contributor, development of documentation for their organisation.
If the target is not achieved initially, I will explore other ways of raising the capital required. I am confident in this product following all the research and industry consultation.   The Impact This mobile app is focused on supporting businesses (particularly small-medium) to streamline their systems and processes to increase their efficiency and reduce their costs and overheads. A lot of businesses want to make the move to technology based compliance and documentation but may be scared of the transition or not have the skills and knowledge to make the conversion and train their staff.
I have spent my entire career developing projects within the organisation I am working for, or for their clients. Short term projects, and projects spanning 6 months - from negotiation and concept development, to validation and implementation, training and tracking. I have managed projects in excess of $100K.
I have worked consulting for businesses for the past 7 years, including international travel with a client to review and compare practices and business operations. I thoroughly enjoy working with businesses and not-for-profit organisations to develop their core business, set and track KPI's and increase their sales, operations, training, quality, achievement of Standards and marketing plans.

In forecasting my challenges, it is ensuring I have enough people to facilitate the development of documents to meet client's specification. I have sourced a number of specialists from a range of industries, available as consultants to assist with industry specific Standards, legislation and details. UCA has 5 staff - mainly part-time, who are all committed to moving full-time.

Share the video.
Share our blog and website.

I sincerely thank you all in advance for taking the time to read my story. For sharers and contributors, you are all making a difference to my dream - and thank you just does not seem enough!

story:
Hi my name is Harry Radford and I'm the Founder of Sixpence Industries Ltd. A startup company with plans to produce multiple new products all born from years of UK construction industry experience.

What is it?

The remedial hinge: a product designed to solve the common problems associated with replacing timber doors in previously used linings, where the fixing holes are either threaded or ovalized. Our patent pending design uses eccentric inserts to rotate the fixing position to allow a secure fixing every time by screwing into fresh timber. I have also addressed the issue where a new hinge would sit short in the housing or too deep because the previous hinges were much thicker and made to a imperial measurement. By upping the dimensions both in height and width, but also depth. We aim to be retailing around the £10 mark for 3" and £15 for 4".

Why?

Is achieving a fixing a problem in an old lining? 100% yes. You may not know it, but many carpenters just use match sticks, golf tees, plastic raw plugs or chop sticks to avoid re-plugging and gluing or splicing a new section in. Does it work? Yes and no. In engineering terms it's hideous. In terms of fire safety, it's a huge liability, at best it's mediocre considering we're planning on sending men to Mars!

Why make them oversize? Years ago, we built things to a imperial measurement literally millions of door linings have 3" or 4"  housings. Fast forward to the present and we are making hinges to a metric size 75 mm and 100mm. 25.4mm to an inch = undersize. Coupled with several removals and refits and you get a pretty chewed up edge that's supposed to be holding the hinge in line. 

Why thicker? Again years ago hinges were made thicker because of less advanced production processes. These deep housings usually get packed with a menagerie of things to hand: most common is the cardboard from the new hinge box! Again in a fire situation this could be a weak link for fire to spread. It also gives the user the opportunity to completely re-seat the housing as if it's a new install, perhaps using a router and a sharp chisel rather than the shovel on the previous attempt. 

Where?

Aimed at the service industry,  primarily fire doors in commercial properties, schools, rental properties, HMOs etc where a users primary concern is end result. There is no reason these couldn't be utilised in the domestic sector. I believe I've created a one-stop solution, suitable for both professionals and DIY users.

What we need:

An ambitous £100k would get us CE & BSI Certified & into major retailers but realistically a mere £20k would get these to market: Amazon, Ebay, etc... 

After running the numbers, producing this product in the UK isn't viable, as much as I'd like to. So it's got to be produced overseas and here's the rub, where as here in the the UK the MOQ is 1000 (and the price is too high), manufacturers in China have MOQs of 10000 (or more) but the price becomes viable. The other issue is tooling which, through several design iterations, we have managed to fit into existing manufacture practices, apart from the inserts which will require the factory to have a cnc sliding head lathe. This will require some funding

So ideally I'm looking for around 100k to produce 3" and 4" in sizable batches with tooling, branding and distribution as well as BSI and CE approvals (but whatever I get will be used to get started). This should open the doors to large retailers and secure its future as a go-to time and labour saver that will be retailing around the £10 mark  3" £15  4".

What you get:

As of perks, the first 20 to claim this will receive an engraved set of personalised hinges. If you pledge a lot, I could send you a couple of sets. It's a labour saver, litigation saver and maybe a life saver!

Impact:

Your contribution will be driving innovation in a market where we see very little. Investors  generally aren't hugely interested in the construction industry even though it's tied directly to the housing market! Successful funding of this product will also mean the development of 4 other products  just waiting to bring to the world and make things easier. 

Users will be supporting a fellow tradesman whose success is tied directly to further innovation in their industries.

I'm a maker not a taker. My company will be run by this motto! I'm uniquely gifted in practical problem solving. I could bore you with examples... but nobody likes a show off.

Risks and challenges:

With the traditionalist nature of the Carpentry industry, some may be slow to adopt the progressive nature of the product but just ask if they own a jack saw! 

IP infringement: the objective is to bring this to market so another person doesn't have to struggle, be litigated against and possibly save the life of someone caught in a fire.

If it gets copied, then it further validates the concept and it's out there one way or another.

The challenge will be BSI testing as the manufacture method is novel but currently see no reason it shouldn't pass and I have an alternate method ready should it fail.

Other ways you can help:

If you're excited to see these available, please, please, please back it.

It takes less than a minute!

It's not about the size of the donation, but the number of backers that proves its viability.

 

By backing my product you're backing me. Any amount is massively appreciated.  If you can't then a share of my Facebook page https://m.facebook.com/sixpenceindustries/?ref=...

Please use Indiegogo's share tools

story:
Want to stay home and achieve professional printing flawlessly? Before PrintPods, it would be a daydream. But now PrintPods is here with permanent and non-removable ink, Duck Soup! Create low-cost custom logos in small batches, glide easily over documents, products, or any object that requires durable, non-removable markings.

 

Enjoy designing your own bodymarks and body decorations anytime with the use of setting spray! Skin-friendly ink is 100% Safe, non-corrosive, water-soluble, and non-irritating. Get inspired with brilliant colors such as Navy blue, Red and Black. Have fun with friends and print temporary tattoos or put your favorite design, team logo, or brand on your skin for events, parties, or family fun.

Looking for a unique gift with a special secret? Communicate creatively with PrintPods. Using invisible ink, print your message or love note just for that special someone. Keep it a secret until viewed with UV light for a surprise and great delight! Unlock more fun and possibilities with PrintPods...

PrintPods allows you to do it all with ultra quick-switch ink types. Multitasking won’t be a myth anymore! Have a fresh idea? Switch! New business needs arise? Switch! PrintPods has an ink to get any job done fast.

 

If you have tried other portable printers in the past that struggled to print on certain materials, you’ll be blown away by PrintPod’s magic powers. Wood? Plastic? Metal? Leather? Sure, you name it! Let PrintPods spark your creativity! Just one simple glide, and all your ideas instantly come to life.

Do you have tons of ideas but hit a roadblock when trying to print on curved or rough surfaces such as stones, glass, mugs, or even food? Here comes PrintPods to set your imagination free. Easy as 1-2-3, every print is as smooth as silk!

 

1 sec connect and print! Simple and fast.

Intuitive and user-friendly app interface makes your printing much smoother and easier! Download PrintPods app, connect to Wi-Fi, upload image or DIY, click “print” and done. Compatible with IOS and Android, truly worry-free.

 

PrintPods sparks all your desire for creative ideas with hundreds of unique in-app patterns. Boom! Just like magic, a new big name in art!

 

With an advanced pulley sensor, PrintPods will detect and respond to your moves off the bat. Print faster, more accurate and much easier!

Half the size but superior battery life stands still! PrintPods’ advanced battery technology makes every one of your ideas happen with 1000+ continuous prints. Dreams never settle, neither does PrintPods!

With just one single cartridge, you can effortlessly continuously print over 3500 times.  

Compared to other mediocre printers, PrintPods excels, especially in its print width. A 2x times wider print width doubles your output and lets you get more done in each pass. It’s a productivity boost for business and lets you take your artistic creativity to the next-level.

 

All of us have experienced frustration when looking at the in-store print pickup price and quality. Low cost performance, fewer choices… PrintPods could your best piggy bank with super powerful printing functions. Every single print just costs you $0.01!

Our first generation handheld printer was a smash hit with business people, artists and creatives. The successful product launch raised over $400,000 with more than 3000 backers and gave users the power to print anywhere, anytime. Now, PrintPods takes the next step with more powerful features, multiple ink options and smooth, accurate prints on any material or surface.

EVEBOT is a start-up tech company of 3D printing and inkjet experts that pioneered the concept of non-standardized printing. Our solutions give users the power to print on any material in new and creative ways free from the desktop and office. We dream big then make it happen and believe that the printers you use should be as useful and creative as you are. We have even successfully introduced coffee and beer printers! What’s next? Join us and let’s take printing into the future together.

*What's in the box

story:
We are sorry to inform everyone that as of today 2020-11-10, our entire 30% discount stock has been Sold Out. Don't worry, you can still get all versions of GUILIN at an amazing 20% discount while stock lasts!

We are sorry to inform everyone that as of today 2020-5-13, our entire 40% discount stock has been Sold Out. Don't worry, you can still get all versions of GUILIN at an amazing 30% discount while stock lasts!

Below is our latest live demo on how GUILIN can reduce TVOC level even when the lamp is switched off. This means that your interior is constantly being detoxified of any VIRUS (inc. All Corona Virus), BACTERIA (inc. Salmonella + E-Coli) & POLLUTANTS (inc. Nitrogen Oxide + Formaldehyde) with GUILIN permanently. For more info on what TVOC is and why it is harmful to all of us. Please click on link below:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Volatile_organic_...

GUILIN MAXIMUM BRIGHTNESS (best environment cleansing effect)

GUILIN MEDIUM BRIGHTNESS x NATURAL INDOOR LIGHT (good environment cleansing effect)

GUILIN POWER OFF x NATURAL INDOOR LIGHT (still sustain environment cleansing effect)

A 24 hours/365 days environment detoxification solution + its pretty, multi-award winning proven design and suits any interior or exterior spaces + does not resemble an old fashion ugly air purifier tech gadget!

GUILIN is a piece of functional illumination art that helps your well being + our planet

 

The Brighter GUILIN becomes, the better it will cleanse the environment as proven with our ground breaking Photocatalysis additive but this process is continuous even when the lamp is switched off. Our Photocatalysis process is completely safe on humans as proven by our Material Safety Data Sheet. GUILIN is designed as a "Lampscape" to aid the well-beings of your family:  https://www.blglab.com/in-house-scientific-datas

Is it a lamp? Or a sculpture? Or both? GUILIN is most appropriately described as a ‘Lampscape’' With etched acrylic mountains that sit on an illuminated base, the Multiple Award-Winning GUILIN lights up your room with an ambient glow, while also adding sculptural beauty to one’s space… and it purifies the air too.

Principally, GUILIN comes with a base that uses edge-lit acrylic mountains to disperse light around the room. The abstractly designed edge-lit mountains come made from glass-reinforced acrylic and sit within slots in a metallic base fitted with a low-voltage 2700K warm LED light. The light shines through the base and the clear mountains, bouncing off the lines etched into the acrylic…. but that isn’t all.

The design also works as a photocatalytic air purifier that uses visible light to unlock certain naturally occurring minerals to cleanse the environment of impurities and toxins like 99.99% of all Viruses (including all types of Corona Virus),Bacteria, Nitrogen Oxide, Formaldehyde, Odor + Pollen Particles (scroll down and see our test data).

A good example of how this works can be found right above you for roughly half a day… the sun. It uses a similar light-based treatment to enrich and elevate your surroundings, not just aesthetically, but also in a very tangible way by purifying the very air you breathe… and it does so while channeling the same sort of imagery, hence the mountain-inspired design.

You can shift and orient the mountains to create a landscape that gives you calm or complements your space. You can even cleverly add more mountains to diffuse more light, much like a physical, interactive dimmer mechanism.

Designed as an ode to nature and the tranquility of mother earth, GUILIN's base comes coated in environmentally friendly paint, while the acrylic mountains themselves are made from 40% recycled plastic. Place the GUILIN on a glossy reflective surface and it mimics the feeling of staring at the mountains sitting right behind a lake!




Latest 2020 articles:

https://www.trendhunter.com/trends/guilin-lamp

https://coolbacker.com/guilin-modular-lamp-insp...

https://www.geeky-gadgets.com/guilin-lamp-13-01...

http://www.trenddb.com/1350870

https://www.debop.gr/deBlog/nea/a-design-award-competition-teleftaia-prosklisi-gia-katathesi-symmetoxon

https://www.zeusnews.it//n.php?c=27947

https://www.yankodesign.com/2020/01/20/the-awar...

https://inhabitat.com/this-lamp-is-a-work-of-art-that-cleans-the-air/

https://www.scmp.com/lifestyle/interiors-living/article/2187712/lamp-rids-air-toxins-first-be-activated-non-uv-light-says

here is the latest article with the same photocatalytic technology on our Flagship Lamp (at no.5 on the link) FOGLIA :

https://www.yankodesign.com/2020/02/07/our-top-...

BLG Tech, based in Italy and Hong Kong is our collaborator on it revolutionary photocatalytic technology, below is our live testing 

You can download some of BLG scientific testing documentation here:

https://www.blglab.com/in-house-scientific-datas

Please visit www.blglab.com for more info.

Above is the first Photocatalysis test done on our other lamp FOGLIA
in late 2018 and shows a standard Air Quality Measurement Device dropping in pollutant levels under any lighting condition. We have since improve the treatment activation wavelength to work even in near darkness!
1) https://www.yankodesign.com/2020/02/07/our-top-...

2) https://www.scmp.com/lifestyle/interiors-living/article/2187712/lamp-rids-air-toxins-first-be-activated-non-uv-light-says

Please note that unlike most small and cheap gadgets that claims to work with the Photocatalytic process, the only solution to efficiently use this technology is based on the equation below:
*PHOTOCATALYSIS EFFECTIVENESS=Applied Surface Area + Photon Wavelength*
this is why GUILIN is designed as a rather large lamp with the 3 layering of mountains as this is the ONLY way any design can work effectively in a relatively limited area to cleanse the surrounding environment.

After our successful 30 Days Kickstarter Campaign, GUILIN will soon be at home around the globe in the above 19 Countries spread around 4 Continents! Lets globalized GUILIN even more and work together to improve our planet's delicate atmosphere!

 

GUILIN production version was first shown in 2019 China Shenzhen International Design Fair at the Italy's A Design Award Pavilion with enormous fan fare!

SUGO's own exhibition at the world renowned 2019 Paris Maison & Objet Furniture Fair with some of our other lamps collection. GUILIN was shown here in prototype form but was sold to a private collector within the first day of the show's opening.​

 

DOWNLOAD HERE: https://we.tl/t-RvypdS9ncK

 

http://www.iamsugo.com

SUGO was born in 2018 with the sole mission of creating ground breaking contemporary Biophilia furniture designs. Started by husband and wife team Kevin Chu and Giulia Di Bonaventura they are serious lovers of nature and wanted to fuse advance sustainable technologies with nature inspired ideas. All the designs focus on working with or giving back to nature. 

http://www.coc.design

Kevin is also the founder and director of COC design based in Hong Kong and Italy and was educated in Architectural Association and Bartlett School of Architecture in London under world renowned architects Peter Cook and Marcos Cruz and was the sole recipient of Bartlett Archigram Design Award in 2001.  Giulia, who hails from Abruzzo region of Italy has extensive experience working with Italy/China Design Education industry. 

With over 20 years in the architecture and design industry SUGO and COC design have won over 50 international awards (including Lexus Awards Japan, Reddot Design Award Germany, IDA Los Angeles USA, A Design Award Italy, Architizer USA, Red Star Award China, Chicago Athenaeum Award USA, Perspective Award Hong Kong) and have been featured in international design publications (including DesignBoom, DesignMilk, Home Journal, Design 360, IDEAT magazine, Terraforme, Perspective Magazine, Home Italia, Architectural Digest, Architizer).

A 24 hours/365 days environment detoxification solution + its pretty, multi-award winning proven design and suits any interior or exterior spaces + does not resemble an old fashion ugly air purifier tech gadget!
GUILIN is a piece of functional illumination art that helps your well being + our planet
 
The Brighter GUILIN becomes, the better it will cleanse the environment as proven with our ground breaking Photocatalysis additive but this process is continuous even when the lamp is switched off. Our Photocatalysis process is completely safe on humans as proven by our Material Safety Data Sheet. GUILIN is designed as a "Lampscape" to aid the well-beings of your family:  https://www.blglab.com/in-house-scientific-datasIs it a lamp? Or a sculpture? Or both? GUILIN is most appropriately described as a ‘Lampscape’' With etched acrylic mountains that sit on an illuminated base, the Multiple Award-Winning GUILIN lights up your room with an ambient glow, while also adding sculptural beauty to one’s space… and it purifies the air too.Principally, GUILIN comes with a base that uses edge-lit acrylic mountains to disperse light around the room. The abstractly designed edge-lit mountains come made from glass-reinforced acrylic and sit within slots in a metallic base fitted with a low-voltage 2700K warm LED light. The light shines through the base and the clear mountains, bouncing off the lines etched into the acrylic…. but that isn’t all. The design also works as a photocatalytic air purifier that uses visible light to unlock certain naturally occurring minerals to cleanse the environment of impurities and toxins like 99.99% of all Viruses (including all types of Corona Virus),Bacteria, Nitrogen Oxide, Formaldehyde, Odor + Pollen Particles (scroll down and see our test data).A good example of how this works can be found right above you for roughly half a day… the sun. It uses a similar light-based treatment to enrich and elevate your surroundings, not just aesthetically, but also in a very tangible way by purifying the very air you breathe… and it does so while channeling the same sort of imagery, hence the mountain-inspired design.You can shift and orient the mountains to create a landscape that gives you calm or complements your space. You can even cleverly add more mountains to diffuse more light, much like a physical, interactive dimmer mechanism.Designed as an ode to nature and the tranquility of mother earth, GUILIN's base comes coated in environmentally friendly paint, while the acrylic mountains themselves are made from 40% recycled plastic. Place the GUILIN on a glossy reflective surface and it mimics the feeling of staring at the mountains sitting right behind a lake!




Latest 2020 articles:
https://www.trendhunter.com/trends/guilin-lamp
https://coolbacker.com/guilin-modular-lamp-insp...
https://www.geeky-gadgets.com/guilin-lamp-13-01...
http://www.trenddb.com/1350870
https://www.debop.gr/deBlog/nea/a-design-award-competition-teleftaia-prosklisi-gia-katathesi-symmetoxon
https://www.zeusnews.it//n.php?c=27947
https://www.yankodesign.com/2020/01/20/the-awar...
https://inhabitat.com/this-lamp-is-a-work-of-art-that-cleans-the-air/
https://www.scmp.com/lifestyle/interiors-living/article/2187712/lamp-rids-air-toxins-first-be-activated-non-uv-light-says
here is the latest article with the same photocatalytic technology on our Flagship Lamp (at no.5 on the link) FOGLIA :
https://www.yankodesign.com/2020/02/07/our-top-...







BLG Tech, based in Italy and Hong Kong is our collaborator on it revolutionary photocatalytic technology, below is our live testing 






You can download some of BLG scientific testing documentation here:
https://www.blglab.com/in-house-scientific-datas
Please visit www.blglab.com for more info.



Above is the first Photocatalysis test done on our other lamp FOGLIA

in late 2018 and shows a standard Air Quality Measurement Device dropping in pollutant levels under any lighting condition. We have since improve the treatment activation wavelength to work even in near darkness!

1) https://www.yankodesign.com/2020/02/07/our-top-...

2) https://www.scmp.com/lifestyle/interiors-living/article/2187712/lamp-rids-air-toxins-first-be-activated-non-uv-light-says

Please note that unlike most small and cheap gadgets that claims to work with the Photocatalytic process, the only solution to efficiently use this technology is based on the equation below:
*PHOTOCATALYSIS EFFECTIVENESS=Applied Surface Area + Photon Wavelength*
this is why GUILIN is designed as a rather large lamp with the 3 layering of mountains as this is the ONLY way any design can work effectively in a relatively limited area to cleanse the surrounding environment.








After our successful 30 Days Kickstarter Campaign, GUILIN will soon be at home around the globe in the above 19 Countries spread around 4 Continents! Lets globalized GUILIN even more and work together to improve our planet's delicate atmosphere!



 

GUILIN production version was first shown in 2019 China Shenzhen International Design Fair at the Italy's A Design Award Pavilion with enormous fan fare!



SUGO's own exhibition at the world renowned 2019 Paris Maison & Objet Furniture Fair with some of our other lamps collection. GUILIN was shown here in prototype form but was sold to a private collector within the first day of the show's opening.​

 DOWNLOAD HERE: https://we.tl/t-RvypdS9ncK http://www.iamsugo.comSUGO was born in 2018 with the sole mission of creating ground breaking contemporary Biophilia furniture designs. Started by husband and wife team Kevin Chu and Giulia Di Bonaventura they are serious lovers of nature and wanted to fuse advance sustainable technologies with nature inspired ideas. All the designs focus on working with or giving back to nature. http://www.coc.designKevin is also the founder and director of COC design based in Hong Kong and Italy and was educated in Architectural Association and Bartlett School of Architecture in London under world renowned architects Peter Cook and Marcos Cruz and was the sole recipient of Bartlett Archigram Design Award in 2001.  Giulia, who hails from Abruzzo region of Italy has extensive experience working with Italy/China Design Education industry. With over 20 years in the architecture and design industry SUGO and COC design have won over 50 international awards (including Lexus Awards Japan, Reddot Design Award Germany, IDA Los Angeles USA, A Design Award Italy, Architizer USA, Red Star Award China, Chicago Athenaeum Award USA, Perspective Award Hong Kong) and have been featured in international design publications (including DesignBoom, DesignMilk, Home Journal, Design 360, IDEAT magazine, Terraforme, Perspective Magazine, Home Italia, Architectural Digest, Architizer).

story:
CLICK ON THE VIDEO ABOVE TO GET AN OVERVIEW OF THE NEW BARBUZZ APP!

WHAT IT IS

 

BarBuzz is part social network, part marketing tool.

Barbuzz is a new social network partying app that helps bar-goers connect with their friends and favorite servers, and always know what's going on at their favorite bars and clubs. 

Additionally, BarBuzz is a great new tool bars can use to connect with their customers directly - through messaging, profile updates and advertising.

 

BARBUZZ SCREENSHOTS

 

TRY OUR FUNCTIONAL MOCKUP! CLICK HERE. (Browser must be Chrome, Firefox or Safari to view.) Note that the mockup doesn't represent the final graphic design - but gives an idea of what's in the app and how it would work. 

 

GREAT FOR BAR-GOERS!

         - Use BarBuzz to tell you where your friends are at RIGHT NOW and tell others where you are, so they can join you. 
         - Use BarBuzz to follow your favorite servers  and see where they are working RIGHT NOW. 

         - Use BarBuzz to follow your favorite bars and clubs and always be up to date on their latest specials, promotions, events and news!
         - Use BarBuzz to message friends or servers at bars you're interested in visiting and get the real scoop on what's buzzing. 
          - Use BarBuzz to post your party pics at a bar's gallery so everyone can see the fun you and your friends are having!

 

GREAT FOR BARTENDERS AND SERVERS!

         - Use BarBuzz to post your work schedule for your regulars so they always know where you're working and when! You control who sees what. 

         - Use BarBuzz to send messages/updates/promos to your regulars and always let them know why they should be out partying with you!

          - Use BarBuzz to look for bar-industry job openings in our free listings!

          - Use BarBuzz as your professional social network and keep your Facebook, Instagram, etc. as your personal social networks. You no longer need to give out your phone number or even your last name to customers you may not know well yet. 
 

GREAT FOR BAR OWNERS AND MANAGERS!

          - Use BarBuzz to post your specials and entertainment on your own profile page and let customers know exactly what's going on THAT DAY. 

          - Use BarBuzz to post staff or party pictures to your time-stamped Photo Gallery, so customers can see the fun as it happens. 

          - Use BarBuzz to advertise to the right audience at the right time. Put your ad in front of people looking for a place to go that day or night!

           - Use BarBuzz to advertise your job openings with free listings!

 

GREAT FOR THE BAR INDUSTRY!

          - Use BarBuzz to advertise your products and services to the lucrative 18-65 yo, high-disposable income segment. Ads can be targeted citywide, statewide or nationwide. 
 
BARBUZZ SCREENSHOTS

 

 

SEE PHOTOS BELOW OF THE BARBUZZ PERKS BEING OFFERED AND CONSIDER CONTRIBUTING TO RECEIVE YOURS!

ONLY INDIEGOGO CONTRIBUTORS WILL BE ABLE TO GET THE BARBUZZ APP VIP VERSION, ENABLING YOU TO RECEIVE DISCOUNTS AND SPECIAL VIP FEATURES.

PERK: STAINLESS STEEL BARTENDER'S BAR KEY

PERK: UNISEX 100% COTTON T-SHIRT

NOTE: If your perk comes with a T-shirt, unfortunately, the contribution process doesn't have a way for you to choose a size, so please click the "ASK A QUESTION" link at top right of the page and send your SIZE, NAME and EMAIL ADDRESS. 

 

HOW YOU CAN HELP

BarBuzz will be a reality but we need YOUR HELP to get it live! We currently have a FUNCTIONAL MOCKUP of the app which you can click through and see in action (Browser must be Chrome, Firefox or Safari to view). But getting a coded version for both iPhone and Android phones that we can test and upload to the app stores is proving costly. While we have invested close to $100K, we are looking to raise another $50,000 to finish coding, testing, secure server space (for all those photos) and get BarBuzz into your hands as soon as possible!!

This may seem like a daunting amount of money to try to raise – but this is an app that can literally be used from day one by anyone at any bar or club in any city in America! That’s a lot of BARS who can use this app to promote their establishments – and that’s a lot of CUSTOMERS like you who LOVE going out for a cold one or some great entertainment. Every little bit will help!

 

 

PERK: 16 oz LIBBEY CUSTOM PINT GLASS
 

GREAT GIFTS/PERKS FOR CONTRIBUTORS

Because this app can be used by Bars/Clubs and Customers, we are providing TWO categories of PERKS for those of you who choose to help us make BarBuzz a reality! Bars and Club owners can donate and receive some awesome, extremely valuable ADVERTISING within the app to a very niche market of customers who are ready to go out and party on any particular night. 

Customers or even Servers who donate can snag some really cool BarBuzz-branded gifts in the process to add to their own home bar – or for servers to use in their everyday line of work (check out the BarBuzz-branded Bar Keys!).

GET VIP VERSION OF THE APP BY CONTRIBUTING NOW!

While the BarBuzz app will be free to download once it is live, contributors via Indiegogo will receive a special unique code to unlock a special VIP VERSION of BARBUZZ, which will give you special discounts and features that others won't have! That's our way - along with great branded items - of saying thanks to our supporters who help make BarBuzz a reality!

 

 

 

PERK: 10 oz RIOJA WHITE WINE GLASS

 

We’re asking the average person to think about what they spend on a typical night out and consider contributing half or even the full amount. Once you start using BarBuzz you will get a great return in the FUN it helps you have, literally every night you go out! Either way, we promise some great perks to show off to your friends that YOU were a FOUNDING CONTRIBUTOR and helped make BarBuzz a reality for everyone to use!

Choose from these cool branded perks: beer mugs, shot glasses, pint glasses, whiskey glasses, wine glasses, bar keys (bottle openers), T-shirts, caps, Doozies, along with the special VIP VERSION of the BarBuzz app.

 

PERK: WOMEN'S DEEP V JERSEY, 100% COTTON
 

BUSINESS CONTRIBUTORS CAN RECEIVE IN-APP ADVERTISING AS THEIR PERKS

Business owners who market to the 18-65 party-spending crowd can receive in-App banner or full-screen ads for 3 months – targeted citywide, statewide or nationwide to all BarBuzz users. While Bar and Club owners will be natural advertisers on BarBuzz, advertisers can be ANY COMPANY that would benefit from targeting Bar and Club goers. These include companies such as: Beer, Wine and Liquor companies or distributors, Cigarette companies, Transportation services, such as Uber, Lyft, Limos or personal driver services, late-night restaurants or Festival and Concert organizers, to name just a few! Besides the Advertising Perks shown at the right, other advertising packages are available as Perks - just contact us and let us know what you are seeking. 

 

PERK: BALL CAP, COTTON, 1-SIZE FITS ALL, ADULT
 

Banner ads will appear at the bottom of each screen that’s displayed (non-moving ads to eliminate annoying distractions). Full-screen display ads will be presented interstitially – that is, irregularly, as one moves from one page to another. Users will not be overwhelmed by advertising, but a good balance of content and ads will be regulated.

 

 

PERK: 16 oz BEER MUG WITH THUMB GRIP HANDLE
 

TIMELINE

Once the fundraising period ends, all contributors will be tallied and the branded perk items will be ordered. We anticipate this will take about 2 weeks to produce and ship to us and we will then take about 2-3 weeks to ship to contributors – so expect to receive them in 3-5 weeks.

Coding, testing and going live is estimated to take about 4-5 months.

 

 

PERK: COLLAPSIBLE BEER KOOZIE

LET’S PARTY

Whether you contribute a little or a lot, every single contribution will help us make this fantastic party resource a reality. Whether you’re a hard-partying college student, a martini or wine drinking 30-something, or a whiskey-sipping boomer, BarBuzz will be invaluable to you when deciding, “Where are we going tonight?”

Please help us bring it to life!

Note that you can contribute ANY amount you wish, as long as it's at least one U.S. dollar. The "Perk" levels described at top right are for those of you that want to receive a thank-you gift by donating at a specified level. If you do not want a Perk and just want to make a donation, simply click the "BACK IT" button at the top of the page.

Even if we don't reach our entire goal, Indiegogo will award the amount we were able to reach and you will still receive your selected Perk!

PLEASE SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN WITH YOUR FRIENDS!

No matter what you can contribute, if you can share our campaign with as many friends who might possibly use the BarBuzz app, it will help tremendously! See the various methods of sharing at the top right of the page. 

Thanks for your support!

 

 

 

PERK: 9.25 oz MALAGA WHISKEY GLASS

FAQs

Q: Are there any cities that will not be included at launch?

A: No! Any city in the U.S. can use BarBuzz. Most bars will automatically be listed to the database, but if your bar is not listed, just add it with your company information.

Q: I’m a server and don’t want to post my real name for security reasons. Will that limit how many customers/regulars can follow me on BarBuzz?

A: Not at all. BarBuzz is set up so you can use a “nickname,” so that your full name doesn’t have to be used online. Nicknames don’t have to be unique, but we encourage you to be creative, so your regulars know it’s you. Nicknames can also be changed at any time.

Q: I’m a server and worried that posting my work schedule could be a security concern.

A: We understand! BarBuzz lets YOU decide who sees whatever information you want to post. You can even set up a default view so that all new followers of yours automatically see limited information, unless you change their “viewing profile.”

Q: In what other ways does BarBuzz help servers limit the viewing of their information and protect their privacy?

A: Using BarBuzz will actually IMPROVE privacy for servers. Currently, if you want to communicate with your regulars you have to either give out your phone number (to text), give out your last name and access to your Facebook, or other social media profile, where you also end up giving access to a great deal of your PERSONAL life. By getting customers to follow you on BarBuzz, you can separate your PERSONAL social network from your PROFESSIONAL social network. You can even create a nickname or alias for your BarBuzz profile, so you don’t have to give out your last name, if you don’t want to. If you were hesitant to broadcast work promotions on your personal social networks, now you can promote your work and communicate - individually or in groups – to the people who matter most – your customers. Using BarBuzz means more privacy and more business!

Q: If I contribute to this campaign, do I own a piece of BarBuzz?

A: No. Equity Crowdfunding is not yet allowed on Indiegogo – only Contributor Crowdfunding.  Besides, U.S. Equity Crowdfunding laws are in their infancy and are heavily regulated by the SEC.

Q: If I won’t own a piece of BarBuzz, why should I contribute?

A: If you think BarBuzz is a cool app that you and your friends would use, this is your chance to help make it a reality! By contributing via Indiegogo, you will enjoy a special VIP VERSION of the BarBuzz app, providing you with special features and discounts. Also, Contributor Crowdfunding is a great way for individuals to show their support for great new company ideas that might not get funded otherwise. 

We think we have great BarBuzz-branded Perks for individuals or bar owners that will make you want to contribute.

In addition to these great Perks, once BarBuzz is a reality, individuals and bar owners will benefit just by using this great partying and marketing tool! Even if your business isn’t specifically tied to a bar, many related companies will benefit by target marketing to the customers, employees and management of bars through advertising. Examples of advertisers include alcohol and beer brands, tobacco companies, vaping brands, ride-sharing services and many more!

PERK: 1.75 oz SHOT GLASS
 
 
 

 

A WORD ON CROWDFUNDING

Not everyone has visited a crowdfunding site, though most people have heard about them. So here's a short recap of how they work: 

1. Folks who have a great new product or business idea create a "campaign" seeking to raise a specific amount of money by a certain date (usually 30 days) to get their business going. The power of the crowd enables someone to ask for a little and get a lot (some popular campaigns become wildly successful and surpass their goals by double or triple!). 

2. Folks who like the idea of the new business and see the value in it and want to support the creation of something new and unique will contribute to the cause. 

3. Call them "Perks," giveaways, or swag - just like NPR and those famous tote bags and mugs, Indiegogo contributors receive what are called "Perks," from the campaign creators, depending on the level of contribution. The Perks are listed at the top right-hand side of the campaign page and listed by dollar amount. Find a perk you would like and consider giving at that level (BarBuzz has Perks designed for Individuals and Business owners). If you wish to contribute an amount not set up as a Perk, you will get the Perk at the next lowest level to that amount - unless you specify you don't wish to receive any Perk.

4. About two weeks after the campaign ends, the campaigner receives all the funds contributed, minus about 5% for Indiegogo and about 3% for credit card processors like Visa.

5. The Perks are then ordered and mailed to contributors and email updates are sent out periodically, updating contributors on how the raised money is being used and when the new product or business is officially launched!

Don't forget that the BEST PERK of ALL is that you will be able to download and use this incredible new social network partying app called BARBUZZ!  And by contributing, you also get the much coveted VIP VERSION of the BARBUZZ app! Contribute now and encourage your partying friends to do the same!!!

 

 

All material Copyright 2016 BarBuzz LLC. 

BarBuzz is a registered service mark of BarBuzz LLC.  All other logos, service marks and trademarks are property of their respective companies and owners.
