A: No! Any city in the U.S. can use BarBuzz. Most bars will automatically be listed to the database, but if your bar is not listed, just add it with your company information.
Q: I’m a server and don’t want to post my real name for security reasons. Will that limit how many customers/regulars can follow me on BarBuzz? 
A: Not at all. BarBuzz is set up so you can use a “nickname,” so that your full name doesn’t have to be used online. Nicknames don’t have to be unique, but we encourage you to be creative, so your regulars know it’s you. Nicknames can also be changed at any time.
Q: I’m a server and worried that posting my work schedule could be a security concern. 
A: We understand! BarBuzz lets YOU decide who sees whatever information you want to post. You can even set up a default view so that all new followers of yours automatically see limited information, unless you change their “viewing profile.”
Q: In what other ways does BarBuzz help servers limit the viewing of their information and protect their privacy? 
A: Using BarBuzz will actually IMPROVE privacy for servers. Currently, if you want to communicate with your regulars you have to either give out your phone number (to text), give out your last name and access to your Facebook, or other social media profile, where you also end up giving access to a great deal of your PERSONAL life. By getting customers to follow you on BarBuzz, you can separate your PERSONAL social network from your PROFESSIONAL social network. You can even create a nickname or alias for your BarBuzz profile, so you don’t have to give out your last name, if you don’t want to. If you were hesitant to broadcast work promotions on your personal social networks, now you can promote your work and communicate - individually or in groups – to the people who matter most – your customers. Using BarBuzz means more privacy and more business!
Q: If I contribute to this campaign, do I own a piece of BarBuzz? 
A: No. Equity Crowdfunding is not yet allowed on Indiegogo – only Contributor Crowdfunding.  Besides, U.S. Equity Crowdfunding laws are in their infancy and are heavily regulated by the SEC.
Q: If I won’t own a piece of BarBuzz, why should I contribute? 
A: If you think BarBuzz is a cool app that you and your friends would use, this is your chance to help make it a reality! By contributing via Indiegogo, you will enjoy a special VIP VERSION of the BarBuzz app, providing you with special features and discounts. Also, Contributor Crowdfunding is a great way for individuals to show their support for great new company ideas that might not get funded otherwise. 
We think we have great BarBuzz-branded Perks for individuals or bar owners that will make you want to contribute.
In addition to these great Perks, once BarBuzz is a reality, individuals and bar owners will benefit just by using this great partying and marketing tool! Even if your business isn’t specifically tied to a bar, many related companies will benefit by target marketing to the customers, employees and management of bars through advertising. Examples of advertisers include alcohol and beer brands, tobacco companies, vaping brands, ride-sharing services and many more!

PERK: 1.75 oz SHOT GLASS
 
 
 

 
A WORD ON CROWDFUNDING
Not everyone has visited a crowdfunding site, though most people have heard about them. So here's a short recap of how they work: 
1. Folks who have a great new product or business idea create a "campaign" seeking to raise a specific amount of money by a certain date (usually 30 days) to get their business going. The power of the crowd enables someone to ask for a little and get a lot (some popular campaigns become wildly successful and surpass their goals by double or triple!). 
2. Folks who like the idea of the new business and see the value in it and want to support the creation of something new and unique will contribute to the cause. 
3. Call them "Perks," giveaways, or swag - just like NPR and those famous tote bags and mugs, Indiegogo contributors receive what are called "Perks," from the campaign creators, depending on the level of contribution. The Perks are listed at the top right-hand side of the campaign page and listed by dollar amount. Find a perk you would like and consider giving at that level (BarBuzz has Perks designed for Individuals and Business owners). If you wish to contribute an amount not set up as a Perk, you will get the Perk at the next lowest level to that amount - unless you specify you don't wish to receive any Perk.
4. About two weeks after the campaign ends, the campaigner receives all the funds contributed, minus about 5% for Indiegogo and about 3% for credit card processors like Visa.
5. The Perks are then ordered and mailed to contributors and email updates are sent out periodically, updating contributors on how the raised money is being used and when the new product or business is officially launched!
Don't forget that the BEST PERK of ALL is that you will be able to download and use this incredible new social network partying app called BARBUZZ!  And by contributing, you also get the much coveted VIP VERSION of the BARBUZZ app! Contribute now and encourage your partying friends to do the same!!!
 
 
All material Copyright 2016 BarBuzz LLC. 
BarBuzz is a registered service mark of BarBuzz LLC.  All other logos, service marks and trademarks are property of their respective companies and owners.

story:
Certificates, Passports, Licenses, Transcripts, Prescriptions, Medical Records, Investments, Bank Statements, Receipts, Warranties, Travel Bills, Business Documents or employee records. ALLDOX is a must have 'One-Stop, Easy & Secure' tool for managing all of your important documents. With this smart app on your mobile you will never struggle to find them in time.
 
You can scan, safe-keep, locate originals, nominate, auto upload by email, add alerts & more and, of course, find & share your documents, anytime & anywhere. ALLDOX is your personal document assistant in your pocket.
 

ALLDOX has enterprise level security processes and AES 256 encryption with a personal key for every user to ensure that your important documents stay secure & private and you always have your 'Peace of Mind'.

Available as mobile apps on iPhone, iPads, Android Phones & Tabs and as Web app. Seamlessly access your account on any platform.

 

ALLDOX HOME is perfect for 'Personal & Family Use'

 

 

If you are the next BIG entrepreneur in making, ALLDOX BUSINESS is a 'must have' tool for you and your team!

 

 

ALLDOX is brought to you by ALLDOX Inc., a Delaware corporation with its registered office in California, USA.  ALLDOX Pte. Ltd, the holding company of the venture is based in Singapore. The back-end and service company of the venture is based in India.

ALLDOX is built and run by seasoned leaders with demonstrated  capabilities in running high performance businesses with global players like Walmart, Kurt Salmon Associates, GE, Citibank, Standard Chartered, Taylor Nelson and Barclays Bank.

The venture is backed by private angel investors based in the United States, Canada,  Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Hong kong, UAE and India.

It's you, me, my friend's mother-in-law, your entrepreneur friend, my lawyer, your daughter's school, my vet and practically everyone around us. 

There are people who are incredibly organized and then there are those who have mastered the art of an organized mess. No matter which category we fall under, we have all experienced that panic when we cannot seem to find an important document right when we need it the most.

Think of a start up entrepreneur with a small team and tight resources. This entrepreneur plays in the world of big boys and competition without much of limitations. Does that not call for the superhero and his/her team to have an extra tool to be super productive? 

Enter ALLDOX, the trusted and easy-to-use document management app that enables users to organize their important documents in a safe and secure environment by combining a consumer-friendly application with enterprise-level best practices and security.

For business users, it is a multi user document intranet that also helps in managing critical processes like claims, leaves or document executions, secure, fast and on the go.

ALLDOX is for the smart families to save time and stress of searching documents. It is for high potential entrepreneurs  in small businesses to have that extra edge, to be super productive with documents, internally and with the external world.

It is for everyone to save time, money, stress and have their 'Peace of Mind'. With digitization being part of the offering, ALLDOX also walks the path of building a paperless world, a greener world for us and our future generations!

ALLDOX BUSINESS is our brand new app in beta and will be launched in its full avatar in May 2017. We believe that small business entrepreneurs need a productivity tool like ALLDOX BUSINESS more than anybody else.  Indiegogo is a great place to access early adopters and dynamic start up entrepreneurs, our core target segment. We want your honest opinion and feedback so that we can perfect it this app, a must have tool that will save millions of dollars for small businesses in days to come.

This is also a great place create buzz for an app like ALLDOX, which is rich with consumer insights and is all set to scale up from its current base of a million of international downloads.

 

 

 

 

WEB APP @  www.alldox.com

story:
Welcome to the most epic purchasing community ever created

​

OUR VISION

Epicconsumer aim's to create the world's largest group purchasing platform, negotiating the best deals and packages for its network across the world.

Imagine what we could achieve if we were a million consumers?

 

OUR MEMBERSHIP

Become a member of Epic Consumer Club and join a community of over 10,000 consumer, negotiating together their prices for everything from groceries, gas, telecom, insurance, household good and any other items our community is working on.  

ITS SIMPLE

Every consumer out there has their day to day expenses   i.e. gas, groceries, insurance, telecom, clothing and many more.

EPIC CONSUMER has created a model where as a community, we incentivize large corporations to provide an opportunity for transparency and accountability, while driving down the cost of our daily lives.

 

HOW IT WORKS

 

WHO WE WORK WITH

 

 

By harnessing the power of our group purchasing community and the interconnectivity of our consumer network, we are driving down the cost of essential utilities such as Household goods, Gas, food, telecom and anything else our community is working on.  

Our consumer community, acts as a single large purchasing unit. As a simple consumer, large corporations would never consider offering you the best deals or packages possible at the most reasonable prices. This innovative will provide a platform for all consumers, delivering seamless communication across a distributed web of service providers and retailers.

 

DISCOVER WHAT OUR COMMUNITY IS WORKING ON

 

Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR)

 

Telecommunications

 

Gas Stations

 

Groceries and Retail Stores

 

HOW WILL THE EPIC CONSUMER APP WORK?

It provides you with a platform where you will be able to:

  • Connect with your fellow EPIC CONSUMERS (10,253 and growing)
  • Access to webinars, briefings, infosession on consumer oriented subjects
  • Listing of all fulfilled and upcoming projects and negotiations
  • Platform where all EPIC Consumers will be able to start their own campaign
  • Platform to start your own socially responsible campaign
  • Geo location for all projects near you (I.e. who is working with our community close by?)

Does it sound too easy? Well, we have worked really hard to make it easy for you, so EVERY ONE of us can become EPIC CONSUMERS without having to leave their household or drastically change their lifestyle :)

 

WE STAND TOGETHER AS EPIC CONSUMERS

If we want things to change, we need to push for change together. The larger the community, the bigger the change

In an increasingly open, digital world where authenticity is the buzzword of choice, EPIC CONSUMER believes that businesses must keep up with growing demands for ethical behaviour and transparency in everything from:

  1. EMPLOYEE RIGHTS
  2. TRANSPARENCY
  3. CORPORATE RESPONSIBILITY
  4. CORPORATE ACCOUNTABILITY
  5. ENVIRONMENTAL FOOTPRINT

EPIC CONSUMER believes technology is the key to dealing with these social challenges. Open data, social networks and mobile tech can change the game.

Which is why this year, we have embarked on turning our findings into a social movement/community, creating a platform, empowering consumers and businesses to take steps towards being socially responsible to their customers.

 

FEATURES

 

BENEFITS

 

 

OUR PILOT PROJECT

Our team here at Epic Consumer Club is dedicated to lowering the cost of living for all consumers. For the past year, 

Epic Consumer Club been working diligently on a pilot project with over 15,000 consumers. Reaching out to over 50+ service providers in different industries: from telecom, to large food chains, insurance companies, car manufacturers, health insurance providers, pharmacies and many more.  

Results have been extremely promising, where the average consumer in our network reduced their bills by over 40%, saving close to 1000$ in 6 months.  

We believe that it is time that we offer these savings to the rest of the world and start fighting back against the rising cost of living. We’ve proven that this concept works and we are ready to streamline the process, providing this opportunity to all consumers out there.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

KARBON BUSTERS is a relatively simple concept and is already proven through our broad base membership of approximately 10,000 members across Canada, but more specifically Quebec and Ontario.

The primary risk that we could encounter would be the delay in negotiating the packages and deals with the large corporations. Indeed, negotiations with the large corporations can take time and many weeks to come through. For example, we have successfully negotiated a package with a large gas station franchise where they will plant a tree everytime one of our members will go fuel up with them. However, the negotiations took almost 2 months and a long waiting time from their executive and CSR teams. 

On the other hand, there is also some risk that the development and the production of the mobile application may take longer than expected. Coordinating with the developers and maintaining quality throughout every step is a challenge.Fulfillment becomes a hurdle when dealing with system integration and compatibility through several operating systems. We will not rush through these steps and will tackle them carefully, one by one. We will take our mobile application to the design for development step in June 2017, and the target is to have it ready to go by August 2017.

Our goal is to grow our membership base across Canada and the US, which will provide us with a better ability to develop new target markets and negotiation opportunities.

Indeed, negotiations with the large corporations can take time and many weeks to come through. For example, we have successfully negotiated a package with a large gas station franchise where they will plant a tree everytime one of our members will go fuel up with them. However, the negotiations took almost 2 months and a long waiting time from their executive and CSR teams. On the other hand, there is also some risk that the development and the production of the mobile application may take longer than expected. Coordinating with the developers and maintaining quality throughout every step is a challenge.Fulfillment becomes a hurdle when dealing with system integration and compatibility through several operating systems. We will not rush through these steps and will tackle them carefully, one by one. story:
Is An Ultimate App / Tool For Life Management Possible?

There is no doubt that technology and computerization are allowing faster and easier management of our tasks in our business, daily and social life. 

Though the amount of data processed, the variety of tools we are using and the quantity of notifications we are receiving are significantly increasing and that’s causing a huge paradox: 

Are all the tools and apps saving us from our burdens or creating new workloads? 

 

 

The offer of the apps and tools are increasing significantly and complete digitalization of our life takes a complicated messy irregular form. 

Do we need to filter the apps we are using and give up from some of them? 

In fact, the logic is quite simple. All the different apps have their own unique categories, with customization.  The way we track and manage and schedule the activities are quite same. And the most difference of those apps are the way they considering the privacy and social solutions. 

There is of course a way to solve the main paradox, which is to use an ultimate tool and put most of the categories you are tracking in it. 

Already a bilateral evolution has started: Social media started to feature lifelogging and tracking, and the lifelogging apps started to integrate with social habitat 

A new media / tool / platform / lifelogger (how you prefer to define) is already born evolved by considering the wind of change: Logg. 

 

Story of Logg

In the first just-idea phase, Logg was only about tracking the brewing tea & coffee. There will be countdown to remind us about coffee and tea. Because this is an indispensable need for humanity, everyone wants hot coffee or tea ? We think you understand that how much we love coffee. After that we thought that we want to remember when we brewed tea, then another thought appeared in our minds, we want to remember our memories based on categories.

There are too many application that tracking categories but they all separated and specified for a category. Making fulfilled memories isn’t possible with using too many applications. So, we thought again, we share our memories in social media and we can’t find any memory in social media. And then light bulb is turned on over heads, we want to create an application to remember all memories, to Logg (record) all our life, to guide ourselves with self-tracking and to increase self-awareness.

From our sight, everything in our lives are so important although we understand how important it is, when we try to remember it. Logg’s main and united idea is Remembering. But not like as notes applications, or social media apps,  remembering really and really everything, every moments from wake up to sleep. This could be possible if we work tight and hard. So, we worked hard and created Logg. Logg is now in its baby steps era but she is growing. Logg has a big opportunity with limitless minds. Nowadays, Logg in market for about one month and users are slowly adapting theirselves to track every moment and live as a organized person. New features are on the way and they will never stop.

Please give your support, make complaints, say good wishes and let’s walk together. 

 

What is LOGG?

Logg has focused on two different key features: different categorization of the all activities, both private logging and socialization on demand. 

Logg is an all-in-one life logging app. A diary, travel companion, your training assistant, budged tracker, health companion, reminder, manager, scheduler and analyzer. 

Logs, Categories and Subcategories  

After creating your profile, you are able to create your logs in various different ways but the key element is that the app allows you to create your logs within single or multiple subcategories and put those subcategories in main categories. 

As an example: If the user would like to create a log about his/her cycling experience. While creating the related log, as a first step he need to choose a subcategory, most of the sport / outdoor activities are already in subcategory database but user can also create a unique subcategory with custom title and icon and use it as well. Then users can add some text and image if they like and create the log with a couple of single steps. All the default logs are created private, users are able to tag them as public and let them visible for their followers and friends. 

There is also a favorites bar in the main screen which includes your custom most used categories and subcategories. 

Also, there are different types of ways to create logs: Quick, Custom, Timer, Countdown, Repeat. 

Users are free to discover these features and invent different combinations to track their unique activities. 

 

Social Features 

Users are free to use their personal log as social as possible. We had already mentioned that public logs are visible to friends and followers. There are 3 different levels of social environment in Logg. The first one is your own log and feed called "My Life". The second one is the feed you are able to see all the logs of the users you are following called "Social". The last and the third one is "Discover" the feed includes public logs of the users with similar interests. You can like, comment, filter and share all the public logs within the related feeds. 

 

Analyze Your Activities 

In the stats screen users are able to see the summary of their activities considering, activity counts, categories, date and frequency. Also, one of the best features includes in this screen. Users are able to compare their activity stats with their friend of friends. 

 

 

Integration 

Logg is supporting more and more third-party apps day by day. Currently the supported integrations are: Spotify, Swarm, Google Fit, Strava and Goodreads. 

 

 

Limitless Possibilities 

Record how many glasses you drink water, tea and coffee a day. Record how many kilometers you walk. Record when you buying and when you start using sunscreen. Set Reminder; do not forget to drink your medicines and to water your flowers. Write down your thoughts about the music you listen to and remember it later. Record the sentences you underlined in the books you read. Save places you trip, take photos and add. See how much time you spend on a daily job. 

Logg will show you how you spent your life. It will offer the opportunity to review your life. When you look back, you will encounter many events that you will say wow. And if you like, you can share it with the whole world or you can make it special to you.  

 

You can save data that only you don’t want to forget and the data you want to track like your health situation, sport activities, travel details, barber or coiffeur appointments etc. only create Loggs for them. 

When was the last time I ate fish?
When was the last time I went to church?
When was the last time I went to hospital?
When was the last time I went to opera?
When was the last time I made barbecue?
How many kilometers I walked?
How long have I been working?
How much exercise did I do last weekend?
Just save your key points of your life if you want to. But, from another point of view, is not every moment of our life a key point?
