story:
THIS CAMPAIGN 

HAS NOT ENDED

we are just getting started!

To contribute, please go to www.abbey9000income.com


Click for

Today's Abbey Report

Updated Daily


This is the only campaign on IndieGoGo where you will get your money back      and much more.  This software is designed specifically for the average person to earn money, and lots of it.  Thirty-one years in the making: Abbey 9000 has overcome the problems of earning money with a very small investment.

So what exactly Is Abbey? 

Abbey is an automated stock trading platform designed to create passive income. Passive income means that you set it…then forget it. Set Abbey up and then let her do her work.

Abbey 9000 Features:  

  • Abbey’s sole purpose is to make money for you and lots of it..

  • No need to sit in front of the computer all day.  Set it and forget it. Go to work, go shopping, or just going about your day.  All the while earning income with Abbey taking care of business.

  • Abbey will track the movement of every stock on all exchanges, and never miss a sound opportunity for investment.  Something impossible to do until now.

  • Losses are cut to an absolute minimum.  Never more than 7% and often at 3 ½ percent or less.

  • Abbey has the most unique Moving Stop Loss or Trailing Stop in the industry.  No need to worry about your stocks declining in value.  This is an automated feature that makes Abbey a winner.

  • 30+ years of trading experience went into the making of this valuable and amazing product.

  • Easy operation with detailed explanation of each aspect of how to make adjustments. Regardless of your knowledge or lack of, you will become a professional literally overnight.

  • ABBEY 9000 INCOME COMPLIES WITH ALL SECURITY EXCHANGE COMMISSION (SEC) RULES AND REGULATIONS.


There are many “automated” trading platforms out there already but they’re difficult to use and many require programming knowledge or deep knowledge of the stock market. They also typically do NOT automagically trade for you. You still have to buy and sell, meaning you still have to sit at your computer and watch boring graphs all day. This is where Abbey is different. 

You set your parameters and walk away. Abbey will do the rest.

Not convinced yet? Here’s what Abbey can do. Say, for example, you’re not one of the 1% and don’t have a lot of money. $500 is all you need to start. Here’s what Abbey does:

If you invested $500 when Abbey made the trade below, just to stay conservative,  Abbey only invested 25% into this stock by purchasing 45 shares at 2.72 per share. She lets it ride until the sell signal is given at $5.89 per share. You’ve just gained 116%. Let’s put that in simple terms.

You start with $500 in your account.

Abbey used 25% ($122.40 to be exact) to purchase 45 shares.

On the fourth day, the stock reaches $5.89 per share, signaling Abbey to sell the stock for $265.05. Out of the original $122.40 invested, you've gained $142.65, a total of 116% Return on Investment (ROI).

You now have $765.05 in your account after 4 days.

Pretty cool, eh? By compounding your earnings (leave it in the bank and let Abbey keep trading with the winnings), your income will grow exponentially.

This is an actual stock that Abbey picked. She simulated the buy and sell signals just as she would do while trading actively.



How much money can I earn with Abbey 9000?

Technically speaking, the sky's the limit! We caution that you be conservative when entering your own figures to the potential earnings spreadsheet, and later when personalizing Abbey.  After all, doesn’t it make sense to make a small profit and do it often, consistently repeating success every day?



Not convinced? Follow us over the next 30 days of trading. You will see Abbey's picks and how much you could make in a month of trading with Abbey.
CLICK HERE TO SEE HOW MUCH YOU COULD EARN WITH ABBEY 9000!

“Hello Dave” - About the Creator of Abbey 9000 – Dave Kellum

I first came to your planet at Roswell, New Mexico (by birth, not interplanetary travel), graduated Alamogordo High School. After attending New Mexico State University I later graduated from Joseph P. Keefe Technical School of Framingham Massachusetts.

 


Dave Kellum

A Jack of all Trades, I became a chem processor, machinist, tool and die maker, R&D Technician, Production Supervisor, Professional Photographer and later a Department Manager.  Yes, I have even been a Big Truck Driver as well.  The need to eat on a regular basis is a real motivator. Always known for working at least two jobs, I worked three jobs for almost nine years. 

Inspired by Dr. Edwin Land, Founder of Polaroid Corporation and my employer for 10 years, and Mr. Bill O'Neil, founder Investor's Business Daily and my Employer for 13 years, I began to develop Abbey in the Fall of 1984.  I always knew there had to be a better way to invest, and I have many discoveries towards that goal over the last 30 years.   With respect to my past experiences, remember, Dr. Land was once a college dropout.  Mr. O'Neil began investing with just $500 and eventually purchased a seat on the NYSE - when he was 29 years of age.  It only took him five years!  I owe Mr. O'Neil much gratitude and thanks for the opportunity to serve and learn from him.

MY COMPLETE BIOGRAPHY 
Join the Abbey 9000 Team:
We are always looking for talented people to join our team.  If you are a professional in software development, animation, video production, social media, Advertising, public relations, and customer service.  Write us a private message.  Tell us how you can help us bring Abbey 9000 to the public as a household name.  Private messages only.


Disclaimer:

Abbey 9000, ( the computer program and trading platform ) is planned for deployment late in 2016.   We anticipate sooner than later.  Any delays will be reported in the newsletter.Abbey, Abbey 9000 LLC, Abbey_9000 are Registered Trademarks  TM  and Copyrighted material that is in this website.  Written Permission to share concept or intellectual material is required*.
* With the exception of posts and news to any or all social media websites.  We at Abbey 9000 reserve the right to grant any person permission of use or denial of use of website and property.The Degree of Profitability by Abbey 9000 is based solely upon your instructions, settings, and parameter as options andsettings.

References to William J. O'Neil, William O'Neil & Companies, Investor's Business Daily, Investors.com ,  MarketSmith, and CAN SLIM, are purely for reference only.   There is no association, ties, agreements, or bonds between Abbey 9000 and the O'Neil companies whatsoever!

Not convinced yet? Here’s what Abbey can do. Say, for example, you’re not one of the 1% and don’t have a lot of money. $500 is all you need to start. Here’s what Abbey does:
If you invested $500 when Abbey made the trade below, just to stay conservative,  Abbey only invested 25% into this stock by purchasing 45 shares at 2.72 per share. She lets it ride until the sell signal is given at $5.89 per share. You’ve just gained 116%. Let’s put that in simple terms.
You start with $500 in your account.
Abbey used 25% ($122.40 to be exact) to purchase 45 shares.
On the fourth day, the stock reaches $5.89 per share, signaling Abbey to sell the stock for $265.05. Out of the original $122.40 invested, you've gained $142.65, a total of 116% Return on Investment (ROI).
You now have $765.05 in your account after 4 days.
Pretty cool, eh? By compounding your earnings (leave it in the bank and let Abbey keep 
trading with the winnings), your income will grow exponentially.

This is an actual stock that Abbey picked. She simulated the buy and sell signals just as she would do while trading actively.

How much money can I earn with Abbey 9000?

Technically speaking, the sky's the limit! We caution that you be conservative when entering your own figures to the potential earnings spreadsheet, and later when personalizing Abbey.  After all, doesn’t it make sense to make a small profit and do it often, consistently repeating success every day?

Not convinced? Follow us over the next 30 days of trading. You will see Abbey's picks and how much you could make in a month of trading with Abbey.CLICK HERE TO SEE HOW MUCH YOU COULD EARN WITH ABBEY 9000!“Hello Dave” - About the Creator of Abbey 9000 – Dave Kellum
I first came to your planet at Roswell, New Mexico (by birth, not interplanetary travel), graduated Alamogordo High School. After attending New Mexico State University I later graduated from Joseph P. Keefe Technical School of Framingham Massachusetts. 
  
Dave Kellum
A Jack of all Trades, I became a chem processor, machinist, tool and die maker, R&D Technician, Production Supervisor, Professional Photographer and later a Department Manager.  Yes, I have even been a Big Truck Driver as well.  The need to eat on a regular basis is a real motivator. Always known for working at least two jobs, I worked three jobs for almost nine years. 
Inspired by Dr. Edwin Land, Founder of Polaroid Corporation and my employer for 10 years, and Mr. Bill O'Neil, founder Investor's Business Daily and my Employer for 13 years, I began to develop Abbey in the Fall of 1984.  I always knew there had to be a better way to invest, and I have many discoveries towards that goal over the last 30 years.   With respect to my past experiences, remember, Dr. Land was once a college dropout.  Mr. O'Neil began investing with just $500 and eventually purchased a seat on the NYSE - when he was 29 years of age.  It only took him five years!  I owe Mr. O'Neil much gratitude and thanks for the opportunity to serve and learn from him. 
MY COMPLETE BIOGRAPHY 

Join the Abbey 9000 Team:

We are always looking for talented people to join our team.  If you are a professional in software development, animation, video production, social media, Advertising, public relations, and customer service.  Write us a private message.  Tell us how you can help us bring Abbey 9000 to the public as a household name.  Private messages only.

Abbey 9000, ( the computer program and trading platform ) is planned for deployment late in 2016.   We anticipate sooner than later.  Any delays will be reported in the newsletter.Abbey, Abbey 9000 LLC, Abbey_9000 are Registered Trademarks  TM  and Copyrighted material that is in this website.  Written Permission to share concept or intellectual material is required*.* With the exception of posts and news to any or all social media websites.  We at Abbey 9000 reserve the right to grant any person permission of use or denial of use of website and property.The Degree of Profitability by Abbey 9000 is based solely upon your instructions, settings, and parameter as options andsettings.
References to William J. O'Neil, William O'Neil & Companies, Investor's Business Daily, Investors.com ,  MarketSmith, and CAN SLIM, are purely for reference only.   There is no association, ties, agreements, or bonds between Abbey 9000 and the O'Neil companies whatsoever!

story:
Manual Сraft Team is happy to present Urban Kukri knife family to Indiegogo today. Meet, friends!

The Urban Kukri campaign launched on Kickstarter around November 7 with the modest goal of $12,00 for funding. Now campaign was fully funded by more than 390 backers who pledged over $30,000.

Ideal shape and feel of a piece of metal.

  • The simplest folding knife in the world!

  • The latest visual games in the office.

  • Steel in combination with the original materials that were used at the dawn of industrialization.

  • This knife is not just a tool, but a sculpture.

  • This knife is not just a tool, it's a memory.

  • This knife is not just an instrument, but there are eternal material and spiritual values created by the people.

  • This knife is like the armor of a higher mind.

URBAN KUKRI knife family.

Give yourself and your loved ones only high-quality outfits.

3 versions of the knife for your needs.

3 sizes, 2 colors. 100% hand made. Compact knife with a universal cutting edge.Unique compact knife size. This project is suitable for all urban residents, regardless of gender. This is a pocket knife for the city and travel.

Only quality metal.

Only the real metals of the industrial age.

This project is suitable for urban citizens, regardless of gender.

Knife-sculpture will decorate the working space of any urban resident.

Also it can and should be carried.

Buy your first collectible knife on indiegogo.

Steel in combination with the original materials that were used at the dawn of industrialization. Each unit comes with a serial number and quality certificates.

Usability of Urban Kukri. 

Each model has its own idea and functional.

Main Knife 100mm, Knife-Keychain 50mm, Knife-Jewelry 30 mm.

30 millimeter version, not only jewelry, but also useful equipment.

Unique compact knife size.

50 mm version is the perfect keychain.

Compact knife with a universal cutting edge.

100 mm version for personal customization.

The simplest pocket knife with a shock shank.

A knife that will outlive any of your gadgets.

I chose metal that is not afraid of water, fire and dirt.

A great example of industrial design.

Perfect handmade lines. Perfection in simplicity.

Still life theatre at office and at home.

URBAN KUKRI family harvest. Make colorful installations with our sculpted knives at home and at work. 

From mini installations to a real theater on the table.

Antique style in modern execution.

This is the simplest folding knife in the world, created by hand, at the moment.

In ancient times old men gave such knives to their grandchildren as a memory of the eternal. Your great ancestor would have given you this knife if he would come down tomorrow from heaven!

"Liberty proportions".

Combination of knife and sculpture. The knife can stand like a sculpture on any surface.

The most unusual thing among your favorite trifles.

A vintage knife in the 21st century looks like this.

Manual Craft team.

Risks and challenges.

I guarantee that every item will be send, because I do it on my own. 
Having reached the required amount, I will assemble a team of enthusiastic professionals who will help me to make everything faster.

The market price of such a knife is not less than $125, but since my team will make a large number of knives and we will do everything on our own to the rivet, by our hands, the cost of our product is not high.

"Perhaps in the future, if you like my design, I will release some more new prototypes.I have a lot of ideas and technical solutions on a variety of topics in the field of knife-making." 
Konstantin Shaporenko respectfully!

story:
My Pet Credentials™  (MPC) started with a personal passion, a commitment to the well being of our pets - and the realization that we could maximize our pet industry experience to create more accessible, more effective worldwide resources for managing our pets' health, their records and ensuring their safety. And we could do it with the ease of an intuitive mobile app for iOS and Android that connects people to pets and their information around the clock.

The paw print behind the program.


My name is Jeff Davis and along with my wife, Jill, and some close friends, we own a longtime pet  services business in Houston, Texas, that provides boarding, grooming, day care and dog training.

Over the years, we've seen many clients who arrive at our business to find they don't have updated  proof of vaccinations or other vital records, often required by law in many cities to board or even have a pet groomed. It can be extremely frustrating to try and quickly obtain the necessary documentation from a local veterinarian, and especially difficult if you've recently relocated.

Beyond the inconvenience, failure to have critical medical information can impact a pet's well being, if allergies to medications or chronic health disorders cannot be determined in an emergency situation. Lack of access can also affect a pet's safe return home if they're lost or stolen and microchips or other identifying tags are not current or properly registered.

We knew there had to be a solution that combined all the elements of pet management, all the time.

                                                     


Altogether simpler, always within reach, in iOS or Android.

Patterned after patient Electronic Medical Records, the MPC app for iOS and Android features a sophisticated but easy-to-use digital mobile interface that starts with creating a profile, then gathers, organizes, stores and makes available, 24 hours a day, all of a pet's information including:

- Veterinary resource(s)

- Vaccination and other records

- Health histories

- Dietary requirements

- Medications

- Special needs

- Grooming preferences

- Emergency and other contact numbers

- Unique identifiers (microchip/license registration numbers)

- Multiple pet profiles

Practical, proactive connectivity.

Ever miss an appointment or vaccination reminder? My Pet Credentials makes managing every pet’s life a much simpler process, with an intuitive design that allows you to quickly create or update each pet’s profile.

                         

Once this profile is in place, your life as a pet owner is easier. The patented MPC platform does all the work, with:

- Profile and records-sharing between designated pet medical care or services providers such as

  your veterinarian, groomer, boarding and day care facility.

- Access to all information no matter where you are.

- Appointment request and confirmation options.

- Syncing all appointments, alerts and reminders with your smartphone and/or email calendar app.

- Full functionality from your smartphone device as well as desktop/laptop or tablet.

         

The heart behind the hardware for advanced lost pet recovery.

  


 

Being separated from a pet is devastating – so the MPC total program works even harder to ensure if a pet is ever lost, the chances of a happy reunion are ideally improved:

- Uses a QR-coded, proprietary MPC ID tag – unique to your pet and its profile.

- Anyone who finds the pet can scan the tag and communicate directly via text,        phone or email.

- Profile connectivity and information-sharing with a network of shelters, rescues, municipal agencies and similar organizations.

- Complements traditional microchips and other databased identification devices and allows for these distinctive numbers to be linked to the pet's unique MPC code.

- Provides a significant measure of safety and helps circumvent potential lapses  associated with traditional identification measures if information is not up-to-date or not registered.

Be part of the solution to total pet management.

We are seeking supporters with vested interest in the health and safety of their own pets and an appreciation of the benefits available to multiple providers and pet partners everywhere. In 2016, the pet products industry anticipates over $60 billion will be spent by U.S. households on pet-related products and services.* Informed and devoted, yet challenged by lifestyle demands, pet owners are likely to continue seeking uniqueness, quality, convenience and accessibility as defining characteristics for their pet-related product choices. And that's exactly what MPC can offer with completion of our multi-version app.

Your contributions will:

- Take us over the finish line for full program development.

- Help bring MPC to market.

- Introduce beta testing with a release date of April 1, 2016 and public release on  May 1, 2016

- Develop Version 2 for veterinarians and pet adoption agency functionality.

- Design a program to collaborate with and assist nonprofit pet partners as well as pet adoption efforts.

Are you ready to raise the level of outstanding pet care management to the My Pet Credentials standards? Pledge now and get in on the rewards to see our campaign achieve its goals and beyond. Thanks for helping us become part of your and your pet’s daily lifestyle, with truly life-changing convenience.

  *Pet Industry Market Size & Ownership Statistics. (2015). American Pet Products Association.

Tech Specs

The MPC mobile app utilizes the latest generation of iOS SDK (9), Swift language and QR Code technology. Our Version 2 development will leverage the implementation of iBeacon technology. The MPC website is API-centric. It features Angular JS 1.3 as a front-end framework. Our technology follows HTML5 / CSS3 /SEO standard recommendations and is fully responsive, allowing UX to be optimized on any mobile, tablet or workstation. (ios and Android)

FAQs

What will it cost consumers to have the My Pet Credentials app?

The app is free to download and use with basic subscription that includes select functionalities!

Additional functions will be available with the premium subscription of $19.95/year, see website for full details, www.mypetcredentials.com .

How many pets can I add to the My Pet Credentials app?

You can maintain an unlimited number of pet profiles on your MPC app!

Can I make appointments for my pet using the app?

Yes, you can request appointments at any of your designated pet providers, like vets, groomer or daycare!

Will I receive notifications of appointments or vaccination reminders?

You will receive direct notifications of all appointments with your designated pet services providers, from vaccination expiration updates to pet grooming reminders!

Will you still move forward with app development regardless of your results on IndieGoGo?

We will pursue all avenues to bring My Pet Credentials to full production using additional crowdfunding options, direct funding requests, and additional development requests to reach our goal. 

A full list of FAQs is available at our website, MyPetCredentials.com...so click here to get more details about this exciting product designed by pet lovers, for pet lovers!

story:
Quick Summary

The world’s ultimate and extremely user-friendly alert solution enabling all users to instantly receive Disaster Warning Information on all types of cell (mobile) phones.
In an emergency situation people are starved of information, even though the majority carry cell phones. It is the most personal, highly relevant communications device in the history of mankind.

"Nothing in life is more important than the ability to communicate effectively." -- Gerald R. Ford, 38th President of the United States


It can happen at any time. It happened to many others in the past. Tragic photos in the headlines.

Disaster strikes and loved ones are injured or gone forever.

Billions of dollars are poured into disaster relief and very little goes to disaster prevention. Why? Because humanity is reactive rather than pro-active.

You can help us make a global difference by preventing death and terrible trauma. Have you really made your mark in the world up to now? Secure Alert Messaging offers you the opportunity to help us make a meaningful difference in the world for many years to come.

About 16,000 people died in the 2011 Japan tsunami

Some of the lucky few but they did not benefit from SAM, the Life Saving Solution.

Every year thousands die, and many more are injured in natural disasters and emergencies due to timely alerts and information not being made available to people in potential disaster locations.

Only a select few people in the world can receive Disaster Warning Information in a timely manner, as there is currently no adequate solution for relaying the information from Disaster Centres to the populace.

We have the ideal solution and need your help to complete and start implementing it. Governments from various countries have already requested us to get back to them with our completed solution as soon as possible.

Video: People complaining about no alerts or flood warnings

It is unbelievable that we live in a so-called modern day and age of technology but instant life saving alerts and warnings are not available to most people on earth. We aspire to achieve this.

Australian based EDWARDS Information Broadcast (EIB) has a socially responsible mission to provide a quick and easy method of relaying Emergency Warning information from National/State Disaster Centres to ALL cell (mobile) phone users in a country/state.

EDWARDS: Emergency Disaster Warning Alert Relaying Delivery Solutions


Overview

We have a patented* solution - SAM                                                                        

SAM = Secure Alert Messaging 

  • SAM can deliver timely alerts and quick updates to ALL enabled cell phones;
  • SAM can be sent to specific target areas only or a whole country;
  • SAM is almost ready to implement; we need help with the last bit of funding;

  • SAMs Multimedia Distribution Platform allows individual users to request specific information, even from an old legacy or non-smart phone. Many millions of people around the globe could benefit from educational content and other additional information that we can provide.

* Patent pending or granted covering 51 countries.

Currently, alerts are only available for limited smart phone types in very few areas. Our SAM solution allows messages to be received instantly by ALL cell phone users in a country and will save large numbers of people from death, injury and trauma globally.

Our cell phone solution, aimed at providing Location-Based Instant Alert Messages to all mobile phones in times of disaster, can relay information from  Disaster Centres instantly to all cell phones in targeted areas, simultaneously  before, during and in the aftermath of all types of disasters.

Follow up messages can be delivered within seconds. Our plan is to make it available on all cell phones, worldwide, at no cost to users.

SAM is an instant mass messaging system targeting any number of cell phones at the same time, and works seamlessly; it is independent of SMS, voice and data networks, which can crash or become unusable when they are overloaded.

Users can opt out of receiving most alert types other than life threatening alert messages. The solution was tested thoroughly on a large public land mobile network (PLMN) and passed all tests with flying colours.

The PLMN technology that we utilise is the recommended method of sending alert messages to the public. The European Telecommunications Standards Institute (ETSI) as well as FEMA recommends this method as the best available. See EU-ALERT ETSI TD 102 900v010101p. SAM also complies with all international requirements for location based alert systems i.e. CAP v1.2, ETSI, OASIS, WARN act etc.

Highly skilled team members are ready to go ahead as soon as we are funded. Neil Wienand is the founder and he is supported by David Mathie, former chief industrial architect of the European Space Agency. More information on the founders can be viewed here: Our Board

By helping to complete our solution you will contribute to preventing death, injury and trauma on a global scale.

Please help fund our efforts. Your contribution may very well make the difference in getting you and your loved ones out of harm’s way sometime in the near future in any country.


Why?

There is a clear and present need for an instant, secure, reliable and targetable public alert system that will reach the most people in the shortest possible time, and continue to supply them with information in times of distress and need.

To be forewarned is to be forearmed.

Current systems discriminate towards users in various ways, preventing messages from reaching all cell phone users.

SAM provides the best, most ideal solution and ticks all the boxes. Other systems already out there fail the test and do not tick all the boxes. This leads to a false sense of security and gets people killed or injured when disaster strikes.

Everyone should have access to life saving alerts and warnings.

It is a basic human right and should not be for some smart phone users in some countries only.

The quickest and best way to contact the most people instantly is via cell phones with our SAM solution. This will save lives, prevent injuries and avoid the terrible trauma of losing loved ones.

How?

SAM can deliver government authorised instant, targeted, secure alerts without needing mobile numbers or recording any personal details of users. When implemented, all mobile handsets, old or new (and not only smart phones) will display alert messages signalled by an intrusive unique alarm, vibration (if possible) and flashing lights.

Automatic roaming takes care of country specific settings and allows international travellers to be informed in the language of their choice for all countries utilising the solution.

Our mobile Multimedia Distribution Platform (M2DP) software will be used to distribute SAM over the air to all cell phones, including future software updates.
The focus will be on user friendly automation with minimal user disruption whilst respecting user privacy. The M2DP software has been used successfully on 2.5G and 3G mobile networks in Australia, Canada, Germany, Israel, Japan, Malaysia, UK and the USA and is compatible with all handsets and operating systems.

What do we want to do?

SAM is a low cost location-based solution, which we need to finalise and implement globally as quickly as possible in order to reduce further unnecessary death, injury and trauma.

SAM will operate on all handset types including older non-smart phones.

SAM is the most ideal and has many different life saving functions and uses, for example instant secure group messages for police, military, fire & rescue, all educational institutions and more. 
Critical alerts and information in the case of an active shooter. We also plan to include a user request for assistance module where users can request emergency services to come to their location.

Diagram showing the flow of emergency information with SAM

We Need

Funding to complete the development and integration of our handset module with our mobile multimedia distribution platform (M2DP). 

$22 Million has already been spent on the M2DP to complete and implement it successfully.

We have already spent $2 million on SAM and require an additional $5 million to complete and implement the solution.

We need $1.5 million, which we are trying to raise via this crowdfunding effort to allow us to generate the rest of the funding required, which will be a co-investment from government based on the amount we now raise, and tax rebates for research and development spend.

With sufficient funding we can be operational within 6 months. We are very cost conscious and utilise strict corporate governance.

Your help is urgently needed to allow us to complete the solution.

Every $ will help get us there. We have already made great progress bootstrapping towards reaching our goals, and we have received a request for our first government contract.
However, the software is not your regular mobile app. It is much more in depth, requiring special skills and of course costs a lot more than a regular mobile app to complete, integrate and implement. SAM is also dependant on supporting hardware.

Funds will be utilised as follows:

  • Let us qualify for government co-investment
  • Business Development                                                                         $ 300k
  • Software development completion and integration                   $ 900k
  • Equipment (integration hardware and software)                        $ 300k

The Impact of SAM

Instant warnings about many dangers like terrorist attacks, active shooters, natural disasters and more will certainly contribute to a better quality of life on a global basis. 
SAM could alert you, your loved ones and friends, allowing time to get out of harm's way.
You will be surprised at how few countries use AMBER Alerts and most of those are sent via FM radio or TV. 
Impact:
  • Quick, targeted AMBER Alerts can save the lives of countless children and help avoid lifelong trauma to kids in danger and their loved ones. A quick, targeted AMBER alert that results in finding a lost or kidnapped child brings immeasurable happiness and relief. There are no words that can adequately highlight the extreme importance and urgency of SAM.
  • Quick, targeted alerts can provide relief on a global scale. Recent attacks on innocent people in Europe highlights the need for quick alerts.
  • Quick, targeted alerts result in less pressure on emergency services and first responders by getting people out of harm's way. This will materially reduce financial impacts on governments, countries and aid organisations.
  • Quick automated earthquake alerts. Warning can be given precious seconds ahead of a quake (80 seconds advance warning previously for Tokio), depending on the distance from the epicentre.
  • Improved quality of life for all under the SAM umbrella, supported by our multimedia distribution platform that can provide a myriad of additional information.

Getting people out of danger quickly will save many lives. Continuous updates during and after disasters and tragedies will reduce stress and contribute greatly to quality of life.

“The most important thing in dealing with any crisis is communication.” J.W. Marriott Jr, CEO Marriott International


Risks & Challenges

There are always risks and challenges. Some of ours are:

  • Not getting SAM implemented quickly enough, allowing governments to take on inferior and dangerous solutions like SMS or alert systems for limited smart phones only.
  • Completing the SAM software, integrating it with our mobile multimedia distribution platform and implementing our solution with Telcos is a challenge but we are highly capable and will do this successfully and efficiently.

Our additional team members are highly skilled and qualified with many years of experience. Others are ready to join us as soon as we have sufficient funds available.

We have many high level contacts in all the right places in various countries who are very interested and willing to take on our SAM solution. Some countries have told us that they desperately need our solution but have no budget for it. We propose to implement it free of charge. We have already planned everything in detail with a highly skilled and experienced project management team.


In order to say thank you...

We are developing a free service and that cannot be offered as a funding incentive as it will be free. There are however various items that everyone should have in order to help them during times of disaster or displacement. We have top class, high quality, critical items that you can keep in your car or go-bag, as a thank you for your valuable contribution to make the world a better and safer place for all.
In addition we'll make our demo software available in two of the perks if we manage to get sufficient funding to complete the demo software. This includes free updates and is basically a fully functional SMS app that will demonstrate the solution and includes cool secret messaging capabilities. The final solution does not utilise SMS.
Every perk includes a certificate for contributing to saving lives at the first major disaster event where SAM is operational.
The items below provide more details on the incentives we offer.


15w Solar Charger - received rave reviews

  • 15W Solar Charger with Dual USB Port  -  max 3A total output to charge two devices simultaneously. 
  • iSmart technology ensure 100% compatibility and fastest charging speed for your devices.  
  • Foldable design, easy to carry around, great for any outdoor trips and activities.                 
  • Water-resistant and mould-resistant nylon to endure all weather conditions.


226800mAh Portable Charger battery pack


14000mAh Car Jump Starter & Portable Charger


Car Charger

  • With two 2.4A Charging Ports (total 4.8A), you can charge two tablets at the same time.
  • iSmart technology automatically adapts suitable input current for your devices and maximize the charging speed
  • As slim as a quarter and weighing only 3oz lightest, yet able to keep charging your devices anywhere
  • Sophisticated circuit design with over-heated, over-current and over-charging protection
  • Easy-to-see LED confirms whether USB charger is properly connected

PowerLight Bundle

(excludes cell phone - indicates connection to cell phone only)


CampStove - Cook and Recharge

Burning only wood, the CampStove creates a smokeless campfire that can cook meals and boil water in minutes.  Setup is easy, fuel is free, and flames are hyper efficient with performance on par with white gas stoves.
It can also generate usable electricity for charging LED lights, phones, and other personal devices.


CampStove Bundle


Deluxe Aluminum Sports Water Bottle

500 mL (16.9 fluid ounce)

Color:  Silver 

  • BPA / BPB / Phthalate free construction with attractive silver color body
  • Suitable for gyms , bike rides , camping , outdoor sports
  • Carabiner clip and split key ring allow you to attach flask to nearly any object
  • Screw top black lid with silicone ring is leak proof

Stop using disposable plastic water bottles , and make the eco friendly choice with this reusable canteen bottle


Deluxe emergency kit - 4 person backpack


Shipping

Please note that we indicate "worldwide" under shipping destinations but we only ship to the same countries that Amazon.com ships to. Please click on the link to see if your destination is included. If your destination is not included, feel free to contact us and we'll find a solution.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Every contribution will help us get closer to our goal. We understand that not everyone can contribute financially, but you can help by asking your friends and colleagues to contribute. Click the Facebook link and share. Please share on LinkedIn and other social media. That extra contribution could get SAM implemented in your country quicker. SAM may even save you or your family.
story_txt:
Quick SummaryThe world’s ultimate and extremely user-friendly alert solution enabling all users to instantly receive Disaster
Warning Information on all types of cell (mobile) phones. In
an emergency situation people are starved of information, even though the majority carry cell phones. It is the most personal, highly relevant communications
device in the history of mankind.
"Nothing in life is more
important than the ability to communicate effectively." -- Gerald R. Ford, 38th President of the United States 


It can
happen at any time. It happened to many others in the past. Tragic photos in
the headlines. 
Disaster
strikes and loved ones are injured or gone forever.
Billions
of dollars are poured into disaster relief and very little goes to disaster
prevention. Why?
Because humanity is reactive rather than pro-active.

You can
help us make a global difference by preventing death and terrible trauma. Have
you really made your mark in the world up to now? Secure Alert Messaging offers you the
opportunity to help us make a meaningful difference in the world for many years
to come.
About
16,000 people died in the 2011 Japan tsunami

Some
of the lucky few but they did not benefit from SAM, the Life Saving Solution.


Every year
thousands die, and many more are injured in natural disasters and emergencies
due to timely alerts and information not being made available to
people in potential disaster locations.
Only a select few people in the world
can receive Disaster Warning Information in a timely manner, as there is
currently no adequate solution for relaying the information from 
Disaster Centres to the populace. We have the ideal solution and need your help to complete and start implementing it. Governments from various countries have already requested us to get back to them with our completed solution as soon as possible. Video: People complaining about no alerts or flood warnings
It is
unbelievable that we live in a so-called modern day and age of technology
but instant life saving alerts and warnings are not available
to most people on earth. We aspire to achieve this.
Australian
based EDWARDS Information Broadcast (EIB)
has a socially responsible mission to provide a quick and easy method of
relaying Emergency Warning information from National/State Disaster Centres to ALL cell (mobile) phone users in a country/state.
EDWARDS: Emergency Disaster Warning Alert Relaying Delivery Solutions


Overview 

We have a patented* solution - SAM                                                                         SAM = Secure Alert Messaging 
SAM can deliver timely alerts and quick updates to ALL enabled cell phones;
SAM can be sent to specific target areas only or a whole country;
SAM is almost ready to implement; we need help with the last bit of funding;

SAMs Multimedia Distribution Platform allows individual users to request specific information, even from an old
legacy or non-smart phone. Many millions of people around the
globe could benefit from educational content and other additional
information that we can provide.

* Patent pending or granted covering 51 countries.
Currently, alerts
are only available for limited smart phone types in very few areas. Our SAM solution
allows messages to be received instantly by ALL cell phone users in a country and will save
large numbers of people from death, injury and trauma globally.
Our cell
phone solution, aimed at providing Location-Based Instant Alert Messages to all
mobile phones in times of disaster, can relay information from  
Disaster Centres instantly to all cell phones in targeted areas, simultaneously  before,
during and in the aftermath of all types of disasters. Follow up messages can be delivered within seconds. Our plan is to make it
available on all cell phones, worldwide, at no cost to users.
SAM is an
instant mass messaging system targeting any number of cell phones at the same time, and works seamlessly; it is independent of SMS, voice and data networks, which
can crash or become unusable when they are overloaded. Users can opt out of receiving most alert types other than life threatening alert messages. The solution was tested thoroughly on a large public land mobile network (PLMN) and passed all tests with flying colours.The PLMN technology that we utilise is the recommended method of sending alert messages to the public. The
European Telecommunications Standards Institute (ETSI) as well as FEMA recommends this method as the best available. See EU-ALERT ETSI TD 102 900v010101p. SAM also complies with all
     international requirements for location based alert systems i.e. CAP v1.2, ETSI, OASIS, WARN act etc.

Highly skilled team members are ready to go ahead as soon as we are funded. Neil Wienand is the founder and he is supported by David Mathie, former
chief industrial architect of the European Space Agency. More information on the founders can be viewed here: Our Board
By helping to
complete our solution you will contribute to preventing death, injury and trauma on a
global scale. 
Please help
fund our efforts. Your contribution may very well make the difference in getting you and your loved ones out of harm’s way sometime in the near
future in any country.


Why?




There is a
clear and present need for an instant, secure, reliable and targetable public
alert system that will reach the most people in the shortest possible time, and
continue to supply them with information in times of distress and need. 
To be
forewarned is to be forearmed. 
Current
systems discriminate towards users in various ways, preventing messages from
reaching all cell phone users. SAM provides the best, most ideal
solution and ticks all the boxes. Other systems already out there fail the test
and do not tick all the boxes. This leads to a false sense of security and 
gets people killed or injured when disaster strikes.
Everyone
should have access to life saving alerts and warnings. It is a basic human
right and should not be for some smart phone users in some countries only. The quickest and best
way to contact the most people instantly is via cell phones with our SAM
solution. This will save lives, prevent injuries and avoid the terrible trauma
of losing loved ones.





How?




SAM can deliver government
authorised instant, targeted, secure alerts without needing mobile numbers or
recording any personal details of users. When
implemented, all mobile handsets, old or new (and not only smart phones)
will display alert messages signalled by an intrusive unique alarm, vibration
(if possible) and flashing lights. Automatic roaming takes care of country specific settings and allows international travellers to be
informed in the language of their choice for all countries utilising the solution.

Our
mobile Multimedia Distribution Platform (M2DP) software will be used
to distribute SAM over the air to all cell phones, including future software updates. The focus
will be on user friendly automation with minimal user disruption whilst respecting user privacy. The M2DP
software has been used successfully on 2.5G and 3G mobile networks in Australia,
Canada, Germany, Israel, Japan, Malaysia, UK and the USA and is compatible with
all handsets and operating systems.What do we want to do?
SAM is a
low cost location-based solution, which we need to finalise and implement globally
as quickly as possible in order to reduce further unnecessary death, injury and
trauma. SAM will operate on all handset types including older non-smart phones.

SAM is the most ideal and has many different life saving functions and uses, for example instant
secure group messages for police, military, fire & rescue, all educational institutions and more. Critical alerts and information in the case of an active shooter. We also plan to include a user request for assistance module where users can request emergency services to come to their location.



Diagram showing the flow of emergency information with SAM

We Need 
Funding to complete the
development and integration of our handset module with our mobile multimedia distribution platform (M2DP). $22 Million has already been spent on the M2DP to complete and implement it successfully. We have already spent
$2 million on SAM and require an additional $5 million to complete and
implement the solution. We need $1.5 million, which we are trying to raise via this crowdfunding effort to allow us to generate the rest of the funding required, which will be a co-investment from government based on the amount we now raise, and tax rebates for research and development spend. With sufficient funding we can be operational within 6
months. We are very cost conscious and utilise strict corporate governance. 
Your help is urgently needed to
allow us to complete the solution.

Every
$ will help get us there. We have already made great progress bootstrapping
towards reaching our goals, and we have received a request for our first
government contract. However, the software is not your regular mobile
app. It is much more in depth, requiring special skills and of
course costs a lot more than a regular mobile app to complete, integrate
and implement. SAM is also dependant on supporting hardware.

story: I would like help buying Katy Perry's giant robot tiger, because after the big game, I worry it'll be another flower in the attic (V.C. Andrews)... and I wanna ride it (Ginuwine). My name is Emmett Morrison, and you have 60 days.
